111111.content:
Twilight was working on a new assignment for Princess Celestia, which was to create a spell that could increase the life of a pony for 20 years. She was close to making a complete version of the spell, but the problem was that she did not have a test subject for the time being. That meant she would have to use herself as the test subject. Once she was ready to see what happened with the spell by standing in front of a mirror, she used the spell on herself and then tried to examine if anything was different about her.

Her body was okay and she felt fine, but after a few minutes of looking in the mirror, she felt like going into the living area of the library and then...
111111.title: Baby (1-2 Years Old)

choices: Get her friends over to help.
1111111.content:
The moment Twilight stepped into the living room, something came over her. Twilight had an uncontrollable urge to do something she would never do. Without thinking, she got up on the couch and start hopping up and down much like Pinkie Pie does when she goes everywhere. As she jumped, joy filled her and was shown by a smile on her face. Feathers floated up from the couch and covered the floor. At that moment, Spike walked into the room.

"Hey Twilight, hav-"

He stop and stared at her. "What the hay are you doing?" asked Spike.

"Playing." Twilight responded in a childish tone.

"Are you feeling okay?" Spike asked, now worried.

"Never better. Why you ask?"

"Well, I can see there's something wrong, and I think it's best if you headed to bed."

"But I wanna...."

"Twilight, I think you really need to rest," Spike said, driving his point home.

"Fine!" said Twilight, mad like a child who had been sent to time out. With that Twilight got off the couch and headed to her bed. Now Spike had to figure out what to do.
1111111.title: Jump Up and Down on the Couch

choices: Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash and Pinkie Pie
11111111.content:
Spike was downstairs thinking of what to write down on a scroll. He needed to ask for help from anyone that was available to help out with Twilight, and so he had to think fast, in case something was REALLY wrong with her.

Dear _____________!

Twilight is acting strange.. I don't know how to explain this but she is acting like a kid. I came back from the store after getting some food and then she was acting like a kid jumping up and down on the couch while talking in the style of one.. I don't know what is wrong with her. But I hope someone can give me a helping hand to find out what is wrong with her.

--Spike.


Spike had made four more copies of the same letter and in the blanks that followed "Dear" on each one, he signed each with the names of Twilight's friends, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash, & Rarity. After Spike sent out the message to the respective ponies, he went back upstairs to see what Twilight was doing. He slowly went upstairs, listening for any loud noises that might have happened just in case she hurt herself or did something she wasn't supposed to do. After he reached the top of the stairs, he took a deep breath and slowly poked his head into the room and saw Twilight. She was lying on her bed, on her back, looking up at the ceiling.

"Why do the stars look so bright?" said Twilight playfully.

Spike watched as she started to get off her bed and looked out the window at the stars.

"Why is everyone mean?!" Twilight said with a sad tone.

She looked behind her and saw a small piece of cake that was sitting there on a lonely small wooden table. She slowly walked over to it and licked it slowly to take the icing off the top of it.

"This cake is nice... Why is Spike so mean to me?" said Twilight was a big frown on her face.

Spike was a little angry and shocked that Twilight had said such things about him and he slowly walked into the room, properly pretending that he didn't see her licking the cake and looking out the window. Then quickly, Twilight turned around and zoomed straight to her bed and then hid under her quilt covers.

"Please go away! I just want to pway with my toys..." said Twilight who was looking pretty scared.

"Twilight, I just wanna know why you're acting like a kid, that's all I wanna know," said Spike with a curious look on his face.

"I don't know! Leave me alone, meanie!"

Spike heard the knocking on the door downstairs, as he hoped it was Twilight's friends, who would be able to knock some sense into Twilight and stop making her act like a child.

"I'll get it!!!" said Twilight with a massive smile on her face.

As she got up from under her bed, she tried to run down stairs but Spike was in the way and then he stopped her by putting his hand right in her face.

"Oh no you don't!" he commanded. "You are still in time out, so you gotta stay up here!"

Twilight stopped and then sat down on the ground while crossing her arms with a big frown on her face.

"Okay... you win!" said Twilight.

Spike quickly ran downstairs and looked through the window and outside of the library was ...
11111111.title: Calling for Help!

111111111.content:
Spike opened the door and welcomed the three ponies in.

"What is wrong with Twilight?" asked Rainbow Dash.

"I don't know. I just got home from the store when I found Twilight acting weird," Spike answered.

"Uh, weird how?" asked Fluttershy, in her distinctive soft voice.

"Well, she was jumping up and down on the sofa!"

Pinkie exclaimed cheerfully, "That's not weird, it's fun! You just jump up and down and up and down and u-!"

"I mean, it's weird for Twilight," Spike interrupted the hyper party pony.

"Well, maybe we should see her then... if that's okay with you..." said Fluttershy
111111111.title: Help from friends.

1111111112.content:
Spike looked down to the ground and then slowly looked up at the three.

"Well erm... you can't see her yet..." said Spike.

Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash were confused at what Spike was saying, as he had asked them to quickly come to help her and now they can't, for some reason.

"If there's a problem with her, then we have to see her right now!" demanded Rainbow Dash.

Spike looked at the stairs and saw that Twilight's bedroom door was closed. He knew that Twilight had closed it because he left it open when he came down the stairs.

"If you go and look, can you promise me that you'll be quiet about it and not make any loud noises?" said Spike with a look of worry on his face.

Fluttershy was perfect for the job of being calm and quiet, maybe she could be able to reason with the newly regressed Twilight. Although she didn't want to intrude on Twilight in case she was doing something private, she wanted to find out what was wrong with her unicorn friend.

"Um... maybe I should go up... because I am quiet... and I could look at what she is doing without her noticing that I am there?" said Fluttershy with her distinct soft tone.

Spike agreed with Fluttershy, but Rainbow Dash on the other hand just wanted to go upstairs and find out what was going on right now.

"Spike, why is Twilight upstairs anyways?" said Rainbow Dash with a tone of confusion.

Spike looked at Rainbow Dash like he had a hard time of trying to find what he wanted to say.

"Well...IcamefromthestoreaftergettingsomefoodandthenIsawTwilightactlikea kidjumpingupanddownthechouchandnotlisteningtomesoIsenthertoherroomandsheisinTIME OUTandsheisreallyupsetwithmeandissayingreallyweirdthings!!!" said Spike constantly rushing out his words making sure he didn't stop.

Rainbow Dash didn't understand a thing that Spike said but Fluttershy somehow managed to understand the quickfire of Spike's words.

And so did Pinkie Pie, who managed to squeeze in her trade of words.

"Maybe the clock is broken and needs fixing! That's why she's in time out!" said Pinkie Pie with that everlasting smile on her face.

Fluttershy, Rainbow Dash and Spike turned away from Pinkie Pie since they knew random innapropriate comments would not help them at all.

"You know what? I am going up there!" said ...

RD face hooved causing baby Twilight to giggle. Oh duh. Yeah Spike basically grew up with Twilight, or something. I’m sure he would know.

At that moment Spike re-entered the room carrying a bottle of milk. Um, here’s the milk. He said hesitantly holding it out afraid of scaring Twilight again.

Fluttershy took it with a kind smile and handed it over to Dash. Um, Flutters. If its not obvious I have very little experience with foals. Dash said nervously eyeing the bottle. Twilight had also noticed it and was making excited happy noises reaching for it.

Both mares and the dragon smiled at the cute act. Just hold her like this Rainbow. The yellow Pegasus said demonstrating the proper position. RD copied it and soon Twilight was nursing making happy cooing sounds as she rapidly drained the bottle.

The prismatic Pegasus was distracted by the scene for a moment before snapping back. Oh yeah! Hey Spike, do you know how to get into contact with Twilights’ parents?

The dragon blinked then facepalmed. Argg! Of course! They would want to know what happened. And Celestia too, she can probably fix this! I’ll send them a message right away, express to Canterlot. She’ll make sure they know. I’ll be back when she replies.

Thanks Spike! Thank you Spike. RD and Shy said together. The dragon rubbed his arm. Hey its nothing. I, I want to help to and fix this you know? Both mares nodded and Spike left to send the message.

So what do we do in the meantime? Dash asked as Twilight finished dropping the empty bottle with a content look on her face, which soon turned to confusion and discomfort and she made a whimpering whine.

Shy giggled. Well first I think a little filly needs to be burped, then we should probably get her into a diaper. Rainbows’ eyes shrunk at that and she quickly passed the foal off to Fluttershy.

The yellow pegasus rolled her eyes but took Twilight and gave the foal a few pats on her back. A massive belch escaped her mouth, making the foal giggle.

The diaper change itself was, relatively easy. As a foal Twilight was easy to pin down but the foal wanted to play some more, and some part of her mind knew that she wasn’t supposed to wear the fluffly white thing that the nice-not-mommy was trying to put on her.

They finally managed to distract her and quickly get the diaper on. Twilight poked it with a hoof, feeling the garment crinkle and how soft it was around her flank. Giggling the foal started rocking back and forth making both mares smile at the cute scene.

So now what? Dash asked.

Spike spoke up against this behavior first, "Uhh...what's going on here?! Princess, you can't actually let Twilight accept you as her mother, can you?! I mean, what would the consequences be towards allowing that when we restore her age?! Her mind could...could be trapped as a foal's or something just as horrible! I am going to raise her as m-y true child, and none of you will stop me! Who has the power to stand up to me of you all? Let me make a wild guess, and say zero! I call the shots, and am deserving to! I always make the right decisions, and I feel this is one of my best! So, say anything against my wishes, and I will ponysally throw you out of here!"

1111111112122121112112112111.content:
Spike and co. turned to find...Twilight returned to normal!

Yay, they wish!

They actually got the cold, fiery eyes of Celestia to stare down upon them with uncontrollable power.

Her Canterlot voice began, "HOW DARE YOU..."

She shut her mouth immediatey, and thought over what she almost did. Luna shook in a far corner of her crib, clutching a teddy bear for comfort in the fear of her 'mother.'

Celestia magically threw the intruders out of the room, slammed the door, and cared for her little Luna.

When she teleported outside, the group had finally gotten uncluttered off the floor and readied to fight.

Celestia smirked, "Oh, what?! Wishing to attack me?!"

She chuckled, then continued, "Please. We can all be civil here, yes?! I don't wish to fight you! I just want to regress you!"

Rainbow attempted a flying kick, of which Celestia sidestepped. Celestia, faster than Rainbow could focus on dodging, punched her in the side, sending the girl soaring to the hallway's end.

Celestia cracked her own neck to prepare herself for a workout, saying, "Next!"

Rarity snorted, then ran up to the royal, blasting away with magic.

Celestia dramatically yawned, using a shield of pure magic herself. Though, she had much strong defense than Rarity's spells, so the protection she created didn't take a major beating from the repetition of castings.

Rarity drew in deep breaths from exhaustion by the time she reached Celestia.

She tried one more blast at near point-blank range, but Celestia struck her on the head hard. Rarity's eyes closed, and she fell unconscious.

Applejack snuck up behind Celestia somehow, and jumped up on the larger pony. She put Celestia in a chokehold, squeezing with all her Earth pony strength. Celestia struggled to thrash Applejack off her, and did so after almost losing consciousness.

Clutching her own neck, Celestia said with some labor, "No...more...nice...mommy!"

Applejack got caught in Celestia's telepathic grip, and started being slammed into the walls on either side of her.

Even with a pretty large amount of endurance, Applejack didn't last past the seventh wall strike, dropping to a heap.

Pinkie Pie giggled, "Hi, Celly!"

Celestia raised an eyebrow, "...Yes, Pinkamena?"

She brought out her signature party cannon...from nowhere seemingly, "Bye!"

And, released volley after volley of surprisingly devastating confetti shots. Only the first two smashed into Celestia, but didn't hurt too bad.

Celestia teleported behind Pinkie, yanked her up, jammed her into the cannon, then pulled the string.

Pinkie rocketed into a wall, and said before joining her defeated friends in dreamland, "Nighty-night..."

All that remained was Spike and Fluttershy. Not the best team.

Fluttershy just cowered on the floor, and Celestia walked around her to stand against Spike.

Celestia responded to him taking his claws out, "Oh, put those away! Honestly, I won't fight a baby."

Spike lowered his guard, and was shot with a Sleep spell.

Celestia grinned, "Didn't say I would not let you take a nap though."

And, finished the battle by returning to Fluttershy, also casting a Sleep spell on her.

"Do you really want to know, because this explanation will be quite long."

111111111212212111211211211121.title: Nope

choices: "Ah just can't let yall do that to me"
111111111212212111211211211122.content:
"Ah am the element of honesty princess, there's no use lyin to me." Applejack reminded. With a sit, Celestia began her story.

"It all started before Twilight became my student. I had known she was the element of magic since she was born so I .... watched over her. She studied hard and her magic grew beyond my own expectations. I would have thought her parents would have been proud of her...... but instead seemed fearful and almost jealous of her growing knowledge. Out in public, they praised her, but when they were home and thought nopony was watching, they would belittle her, beat her and even...." Celestia forcefully held back tears ".....other things. This I later discovered led to Twilight's OCD and her fear of displeasing me. For if something was wrong with her, her parents would.......not hold back. As time passed and she became my student, I realized this wasn't the first time I saw this happen. I had realized my own sister was a victim of our parents. I realize now the reason she wanted the night to last forever was not a question of subject loyalty, but the hope our parents would realize her importance. Luckily they did not live long enough to see the monster they had created. Even after all these years, the scars still run deep for Luna and many nights have been restless for me as she would cry in her sleep. I decided there was only one solution to end her pain: to turn her into a foal and show her a loving parent in the form of me. My plan appears to be working as she seems happier now then I ever remember. My next target was to be Twilight, however you all brought her to me and I saw she did the spell for me. Now Luna has a sister to play with and all they will remember is that I was their loving and caring mother.

Applejack looked around, surprised to see the others were still asleep after the time it took Celestia to give that speech. "Ah still don't like this princess." Applejack said as she struggled in her chains"Ah understand your intentions, but that still don't make this right." With a scoff Celestia answered "Says the mare who hardly knew her parents." Hearing that, Applejack froze "I can look right into you little miss honesty" Celestia said with a grin "I can tell your jealous of your friends just because they actually had parents for their foalhood and what did you have? Your big brother and your grandmother? You should be happy, am letting you have a second chance at living the life of a foal that knows what it's like to have a mother to protect her from harm. However, despite your current situation, I won't force this on you. Just say the word and I can let you go. The others could use a big sister anyway."

Applejack looked to her friends as they began to finally wake up, then back to Celestia and the two foal she just realized were here. "Ah don't have any regrets for my life..." she thought ".... and yet Celestia's right."
111111111212212111211211211122.title: "Ah need ya to be honest"

choices: A guard enters the room and interupts
1111111112122121112112112111221.content:
As much as Applejack hated to admit it, Celestia was right. Not a day in her life had gone by when she didn't look at her friends in envy over the fact they had mothers during their lives. As tears began to stream down her eyes, she spoke. "Please Celestia, your right, please, make me your daughter." Celestia smiled as her horn became a soft blue "I knew you would see things my way."

Applejack could feel the magic coursing through her body and began to relax, knowing her life was about to become so much better. She looked over at her friends, woken up and beginning realize what was happening to her. The most shocked was the little dragon..... what was his name again? Applejack didn't care about him anyway, neither did she care when she looked at the others and couldn't remember them either. What she did know was that they seemed smaller a few seconds ago, and now they seemed to tower over her. She looked at her hooves and noticed she could slip through the chains holding her. Once she was down, she looked at the five strangers trapped against the wall and giggled as she watched them struggle against the chains. She could feel sompony behind her and looked to see a tall ,white, and familiar alicorn smiling at her. She remembered why the alicorn looked familiar: she was her mommy(and she remembered her name). Trotting up to her, Applejack nuzzled her leg saying "I wuv you mommy Cwestia."

"I love you too my dear Applejack." Celestia said with a motherly smile "Go and play with your sisters, mommy has work to do." As Applejack left to play with Twilight and Luna, Celestia turned to her captives who were shocked into silence. "Now for the rest of you........."

He recognized the the yellow fur and pink mane immediately as Fluttershy's, however she didn't seem herself. While her fur was it's normal color, it appeared to have an unsettling tint of gray to it. Her eyes, blood-red colored, watched with malicious intent and she hung from the ceiling. Shining watched, frozen with horror as the pony he knew as one of his sister's friends spread out large bat wings and descended from the ceiling. A dangerous animal was bad enough, but Fluttershy was discorded like Twilight said she once was, it would be a problem.

...

Jab to the chest, jab to the back, jab to the side, jab to the neck. Finally, jab to the stomach when he was launched into the air from all the previous strikes.

Everything happened so fast he couldn't even know about all the damage done until he landed onto the ground, and was given time to breathe.

Shining struggled to his hooves, saying with gasps, "...Buck. Didn't think she was that fast. Sure can't fight something like her...right now. Must...run."

He turned, and dashed right where he had come from.

Well....... BOO-BUCKING-HOO you big baby, why don't you cry to your wife so she can help do YOUR job for you." Not realizing where he was going, Shining smacked right into a wall and blacked out. 11111111121221211121121121112212111211.content:
Stirring awake, Shining could tell he was in chest-deep waters. Only...in a reclined position.

And...the water was...quite warm, actually. Soothingly warm.

Eyes peeked open, he then saw himself inside the very last place he could ever have expected: a spa.

...

Shining said in obvious confusion, "Okay, what the buck?!"

And...the very last pony expected to appear, did.

Celestia pushed the doors open, announcing, "Hellloo, Shining! How is my favorite stallion in the world doing?!"

Shining's eyes tracked the princess as she walked to sit near the pool.

She laid on the ground, friendly grin stuck on her face, "Oh, Shiny. Did you find everything in my little castle to your liking?"

Shining growled, "No. I most certainly didn't. My sister's being held hostage by you. And...I'd make a damn good assumption you transformed her friends. I already met...a few."

Celestia magically brought out a viewing orb of most of the Mane 6, "Why say that? Her friends are just fine. Sure, caught up in chains, but fine."

"...Still. You're keeping them hostage! And, don't you dare disregard what I previously said! What of my sister?! Also, why would Luna allow this to happen?! Did you do something to her as well?!"

Celestia chuckled at his demands, "Dear colt, I don't have to do a thing you ask. Well, yell. All I have to do is sit and watch the show."

Celestia proceeded to put a hoof an inch from the water, leaving it suspended. Then, shot it back, as if the water was deadly.

Shining noticed this, and immediately splashed her several times.

He shouted victory, "Ha! Whatever effects cursed upon me will now be played upon you! Revenge is a dish best served at room-temperature apparently!"

Celestia's grin disappeared.

She shook the water from her body, saying, "That wasn't very nice!"

Then, when her coat and mane were no longer soaked, Celestia's face turned right back to happiness as she explained, "But, Momma Celly's still okay! You know...that was cute. Truly adorable of you to believe a little water could get to me. No, no. You see, that pool you've been in for the last few hours does have some special effects. A pony sprayed by its water won't have to worry about anything though. Now, if somepony were to take a dip in it for a long period of time, the pool's abilities would kick in then. Which you have."

He stood up, fully enraged at her now.

Celestia told a warning, "I wouldn't do that. You try to leave that pool, then you can say good-bye to all your years except the first. That's right, baby! The pool doesn't regress you when you're swimming! Although, attempting to leave its waters will leave you a sweet little foal! Go on. Come attack me."
11111111121221211121121121112212111211.title: A spa

choices: The two embrace as Shining become a foal
111111111212212111211211211122121112111.content: Shining kept his anger, but decided he would have to think of something. "You know" Celestia said with a sick grin " You should be glad I have made your sister into my own foal." Looking up from his watery "prison" Shining asked "Give me one good reason as to why." Circling around the pool, Celestia laughed "Because her real childhood parents were nowhere as kind to her as I ever was or will be." As Shining gave her a quizzical look, Celestia shot a glare at him " Don't act like you don't know what I'm talking about! You knew all along didn't you?" As tears began streaming down the alicorn's face, she continued. "All she wanted was to be a good daughter and her parents punished her, for what I ask? SIMPLY FOR LEARNING!!! Not only that, but you saw how troubled she was and the effects it was having on her. I ask you, WHAT DID YOU DO TO HELP HER?!? NOTHING!!! WHILE YOU WERE TRULY PRAISED AND RESPECTED, YOUR SISTER WAS GOING THROUGH THE MOST HORRID YEARS OF HER LIFE AND YOU DIDN'T LIFT A HOOF TO HELP HER!!!!!" Shining sat in the pool, mortified not only by Celestia's turn of voice, but also how she had a point. In fact, he had actually witnessed his sister getting a tough beating simply for having figured out a spell a week before most unicorns did. His parents never knew and he never shared it with anypony. Seeing her words were getting to him, Celestia went back to her comforting voice and spoke. "But it won't matter soon, Twilight will have a happy foalhood thanks to me. Alongside her is Luna, Applejack, and soon the rest of the Twilight's friends." Looking at Shining with motherly eyes "However, I can also give you a second chance as well." Laying down and holding out her hooves "Come to me, come out of the pool and you can join your sister and my family. Shining looked at the comforting hug, given that he was on the verge of crying he wanted some comfort. At that moment, he wanted nothing more then to start it all over, and now was his chance.

At least it seemed to be her, however her body seemed quite like that of a crystal pony, then again she looked less like a pony and more like a dragon. Looking around, Shining was relived to see a door behind the two sleeping creatures that was no doubt the way out. Wanting to get out of this Dragon's Lair( ;) ), Shining made a dash for the door.

"Because do you want all of this Age Regression nonsense to stop?" said Celestia.

"Yes." said Luna.

"We have always had a good childhood.." said Celestia.

Twilights sleep was deep and dreamless. Honestly it was the best sleep she had in a long time, literally sleeping like a foal. Twilight eventually half woke with a yawn. Still sleepy Twilight moved on autopilot and tried to hop out of her bed.

However, what was a short step for an adult was a pretty long foal for a foal.

Twilight landed with a thud her eyes flying open in shock as the pain of the impact registered and the events of the day came rushing back. She was a foal again! She had just fallen out of her own bed and it hurt! The regressed pony immediately felt her eyes tear up and before she could stop herself Twilight found herself crying the loud long wail of an infant who just hurt herself.

Twilight tried to stop herself, but for some reason she just couldn't. She was hurt, confused, did not want to be a baby, and the only way she could think of expressing this was to cry.

It worked though as she soon heard the door burst open and someone move to tend to her. Twilight stopped crying just long enough to open her eyes to see..

11112112112212211.content:
Wat? Twilight bluntly giving her friend a look. To her credit the alabaster unicorn looked sheepish, but that didn't stop her from carrying the foal downstairs.


You see Twilight I had a wonderful flash of inspiration when I saw you sleeping and I just had, had to start a new line of foal outfits. Rarity finished with a little squeal several outfits now hovering in her magic.

Twilights eyes widened in horror. A part of her was briefly aware of Spike making a hasty exit to another part of the shop as Rarity set Twilight up on the show stage.
Wawity! Nu! Me not gonna be a mod-wal! Twilight declaired stamping a hoof defiantly.

Aw, come on Twilight smile! Rarity pleaded as she adjusted the bonnet on the foals head a camera hovering in her magic. Twilight just looked at her with the mother of all outs her forelegs crossed defiantly.

Twilight was Raritys' model for the day it seemed. And she was not happy about it! Twilight had learned some more things about her predicament which only soured her mood further.

First her magic strength and control were gone. She had tried teleporting, levitation, even opening a door were beyond her now. Twilight also discovered that her vocabulary had shrunk. When she tried to speak she found herself only able to say small simple words and phrases a young filly or colt would know. Lastly Twilight discovered if she got really excited, or really upset, the few words she could say started mixing together until she was babbling like a baby.

In all it made for a very unhappy filly. Twilight wanted to fix this, not moddle foal outfits and she was making Rarity know it! Twilight had to admit they were cute though and would look good on a real foal. Twilight however was just emberessed having Rarity constantly mix and match, swapping them on and off her and dressing her in such emberessingly infantile garmets.

Come on Twilight, just smile please. This is the last one. Rarity pleaded. Twilight continued to pout. Rarity frowned, then she got a wicked grin on her face as she remebered something she used to do with Sweetie Bell. Before Twilight knew it she was squealing wiht laughfter as Rarity tickled her hooves. The mare stopped after just a moment letting Twilight catch her breath.

The purple foal was still smiling happily when Rarity snapped a pciture. And perfect! Thats going on the cover! Rarity exclaimed as Twilight calmed down and started chewing on her hoof again. What was she upset about again? Well it wasn't important if she couldn't remeber it. Oh what a pretty dress! Twilight cooed happily and started playing with her outfit.

Seeing this Rarity frowned. Twilight was giggling happily seemingly without a care in the world, and that worried her. Was their friend regressing in mind as well, or was this jsut a side effect of the spell?

The pair were interupted when
11112112112212211.title: I need a modely for my new line of foal outfits.

Once there, the fashionista laid down on one side and gently placed Twilight near her hind hooves. "Okay darling, drink up." Said Rarity lifting her leg to let her friend get to her teats. Twilight could only blush in embarrassment at was going on. "Don't worry about it Twilight. After Spike told me what happened, he and I went to see Zecora. And she gave me a potion that helps produce milk for young fillies and colts like yourself." Explained Rarity seeing the look on Twilight's face.

She might get use to this.

111121121122122112112.title: She got distracted.

1111211211221221121121.content:
Twilight stopped seeing a few foal toys scattered near her. Apparently Rarity had left a few in case "her foal" needed something to do during the modeling session, or as accessories. With Rarity busy working on something, ("Please don't let it be another outfit for me to model!" Twilight pleaded mentally) Twilight would have to walk by them to get Rarities attention.

It never occurred to Twilight that after she had finished nursing Rarity had set her off to the side next to the toys for a reason. They did look really inviting. Twilight shook her head fixing her expression, but a strange urge hit her. She looked back at the pile biting her lip. "A few minutes won't hurt." She finally decided toddling over and setting down on her diapered rear near the pile.

Twilight let out a little squeal of delight when she spotted a familiar doll amongst the offerings. "Smawty-Pants!" The filly cooed scooping her old doll into a hug.

Rarity looked up briefly to see Twilight playing with her doll and toys, holding a babbling conversation with her doll as blocks, rattles, and even a few books were examined and played with. True fully Rarity was a bit hesitant looking after Twilight when she was like this.

Rarity and foals just did not mix most days, but. Maybe it was just the fact that Twilight was a dear friend but there was just something about the little purple foal that made Raritys' heart flutter. Rarity knew that the other girls would swap Twilight until this was fixed, but honestly Rarity wouldn't mind looking after Twilight a bit longer. The alabaster mare smiled and went back to her work. Twilight would look absolutely precious in this new onesie!

Twilight soon lost track of time as she played, simply enjoying the carefree feeling as she tested each toy out. After trying everything else out though, she found a book of her favorite stories from her fillyhood and was determined to read it from beginning to end. So she sat with Smartypants hugged close as she read page after page.

Twilight had just gotten half-way through when Rarity suddenly picked her up. Twilight let out a cry of shocked-protest reaching for her precious book.

"Now, now, Twilight." Rarity gently chided. "You can go back to your book later. Right now a certain little filly..."
1111211211221221121121.title: Saw and started playing with some toys

11112112112212211211212.content: "Needs to take a nap." Said Rarity placing Twilight on her bed. "I'm not tired Rarity." Retorted Twilight. "Tired or not. You need sleep darling."Replied the fashionista. Twilight tried to argue with her friend, but she let a yawn that only proving Rarity's point. Once Twilight was asleep, Rarity went back to her design for the new line of clothes for young fillies and colts. Rarity felt good taking care of her friend like this. It gave her the chance to see what it was like to be a mother. Just then, a new thought popped into her mind. What if she made something for mothers who nursed their babies. And that idea in mind, Rarity started a new sketch for her line. An hour later...
11112112112212211211212.title: "Needs to take her nap."

111121121122122112112122.content:
Somepony knock on the door.

Who is it?
111121121122122112112122.title: Somepony knocked on Rarity's door

1111211211221221121121222.content: "Hello there, Pinkie Pie. What brings you here?" Asked Rarity. "Hi Rarity. I'm here to help you with taking care of Twilight." Said the pink party pony. Rarity was a little surprised by the fact that Pinkie Pie knew about Twilight's current state. But then she remembered that she was talking to Pinkie and hardly anything in Ponyville could happen without her knowing about it for long. "I am right in assuming that Spike told you about that?" Asked Rarity. "Yup. He was at Sugar Cube Corner today and told me everything. So I thought I might be able to lend a hoof if I could." Replied Pinkie Pie. Just then, the pair heard crying from upstairs and both rushed to see what was wrong.
1111211211221221121121222.title: Pinky Pie

11112112112212211211212222.content:
Both mares burst through the door to the bedroom, with Rarity honestly expecting the worst. However, nothing stuck out to the unicorn. The room was still in order, the only thing that seemed wrong was Twilight. The little foal was crying at the top of her lungs, tears in her eyes as she kicked her legs and waved her arms widely her face dark red.

Rarity was over in an instant scooping the crying foal up halting the crying for a moment. "Twilight?!? What's wrong darling?" Rarity's question was soon answered when she noticed an awful smell coming form the purple foal. Rarity recoiled managing a small "Oh." as she realized the problem.

Twilight needed a diaper change.

Noticing her friends reaction Twilights' face got even redder in embarrassment and she started crying again. Rarity, now holding Twilight at a distance, started panicking. The alabaster mare had been having so much fun with Twilight, she had honestly forgotten the other part about looking after a foal. Now Twilight needed a diaper change but not only was Rarity not looking forward to changing a dirty diaper, but this was also Twilight her friend. "Now, now Twilight. no need to cry. please calm down." Rarity cooed bouncing her friend slightly.

This didn't work but that's when Pinkie stepped in. "Awwwww! Why is wittle Twily crying huh?" Pinkie cooed taking the foal from Rarity before making a comically exaugurated expression. "Uh-oh! Somepony made a stinky didn't she? Well don't you worry! Auntie pinkie will take care of it." So saying pinkie popped a pacifier she got from, somewhere, into Twilight's' mouth. Rarity briefly noticed that it was the same pacifier Twilight had been nursing when she had when Rarity had started looking alter her.

The unicorn didn't question where Pinkie had gotten that from, but more importantly and surprisingly it worked! Twilight was apparently surprised too. She kept trying to look for at the pacifier as if bobbed in her mouth, apparently just as shocked it was working. With Twilight quiet Pinkie quickly got to work grabbing the diapering supplies soon disposing of the dirty diaper and wrapping a clean one around Twilight.

"There we go! No more stinky diapee!" The pink pony cooed bopping Twilgihts' nose making the little foal giggle around her pacifier. Rarity just let out a sigh of relief. "Thank you Pinkie. I, guess I panicked there didn't I?"

"Aww no problem Rarity! I know diapers aren't your thing and I don't mind looking after this cutie." Pinkie replies happily scooping Twilight up to cuddle and boop the foal more making Twilight let out a stream of happy sounds. Rarity felt her heart melt at the sight.

"I know, but still this was my day to look after Twilight so I really should have done it. I must insist on taking the next one." Rarity replied. Pinkie just responded with a shrug and her trademark grin.

"Now that that's over though: Twilight, what would you like to do now?" Rarity asked. Twilight just turned to the unicorn still nursing her pacifier. With a sigh Rarity gently removed the object so Twilight could talk. "Come on now Twilight, what would you like to do? I still have your toys here, or we can model a few more outfits, or Pinkie can play with you." Pinkie looked really excited at this.

"We just need to know dear." Twilight blinked and seemed to think before saying
11112112112212211211212222.title: Twilight needs to be changed

Twilight's statement caught both mares a little by surprised, but Rarity gently smiled and lied down next to the unicorn filly. Once Twilight had started nursing, Rarity turned her to the pink party pony and said "Can you pass me my sketchbook please Pinkie?" "Of course Rarity. What are you working anyways?" Asked Pinkie Pie as she handed over the book. "It's something for my new mother and child line of clothes. It was originally just going to be for young fillies and colts, but after the first time I nursed Twilight, I thought to create something for the mothers as well." Replied Rarity. After Twilight was done, Rarity placed her friend on the floor with her toys to play with for a moment while she got back to work. "Do you think Twilight would mind if I looked after her for a while." Asked Pinkie Pie as she followed the alabaster unicorn. "I don't see why not. I just wondering what her parents are going to do when they hear about this." Said Rarity. Suddenly...
111121121122122112112122221.title: "Me hungy."

1111211211221221121121222211.content:
The door slamming open startled all three ponies, especially Twilight who started crying again. Twilight was well aware of how she was acting like a real foal. Crying when she woke form her nap needing a change, to her recent nursing to now crying over a loud noise, but she couldn't help it. It just seemed natural, almost right to behave this way, and it was starting to scare her.

Pinkie was over in an instant soon calming the purple foal while Rarity glared at whoever was at the door.

Her glaze softened when she saw it was Spike, then morphed into concern when she saw the state he was in. The baby dragon was panting and out of breath hanging onto the door frame like it was his lifeline. From the ragged breathing and amount of sweat covering his scales Rarity concluded he must have run the whole way here. The drake seemed like he was trying to say something but Rarity couldn't make out a word.

"Spike! What happened? No! Don't talk. Let me get you some water." Pinkie continued to hold and cuddle a now calm Twilight as Rarity brought Spike the largest glass of water she could find. Spike drained the thing in seconds, but seemed much better afterwards.

"Th-thanks Rarity." He muttered. "Your welcome Spiky, now what's the problem?" Spike suddenly looked nervous, glancing at Twilight. "Well, you know I left when Twilight woke up right?" Both Twilight and Rarity gave him a small glare. Yes, they did remember how Spike had ducked out right before the "fashion show" but neither could blame the drake.

Still Spike gulped at there expressions. "Right, well after I left I decide to let the rest of the girls know about. There were only a few, like Pinkie, so I managed to get them pretty fast." The pink party pony waved happily at her name. "And then I just kind of wandered around town, and then thought about what had happed and what I could do, then I started panicking and."

Rarity stopped his nervous ranting with a gentle hoof to his lips. "The point Spike please. Why did you run all the way here?" The unicorn asked. Spike nodded and took a deep breath.

"Well I went back home, to tidy up or find the spell book I don't know and I found something!"
1111211211221221121121222211.title: Spike bursts into the room.

11112112112212211211212222111.content:
"Twilight's mother is visiting today." Said Spike. Rarity and Pinkie Pie looked at each other and then at the purple filly playing with her toys. "Spike. Did you tell her about her daughter?" Asked Rarity. Spike smiled nervously at the question. Spike's reaction was all the answer the mares needed. "What are we going to do Rarity?" Asked Pinkie Pie. "I don't know yet. But we can not let Twilight's mother see her like this. Spike. See if you can find the spell Twilight used and if you can slow down her mom." Said Rarity. Spike nodded and ran out the door. "In the meantime, we need to find a way to hind Twilight's current situation in case her shows up." Added the alabaster unicorn. "We can take her to Sugar Cube Corner." Suggested Pinkie. Rarity agreed with the idea and took a few minutes to get everything she needed for the track to the bakery. Once she had everything, Rarity and Pinkie Pie were about to head out the door when they heard somepony knocking.

Rarity nervously opened the door to see...
11112112112212211211212222111.title: Twilights' mother is visiting!

choices: She had missed her friends, but something had changed.
One or more of her friends got hit.
111121121122122112112122221111.content:
Rarity let out a sigh of relief. "Oh girls, you have no idea how happy I am to see you!" Rarity exclaimed visibly drooping in relief and motioning the others to come in. "Ah can imagine." AJ muttered noticing Twilight on the floor happily playing with her toys.

"Awww! Isn't she just the cutest?" Fluttershy cooed hovering over to get a better look at there regressed friend. Twilight looked up at the movement and her expression became on of shocked embarrassment. Twilight was not happy with all the ponies that were seeing her like this, especially since she was caught playing with foal toys! Her cheeks flushed in embarrassment Twilight tried to pretend she had not just been playing.

Most of the girls found this utterly adorable, but Rainbow Dash couldn't help but snicker. "Wat funny?!?" Twilight demanded in her high pitched lisp, which only made Dahs snicker harder. "You can talk?" Fluttershy exclaimed, but it was at her normal tone of voice so no one heard her. At the look Rarity gave her the blue pegasus was forced to explain.

"I'm sorry ok." Dahs explained sounding honestly guilty for laughing. "Its just. You really messed up Twilight. Having fun with you toys? Have you needed a diaper change yet?" "It no fu-ny Wain-bow!" Twilight argued pouting, before she felt something. Twilight looked down noticing a growing stain on her diaper: she was wetting herself! In front of all her friends! Twilight squeaked in shock and tried to cover up the growing mark but everypony saw it.

Shy and Pinkie immediately cooed and went to tend to Twilight while Rarity glared at the snickering pegasus. Rainbow knew she should stop, but like she said the prismatic Pegasus just found the whole situation darkly amusing. How could Twilight mess up so badly that she turned herself into a foal? Dash knew she should stop, but every time she tried she started comparing the little foal in the wet diaper to her studious friend and couldn't help but let out another snicker.

"Perhaps you would like to change Twilight?" Rarity hissed. Rainbow immediately stopped her snickering. "No way! Un-uh! I do not do diapers, or foals in general! That's why you were the one to look after Twilight in the first place!" Rainbow protested. "So your abandoning your friend when she needs you? Some element of loyalty!" Rarity shot back. Then Rarity and Rainbow got into an argument, which AJ soon joined as Fluttershy and Pinkie continued to coo at Twilight as if she was a real foal saying things like "I'll change you when your done."

Twilight covered her ears and whimpered feeling something well up inside her. All the noise, the embarrassment, Dash's snickering, being treated like a real foal, realizing that she had been acting just like a real foal! Twilight again felt something snap inside her. She started crying again her loud wail immediately silencing everyone as her horn started glowing brightly fueled by her emotions.

"Magic surge!" Rarity shouted her eyes going wide in horror. Immediately everypony went to dive for cover just as Twilights horn let out a massive flash of light. When she could see again Twilight looked around blinking in confusion realizing what had happened! Twilight immediately covered her mouth in horror! "Giwls! Me so-wy! Tu o-tay! Pwease!" Twilight felt like crying again as her friends came out of hiding and they realized that
111121121122122112112122221111.title: The rest of mane 6

As the light faded and the magic passed the ponies cautiously poked out of hiding. When it became clear that they were unharmed they let out sighs of relief, only for Rarity to let out a shocked squeal as she saw what had become of her beloved shop.

Apparently Twilight had missed her friends but had hit Carousel Boutique itself and Rarity's business and home had been altered.

What had the surge done to the boutique?

1111211211221221121121222211112111.content:
Four mares popped there heads up no worse for ware making Twilight sigh in relief. But she noticed someone was missing. "Were Wainbow!" Twilight cried looking for the prismatic Pegasus.

A noise drew there attention and the ponies noticed a dazed looking blue Pegasus foal with a multicolored mane and tail stumble out onto the floor. In an ironic twist Rainbow Dash had been hit by the magic surge, and was now a foal herself. Complete with magically appearing diaper on her flank. The irony was not lost on anyone, especially Dash who soon started to cry.

Fluttershy and pinkie were immediately over comforting the regressed Pegasus while Rarity held a teary eyes Twilight. Applejack just shook her head at everything wondering how this had spiraled out of control so fast.

Fnally Fluttershy managed to get Dash to calm down as she rocked the blue pony. "There we go. No need to cry now." Shy cooed softly. "Now Dashie, are you ok?" The regressed pony looked at the butter yellow mare blinked and
1111211211221221121121222211112111.title: Became a foal like Twilight

Twilight and Rainbow Dash needed to be changed
11112112112212211211212222111121111.content:
Asked, "What now?"

Rainbow Dash could still talk, but only just. The others looked at each other with worry on their faces.

"The first thing we need to do is to get Twilight and Rainbow Dash out of sight before anypony can see them." Said Rarity placing Twilight on her back.

The others agreed and decided to go with the Pinkie Pie's first choice of Sugar Cube Corner. Once at the store, Pinkie explained what happened to her friends to the Cakes and asked if it was okay for them to stay in the nursery for a while.

"Of course it is. We'll help out if we can." Said Mrs. Cake.

Rarity took Twilight and Rainbow in the nursery so that they could have a place to play for a while. After some time...
11112112112212211211212222111121111.title: Spoke normally.

choices: Skip to when the foals wake up.
111121121122122112112122221111211111.content:
It was a tense time for the regressed ponies as they sat in the nursery. Twilight was still feeling horrible about her surge had kept as far away from Dash as possible, thankful that only her friends body had been affected.

Rainbow for her part was angry and embarrassed at her situation. Rainbow had even tried to remove her diaper out of embarrassment, and had been so adamant that Pinkie had actually taped the thing to keep her from ripping it off. Pinks had explained that RD needed the diaper now, that Twilight already needed a change and they had no idea how long this would last so. With all that Dash was quite happy to avoid Twilight.

So for the first few minutes in the nursery both foals just sat in a corner and ignored one another, waiting until they fixed this or Twilights mother found them. However, there plans didn't last five minutes as the Cake Twins soon noticed the new ponies in there nursery.

At first Pound and pumpkin simply looked at the new foals, foals that looked so much like Pinkie's friends. But her friends weren't small and wear diapers. After a bit both foals decided they didn't care and they had new playmates!

At first Twilight and Rainbow had waved the twins off, with Rainbow being very vocal about it, but as the Twins kept insisting they play the two regressed ponies became more and more interested. Though they still had there minds the foolish toys and activities just seemed so, so fun! Hesitantly at first Twilight and Rainbow began to join in.

Soon all four foals were laughing and playing, there earlier troubles forgotten as Rainbow and pound played a game of flying tag and Twilight and Pumpkin moved toys with there magic creating a grand story. Eventually though Twilight yawned, which was soon taken up by the other foals. Not long after the four just crashed, grabbing whatever was nearby as a pillow and taking a nap.

Not long after Mrs. Cake entered to check on her foals. Seeing all of them asleep the mother mare smiled and gently scooped them up and set them in a crib. Her twins in one and the regressed mares in another.
111121121122122112112122221111211111.title: Twilight and Rainbow Dash needed a nap

choices: Rarity and Mrs. Cake nurse the foals.
The foals need to be changed.
1111211211221221121121222211112111111.content: What happens when they wake up?
1111211211221221121121222211112111111.title: Skip to when the foals wake up.

choices: To stay fwith the Cakes or now.
11112112112212211211212222111121111112.content:
As the foals slept the remaining Mane 6 explained to the Cakes what had happened. The owners of Sugar Cube Corner were not happy with the idea of hiding what had happened, especially since Twilight's mother was in town looking for her daughter. After some convincing, and an assurance that this was only temporary and Spike was looking over the spell to fix it as they spoke, the earth ponies agreed to help and stay quiet about it.

After that the ponies busied themselves for the next hour, waiting for something to happen. After a bit Applejack reluctantly left. She had farm work and her market stand to run afterall, and fixing a magic spell wasn't her area of expertise. The farmmare promised to come running if she was needed though.

Rarity spent that time nursing a milkshake and wondering what would happen when Twilight grew up again. Once again the alabaster unicorn felt a stab in her heart at the thought of losing "her foal" but pushed it back down.

Twilight needed to be her correct age, no questions. Twilight was her friend, not her foal! So why did she feel so upset at the thought of getting Twilight back to normal.

She was started from her thoughts by the sound of several foals crying. Immediately Rarity, Fluttershy and Mrs. Cake were rushing upstairs. Pinkie Pie started to leave, then remembered she had a line of customers and stayed put.

The blue earth pony had a smile fixed as she walked into the nursery. "Hello dears, what's wrong?" At her voice Pound and Pumpkin stopped crying. Twilight also stopped noticing Rarity walk over, but was still red faced and actually looked away

Rainbow though kept throwing a tantrum, trashing and crying as only a very upset foal could. Fluttershy picked the crying foal up. "Whats wrong Dashie?" Fluttershy soon got an answer noticing the smelly lump in the back of the Pegasus diaper. "Oh, I guess somepony needs a change?" Fluttershy asked bouncing Rainbow trying to get her to calm down.

"I think they all do." Mrs. Cake said already tending to her children. "Just give me a minute dears and i'll be out of your way." Twilight clung to Rarity red faced in embarrassment. The purple pony had woken up to Dash crying and had noticed that she also had messed her diaper while she slept. Twilight was embarrassed beyond words, but Rarity's warm presence calmed her. Without noticing Twilight began to suck on her hoof.

Rainbow though was still crying. "Calm down Rainbow Dash. Its ok, just a stinky diaper. I'll get you changed and make it better. Its ok, little foals make messes all the time." Rainbow didn't calm down though. She wasn't supposed to be a foal!

It took some doing, and borrowing a nearby pacifier, but soon Rainbow had calmed down and all foals were in new diapers. "There we go, now that wasn't so bad was it?" Fluttershy asked with a kind smile. Rainbow just nursed her pacifier and turned away still to embarrassed to respond.

"Well, now what?" Rarity asked after a bit. Mrs. Cake shrugged. "That's up to you dearie. Carrot and I won't mind if you want to hang out here till this mess is fixed, and I think the twins would love to play with Twilight and Rainbow some more anyway."

The twins babbled excitedly at that. Twilight perked up seemingly eager to play, but Rainbow just blushed and shook her head.

Fluttershy and Rarity shared a look before deciding.
11112112112212211211212222111121111112.title: The foals need to be changed.

choices: Rarity and Mrs. Cake nurse the foals.
111121121122122112112122221111211111121.content:
They felt like the bakery was the best option for the moment.

What do they do now?
111121121122122112112122221111211111121.title: To stay fwith the Cakes or now.

choices: Gave in and started to nurse.
1111211211221221121121222211112111111211.content:
With that decided what happened next was pretty obvious with foal who just woke up. A low growl reached the ears of the assembled mares who turned towards the source. Twilight and Rainbow blushed as there stomach growled again. The Cake twins were not so subtle and started whimpering and reaching for there mother. "Looks like our little ponies are hungry." The blue mare said smiling before scooping up her foals and getting situated to nurse them.

Pound and Pumpkin did not hesitate and soon happy coos filled the room as the twins nursed.

Rarity walked over to "her foals" as this happened and picked both of them up. "Ok you too, guess its lunch time hum?" Twilight blushed but her growling stomach left no doubt and the purple foal was soon nursing herself. Rainbow though.

"Nu-uh! Nu ay!" The blue foal said stubbornly refusing to nurse. Rarity sighed. "Come on Rainbow Dash, your much to young for most foods, so this is only way. Its perfectly safe." Rainbow shook her head. "Nu-uh! Nu! Me no foaw!" Rarity sighed her eyes narrowing. "Rainbow Dash. I don't know if you noticed but your speaking with a lisp, took a nap in a crib and just needed a diaper change. 111121121122122112112122221112.content:
"Ms. Velvet!" Rarity gasped gulping before giving a smile trying to hide her nervousness. The older grey mare smiled pleasantly, apparently not noticing Rarity's nervousness.

"Hello Rarity! Sorry to bother you, but you wouldn't happen to know where Twilight is do you?" The older mare asked her smile fading. "I told Twilly that I was visiting days ago, and I know she must have expected me, and you know how she is with her schedules, but I can't find her. I tried to ask Spike the poor boy ran off like he had seen a ghost." Velvet finished clearly concerned for her daughter.

Rarity felt her heart rate increase and her smile froze as she considered what to do.

On one hoof, Velvet did not know about her daughter. Keeping her in the dark would probably make her worry, but should they tell her? It wasn't like this was a major scenario, just a spell gone wrong. If anything, this whole incident could just end with Celestia showing up and change Twilight back to normal this evening as soon as her royal duties were done and the two Twilights could catch up tomorrow! Done and nothing to worry about.

But if they did tell her, then what was the harm. Velvet might freak out but after some explaining she would be fine right? If anything then the two could still have a mother-daughter day, just slightly different than what they had planned. Velvet might even be thrilled to have one of her little foals back and be more than happy to take Twilight until this mess was resolved. That would leave Rarity free to finish her new design today if nothing else.

Rarity felt a little twinge of, something, at the thought of giving Twilight up but she ignored it.

All of this passed through the alabaster unicorns mind in moments but it was taken out of her control when

11112112112212211211212222111221.content:
Rarity stood there awkwardly as Twilight Velvet continued to rock and cuddle her daughter. After a bit a smile stretched across the grey mares face and she booped her daughters nose making the purple pony release a infantile giggle. "I forgot how cute you were as a baby Twilly." Velvet cooed booping her foal nose again.

Twilight squealed and batted at the offending hoof but that only made Velvet giggle. "Oh, is my Twilly ticklish? Well look out! The tickle monster is coming!" Soon the air was filled with babyish laughter as Velvet played with her daughter, the older unicorn knowing just where to poke to get the cutest reactions. "You are so sweet!" Velvet squealed. 'Who has tiny hooves? Who has cute itty bitty hooves?" She asked tickling said hooves.

Twilight squealed and squirmed under the "assault" and finally caught her breath when her mother paused for a second. "Top!" The foal cried still giggling grabbing Velvets hoof with both of her own. "Mama top! Mama top!" Velvet giggled. "Ok Twilly I'll stop for now. Your just to cute I couldn't help it." She explained before kissing her daughter on the head making Twilight coo in delight.

The grey unicorn had a beaming smile on her face. Despite what had happened playing with her daughter had struck something in her and now Velvet couldn't stop smiling.

Twilight Sparkle for her part wore an expression that could only be described as "delight embarrassment." On one hand, she realized that she had just been treated as, and responded just like, a real baby. Which she wasn't, she was a grown mare in a foals body. But they were fixing that right now, and being treated like that was all sort of embarrassing.
On the other, she liked it. Twilight couldn't explain why but she felt a warmth in her chest despite the embarrassment and it had been fun to simply laugh like that and relive some of the stress that had built up since this mess started.

Rarity tried to stamp down the spike of emotions she felt when she Saw Velvet playing with Twilight. The alabaster unicorn was feeling all sorts of emotions watching the scene unfold. She fixed a smile on her face though, which became more and more forced as time went on. "What is wrong with me?" she thought.

Pinkie Pie, was busy snapping pictures of the cute scene.

After a bit Velvet set her daughter down. "Well, this is not what I had in mind, but I can't complain." She said. Pinkie, hiding the camera in her mane gave a delight smile. "Does this mean your not angry that Twilight got turned into an adorable foal?"

"Oh now, I'm quite mad actually." Velvet responded without missing a beat. "But there's nothing I can do about it so I'll just roll with it. Besides I won't mind spending some time with my little Twilly." Velvet cooed ruffling her foal hair making her squeal.

"This is to convenient." Was Rarity's first thought when she opened the door and saw the solar ruler of ponykind standing in her door way. The unicorn immediately bowed but Celestia brushed the gesture off. "Please Rarity, not now. I must see Twilight." Celestia said not-unkindly as she walked past the bowing mare.

Twilight looked up at the sound of her name and he eyes light up seeing Celestia. "Pwincess!" Twilight squealed happily then blinked and looked at herself before blushing and trying to cover her diaper. "Nuu! Pwincess! Nuu wook!" Twilight pleaded but Celestia fixed a soft motherly smile on her face as she laid down next to the regressed unicorn.

"Its ok Twilight, I need to know what happened though." Twilight sniffed looking down in shame. "Me, me sowy Pwincess. Me jus, twying a new spew an, an me then ba-be!" Twilight finished crying softly clearly embarrassed admitting her mistake and having the princess see her like this.

Twilight was immediately wrapped in a golden glow and held next to the princess barrel. Instantly Twilight stopped crying and let out a happy coo at the warmth and security radiating from the solar aliconrs' body. "Its ok Twilight. No need to cry. I'm not mad at you." Celestia said honestly. "Weally?" Twilight questioned curiously. "Really." Celestia assured her booping the foal nose making her giggle.

"No I have to talk to Rarity a minute so you keep playing with your toys and we'll find a way to make you a big pony again soon, ok?" "Otay!" Twilight said happily immediately going back to playing as Celestia let her go. With Twilight occupied the solar princess motioned for Rarity to follow her upstairs. Once they were sure Twilight was out of earshot Celestia slumped looking tired.

"At least she isn't to far gone yet." Celestia said sounding relived before looking up. "Rarity, I came as soon as I heard. I do know what spell Twilight cast on herself and..."

111121121222.content:
Spikes’ first thought was to slam the door and barricade himself and Twilight in the bedroom. His second reaction was to lie his tail off and hope they go away.

The first plan was ruined because Pinkie Pie. She would find a way inside and figure out what had happened no matter what Spike did.

His second plan was thwarted because of Applejack. She would know he was lying and would wring the truth from him. So that left only one option.

The dragon gulped, and hoped Twilight wouldn’t be too angry as he opened the door a bit further inviting the two mares in.

Um, well you see. Its kind of complicated. He began nervously as AJ walked in and Pinkie bounced inside. It um, well Twilight was trying a new spell and. He groaned. Why was this so hard to explain?

The two mares were now looking at him worriedly. Something happened to Twilight? Pinkie gasped dramatically. This is horrible, disastrous, terrible! She cried jumping into the air, then stopped blinking.

Wait? If something happened to Twilight, why did my dozy tell me to bring this? Pinkie asked dropping her saddlebags and opening them revealing diapers, bottles, powder, toys and everything else you needed to look after a foal.

Spike gulped. Well, you see. Its because Twilight turned herself into a foal. He admitted. There was a pause. Applejack looked at him with an expressing of confused disbelief. Pinkie though.

The party pony gasped again her smile beaming. Twilight is a wittle bitty cutie foal! She squealed. Oh this is super, tremendous, wonderful! I have to see her. Where is she? And with that Pinkie zoomed off.

Spike followed with AJ on his heels. Pinkie wait! Twilight might not want to see you yet.

Twilight for her part was unaware of this. The foal leaned back in the booster seat sighing contently having finished the applesauce. The little pony was covered with bits and pieces of her meal but was either unaware of her messy state or simple didn’t care.

“Where did Spike even find a booster seat anyway?” She though unaware that she was starting to suck on her hoof. A moment later she felt thirsty and eyed the glass of milk Spike had set out. Twilight eagerly reached for it, not thinking to use her magic first.

She managed to grab it, the small glass looking massive next to her small hooves, but forgot about a foal’s coordination. Twilight only succeeded in spilling the milk all over herself when she tried to sip it.

The foal blinked then immediately felt the need to cry again, which she did. “Why am I acting like this?!?” Twilight thought as she cried realizing that she was acting more and more like a foal but found herself unable to stop. Which only made her cry harder.

She stopped crying in shock when she felt herself be picked up and found herself looking at the smiling face of Pinkie Pie. Aww, don’t cry little Twiliy. Pinkie cooed bouncing the foal a bit before setting her on the floor.

There’s one surefire way to calm a crying foal. Pinkie said seriously. Where’s Twily? Pinkie cooed covering her face. Where’s Twily? The party pony suddenly threw her hooves away and gasped dramatically. There she is! Pinkie cried grinning.

Twilight blinked finally registuring that Pinkie Pie was in the room with her, had seen her cying liek the foal she now looked like and was currently playing a game of peek-a-boo with her.

What’s Twilights response to this relevation?
111121121222.title: Explain the situation, see if they can help.

choices: Skip to when Twilight wakes up
1111211212221.content:
Spike entered the kitchen expecting the worse. Instead he had to pick his jaw off the ground. Twilight was sitting on the floor, covered in applesauce and milk, and laughing as Pinkie continued to play and make silly faces.

Every time Pinkie would pause Twilight would get ahold of herself and looked like she was going to say something, and then Pinkie did something else that made her break out into infantile laughter again.

The dragon picked his jaw off the floor and shared a look with Applejack. The farm mare looked just as lost as he was. So the two just looked on as Twilight continued to, well act like a foal.

Eventually though after several minutes of this Twilight suddenly yawned. Aww. Is wittle Twily ready for her nappy? Pinkie cooed scooping the foal up and rocking her.

Nu, nu sweepy. Twilight muttered her eyes already closing as Pinkie hummed a song she often used for the Cake twins. In moments Twilight was dozing, and starting to suck on her hoof again. Pinkie giggled and replaced the purple hoof with a pacifier.

The party pony sighed happily. You are such a cutie. Pinkie squealed before setting the foal down. Spike broke from his trance then. What, hey? Pinkie what are you doing?

Getting a diaper on this little cutie before she has an accident. Pinkie replied simply removing the supplies. Bwa? But why? The dragon asked confused. Pinkie giggled. Silly Spikie. All foal need diapees. Pinkie said taping the garment shut.

Spike groaned. I know that, but this is Twilight. Don’t you think she doesn’t need them? The pink pony just shrugged. Well, we’ll see after her nap won’t we? Now I better get her cleaned up a bit as well. Where do you keep the wash cloths.

Spike just wordlessly pointed and the mare and foal hopped off. Applejack watched them go before finally speaking up. Spike, could ya please tell me what jus happened here?!? The fame mare groaned out clutching her head.

Sighing Spike gave a rundown of what had happened that morning. So we need to find a way to reverse this. He finished.

Aww. Why would you want to reverse this? Pinkie asked cooing at the sleeping foal. Because you saw how she was acting Pinkie. Spike said giving her a look.

Twilight is acting more and more like a foal. This wasn’t on purpose and this isn’t a game. I’m worried about her.

Pinkie blinked. This, isn’t a game? Twilight didn’t mean to do this? Oh. That, is bad. She finished dully as she literally deflated. Spike and AJ winced.

Well, nothing saying ya can’t play with her while we’re looking to fix this. AJ said hesitantly. Pinkie was immediately back to her old self beaming widely. You’re right! The twins will love having a new playmate! She squealed.

Spike coughed, hoping that Twilight would forgive them for whatever Pinkie was going to put her through. In the meantime, I need to send some letters to Celestia, and her parents and see if anyone can reverse this. He said.

Pinkie, think you can bring Twilight with you and watch over her for a bit while I get everything sorted out? Spike assumed the way she was smiled and rushed out the door was a “yes.”

AJ sighed. Twi won’t be to happy when she wakes up. She muttered following her hyperactive pink friend.
1111211212221.title: To laugh! The game is fun!

111121122.content:
Twilight looked away form her reflection towards Spike. "Yes! Its me! Spike I tired a spell on myself!" Was what Twilight wanted to say, what actually escaped her mouth was something along the lines of: "Yeeeeeee, Ssspaaaaaaiiiiiii aaabah gahh!" Twilight covered her mouth in horror while Spikes' eyes grew wide.

"Twilight? Ok this isn't funny say something!" Tears welling up in her eyes Twilight tried to explain but only more baby babble escaped her mouth. "I can't talk!" Twilight realized feeling a coldness settle in her stomach. The spell had worked, but it had worked too well! She hadn't just regressed a few years but she had turned herself into a foal!

Would she have to grow back up again? Could it be reversed? Would she have to move away from her friends? What would Celestia think? All these thoughts and more swirled around Twilights mind and a new feeling bubbled in her. Twilight started crying, softly at first but it grew in volume until she was crying like an upset foal.

Spike jumped and rushed over scooping the crying foal up. "Its ok Twilight! Don't cry! We'll fix this, somehow." The dragon pleaded as he acquardly rocked the crying foal trying to calm her down. After a few minutes Twilight did calm down slightly and looked up at Spike with teary eyes.

It suddenly hit Spike that his/mother/big sister/boss figure was now a baby and needed a caretaker herself. "Now what?" Spike thought gulping. Twilight actually provided the answer not a moment later when.

1111212211111.title: It's a youthinizing spell, only suppose to ...

choices: Twilight takes care of Rarity, because an antidote does not exist and more
11112122111111.content:
Rarity quietly opened the doors to the Crystal Castle. She knew that Twilight was working in her library this day, but she was in "desperate" need of Twilight's help. She had several gray strands of hair in her mane and they just wouldn't come out no matter what she tried. The local spa dyes just weren't powerful enough. So, her next option was magic. Currently, she was wearing a beautiful hat to hide her mane, but she wanted to show her gorgeous mane to the world.

Rarity trotted slowly to the library door and then carefully opened the library door with levitation. Once inside, she noticed only Twilight was in sight which gave her a sigh of relief. She didn't want Spike to see her ugly gray hair. Twilight, on the other hoof, was someone Rarity could trust. Still, she was quiet, slowly closing the library door behind her and gradually walked up to Twilight.

Then, when she was nearby she moved one of Twilight's organized pens, taking Twilight out of focus. Twilight quickly lost focus to reorganize the pen, warmly greeting Rarity. "Hi Rarity, How are you doing? Why'd you decide to come over?"

Rarity kept her cool, "Good, good, I just need a little magical assistance, that's why I came over."

"Well, what can I do for you?"

Rarity took off her hat and almost instantly lost her demeanor "My-my mane. There's gray hairs in it! I need a youthinizing spell. None of the spa dyes work and they tried everything. Please please help me."

Twilight chuckled "Of course Rarity. This shouldn't be too difficult now that I'm an alicorn."

Rarity sighed "Oh thank you. Thank you! You are the best friend I could ask for."

"Not at all Rarity. Though, you're going to have to stand still while I cast the spell. Just give me one moment while I search for the book."

Rarity sat in a library chair patiently waiting for her friend to come back. It took about two to three minutes, but Twilight was finally back. "Alright Rarity, just sit tight and you should be a week younger. That should give you time to prevent the prevent the gray hairs coming in."

"Thanks again Twilight, you're a life saver."

Twilight just nodded and begun the spell. She blasted Rarity with a magenta bolt, levitating her into the air. In the air, a magenta auras started spinning around Rarity. The faster these auras spun, the younger the casted would become. Twilight last casted this spell when she was a unicorn and would up over shooting the spell, turning Rarity into a ten month old foal. Twilight and Rarity were both closing their eyes and had no idea what was happening. Twilight started to levitate her down and Rarity kept her eyes closed until feeling the cushion of the chair.

They opened their eyes at about the time. Twilight was astonished and couldn't even spit out what happened to Rarity. Rarity was scared by her friends response and slowly turned to her body, seeing in horror her body regressed to that of a baby. Tear droplets quickly formed around Rarity's eyes and within second she broke the silence, wailing at the top of her lungs.

WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH

What happens next
11112122111111.title: Baby

choices: Rarity makes a fit throughout the changing
Rarity accepts her fate as a baby
111121221111111.content:
Rarity's wails took Twilight out of her shock. Twi shook her head a couple times and slowly walked up to Rarity. She didn't know what to do, but her instincts suddenly kicked in. She started rocking little Rarity back and forth. "It's okay Rarity, I-I'm here. No need to cry."

After several minutes of Twilight's rocking, Rarity started to calm down. Her facial expression quickly went to anger though. In the cutest high pitched voice ever Rarity yelled "Wha did yo-wa do ta me?!!!!!!!!! HOW YOUNG AM I?!"

Twilight continued rocking her and responded calmly "I accidentally turned you into a baby. I'm unsure how old you are though."

"We-wa, chan-ga me bak!!"

"Kay, kay, let me read the spell book first. For now, just relax"

Rarity just folded her front hooves, looking annoyed as Twilight levitated her and the spell book. Twilight's face suddenly changed to one of concern. Then shortly after it was followed by one of relief.

Rarity was getting concerned herself, but she didn't want to show it. Instead she just yelled at Twilight "Twi-wigh-ta! Wha is gowin on wit dat spew-wa?!!!!!!!"

Twilight shyly responded "Soo.. there is no.. antidote for the spell..."

"WHA?! YOU TUR ME INTA A BABY AN YOU CAN-TA TUR ME BAK?!!!!!!!!"

"Well.. yes, but.. but the spell should only last for a week"

"Show-da?!!!"

"Yes.. should. All I can do for you now is take care of you"

"We-wa, me no wan your hewlp!"

"Then, who do you want to look after you?"

"No-pony! Me oda nuff ta wook afta me sef!!!!!!!!"

Twilight chuckled "I'll take that as a sign to get involved." Right there in a flash of light, Twilight summoned a stack of diapers as well as baby lotions. "Someone needs a diaper change!!"
111121221111111.title: Twilight takes care of Rarity, because an antid...

choices: No. Twilight manages to wrangle the foal into a diaper.
Yes! Rarity has a magic surge!
1111212211111111.content:
The foal's eyes widened in horror at Twilight's words and the diapering supplies hovering around her. NOOOO! NO DYPEE! Rarity yelled running, er, toddling away as fast as her tiny legs could go. Twilight resisted the urge to "DAWW" at the sight of a foal trying to avoid her diaper change and cut Rarity off in three steps. Come on Rarity. She soothed. This is for your own good. The spell will be over in a week and I really need to get you into one before you have an accident. NOOO! Rarity denied again turning to run the other way. Twilight caught her friend in her magic before the foal could run off. Please don't fight me Rarity. Twilight pleaded. This will all be over before you know it. ME AM BIG PONY! Rarity yelled as she squirmed and kicked in the purple glow, her own horn glowing as tried to perform a spell of her own. ME NO NEED DYPEES! WET ME GO TU BIG MEANY EAD! WAAAHHHHHHHH! Rarity began to wail like the upset foal she had become the situation overwhelming her. Not only would letting herself be diapered prove she was a foal but the thought of using the diapers! The thought of a dirty diaper pushed the grime and dirt avoiding unicorn over the edge. Twilights surge of sympathy for her friend was quickly drowned out by her friends crying, along with everything else. Sweet Celestia she has a powerful set of lungs! Twilight thought covering her ears wondering if they would start bleeding any moment. Rarities cries continued to build, as did her distress and the glow of her horn.



Does something happen?
1111212211111111.title: Rarity makes a fit throughout the changing

choices: Skipping ahead. All of them are gathered around a sleeping Rarities crib.
11112122111111111.content: Well if her friend was going to act like an angry foal. Rarity's cries were cut off as a purple and white pacifier appeared in her mouth. To the shock of both ponies it worked. Rarity started sucking on the rubber nub, either unwilling or unable to spit it out. Judging from the look she was getting Twilight figured it was the later. Tightening her magic to hold Rarity gently but firmly Twilight lowered her friend so the white unicorn lay on her back on the floor and began the delayed diapering process. Rarity whimpered and squirmed still trying to fight, but in the end Twilight managed to apply the lotion, powder, and tape the diaper closed. Now that wasn't so bad was it? Twilight asked cuddling her friend to her chest. Rarity continued to whimper and whine for a few moments before growing silent. Confused Twilight cradled Rarity in her arms, and smiled when she saw the sleeping foal sucking on her paci. Guess this was too much for you huh Rarity? Twilight asked softly starting to rock the foal. The alicorn sighed. Well Twilight looks like you are a mother for the next week. Now what? The alicorns mind hit overdrive as she began to schedule the next week. I can convert one of the rooms into a nursery for the week and I can afford plenty of supplies, so no problem there. Our friends and Sweetie Bell need to know thought. Oh I can only imagin how she will react. "Cutie Mark Crusaders Foalsitters! Yay!" Or Spike! I can't imagine how he will take this. Twilight looked at the foal, sleeping peacefully after her emotional and physical exhaustion. How am I supposed to explain this?!?
11112122111111111.title: No. Twilight manages to wrangle the foal into a...

choices: Why tu wet me be sween wike tis, an me ave a shwow tis week!(This is bad.)
Twi-twi! Dypee wet! (Starting to mentally regress. This is worse.)
111121221111111111.content: Ok, Twi. Now run that by me one more time. Applejack said looking at the princess from across a pink and white crib.
