Rarity still slept, well like a foal undisturbed by her friends and sister. Twilight sighed tiredly. Well Rarity came to me wanting to remove some grey hairs. Wanting to help I decided to use a youthinizing spell, not an age spell I want the difference to be clear, to help. She rubbed the back of her neck. I guess I overloaded the spell because she ended up like this. The good news is that it will wear off in a week. Twilight finished with forced cheeriness. Currently the Main six, Spike and Sweetie Bell were gathered in the room Twilight had chosen as the nursery. It consisted of soft pinks, whites, and purple crystals covered in soft carpet with a changing table, crib, and plenty of toys and books. It was perfect. Twilight had checked all of her books to make sure. Of course her friends had reacted differently. Spike was looking through the crib bars with a blank look, his expression unreadably as he looked at his crush that was now younger than he was. Sweetie Bell was crowding against the bars smiling as her “big sis” slept, her mind already filling with crusading ideas. Fluttershy was cooing at Rarity a look of pure bliss on her face while Pinkie was bouncing around chatting quickly but quietly about all the fun things she could do with Rarity and the Cake twins. Rainbow had thought the situation was funny, but was nice enough to limit it to snickers. Applejack still didn’t seem to grasp what had happened, as this was the fourth time she had asked. So, what do we do? The farm mare finally asked looking at her regressed friend. Well, all I have to do is take care of her till the spell wears off. Twilight said. Really that’s the long and short of it. I just called you girls, and Spike, so you would be aware and to help out if you could. Instantly Fluttershy, Pinkie, and Sweetie Bell’s hooves went into the air causing Twilight to chuckle. Maybe you could turn us into foals to play with this little cutie. Pinkie added, surprising serious. Twilight hummed at the suggestion then shook her head.Thanks girls, but I got her for now. That is somethingto think about Pinkie but we will have to see. This should wear off soon and we’ll have everything back to normal in a week! Nothing could go. Twilight found her proclamation cut off by a pink hoof. Shhhhh! Pinkie shushed covering Twilights mouth, somehow, despite being three feet away from the crib on the other side. Don’t say it. Wha?! Pinkie! Twilight hissed batting the hoof away. Don’t you know Twilight. You never say “Nothing could go wrong” or “what could possiable go wrong” because you’re just inviting something bad to happen. And I just said “What could possiable go wrong!” Pinkie covered her own mouth with both her hooves. At that moment Rarity began to stir, cutting off Twilight impending rant. The foal yawned cutely, causing the mares to daww, rubbed her eyes as she looked around at the assembled ponies and dragon. Suddenly her eyes grew wide and she began crying, dropping her pacifier and causing everyone to jump. Twilght immediately grabbed the foal and started rocking her. Shhhh. It’s ok. What’s wrong Rarity? The foal looked at Twilight with teary eyes and opened her mouth.
111121221111111111.title: Skipping ahead. All of them are gathered around...

choices: "Mmm.. me wike dat idea... no wait, me WUB DAT IDEA!!"
1111212211111111111.content:
Rarity screamed at the top of her lungs "Why tu wet me be sween wike tis, an me ave a shwow tis week!"

Twilight calmly responded "Sorry Rarity, I just wanted to fill everyone in. They're important to you too after all."

Rarity folded her arms with an adorable scowl "Dats why me no wanna be sween by dem.."

Pinkie suddenly interjected, putting little Rarity into her arms "D'aaaaawww it's okay Rarity! Aunt Pinkie is here and you're not the only baby in town. You can play with the Cake Twins too."

Rarity looked angry, that she was about to yell, and then... she cried, covering herself in Pinkie's coat "Me don ca-wa if-a me baby, me jus wan me oda wi-fa stuff sett-wled."

There was a sudden shock that passed through the room. Twilight was the first to speak up, "So.. Rarity, you're okay with being a baby again? But w-why?"

Rarity was still tear-y eyed, but peeked out to say "Wes.. i-it wike ah spa... but betta. Dis dypee is wike a comfy piwwo on me fwan-ka. Me coat is wita-wy wike ah baby's bat-tom. Me wook adoor-wable an can fit in da most adoor-wable baby owt-fits. An ta top it aw-wal ofa, me ge aw-wal ob dis aten-ton in a comfy bed!"

Twilight continued to stutter "But but, you reacted so negatively to everyone seeing you wik dis. Why?"

Rarity no longer tear-y eyed. Her expression was more one of annoyance. "Becuz! You wet dem see me when me sweeping! Me cuda wet me-sef wiw a fu-wal aw-di-wence!!"

This answer just added to the enigma of the situation. Twilight was puzzled, worrying that maybe the spell had some negative effect on Rarity's brain. Sure all those reasons fit Rarity to a tee, but it was still being a baby, something that hours ago she protested against.

Twilight's pondering was cut off with Rarity then speaking up again "No-wa wha aw you Twi-wigh gonna do ab-owt me shwow! Dis is ya fawt afta aw-wal!!!"

This answer took Twilight out of her trance. Perhaps this was Rarity. The real Rarity certainly would say that. Twilight answered "Kay, soo, what do you all think?" pointing to the others in the room.

Pinkie raised her front hoof "Oooo Ooooo! Me Me!!"

Twilight sighed "Yes, Pinkie"

"What theme is the show?"

Rarity blanked out for a second, "We-wel.. I wa weabin da ah sa-pwise, but.."

Pinkie cut in again, "Oooooo, den make it baby themed! With you as the star! You can say that it's all part of the theme!!"

Rarity pondered, looking adorable for a moment...
1111212211111111111.title: Rarity's Baby Revelation and the New Show!!

choices: Insists! "Me aw-weady kno wha ta do!!!"
Shys away "You wigh Twi-wigh... *sniff* Me bewin cwazee"
11112122111111111111.content:
Rarity finally spoke up "Mmm.. me wike dat idea... no wait, me WUB DAT IDEA!!"

Pinkie was ecstatic at the idea and the rest, including Rainbow Dash, paused with a "uh?" face.

AJ was the first to speak up "Rarity, this sounds a bit.. silly, don't ya think sugarcube?"

Rarity smiled with ego, "Naht aa aw-wal A-Jaaaaa-ya. Dis idea-ya is gwold. Da dwess inda-stwy ha been wooking fa we-bo-wuton-awy idea-yas. I'v-a been habin twouble watey comin up wit ne-wa idea-yas. Dis is a new idea-ya! Oooo, an me can act-twy moda-wise age-changin spwells!!!"

Twilight spoke up nervously "Rarity, don't you think this is going a bit too far? I mean, for a one time show, I might understand. But you're talking about a dress line for all of Equestria. Do you really think that ponies will buy into it? What about you? How will you advertise your dresses? You'll need to find babies for every dress?"

Baby Rarity...
11112122111111111111.title: The Baby Show is On!!

choices: Baby Rarity makes a poopy in her diaper
111121221111111111111.content:
Rarity speaks up in her high pitched voice "Yes! Me aw-weady kno wha ta do!!! Me wiw ad-ba-tise how fu-na being a baby is!!!"

Rainbow cracked up "Haha, you've gotta be kidding us. Ponies won't believe that."

Rarity got a little testy raising her voice "Oh yea! Dey wiw-wa if I stay wike dis!!"

All of the ponies said in unison, "WHAT?!!!" (Though, Pinkie's was a little cheerful in her tone)

"Me kno wight? Me weawy wike da wook ob dis woom, an dis dypee, an, an, an aw-wal ob dis stuf-fa."

AJ spoke up first "What about your old life?!"

Rarity smiled "Whaa, me wike dis one more."

Next, Rainbow spoke up "Wow, wow, wow. So, you're going to be fine with all of those diaper changes?"

A shiver passed down Rarity's spine, but she responded. "Da.. da, why me hab you aw-wal. You aw-wal can take ca-wa ob me."

Twilight the asked "Well, what about your career aspirations? You can't set up a shop in Canterlot as a baby?"

Rarity pondered for a second "Goo-da point. Den ag-wan, me neba kne whe ta weab. Eee wha stwes-ful. Bu bu, bu now me am a Pwincess' daww-ghta an a famos desi-gna!"

Twilight was astounded. She wasn't ready to have a baby, especially if that baby was her friend.

Fluttershy spoke up next "How will you design clothes then?"

Rarity smugly responded "Wit ya hwelp! Me dwa da dwesses, you make da cwothes!! Ya aw-weady show ya ca do it."

Fluttershy hesitated "But but, how can you draw as a baby?"

"Eas-wy. Wit me horn. Jus wat me" Rarity then levitated a crayon the floor and drew one of her past dresses with seeming ease.

Everyone but Rarity turned to Twilight, thinking "how is that possible?

Sweetie Belle asked an interesting question next "Would that make me the big sister then?"

Rarity giggled "Me no know. Da dat matta anyway? I may tech-wee be ya oda sista, but da nah matta. Me get da dypees, da baby coat, da bed, da aten-ton, an can enjoy baby tweet ments"

Sweetie Belle chuckled "I guess your right. Plus, maybe I'll get my cutie mark in being a great older sister."

Spike spoke up now, more annoyed than anything "Rarity, is this really the life you want to live?! What about everything we've been through?"

Rarity became somewhat scared, hiding in Pinkie's hooves "Wes, but we ca stiw-wa hab fu Spik-ee Wik-ee."

"Fine... I suppose." Spike left the room at a normal pace, frustrated.

Rarity started to tear up. "Me nah mea-na ta upset him... *sniff*" Rarity lost control for a brief moment afterwards
111121221111111111111.title: Rarity leaves her Old Life Behind for Baby-hood

choices: Rainbow sped outside the Castle. "RRR!! I am outta here! Later!!"
Rarity gets a magical surge and gleefully shoots Rainbow. "Pinkee wa wight!"
1111212211111111111112.content:
As Rarity was tearing up and she briefly did the unimaginable. She pooped in her diaper. This was a very noticeable accident. As she made the accident, a loud farting sound echoed throughout the crystal-y room. What more, if this sound wasn't heard, the smell that filled the room certainly was. All of Rarity's friends and Sweetie Bloom covered their noses.

Meanwhile, Rarity launched into another full scale wail, "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!"

However, this wail was cut off by a certain pony's a response. This response accentuated the fact that Rarity was indeed a baby. The pony who made this response was none other than Pinkie.

Pinkie covered her nose for a brief second until she heard Rarity's wails. She went right into action, speaking to Rarity as if she was one of the Cake Twins.

In warm tone, Pinkie enthusiastically said "Ahhhh, looks like somepony wony made a stinky winky in her diaper wiaper. You must've had a lot of food-y woody, didn't you?"

Something about Pinkie's tone was... soothing. Rarity slowly stopped crying as she heard Pinkie say this. She eventually stopped at "stinky winky in her diaper wiaper." The words themselves were embarrassing, but something about how they were said instinctively soothed Baby Rarity. Oddly enough, Rarity still wanted to cry, but her body would not allow it. She could hear Pinkie loud and clear and even heard the statement "food-y woody." This line annoyed Rarity, but there was some truth to it. After all, she did have all those tubs of ice cream before coming over. This was just great.

Pinkie continued with her commentary, meanwhile moving Rarity to the changing table. "Don't worry orry Rarity, I'll have your flank-y wank-y all clean-y wean-y in jippy wippy." After finishing that statement, Pinkie had put Rarity on the changing table and gave a little "boop" to Rarity's nose before starting the changing.

Oddly enough, Pinkie used her hooves for the diaper changing and was quite skilled at it actually. Looks like all those Cake Twin Foalsitter gigs really paid off. In a matter of seconds, Rarity's dirty diaper was off and thrown into the nearby waste bucket. "There we are! No more icky wicky diaper, right Rarity?"

Rarity was too much in astonishment by the mere fact that Pinkie, OF ALL THE PONIES, was the first to legitimately clean her bottom. Pinkie took Rarity's wide mouth to mean she was mesmerized. "Ahh, no need to be surprised Rarity Warity, I'm your Auntie Pinkie Pie! The best diaper changer around. Speaking of which, your bottom wottom is in need of some wipe-y wipe wipes." In a flash, Pinkie wiped Rarity's flank clean and quickly moved on to powdering it. "Okey Dokey Lokey, time for the new diap-y wiap-y. Don't worry Rarity, this is going to feel great!!"

Rarity couldn't believe it. Pinkie was right. Pinkie put the new diaper on just right, not too tight and not loose. Unlike before, Rarity could really feel the comfy-ness of this diaper. Rarity didn't want to give Rarity a smile afterwards, but she simply couldn't resist. Afterwards, Rarity gave giggled with glee, smiling wide. What? She couldn't help it. This diaper just felt so much more comfy compared to the last one.

Pinkie took this as a sign that Rarity enjoyed the entire changing. "D'aaaaawww, wasn't that fun. Diaper changes with Pinkie Pie will be a blast!!"

The rest of the mane6 and Sweetie Belle just in shock. Based on the way Rarity and Pinkie were acting, one could hardly tell that Rarity actually used to be an adult hours earlier.

Rainbow Dash got out of her shock first. "Okay, what was that?"

Pinkie Pie walked up to her with Rarity cuddled in her chest, "What do you mean silly? I just was giving little Rarity here a diaper change? What are ya? jealous?"

Rainbow Dash was outraged, but tried to keep in her anger around Rarity, now that she was a baby. In an irritated tone, Rainbow responded "No. I meant... How did you give Rarity a diaper change so easily? Isn't she your friend? Isn't that awkward?"

Pinkie chuckled "Silly Rainbow Dash, It was really easy. I'm her friend after all. Friends give other friends things they'd never expect the other friend to need. Like, I had nooo idea this morning that Rarity here would need one of my patented Pinkie Pie diaper changes, but I'd love to give her one. Haha, I'd love to give all my friends my patented Pinkie Pie diaper change."

On some level, Rainbow wanted to argue against this, but she knew doing so was pointless. Pinkie didn't seem to notice the awkward-ness of changing another friend's diaper and Rainbow didn't feel like explaining it to her. However, Rainbow absolutely would not let Pinkie get away with saying she was jealous of being diaper changed.

As this was happening, Rarity was simply lost in the sensual delight of her diaper, which pressed up against her. She only paid attention vaguely, looking up at her adult friends with a gentle smile and hardly noticing the tension in the room.

Rainbow Dash brashly talked back to Pinkie. "Get caught up in your fantasies about changing your friends' diapers, but don't forget that those are just fantasies. Don't tell me that I'm jealous. I'd never be jealous of diaper changes!"

Pinkie just giggled with a snort "Haha, silly! Rarity turned into baby by accident. It's more possible than you think!" After finishing her statement, she gave a playful wink.

On that final note...
1111212211111111111112.title: A Mystical Diaper Changing & A Wild Disagreement

choices: Fluttershy comforts the tear-y eyed Rainbow Dash & the 2 foals make up.
11112122111111111111122.content:
Right after Pinkie winked, Rarity's horn lit up with a pretty blue aura. Rarity felt a surge of magical energy flow through her. Fluttershy was the first to spot this; the rest were preoccupied on Rainbow and Pinkie's conversation. Fluttershy quickly told Twilight, who then tried to interject. However, Twilight didn't know when to but in. Rainbow and Pinkie's conversation just kept getting more out of hoof.

Meanwhile, Rarity felt like her imagination could actually be brought out in full force through magic. She looked around the room, wondering what to do. She had all sorts of baby decoration ideas in her mental storage, but one strong idea suddenly hit her. Turn Rainbow into a baby. She giggled to herself and then began aiming at Rainbow. Rainbow and Pinkie were too distracted, but Twilight, AJ, Fluttershy, and Sweetie Belle saw what she was doing. The four of them collectively yelled "RARITY! NO!" by coincidence. This caused Rainbow to snap out of her argument and turn to the four. "What's going on now-?"

Rainbow started her question with a brash voice, but suddenly felt magic shoot her. Right then, she cut herself off, turning a 180 to Rarity.

Her mouth went wide opened once she noticed that Rarity was shooting her with a blue beam of magic. Next, she realized that she was being suspended in the air. In one quick huff she yelled "WHAT IS GOING ON?!!"

Immediately after, blue auras formed around her and spun rapidly. This exact same process happened to Rarity hours earlier. While Rarity casted the spell she giggled "Hehe., Pinkee wa wight!!"

The blue auras formed a vortex around Rainbow. She couldn't see a thing. She couldn't hear a thing. Rainbow spoke out throughout this process, asking what was going on. The only sensation she could feel was a spiraling blue energy around her. Gradually, this sensation seemed to speed up. In actuality, Rainbow was simply regressing, which caused the blue vortex to feel stronger as her size changed. Rainbow didn't know this though and her raspy adult questions soon turned to childish pleas for help. Rainbow's voice had become high pitched, but she didn't notice a thing. And before she knew it, this blue vortex felt terrifying. Rainbow increasingly felt insecure. She wanted somepony anypony to be beside her. Her fear of alone-ness quickly caught up to her and she couldn't resist it anymore. She cried. These cries soon turned to wails and these wails then turned into high pitched screams.

On the outside, no one could hear what was happening. Even if they could, all of them, except Pinkie and Rarity, were flabbergasted to the point that they wouldn't hear Rainbow's earlier questions. They were stunned that one of Rarity's baby magic surges had such power and that Rarity could actually control these surges. All of sudden, Rarity was a force to be reckoned with, one that would have to be taught to not shoot her friends with aura beams.

A couple minutes passed by and everypony on the outside could finally hear Rainbow's wails. They tried to call out to Rainbow, but their words didn't seem to reach her. Before they knew it, Rainbow started screaming in a high pitched voice. Once this happened, the blue vortex quickly dispersed and the new foal was lowered onto the carpet floor. What emerged was a tiny naked light blue foal with a rainbow mane and tail, screaming at the top of her lungs. Twilight, AJ, Fluttershy, and Sweetie Belle all opened their mouths in complete shock. Rarity could turn other ponies into babies with her magical surges? The thought was rather terrifying.

All of sudden, Rainbow, now more than ever, needed comfort. One pony in particular quickly came to support the terrified baby pegasus. That pony was none other than Fluttershy.
11112122111111111111122.title: Rainbow Regresses into A Wittle Foal

choices: Mommy Fluttershy calmly gives Baby Rainbow a Diaper Change
111121221111111111111221.content:
Fluttershy quickly jumped into action, cradling the now 10 month old Rainbow Dash. Fluttershy then sang in a majestic voice "Hush now, quiet now, ev-ery-thing will be al-right, hush now, quiet now, ev-ery thing is o-k..." a couple times. Her singing soothed both Rainbow Dash and unintentionally Rarity, who was about to be in big trouble.

Rainbow Dash soon calmed down and her screams were reduced to a murmur. She could finally notice everypony staring right at her, most especially Fluttershy who was holding Rainbow in her front hooves. Rainbow's first instinct was to hug Fluttershy with quiet tears coming down her face. "Dat wa scaw-y! Me don wan ta be awone anee-maw! Pwease don weab me!!"

Fluttershy embraced Rainbow hug and the rest went "awwwwww" to Rainbow's behavior, except Rarity, who was a little jealous of Rainbow's attention.

Fluttershy rubbed Rainbow's back with her right front hoof. "There, there.. You're okay. I'm here and I won't let anything bad happen to you."

Rainbow asked "But but, da bwoo bo-tec wa con-swom me. Eee migh be bak!"

Fluttershy gave a warm reassuring response, wiping the tears off of Rainbow's face "Noo.. You have no need to fear. Those vortexes won't get our Rainbow Dash" Fluttershy then adorably snuggled with Rainbow "Our Rainbow Dash is brave and adventurous. She won't let any vortex scare her."

This cheered Rainbow up and soon started giggling, the first time she showed an actually positive emotion while being a baby. "Tanks Fwuttashy. Dah chee-wad me up. You wight! Me am bwabe an ah-wen-tuwous! Me da bes!"

Fluttershy gently smiled. "There's the Rainbow I know and love. I'm happy you're all better."

Rainbow perked up, "Me too!"

Fluttershy giggled after Rainbow's response, replying "But in the mean time, you are going to need a diaper change."

Rainbow's mood suddenly changed. She folded her front hooves giving an adorable "No! Me a, bi-ga po-nwy. Me no need dypees."

Twilight intersected "Unfortunately, she's right Rainbow. You will need a diaper change for the time being. I'll quickly find out how long this spell will last, right after a certain someone apologizes for her rude behavior."

Twilight's voice then became stern "Rarity." and she walked closer to Rarity who was still in Pinkie's hooves.

Rarity fearfully responded in a high pitched voice "Wes..."

Twilight kept the tone of voice the same "Why did you turn Rainbow Dash into a baby?"

Rarity had trouble spitting out the words "Becas becas..."

"Because why?"

Rarity suddenly burst into tears "Becas me tout it wou-da be maw fun! Me jus got da powa an an *sniff* di-dent kno wha ta doo. Pinkee se-da Wai-bow migh be ah baby, so da wa da ow-wy ting me cud tink ob!!!"

Twilight's facial expression soon changed to one of sympathy after seeing Rarity burst out in tears. The little baby knew what she did wrong, which was a good sign. As Rarity's new unofficial mother, Twilight had to make sure Rarity was being nice.

Twilight levitated Rarity from Pinkie's into her own. Pinkie smiled and understood that this was a job for Mommy Twilight. Twilight rocked Rarity back in forth in hooves. "It's alright Rarity. I forgive you." and wiped off Rarity's tears with her wing.

Rarity responded hesitantly "Wa-wa-wee-wy?"

Twilight smiled. "Yes, really. But, you still have to apologize to Rainbow and you will not get desert tonight or the special cotton blanket I let you sleep with."

Rarity responded upset "Bu-bu Twi-wigh..."

Twilight expected this, but handled it like an adult. "Not ut, uh. No butts. I'm being very generous by not giving you other punishments. It was an accident, but you can't let it happen again."

AJ said under her breath "A little two generous if you ask me..." No one heard AJ's comment.

Rarity felt defeated "Okay Twi-wigh.. you wight..."

Twilight smiled gently, "For now, you need to apologize to Rainbow." Twilight then carried Rarity over near the changing table where Fluttershy and Rainbow were. "Now Rarity, what do you have to say to Rainbow?"

Rarity timidly said "Sowwy." Twilight interjected "For what?" Rarity then finished her apology. "Me sowwy Wai-bow dah me tur yo-wa inta ah baby. Me di-den mean ta huw-ta yo-wa."

Fluttershy, nudged Rainbow. "What do you have to say Rainbow?" Rainbow looked up, "No-ting. She mean-y. She no mean it."

Fluttershy was appalled. She in essence had become Rainbow's unofficial mommy, similar to how Twilight had become Rarity's unofficial mommy. Fluttershy sternly stated "Rainbow, Rarity is your friend and friends make mistakes. Good friends accept their friends' apologies and forgive."

Rainbow spoke a little "Bu-" only to be cut off my Fluttershy who raised her voice, using the stare and saying "Raaaainbow Dash.."

Both of these techniques showed who had the power between Fluttershy and Rainbow. Fluttershy's techniques were actually so effective that Rainbow started to tear up "You-you.. wight... me me *sniff* sorry." Rainbow had mentally connected Fluttershy with the protection from alone-ness. As a result, Rainbow was extremely afraid to lose Fluttershy's support. Rainbow had become a baby who was quick to obey Mommy Fluttershy's orders.

Afterwards, the unofficial mommies, Twilight and Fluttershy, and their foals, Rarity and Rainbow respectively, smiled. For once in this jam backed day, there was a moment of calm-ness.

After a minute or so passed by, AJ awoke them to reality. "Um.. any y'all wanna find out how long Rainbow will stay a foal?"

The unofficial mommies said together by coincidence "Oh, right!" Pinkie then raised her right front hoof "Ooooo!! Me! Me! Me! I'll go get the book. I know which one it is."

Twilight stated "How would you-? Oh never mind, that sounds like a good idea. Fluttershy and I are a little preoccupied."

Pinkie smiled on her way out, briefly reminding Fluttershy "Oh remember to give Rainbow a diaper change. You don't want her having a messy wessy now would you."

Rainbow sarcastically said "Yea.. wight.. tanks Pinkee." while Fluttershy authentically said "Ahh, right. Thanks Pinkie Pie, I almost forgot."

Pinkie smugly responded "You both are welcome. Don't worry Rainbow, Auntie Pinkie will remind them about your diaper needs." In the end, Pinkie was right. The possibility of Rainbow being turned into a foal certainly existed and it certainly happened.

Rainbow was agitated. She forgot about the conversation that happened prior to her transformation. Why did she have to remind Fluttershy? Somewhere in Rainbow's mind, she thought she could get away without a diaper change.
111121221111111111111221.title: Fluttershy comforts Rainbow & The 2 Foals Make Up

choices: She has the spell book. What did you expect?
Something else. I don't what, it's just... something else
1111212211111111111112211.content:
"Come now Rainbow" Fluttershy said calmly "It isn't so bad. You might actually like getting a diaper change."

Rainbow was skeptical, but she didn't want to give Mommy Fluttershy a hard time. So, she went along with the diaper change.

Fluttershy laid Rainbow onto the soft white changing table. "Good job Rainbow Dash. You're being so cooperative." If this was what Fluttershy diaper changes were like, filled with compliments, then Rainbow could get used to this.

Next, Fluttershy pulled out the baby powder. "Now, I'm going to apply the baby powder. It might be scary, but remember Mommy Fluttershy is here and she'll protect you." Fluttershy gave light to moderate taps, which only slowed down the entire changing process."

While Fluttershy was being over-cautious, Rainbow was actually enjoying herself. After all, this meant she'd have more time with Fluttershy who acted as her defense against alone-ness. Rainbow wanted to be with her new Mommy for an extend period of time, since times such as these were calm and soothing, direct contrasts to Rainbow's high energy job. Yet, at the same time, this calm-ness reminded her of times where she'd just rest on clouds. Except, now that resting wasn't being done alone and Rainbow really didn't have to do much to on her own.

As Rainbow was being powdered, she came to realize, being a baby rocks! Not only could she spent much of her time with Mommy Fluttershy, she had complete freedom to do whatever she pleased. She could sleep, eat, play, and go potty whenever she felt like it. Additionally, her baby status guaranteed that tons of ponies would feel like losing to her. She could win countless games for the rest of life.

The only negative, which was admittedly pretty big, was that she couldn't be a wonder-bolt in this state. Granted, she didn't feel "ready" yet. The blue vortex induced a traumatizing experience. And as a foal with a safe environment, her chances of returning to said environment were slim to none.

After she finished thinking about this, Fluttershy finally finished the powdering process. Rainbow Dash tuned back into reality in time to hear Fluttershy's question "Did you enjoy the powdering? I know it can sometimes be slow and frustrating for foals who just want to play."

Rainbow smiled "Yes! Me act-twy wubed da pwa-cess."

Fluttershy was ecstatic and surprised at the same time "Really, why?"

"Becas me get ta spen time wit yo-wa, me new mommy. Me aw-so wub da com-pwa-mens."

Fluttershy was pleasantly surprised to hear that. "So, I'm your 'new mommy?' "

"Yus, or-wa me Mommy Fwuttashy or-wa jus me mommy. Me neba wan-ah aban-don yo-wa"

Tears of joy drifted down Fluttershy's face. She had found someone who would give her unconditional acceptance while still understanding what she says. This was an aspect Fluttershy kept hidden from others and she wasn't about to tell Rainbow Dash.

Still, Rainbow tilted her head to the left adorably asking "Wha-why Mommy Fwuttashy cwying? Di me do sometin wong..." Rainbow started to tear up, just thinking about this possibility.

Fluttershy quickly brushed away Rainbow's tears and reassured her everything was okay "Don't cry Rainbow. Mommy was crying tears of joy at how kind you've become. Your concern for me shows you're the best baby I could ever ask for."

Rainbow opened her mouth wide, giving an adorable face of surprise "Wooooooooow. Me maw aw-some den me tout. Tanks fa da sup-wat mommy Fwuttashy."

Fluttershy chuckled in response. "You're very welcome Rainbow. Now, let's get you finished into that new diaper, now shall we?"

Rainbow clapped her hooves together! "Yay!!!" Rainbow wanted to know what Rarity was gushing over after all.

Again, Fluttershy took her time, gently lifting Rainbow's hind legs and flank and carefully sliding a new diaper underneath Rainbow's flank. This was followed by her gently lowering Rainbow's bottom on to the fluffy white diaper. Lastly, Fluttershy begun tapping the diaper in place, asking Rainbow when things were too tight or loose. She was trying to find the perfect fit for Rainbow. While this process took an incredible amount of time, Fluttershy ultimately finished the diaper changing giving Rainbow a diaper which fit just right, not too tight or loose, just like the diaper changing Pinkie gave to Rarity hours earlier.

Once Fluttershy was finished, Rainbow, like Rarity, was mesmerized by her diaper. To Rainbow, it felt like a nice fluffy cloud covering her flank. Another nice twist was that it kept cool air from going traveling through her legs. For this reason, Rainbow would always feel like her flank was too cold while flying. Now, Rainbow could fly while having her bottom remain nice and cozy.

Meanwhile, Mommy Twilight read Baby Rarity a story about fashion. Sweetie Belle listened, watching her now 'younger sister' become fantasized by the book.

It was weird. Rarity and Rainbow both possessed adult and baby characteristics. They could understand complex words, but couldn't say them. They generally understood what the adults were saying, but were more interested in foal activities or foal iterations of the activities they used to perform.

AJ just sat the side, trying not to get too involved. All of this foal stuff didn't make a lick of sense to her and she was hoping it would all boil over. With Rainbow now a baby, she lacked an athletic partner. There was also a pressing fear that the following state of things would become the new status quo. If that was the case, then she'd have to find some new way to bond with Rainbow and Rarity. (She honestly didn't believe Rarity could follow through with her plan)

Next, finally comes back and...
1111212211111111111112211.title: Mommy Fluttershy calmly gives Baby Rainbow a Di...

choices: AJ's day could've gone better. Throughout the day, things became even more worse
Something Else OKAY?! I have no idea what. It's just... SOMETHING ELSE!!
11112122111111111111122111.content:
Pinkie skipped joyfully inside. "How are the babies doing?"

AJ responded "Eh.. good I guess. Rainbow just got a diaper change. So.. that was something."

Pinkie became ecstatic "Ooooo, right. So Rainbow how was it? Did you like it? Wasn't it fun?"

Rainbow nervously said "Wew.. it was act-wy sorta fun. Mommy Fwuttashy really kno-sa how ta chan-ga diapa"

Pinkie just smirked "Soo.. was a certain Aunt Pinkie right? I knew you'd have a blast!"

"Me gess you wa wight."

"Awww, someone's nervous isn't she? Come here, it's okay!" Pinkie then picked Rainbow up from the changing table, cuddling her.

"Whose a good foal? You are! You are!"

Rainbow looked upset all of sudden, tearing up. She stretched her hooves to Fluttershy, but couldn't reach.

Pinkie knew what this sign meant and gleefully said "Awwwww, you want mommy to hold you, don't you? Well, no need to fear!"

All of sudden, Pinkie put Rainbow in Fluttershy's hooves. "There you are! Are you all better?"

Rainbow's tears quickly dried up once she was in Fluttershy's hooves. She just gave a little nod "Uh hu.. thanks Pinkie."

"No problem little one! If you need something just tell Aunt Pinkie Pie and she'll make that problem go all away!"

This warm moment between Pinkie and Rainbow was quickly cut off by AJ. "So.. how long will Rainbow stay like this?"

Pinkie cheerfully said "That all depends on Rainbow. The spell book says Rainbow can be turned back with this simple spell, but that the spell won't wear off. If she choose to, she could stay a baby forever."

AJ was relieved. "That's fantastic! You heard her Twilight. So, read that spell and let's get this over with."

Pinkie looked annoyed. "AJ, that's up to Rainbow to decide, not Twilight silly."

"Yeah right Pinkie, like Rainbow would really want to stay like this for long."

Rainbow then spoke up, "Wew, act-twy.. me am un-shaw wha ta do. Me wub mommy Fwuttashy an me don wan ta weab ha. Pwus, me ge ta sweep, eat, pway, an go potty wheneba me wants. Me aw-so gets ta win aw-wal da time."

No one but AJ was really surprised. They had seen the way she was acting and figured this would happen.

AJ wasn't ready to drop the issue though. "What the? Come on Rainbow, don't be ridiculous. What about the Wonderbolts or competitions?"

Rainbow shyly responded "Wew... me no fweel weady fa da Wonda-bowts or-wa compet-tons. Me wan Fwuttashy ta ca-wa fa me instead!"

AJ got frustrated with Rainbow's answer and turned to Twilight. "Well? Come on Twilight. Hurry up and change her back!"

Twilight was paying attention to the conversation and got annoyed with AJ. "AJ, she just said she doesn't want to. Didn't you hear her?"

"So what Twilight. She's just a foal right now. She ain't thinkin' clearly. We have to-"

AJ was cut off my Rainbow's crying. "I'm-I'm jus a fo-wal. But but.. mommy Fwuttashy said..." All of sudden she was wailing "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

Fluttershy quickly comforted her, "There there... Rainbow. It's okay. AJ is wrong. She's just being a mean-y right now." Luckily Fluttershy's words broke through and she stopped wailing "Wa-wa-wee-wy?"

Fluttershy gave a motherly smile "Yes hun. Mommy is right and AJ is wrong."

Pinkie then spoke up to AJ "How dare you AJ? How could you say such a harsh thing to a baby friend? You'll hurt their feelings!"

AJ rolled her eyes. "Ya'll aren't thinkin' right. Rainbow doesn't actually want to be a baby. It's just the spell talking."

Pinkie smiled "You prepare to wager that?"

AJ was pretty confused "Huh? What do you mean?"

"I mean.. are you prepared to show us that it is the spell talking?"

"How in the world would I show that?"

"Hmm.. how about you get turned into a baby from the spell Rarity used and we'll see if you're right. If you wanna stay a baby, then we'll turn you and everyone back. If you don't wanna stay a baby, then we'll just turn you back."

AJ was annoyed, but she wouldn't back down from this. "Fine. How long do I have to stay a baby to you all this is just plum none sense?"

Pinkie rubbed her chin real quick... "Hmm.. how about... till tomorrow morning?"

"What?! No, that's ridiculous. Rarity and Rainbow haven't been babies for more than 4 hours. 4 hours is the most I'll do and if I want to turn back then you win and I'll keep quiet about this."

"Fine.. I can't wait to take care of you." AJ's plan just might work. Pinkie Pie and the others would make sure she enjoyed herself, which would make it easy to stay a baby. AJ of course was missing something, but would soon find out."

"Alright Twilight! Let her up! You heard her. Turn her into a baby."

Twilight sighed. "One second" Twilight gave Rarity to Sweetie Belle. "Sweetie, can you look after Rarity while I do this." Sweetie Belle was ecstatic! She had been patient all this time and finally got a chance to play with her 'younger sister.' "Absolutely!"

Twilight calmly said "Thank you." and looked to Rarity "Now, be a good baby. I don't want to find out that you misbehaved."

Rarity smiled "Okay mommy Twilight. Me be gud."

Twilight kissed Rarity's forehead and walked up to the spell book. Twilight and Rarity's reading time clearly allowed them to bond more as mother and daughter and it was showing.

Now, was not the time for that though. AJ's wager had to be fulfilled. Twilight knew AJ was wrong, but unlike Pinkie, she knew that the way to win the bet was to act motherly. Pinkie, on the other hoof, was just going to act motherly because she loved babies. This did raise the question, if she knew how to get AJ to not want to stay a baby then was she doing a disservice to Rarity and Rainbow by aiding their thinking in being a baby. Twilight had concluded that she was just being friendly and that if her friends made decisions off of that, then said decisions were authentically made. Of course, Twilight wasn't thinking straight with this. Sometimes being friendly does in fact lead ponies in unpleasant directions. Perhaps some where in her unconscious Twilight was enjoying being Rarity's mommy and didn't want the whole process to end.

So.. Twilight was quick to read the spell, forming a similar esque vortex around AJ. Twilight was confident that taking care of AJ would make AJ want to not be a foal and she was eager to get this wager done and over with. She wanted to return to her little Rarity.

AJ had her eyes closed though, unlike Rainbow, and knew that the regression process probably wasn't enjoyable. Plus, Twilight was able to complete the transformation pretty quickly. The spell she used on Rarity was actually a youthinizing spell, which made the age regression take longer. However, this spell was a straight age regression one, which meant the process was going to be pretty quick.

AJ was hit with Twilight's magenta beam and then propelled into the air with magenta auras spinning rapidly around her. It was sorta like a rollercoaster and as soon as AJ felt the magenta aura, she started to regret this. She thought "Augh... this is going to be an annoying day." Still, AJ kept her cool throughout the transformation, in a large part because she was closing her eyes and focusing on something else. That focus being how annoying the rest of the day would be. For one, she was hoping that she wouldn't cry. That would make this experience ten times more embarrassing. AJ's thoughts raced a little bit as she thought of all the things that could go wrong. Little did she notice that by thinking of these things and regressing, she was actually increasing the chance that she would cry in front of her friends.

And.. that's exactly what happened. As the regression came to a close, AJ started to cry and like Rainbow, these cries quickly turned to wails. Luckily for her sake, she didn't start screaming. But... the transformation did end on her wailing which was really embarrassing.

While the transformation happened, things were pretty low key on the outside. After having to of their friends turned into babies by surprise and having this all be planned, all of them just went about their business. Everyone but Twilight and Pinkie were distracted. Fluttershy and Rainbow were just cuddling together, and Sweetie Belle and Rarity were just playing around with blocks, trying to make things look pretty. Twilight had her eyes closed concentrating on the spell and Pinkie had a big smile on her face, waiting to see baby AJ.

Before they knew it, AJ's transformation was done and what formed was a little orange earth pony baby wailing at the top of her lungs. Pinkie quickly picked her up, cradling her carefully. Twilight looked concerned. AJ knew what was happening, so.. why was she crying? Did she actually turn into a baby mentally?

Pinkie motherly said "There, there. Mommy Pinkie is here." and Twilight followed up, asking "AJ, is everything alright?"
11112122111111111111122111.title: Rainbow's Decision & AJ's Wager

choices: Have AJ wakes up in four hours. (She doesn't want to be a baby anymore)
Have AJ wakes up in four hours (She oddly wants to stay a baby)
111121221111111111111221111.content:
From Pinkie and Twilight's responses, AJ suddenly realized she was wailing, which... made her even more embarrassed. When she realized that she was wailing, she had a brief pause followed by louder wailing.

Twilight was becoming nervous "Pinkie, what do we do? I didn't expect this to happen? We-we turned our friend into a baby and now she's wailing at the top of her lungs!"

Pinkie just giggled "It's okay silly. I know what to do!" Twilight was skeptical, but took a breather, waiting for Pinkie to do whatever she was planning to do.

Sure enough, Pinkie rocked baby AJ back and forth, slowly. There was a soothing rhythm to it, which caught AJ of guard. The rocking quickly calmed baby AJ down. AJ sorta wanted to cry, but her body was instinctively calmed down. AJ hated being a baby, but she had to admit that this was something she liked. As embarrassing as being rocked was, it prevented her from crying on the outside, which was a blessing. Since AJ was no longer wailing on the outside, she no longer was embarrassed and internally had no reason to cry. Now, AJ looked like she calmed down.

Twilight was impressed. "How did you do that?" Pinkie just gave an obvious response "Silly Twilight, all babies calm down when you rock them back and forth."

Twilight just gave a deadpanned "Oh.. that makes sense." Twilight then turned to the orange foal in Pinkie's hooves and asked "Is everything alright AJ? Why were you crying?"

AJ shyly responded "Wew.. I sorta got wost on aw-wal da negatib possibi-wities." AJ rolled her eyes after hearing her new voice, which was another annoying thing to add to the mix.

Twilight was relieved. AJ's response made sense and her eye rolling further confirmed that AJ hadn't regressed mentally. Twilight then gave an awkward response "So.. how is being a baby?"

AJ was annoyed "It as fu-na as bein' at ah baw-bek-cu wit owt a-nee meat. No, scwatch dat, it worse." Twilight giggled a little bit at AJ's high pitched response. AJ saw it and sarcastically responded "Yea.. waff it up, dat make me fweel betta."

Twilight was hesitant. "I-I didn't mean it like that." AJ gave a sarcastic response "Yeah... wight."

Pinkie interjected, taking AJ's response literally. "Yup AJ. Twilight was just having fun with her friend. Before you can play with her though, I'm going to need to give a certain some pony a diaper change."

AJ was straight faced. "Cud dis day get a-nee wowse." Pinkie chuckled "I wouldn't say that if I were you, but it's already late. Things may have just gotten worse for you already."

AJ could only say in response "Wha? Wha you mean?" Then AJ heard somepony and realized what Pinkie meant. Applebloom just entered the room.

AJ looked over to what used to be her younger sister, who happened to look at her at the same time. Applebloom responded "AJ! YOU'RE A BABY TOO?!!!"

AJ looked for a place to hide, but there was none. As Applebloom walked closer, AJ started to tear up. By the time Applebloom was right next to AJ, AJ was wailing yet again. Applebloom was even more confused now. "What's going on? Why is my sister like this? and why is she acting this way?"

Pinkie giggled "One second Applebloom. I just need to calm down little Applebloom here." Pinkie then rushed over, got a pacifier, and returned, plucking in AJ's mouth. AJ instantly calmed down after that. Yet, it was another case of AJ's body acting against her will. After it was in, AJ had an annoyed look on her face, while the adults spoke on her behalf.

Twilight opened up first. "So, through a long twist of things, Rarity and Rainbow got turned into babies. Both wanted to stay this way and AJ thought that Rarity and Rainbow weren't themselves, that maybe the spells altered their minds somehow. So..."

Applebloom suddenly looked angry and asked "So, you turned my sister into a baby, just to keep your baby fun?"

Twilight looked perplexed. "No, we got into a bet that if in the next four hours she doesn't want to be a baby, then she has to drop that claim. If she wants to be a baby though, then we'll turn her, Rarity, and Rainbow back to normal. Why did you think we would turn AJ into a baby for fun?"

Applebloom looked a little stunned "I'm I'm sorry, it's just.. seeing my sister like this made me a little scared something terrible happened. I-I can't believe all of this stuff happened."

Pinkie jumped in. "I know, right? It's such a blast! You just came in time for AJ's diaper changing!"

Applebloom was a little frustrated "You're kidding, right? This stuff is a blast to you?!"

"Yeah, huh. Taking care of my friends is like two goods together, babysitting and friends, that's like double the fun and double the excitement."

Applebloom was a little taken off guard by that response "I see.. well, I guess I could watch her diaper changing. I want to protect my big, I mean.. little sister as much as possible." AJ scowled from that response. When she turns back, she'll make Applebloom think twice before saying something so ridiculous.

Next thing AJ knew, all their eyes were on her for her diaper changing. This was super embarrassing. AJ wanted to cry, to shout out against this, but.. she was powerless. The pacifier prevented her from crying. So, all she could do was close here eyes and wait for this nightmare to end. Still, she could feel the diaper changing, which to her annoyance had a bit of a charm to it. So much so that she opened her eyes during it. Pinkie smirked at the sight; she knew what was up.

AJ actually enjoyed the sensations, but the last thing she wanted was for her friends or her sister for that matter to know. Luckily the pacifier prevented her facial expressions from being very visible.

Pinkie was quick as always, powdering and diaper taping at lightning speed. And once she was done, the diaper was on nice and comfy not too tight and not too loose, Pinkie's specialty. Like Rarity, AJ really liked the sensation of the diaper. Rarity was right, it was like a pillow on your flank. This meant AJ had 3 annoying secrets. She enjoyed being rocked, experiencing diaper changes, and wearing diapers. What was next...? Still, there was no way they could know, so her secrets were safe.

And then Pinkie removed the pacifier, giving away one of those secrets. AJ had a big smile on her face, which shocked Applebloom. Twilight and Pinkie weren't so surprised. I mean, so far Rarity and Rainbow enjoyed diaper changes, so the odds were pretty clear AJ might too.

Applebloom hesitantly asked "AJ how-how could you? You.. enjoyed the diaper changing and wearing the diaper? What's gotten in to you?"

AJ did the only thing she could do. Deny it. Though.. lying wasn't her specialty. "Nuh uh. Me no wike diapa chan-ges or-wa wea-win diapas. Don be wa-dik-you-wous." AJ's facial expressions suggested she was saying a lie.

Applebloom wasn't buying it. "Oh yea? Well, then what do you do when I do this?" Applebloom pressed AJ's butt down on the changing table, looking at AJ's expression. AJ didn't want to, but her facial expressions again gave away the truth. She naturally made a big wide smile to feeling the diaper press up against her.

Applebloom had caught her "Ha-HA! I knew it! You do like wearing diapers. Might I ask, why?"

AJ's goose was cooked. She had to say something now. "O-kay... you wa wight. Me no kno why.. It jus, jus feewls gud. Me hay-ta say it, bu it jus does.."

Applebloom's reaction was.. unexpected. She laughed her flank off. "This is hilarious! Wait until people hear this!"

This embarrassment was enough to cause AJ to cry. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!!"

Twilight looked at Applebloom sternly "Applebloom.. that wasn't nice. You're sister is a baby for crying out loud, no pun intended. You shouldn't laugh at a baby like that."

AJ heard Twilight referring to her as a baby, which only made AJ's wails louder. Twilight facepalmed. What was she suppose to say. I mean.. AJ was a baby now. There's no way she could avoid that word challenge.

Fortunately, Pinkie knew what to do. She rocked AJ back and forth, with a soothing rhythm, stopping AJ's wails quickly. "It's okay AJ, mommy Pinkie is here."

AJ was about to say "thanks," until she heard Pinkie call herself "mommy." AJ raised her high pitched southern baby voice "Wha wa dat?! You not me mommy! Don say dat!!"

Pinkie managed to bounce that off pretty quickly. "Sheesh tough crowd. Okey Dokey Lokey then. Does Aunt Pinkie work?"

AJ folded her chubby hooves. "Me gess... tanks fa stoppin da..."

"No problem! That's what foal-sitters are for after all."

AJ really hated to admit it, but Pinkie really was good at controlling baby's emotions. All of her techniques had worked on AJ so far. But AJ still knew, deep in core, her apple core, that she was not a baby. She was fighting her instincts and completely lost track of her initial reasons for being a baby. She was suppose to give in, if she wanted to win. Her resistance to giving in, just showed that her and likely her friends all had the mental control to not give in.

AJ just asked "Wha now?"

Twilight thought out loud "How about you take a nap? You seem exhausted from all this pampering."

Twilight had a point, one that AJ didn't like, but a correct one none the less. "Kay.. me weady fa da cwib den."

Pinkie interjected "Kay my little wittle friend." Meanwhile Twilight summoned another crib and tucked AJ inside. Pinkie then interjected again "Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite."

Surprisingly, AJ got to bed quickly without even the need of a lullaby. The poor little foal sure must've been exhausted.
111121221111111111111221111.title: AJ's day could've gone better. Througho...

1111212211111111111112211111.content:
AJ hated to admit it, but saying you “slept like a baby” didn’t come close to actually sleeping like a baby. She could not remember a time where she had slept that good and woke up this refreshed. The orange foal yawned and rubbed her eyes. Muscle memory made her search for her iconic hat for a moment before she remembered where she was. Yawning again the orange foal finally opened her eyes, to see a grinning mass of pink.

Bawww! She yelped in fright. Instantly a pacifier was in her mouth with Pinkie making a “shhh” gesture with her other hoof. A nod showed two other cribs where Rainbow and Rarity slept peacefully. Rarity had her pacifier back and Rainbow was sucking on a hoof. Applejack nodded showing she understood and Pinkie removed her hoof.

Good afternoon sleepy head. Pinkie said cheerily but softly to not wake the other foals. Enjoy you’re nap? Mmhuh. Aj said nodding. Great! I guess you want to see Twilight now? Mumhum. Pinkie carefully picked the orange foal up and set her on her back. All right. All aboard the Pinkie express! Next stop Twilight! Applejack would never understand how it sounded like a real train leaving the station suddenly, but went with it. Pinkie threw in several jumps and bumps that made her passenger bounce and giggle slightly as she was thrown into the air.

Meemge mummph! The foal almost went cross eyed trying to glare at the pacifier still stuck in her mouth. Poor Applejack was quickly introduced to two facts about foal: their poor coordination and week limbs. Applejack could not move her legs enough to get a good grip, and when she finally managed a passing grab her reduced strength meant it remained firmly lodged in place. Worse she found she could not just spit it out. She spent the reminder of the trip trying, and failing to remove the rubber nub wedged firmly in her mouth growing more frustrated and angry with each failure.

Finally they reached the “living room” where Twilight and Fluttershy were sitting and talking. It wasn’t that long a trip, but it felt that way for AJ. Pinkie set her charge on the table and finally removed the pacifier. Applejack gasped like a drowning mare coming up for air and glared at the offending item. Dumb ting! She declared sounding more cute than threating. AWWW! Don’t be upset little Appwejack. Pinkie cooed rubbing the foals head. Most foals love their paci’s. Applejack batted at Pinkies hoof. Me no Foaw! All right Applejack. Twilight said taking control before the situation got out of control. Times up. What do you want to do?

Aj just raised an eyebrow and gave Twilight a look. Soooooo, grow back up? Twilight said with a nervous chuckle. At the foals nod Twilight lit up her horn and the air filled with magic.

I just have to put this. Does Twilight mess up the spell again? I mean it’s not like she will mess up a spell twice in one day right?
1111212211111111111112211111.title: Have AJ wakes up in four hours. (She doesn'...

choices: No. She's sick of it. Period.
Actually, yea. She'll enjoy it now for when she spends time with her friends.
11112122111111111111122111111.content: So.. the spell works, but will AJ still like being turned into a baby for fun?
11112122111111111111122111111.title: The Spell Works, but Still...

choices: Fast forward to the show! The show must go on!!!
Stay through the night! Let's see how things progress!!
111121221111111111111221111112.content:
After AJ nodded, a beam shot at her and a similar magenta vortex spun around her. This time though, AJ forgot to close her eyes. The experience was altering.

AJ hoovered above the ground and quickly couldn't see her friends. The vortex spun around her, oddly giving her mental strength, as opposed to what happened with Rainbow Dash. However, said mental strength came with a catch. As the vortex spun at super high speeds, AJ also felt the weight of responsibility press on her.

Suddenly her job which she often enjoyed seemed daunting. After actually sleeping like a baby, she couldn't go back. For this reason, silent tears came down her face as the spell finished up. (The diaper vanished away during the vortex)

Once completed Twilight levitated AJ back onto the ground. The three of them though, Twilight, Fluttershy, and Pinkie were surprised by AJ's face.

AJ saw their faces and became agitated. "Why are ya'll looking at me like that?"

Luckily for AJ, Twilight spoke up first. "Well.. AJ, were you crying just now?"

AJ looked annoyed. "No! Why?"

Twilight levitated a mirror. As AJ looked at it, Twilight said "It's just you look-"

Pinkie interjected "Super duper upset. Do you wish you were a baby again?"

AJ grinded her teeth. She did not want to talk about this, but.. her goose was cooked. She gave a sigh and came clean. "Not completely. I dunno, it's just. Being turned back into an adult is just a bit daunting. I had one of the best night sleeps as a baby, that I've never had in years. After experiencin' that again, I want to experience that again, you know?"

Pinkie got the impression from this that AJ wanted to be a baby right away, so she asked the question "Awww... does the wittle Applejack wan go back to sleep in her crib-y wibby?

AJ's gave a deadpanned response. "I don't want to just be a baby again Pinkie."

Pinkie then looked confused "Then whatcha wanna do silly?"

AJ paused "I... I don't know. Ya'll got any ideas?"

Twilight rubbed her chin for a bit and responded "So.. one idea is that every night you can come back to the castle, I'll turn you into a foal and then I can tuck you in your crib."

"Just for the crib?" AJ asked

"Yeah.. why?" Twilight posited.

AJ spoke up.. "Well.. I did, um.. admittedly enjoy myself a little bit. Maybe I could come back here normally to play with Rarity and Rainbow, sleep over, and return those days back to work, fresh as can be?"

Her three friends just stared back in surprise. AJ was a little nervous by their reaction "Um.. maybe that was a bit too much. Sorry ya'll."

Pinkie spoke up "No silly! We're all just happy."

AJ was skeptical "Ya'll are?"

"Yes!! Absolutely!!!!! This means I can play with one of my favorite babies!!"

"Favorite babies, excuse me?"

"Awwww.. AJ, you just were so adorable as a baby. I can't help it. Your my friend and out of all of my baby friends, you needed the most comfort. That's just what Aunt Pinkie is here for!!"

AJ was just amazed and somewhat agitated Pinkie had the gaul to say all that. She didn't want to question it though and get into another run around.

Finally, Twilight and Fluttershy spoke up. Twilight first. "That's awesome!! I'm sure my Rarity would love to have you over."

Fluttershy then spoke up "Same for my little Rainbow. She loves to play with you after all."

Something was weird about what they just said. The two were treating Rarity and Rainbow like their own foals. It was weird, but AJ again didn't want to question anything.

What happens now? Shall we fast forward to baby dress show or shall we see how the night progresses? (If we fast forward, Rarity and Rainbow will carry out their lives as Twilight and Fluttershy's foals respectively. AJ will also be a baby for friend get togethers.)
111121221111111111111221111112.title: AJ's Transforms Back but Future One's Will Come

choices: The volunteers are scared after their transformation and struggle to cooperate
The volunteers are convinced to enjoy the new baby attire
1111212211111111111112211111121.content:
This set up passed for a week, with nopony in Ponyville being filled in on the details. Everypony who already knew were told to keep it a secret for Rarity's new fashion line up. For this week, Twilight teleported Fluttershy and Rainbow Dash to Fluttershy's cottage when needed. Additionally, Twilight's magic allowed them to have a limitless supply of diapers for the little ones. (Which often included AJ. AJ refused to be in her friends company without being a baby.) The gang was beginning to accept their new lifestyle. The grown ups started to see themselves as the caretakers, or mothers in Fluttershy and Twilight's case. The little one's, even AJ, started to see themselves as babies.

With AJ, she started to see herself as a baby who needed to help out on the farm a lot. The age she started to identify with was that of a 1 year old. She didn't even mind Applebloom calling herself the big sis. AJ was eagerly waiting for the farming off-season where she could play with her friends without distraction.

On a couple visits within the week, Applebloom, Sweetie Belle, and Scootaloo came over to care for AJ, Rarity, and Rainbow Dash respectively. They loved caring for the "little ones," even if it didn't get them their cutie marks. Still, giving diaper changes was a little annoying for them.

Each day moving forward was also a day to prepare for the big dress show and reveal. Aunt Fluttershy was helping Rarity with her designs. The dresses were enchanted though so that the wearer would turn into a baby. Once transformed, the new babies would have to have a diaper change. For that reason, each outfit came with several packs of diapers. For transforming back to normal, there would be a second outfit to do that. Rarity was determined that this approach would revolutionize Equestrian fashion, putting her at the center.

Oddly enough, her aunts Fluttershy and Pinkie as well as her new mommy, Twilight, didn't even question it. They didn't want to make their lovely wittle unicorn dress maker upset. They saw it as a part of her wittle baby imagination and they didn't want to hurt it in anyway. They'd stand up for their little one, especially Twilight.

For the show, Rarity was planning on making this a big surprise. So, she made four distinct dresses for four distinct ponies. Rarity's plan was to persuade live audience members to wear these dresses. She would have these dresses out on display, each appealing to one of these four pony's preferences. Those ponies would be Fleur Dis Lee, Sapphire Shores, Amethyst Star from Ponyville, and Upper Crust from Canterlot. (Check mlp wiki for the designs of these ponies)

Little Rarity choose these ponies, because they each belonged to a distinct audience. Fleur Dis Lee was from the upper elite of Canterlot, Upper Crust was from the regular elite of Canterlot, Amethyst Star was from Ponyville, and Sapphire Shores was known all across Equestria. If each one enjoyed their baby experience, Rarity's new design approach would surely take center stage.

Additionally, Rarity, Rainbow Dash, and AJ would all be in their own baby dresses for the event.

The event was held in the evening in the Ponyville town hall. Everything was decorated to appeal to the many audiences. Rarity, Rainbow Dash, and AJ were in their baby dresses, diapered, and hidden behind the curtains for their special entrance. They were teleported in of course to avoid giving away the secret.

Unfortunately for Twilight, she would have to start the show and levitate the four dresses. If royalty were addressing the crowd, it would increase the significance. At least, that's what little Rarity thought. Plus, she thought her new mommy would do a great job.

Twilight peeked out of the curtain, looking at the full crowd. Being nervous, she took a deep breath and walked forward onto the fashion runway with the four dresses on manikins. Everypony gathered around confused. Where were the models?

Twilight spoke up best she could. "Greetings Fillies and Gentle-colts, Tonight's fashion show will be a little different. We'll need volunteers. These four dresses were picked out precisely to demonstrate the brilliance of Rarity's new style. Will there be any volunteers?

The dresses had a similar style to them. Sapphire Shores' dress was a white skirt dress with blue trim and little tiny sapphires covering it. Fleur Dis Lee's dress was a light blue skirt dress with purple trim and tiny purple gemstones covering it. Royal Ribbon's dress was a light purple skirt dress with light blue trim and tiny aquamarines covering it. Lastly, Amethyst Star's dress was a light cyan skirt dress with light pink trim and tiny pink gemstones covering it.

The first pony to volunteer was Sapphire Shores, spotting the wonderful designs, which appealed to her tastes. "Oh my, that one dress over there is simply exquisite. Just the kind of outfit that shines for a star like me." She pointed to the very dress Rarity designed for her. Twilight had her wait though until three other volunteers came up. Volunteers had to wait on the end of the runway. Sapphire Shores was a little agitated, but she wouldn't argue with a princess.

Fleur Dis Lee took Sapphire Shores' behavior as a sign that it was okay to also volunteer. After all, she already spotted a dress she liked. (which was the one Rarity made for her) "I too like one of these dresses. I like this one though. It's my favorite color and style choice." She calmly stood on Shores' right side.

New up was Royal Ribbon. She came to this fashion show primarily because Fancy Pants came and since Fleur Dis Lee, Fancy Pants' partner, volunteered, Royal Ribbon suddenly wanted to volunteer. She had already spotted a dress that she actually liked, but still wanted to know she could volunteer without hurting her reputation. "I agree with these two fancy ponies. That dress right there looks gorgous." She played up her entrance standing on the left side of Sapphire Shores.

Amethyst Star was the last pony to volunteer. However, she was very nervous to since two high ranking ponies just did. Still, the cyan dress that Rarity made for her spoke to her on so many levels. She just had to wear it. "Um, I agree too. This dress here looks great. C-could I model for this one? Rarity wouldn't mind, right?"

Twilight spoke "Absolutely! Anyone who can wear the dress can volunteer." With that, Amethyst, the last volunteer stood to the right of Fleur Dis Lee.

Once in line, Twilight seemed relaxed. The arguably hardest part now ended. Next up, the surprising. "This is fantastic. Now, that the models have been decided, you for should come with me. But fiiirst, we need special effects in honor of this." Twilight then casted a spell, filling the room with a thick magenta smoke.

Little did the audience know what was about to happen. Under the cover of the smoke, Twilight plucked enchanted pacifiers into the volunteers' mouths that couldn't be easily removed. (blue for Sapphire, purple for Fleur, light blue for Royal, and pink for Amethyst) The volunteers were completely surprised, but they had little time to react! They tried to remove the pacifiers to no avail. While they struggled, Twilight levitated each one and magically poof-ed the dresses onto the volunteers. Magenta vortexes then engulfed each volunteer, causing them to regress. The smoke would be clear soon though, so Twilight rushed her and the regressing the volunteers behind the theater curtains.

What happens next?
1111212211111111111112211111121.title: The Week till and the Day of the Baby Dress Show!

choices: Amethyst Star doesn't accept AJ and RD's reasons.
Amethyst Star embraces her friends' decisions.
11112122111111111111122111111212.content:
Once in the back of the stage, Twilight levitates them to a backstage room where the rest of the mane6 are waiting. The room is shut and magically made sound proof, so other audience members couldn't hear them. Then Twilight grabbed a walkie talkie, briefly turning it on. The other end of the walkie talkie was attached near a microphone. Twilight calmly spoke into it. “Ladies and Gentlecolts, this is Princess Twilight Sparkle speaking. Everything is fine. The smoke was part of the show for an invigorating performance! Once the volunteers finish putting on these dresses, we will come out to show you all.” Afterwards, Twilight turned off the walkie talkie and put it in a high place so the little one’s wouldn’t accidentally turn it on.

Everyone’s fear quickly vanished and they calmly waited for the volunteers as if this was perfectly normal.

The backstage room was magically redecorated to be baby themed, since that was the true theme. Several changing tables were available, each with their own set of baby lotions and diapers.

Rarity was happy to see Twilight come in. In a high pitched adorable voice, she screeched "How di it go? Di ebawy-win wor-ka outa wight?"

Twilight smiled at her little baby "Yep. I was nervous, but everything went off smoothly." Twilight levitated the volunteer vortexes over a prepared playpen for the new baby volunteers.

Then she snuggled her adorable baby unicorn. "Mommy will make sure your show is special." The two cuddled for a bit, before Twilight went to the playpen too.

Meanwhile, the volunteers' vortexes were just finishing up. Twilight, Pinkie, and Fluttershy gathered around in their grown up garb waiting to introduce the first babies.

The first baby to finish was Sapphire Shores. She came out of the vortex all tear-y eyed, unable to speak. Pinkie picked up the little adorable Sapphire Shores, rocking her back and forth. "It's okay, your foalsitter Pinkie Pie is here." This helped calm little Sapphire. Once her tears melted away, Pinkie removed her pacifier and placed her on a comfy changing table. "How was your first time trying on Rarity's new dress?"

Little Sapphire was overwhelmed "Wha-wha was da?"

"Awww, it was nothing, just the baby effects of wearing Rarity's new dress. You're an adorable new baby now! Isn't that great?!!!"

"Ba-baby e-fecs? Wha why does...?"

"That's a great question. Let me get Rarity." Pinkie went away for a sec to get Rarity. First she cuddled the little Rarity and then cradled her as she walked back to little Sapphire. "Here she is Sapphire. Ask away."

Sapphire was astounded at what she saw. Rarity was a baby too already wearing a cozy diaper and blue skirt dress with white trim and tiny white gemstones. Little Sapphire had a hard time asking the question as she was so caught up in Rarity's garb "Why-why-?"

Little Rarity cut her off. "Aw, Sa-fiya, me kno yo-wa wor-weed. Me di-den mean ta make ya so unhappy. Dis jus da onwy way ta con-bince yo-wa aw-wal ob me new dwess wine up." Sapphire just tilted her little head in confusion, so Rarity continued. "Me find out dat bein a baby is fun. Diapas feewl wike piw-wows an naps aw so sootin.' So, me make dwess show ta show-case dat. You aw won ob da first bowenteers ob dis! An bes ob aw-wal, you can we-wa da oda dwess ta change bak."

Sapphire was skeptical, but didn't know how to respond. So, Pinkie simply interjected and gave her patented diaper changing. She was quick as can be, tapping oddly comfortable baby powder on Sapphire's flank and following up with a super duper comfy diaper. The diaper fit snuggly around her little waist. Sapphire was mesmerized by Pinkie's changing.

With great enthusiasm, Little Sapphire screeched with enjoyment. "Oh me go-sha!! You wa wigh!!! Dis is da bes!!! ME WUB DIAPAS! Warity! Yo-wa aw on da cuttin' edg of da nes dwess webowution! Me not on-wy wub dis dwess design, me wub dis diapa too. How do me wook?" Pinkie showed a mirror. Little Sapphire no longer had any eyeliner, but she looked adorable. The dress and diaper made her stand out. Sapphire screech again "Dis is da bes!!!! Tank you Warity."

Little Rarity was ecstatic, hugging her client. "Wanna pway wit me bwocks while we wait fa da oda bowenteers?"

"Su-wa."

Pinkie smiled, putting the adorable foals in the playpen near the blocks. Three more ponies were lined up.

While Pinkie was giving Sapphire Shores a diaper change, Amethyst Star's vortex ended. She shyly looked at her new environment. "Wha wa gowin on?"

It was Fluttershy's shift this time. Fluttershy hushed the little baby, picking her up and rocking her back and forth. "There there, it's okay. No need to be scared."

Amethyst spoke up "Bu-bu.. me na scared. Me jus confuused. Wha happen?"

Fluttershy gently placed her on a changing table and then answered her question. "You tried on one of Rarity's new dresses and thus turned into a baby."

As Fluttershy initiated a slow diaper changing, Amethyst spoke calmly "Bu-bu why?"

As Fluttershy was powdering Amethyst's baby bottom, she said "Aww, it's because Rarity found out how fun being a baby was and she wanted to spread the joy to other ponies. I helped her make dresses that turn ponies into foals, but don't worry we have second dresses to turn you all back."

As Fluttershy finished the powdering, Amethyst asked "well, can me hab dat se-cunt dwess den. Me no wanna be a baby again."

"Can you wait just a little bit longer? Rarity wants you to see what it's like before then."

Amethyst folded her chubby arms "Fine den.. wet's see how comfy diapas aw..."

"Oh thank you thank you thank you! You won't regret it."

"Me wiw way-ta see den."

Fluttershy started the last part of the diaper process, carefully with love applying a diaper and checking to see what tight-ness Amethyst liked.

After all was said and done, Amethyst sat up with her being able to feel the diaper press up on her. It was... nice. Actually, it was really nice. The diaper change and the diaper. Amethyst nervously said "T-tank you fa makin me way-ta. Me act-twy wike it, da change an da diapa."

Fluttershy cuddled her "Aww, you're very welcome. Now here's a mirror to see your adorable self."

Amethyst looked at her reflection with astonishment. She-she looked amazing. Soo cute!! With the dress and diaper, she looked innocent and cute enough to hug. As a matter of fact, Fluttershy quickly did just that. She couldn't help it. Little Amethyst just looked so adorable.

Little Rainbow saw her new mommy hugging Amethyst and quickly became jealous, wailing at the top of her lungs. Fluttershy immediately flew over to Rainbow with little Amethyst in her arms.

Amethyst was shocked to see what looked like Rainbow Dash as a.. BABY! Little Rainbow was wearing a light rainbow skirt dress with magenta trim and little magenta gems covering it.

Fluttershy picked up Little Rainbow, holding her in one hoof while Amethyst was held in the other. “Is everything alright my sweety?”

Rainbow wiped away her tears. “Na-no! Me no wan mommy weabing me!”

“Ahh.. it’s okay. I wasn’t leaving you. I was just giving your friend her, Amethyst Star, some love. Don’t you like your huggy wuggy’s after diaper changes?”

In an unhappy tone Little Rainbow said “yeah…” She knew where Mommy Fluttershy was going with this.

“See, well I was just giving it to her. It’d be unfair otherwise. You wouldn’t want that though, would you?”

“No..”

Fluttershy softly said “Good Baby!” and nuzzled her foal’s nose. “Now I’m going to put you two in the playpen for now. Both of you play nice now. It’s what friends do!”

Little AJ looked a little unhappy though. She wanted to play too. Fluttershy saw Little AJ’s face though and responded accordingly “Awww, does Little AJ also wanna play?”

AJ nodded “mmmHmm..”

“Awww, come here little one. Of course you can play.” Fluttershy shortly cuddled with Little AJ and then put her in the play pen with RD and Amethyst.

Little AJ wore a green skirt dress with red trim and ruby’s covering it. Amethyst looked in amazement at the two most atheletic Ponyville ponies being babyfied.

She nervously asked “Um.. wha gotten in ta you twos..? Me wike dis, bu you two seem ta wub it.”
11112122111111111111122111111212.title: Sapphire Shores & Amethyst Star Enjoy Babydom

choices: Royal Ribbon & Fleur Dis Lee, next volunteers, don't like babydom
Royal Ribbon & Fleur Dis Lee, next volunteers, accept babydom
111121221111111111111221111112122.content:
Both Rainbow and AJ looked nervous, but Rainbow spoke up first. “Wew.. me aw-ways been nerbous. Bein’ baby is wewakzin’. Pwus, we ge comfawted by Mommy Fwuttashy!”

“Mommy Fwuttashy?” Amethyst looked adorably dumbfounded

Rainbow teared up getting nervous. “Y-yes.. me feel wike she wike mommy an-an.. she said she gonna adopt me!”

“Adopt?”

Rainbow remained nervous “S-some wair ponies not weady fa da gwown up wife yet.. me-me one ob dem…” Rainbow turned away in embarrassment.

Amethyst finally understood now, but she felt bad. She quickly rubbed Rainbow’s back and said “Me no mean ta be mean. Me jus curwious. Tanks fa da info!” Amethyst finally hugged Rainbow for extra measure. It was simply adorable. The two foals had to go so close to hug that they snuggled around each other, diapers and all touching.

After the heartfelt hug, Amethyst looked to Little AJ who said “Me baby cus da wife is fun. Workin is hawd. So, me come oba here an Twiwigh turn me back ta me weal age.”

Amethyst gave an equally dumbfounded look “Weal age?”

“Yu-yup. Me weawy a baby since it daw wife dat me kno da bes. Me jus choose dis way.”

“Bu-bu wha abowt ya famwy?”

“Me famwy adjustin’ an ebentuawy, me gonna no nee ta help da fawm. Me oda sista wiw hewlp owt.”

Amethyst was surprised, but happy for AJ. She saw these changes as natural parts of life and wanted to embrace her friends’ decisions.

The three of them, RD, AJ, and Amethyst then played around with baby blocks in the meantime.
111121221111111111111221111112122.title: Wittle AJ and RD explain their Reasons

choices: The Baby Dress Show Goes Off Wthout A Hitch
1111212211111111111112211111121222.content:
Meanwhile, Twilight and Pinkie changed the last of the diapers, Twilight took Royal Ribbon and Pinkie took Fleur Dis Lee.

Both new babies had similar shocked reactions followed by quick happy acceptance. Royal Ribbon was at first upset, but quickly relaxed after royalty, ROYALTY, changed HER diaper. She was actually quick to accept this after that. If royalty was alright with this, then why shouldn’t she? At least that’s what she thought in her cute adorable state. The princess taking care of her was also an added bonus. Sprinkled onto this fact was her comfort of knowing she could change back at any moment.

As Royal Ribbon smiled in glee at the diaper change, Twilight put her in the playpen with the rest of the babies. Royal Ribbon was at first insecure at being away from the Princess. However, her insecurity quickly went away as she saw little Rarity and Little Sapphire Shores. The three of them continued to talk about the luxuries of babydom, cheering up Royal Ribbon.

As for Fleur Dis Lee.. she first panicked. Her time as a famous model seemed to be over. Pinkie quickly cheered up the little ball of white and pink though.

“Awwwww, don’t worry little one, you’ll be aye ok!”

Fleur wiped her eyes and nervously said “Wa-wa-weawy?”

“D’awwwww, of course! Would I lie to you? Come on, I’ll show you a mirror.”

Fleur covered her eyes in embarrassment. Then next thing she knew, Pinkie stopped walking and said “Here we are little one.” Fleur eventually opened her eyes. She couldn’t help it. The curiosity was eating away at her.

She paused looking at her reflection. Her face then quickly changed to one of glee. She opened her mouth nice and wide, shouting “ME WUB IT!!!!”

Pinkie was ecstatic. “AWESOME! I knew you would. Now it’s time for a certain somepony’s diaper wiaper change!”

Fleur’s face quickly changed to one of shock. Luckily for her, Pinkie didn’t waste anytime. She quickly rushed over to the changing table and used her patented diaper change. At lightning fast speeds, Pinkie finished the changing and showed Baby Fleur Dis Lee the mirror again. Fleur interjected before the mirror though. “Da.. was… AWE-SOME! Bu-bu.. why me WUB IT?! Me nah a baby!!”

“Aww, that’s fantastic. Thank you for the compliment. There’s no need to panic though. Everypony likes a good diaper change.”

Fleur was skeptical “Weawy?”

“Yup!”

Fleur was still skeptical, but her skepticism was quickly melted away by her reflection. With the diaper added to her flank, she looked waaaaay more adorable. Her concern about the diaper changes quickly went away and she was gleaming with all the amazing model possibilities posed by being a baby. Pinkie then told Fleur Dis Lee the bit about changing back, but it seemed Fleur Dis Lee didn't really care. The thought of changing back didn't even register with her.

Pinkie then put the last baby in the playpen. The three grown-ups, Pinkie, Twilight, and Fluttershy, then asked the little one’s if any of them had to go potty. Quite a lot of them had to go actually. AJ, Sapphire Shores, Amethyst, and Fleur Dis Lee all had to go. None of them took their time though and stench odors quickly filled the baby room.

Pinkie took care of Sapphire Shores and Fleur Dis Lee (Since Pinkie was so fast, she could take care of two diaper changes at once), Fluttershy took care of AJ, and Twilight took care of Amethyst. Each baby hugged their subsequent diaper changer and all the foals were quickly ready to head out.

Twilight turned on the walkie talkie, briefly to say that her, the volunteers, and the fashion designer would be out shortly. Then Twilight turned off the walkie talkie and the three grownups tucked the little one’s into strollers. Rarity, Amethyst Star, and Royal Ribbon were all in one stroller pushed by Twilight, AJ and RD in another stroller pushed by Fluttershy, and Fleur Dis Lee and Sapphire Shore’s in a third stroller pushed by Pinkie.
