They opened the door, got behind the curtains, and pulled back the curtains to finish the show!!
1111212211111111111112211111121222.title: Royal Ribbon & Fleur Dis Lee Enjoy Babydom

choices: This designer show has a HUGE effect on Equestria
11112122111111111111122111111212221.content:
The three adults rolled out onto the designer runaway to a confused crowd. Hardly anypony knew what was going. Some audience members asked questions like “What’s with the strollers?” or “Where are the volunteers?”

Twilight, Pinkie, and Fluttershy didn’t answer any of these questions. That wasn’t what they planned after all. At this stage of the show, confusion was expected, as none of the babies could be seen.

Once the three grownups got to the end of the runaway, Pinkie spoke up ecstatically “Soooo… are you all confused? No need for that sillys, the volunteers and the designer are already here with us!”

That raised the level of confusion. But then Twilight levitated all the foals out of their strollers and poofed the strollers away. Each foal then stood up in a straight line on the runaway, with the grownups behind them, making sure each foal was alright.

The audience was flabbergasted at the site of it. Many audience members asked “No way… they’re they’re babies?!” or “What is going on?!”

Very shortly after they all were before the audience, Twilight levitated her little Rarity up as well as a microphone and Rarity spoke to the huge audience.

“Hewwo ebeypony, me name is Wawity. Many ob you pwob-wy con-foosed by dis, so wet me ek-spwain farst. A week ago, me akid-ent-awy got turned inta a baby. At farst, me wa scared, but it wa-ent becas me wa baby. Bein baby wa fun. Me get diapas dat feel wike piwwows on me fwank, me get comfy cwow-ting, an me get tons ob wub. Me wa scared cus me tot me show wa wuined. Bu den me gots idea. Since me wub bein a baby, maybe odas wiw too. So, me an me fwends make me new dwess wine up. It easy. One dwess turn pony inta baby an oda dwess turn dem back. Me wanted to get boowenteers to twy it, before dey deny it. So me did an me pweased ta say, dat me wa WIGHT! Aw-wal me boowenteers, pwease tell da awd-ence wha you tink!”

Rarity’s speech cleared the air, but there were still plenty of skeptical faces in the audience.

Little Sapphire Shores was the first to speak up though, trying to help Rarity’s cause. “Wawity is wight. Me wa weawy upset, but den me twy me farst diapa chan-gin in ye-was an me WUB IT! It so comfy! Wawity is on da cuttin’ edge ob fas-on an me da-wa a-nee won ob yous ta say oda wise. Don we aw-wal wook ador-wable?! Me is Saf-fiya Soores an me endowrse dis new type ob dwess. Dis is Wawity’s idea an she gots ta be pwased fa it!”

Many model ponies were quickly convinced by Sapphire Shores words. The models and fashion designers of the room were practically nodding their heads by the time Sapphire finished.

However, Ponyvillians were still skeptical. That’s when Little Amethyst Star spoke up with Little AJ and Little RD to her sides.

“Me agwee wit Saf-fiya Soores! Me wa weawy con-foosed by aw-wal dis. Bu den Fwuttashy.. she-she change diapa an an… me wewised some-ting. Dis takes stwess ah-fa ob me. It take stwess ofa Wainbow an AJ. Wigh guys?!”

Little AJ and Little RD nodded with big smiles on their faces and Amethyst Star continued. “Me tink me kno why me no eba do dis befowa. Me kno do dis befowa cus we idea-wise adwult hood. We tinks it so much betta eben-dogh it so hawd. We need bweaks me tink. We need ta we-wacks. Oda wise we stwess owt an an.. an den we suffa. Me wanna be baby an me not afwaid ob it!! Me WUB IT!!”

Amethyst Star’s speech convinced nearly every Ponyvillian and even some of the upper elite of Canterlot. Most of the crowd was now on Rarity’s side. Still, not everyone was convinced.

So, Little Fleur Dis Lee and Little Royal Ribbon spoke up next. Royal Ribbon was shy in front of the audience and slowly became confident. She spoke up first out of the two of them “Me-me tinks dis is gwate. Me had me diapa change by PWINCESS TWI-WIGH. Tinks abowt it! Da pwincess ob fwendship wikes dis an she had da wiwing-ness ta comfort me aw becas me baby. Me tinks baby hood is da key to feewin wike me fah-wowin da pwincess. ME WANNA FAH-WOW PWINCESS. Me wanna do so, espec-awy when me no need ta work when me ah baby. Me wanna be a baby at social ebents. Me wanna be won an me wan da cantawot ewite to fah-wow in me hoofsteps!”

There was a resounding applause by the Canterlot elite for that speech, quickly followed by Little Fleur Dis Lee’s speech. “Dah not aw-wal ob it! WOOK AT ME! ME WOOK ADORABLE! Me wub bein baby cus me look da bes me eba been. Me nah onwy wook da bes, but me feel da bes. Me feel adorable. It wike feewin ama-sin! If dis feewin not fa da ewite, den me no wanna be ewite. Me wanna be baby! Me wanna hab me wooks shine!! Me wanna hab our wooks shine! Can we pweese wet dis happen?! ME WIW NAH GIB UP!”

After her speech, every audience member was stomping their hooves. Before the designer show finished, Pinkie spoke up again. “Don’t be fooled ponies. The fun is for everypony! I’m not a baby, but I get to comfort my friends. I get to play with my friends. I feel like their caretaker and it’s incredible! The feeling of amazing-ness isn’t just for the babies, but it’s for the adults who get to care for their baby friends!”

The hoof stomping increased after Pinkie’s speech and the remainder of the evening was spent with ponies commenting on the clothing idea and the looks. Everypony was positive and all the babies felt wonderful.

As the show ended and folks left, Twilight wound up giving away quite a bit of dresses, diapers, and other baby supplies. They had a number of these saved up in the back, but the number of ponies requesting these items was more than they intended. Luckily, they brought just enough for everypony.

Amethyst Star, Fleur Dis Lee, Sapphire Shores, and Royal Robin all left the event as babies. Each had a designated friend who was caring for them.

Time can only tell how much this designer show would rock back and forth the face of Equestria!!
11112122111111111111122111111212221.title: The Baby Dress Show Goes Off Wthout A Hitch

choices: Follow an incident of it being a prank (Cheerilee)
Follow an incident of it being a gift (Mr. and Mrs. Cake)
111121221111111111111221111112122211.content:
As months passed, the number of orders needing to fill increased. Rarity had more business as a baby then she ever did as a grown up. The effects of her new clothing line were apparent through Ponyville and beyond.

In Ponyville, the number of strollers out and about increased exponentially. About a month since the designer show, a new daycare opened up. All new plethora’s of ponies were choosing to be babies as a form of relaxation. Some ponies went beyond this though.

Mayor Mare even stayed a baby on normal hours now, only changing back when she had to deliver speeches. Otherwise, she was doing her paperwork in the baby form.

This baby working style actually became quite common and the number of caretakers in Ponyville as well as the rest of Equestria increased.

In many other towns across Equestria, the same rules held true. In capital cities, the upper elite were defined by the quality of diapers and other possessions they wore. Social events were typically hosted by babies, who use to be adults of course.

Equestria truly transformed as a nation from this new clothing line up.

Of course, clothing surprises were an aspect of all this. Sometimes ponies would be surprised with baby transformation as a gift or a prank.
111121221111111111111221111112122211.title: This designer show has a HUGE effect on Equestria

1111212211111111111112211111121222111.content: So does Cheerilee prank someone or get pranked?
1111212211111111111112211111121222111.title: Follow an incident of it being a prank (Cheerilee)

choices: Her Students (Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon)
11112122111111111111122111111212221111.title: Cheerilee get's pranked into a baby

choices: Cheerilee embraces babydom, considering teaching as a baby
111121221111111111111221111112122211111.content:
It was another normal day of school. The sky was clear and the majestic sun was out. On her way to work, Miss Cheerilee spotted several strollers, many with her friends inside.

She talked with one of her friends who happened to stay a baby most of the time. That pony just so happened to be Amethyst Star, who was being cared for by a pink and white pony named Care Sweet.

Amethyst spoke up to her friend, Cheerilee, as she was nearby "Hi Cheerawee, how it goin?"

"Ahh.. it's going alright Amethyst. How about you?"

"Good. Me wa wondwin' if ya eba want ta give dis baby ting a shot."

Cheerilee laughed "I'm good. I think it's a lovely idea, but I don't plan to get my diaper changed anytime soon."

"Eh, sut ya sef. Me an da odas aw gonna be habin a pwaydate wata. You stiw can come if you want."

Cheerilee smiled "I'll think about it. Thanks for the offer."

On her way to class, she pondered on it. Each passing day was making her less and less sure of her position to not even try it. The truth was.. she was scared of it. She knew she could handle class if need be as a baby. It's just the thought of a being so vulnerable that scared her.

She shook her head right as she entered the classroom, trying to enter her zone.

On her way to her desk, Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon stopped her.

Diamond had her usual cockiness to her, with Silver Spoon smirking behind her. "Hi Miss Cheerilee, could I have a moment of your time?"

Cheerilee sighed, thinking "what will it be this time?" and said "Of course girls. What do you need?"

Diamond smiled "No, no, no. You misunderstand. We wanted to give you this dress we made!" Diamond Tiara then pulled out a gorgeous green skirt dress from her saddle bag. "Me and Spoon are thinking about becoming dress makers and we wanted to show off our dress to class. With you wearing it, we'll finally get some recognition."

Cheerilee was quite surprised by the dress. It looked amazing!! She wanted to say yes, but in a contained way. "Why of course girls. That dress looks great! Thank you for making it."

"No, thank you for wearing it."

Cheerilee wasn't thinking straight to go to the bathroom though. She simply put the dress on in a hurry in class. She then organized herself in front of a mirror. As the last fillies pulled into class, Cheerilee said "Good morning class, today we're-"

She was then cut off as magenta winds started forming around her. She stopped her lecture, trying to see what was up. Before she knew it.. she was lifted into the air and the winds formed around a vortex. Before the vortex clouded her out, she yelled "DIAMOND TIARA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!"

Before she knew it and her students, the winds were spinning around her at super high speeds. Cheerilee eventually realized what was going on, but she was powerless to stop anything. She was tricked and now foal-hood would eventually hit. The thought of what would soon be happening scared the daylights out of her. Long before the transformation was complete, Cheerilee started to cry about her situation. By the time she approached babydom, she was wailing at the top of her lungs.

After roughly 7 minutes later, the vortex ended, leaving a baby purple pony wailing. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!"

Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon had smug faces on as both of them moved to the front of class. Diamond Tiara plucked a green pacifier into Miss Cheerilee's mouth and spoke up to her fellow classmates. "Listen up! Miss Cheerilee is a baby and there's nothing you all can do about it! Today, I'm the teacher and today's lesson is how amazing I am."

The CMC stood up out of their seats to face their former bullies. Applebloom spoke up first. "No way! You can't just turn our teacher into a baby and demand you're the teacher!"

Diamond Tiara was frustrated that anyone dared to challenge her. "Well too bad. I did, so sit down Applebloom! or ELSE!"

Scootaloo spoke up "Or else what?! You had to trick Cheerilee to get the upper hand. That won't work again."

Silver Spoon looked concerned, but Diamond Tiara shot back "or else... or else, I'll remove Cheerilee's pacifier and the baby girl will wail your ears off!"

Sweetie Belle raised her voice back, squeaking a little "How DARE you? You turned our teacher into a baby and now you're humiliating the baby!" Before Diamond Tiara could give a rebuttal, Sweetie Belle levitated Baby Cheerilee into her hooves.

Diamond Tiara clenched her teeth in frustration "RRRr must you three always ruin everything!"

Applebloom laughed "Yup." and spoke up to her class "So, I think we should cancel class today. Miss Cheerilee can't teach us as a baby after all."

Cheerilee covered her face after hearing that. All the kids were leaving and it was because she was too young. She had absolutely no control over anything.

As the kids were leaving, the CMC approached Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon again. Applebloom asked "Now where is the reverse dress?!"

"It's at my house and you'll NEVER get it. Miss Cheerilee isn't coming back. She's gone. The baby right there.. she isn't her." Diamond Tiara then stared Cheerilee down, saying "she's just a baby, a weak baby, who will need a diaper by the way. I recommend you go get one or someone's gonna have an accident."

From hearing that, Cheerilee wailed, letting go of the pacifier and making a racket for the CMC.

Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon then left, laughing at the predicament they put the CMC in.

Applebloom and Scootaloo angrily stared at Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon, while Sweetie Belle tried to calm their teacher. "Guys.. this is the bigger problem."

Cheerilee, tried rocking her back and forth, singing "Hush now quiet now." This all didn't put Cheerilee to sleep, but it at least calmed her down. Sweetie Belle's experience as a baby caretaker was showing. She had already taken care of Rarity for roughly a month at this point and she was plenty ready for this.

Cheerilee finally spoke up for the first time as a baby "Tanks.. you tree... Me a-scwace. Me dunno anee-tang. If on-wy me di-dent put on dis dwess."

Applebloom and Scootaloo basically just watched. Sweetie Belle did most of the talking "It's okay Cheerilee. Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon are devious. Besides, we can fix this?"

"We-weawy?"

"Of course! I take care of my sister all the time. I'll have you in a diaper as fast as I can."

This only upset Cheerilee, making her tear up. Sweetie Belle quickly realized what she did and blushed "Oh.. I-I didn't mean it like that."

"Yes, you di!" Cheerilee yelled with tears in her eyes "Me am baby! Me am stupid baby an da own-wy ting fa me is diapas! Me wiw neba teach again!!"

Sweetie Belle did the only thing she could think. She babied Cheerilee. The approach oddly worked with Rarity, so she did it here. "Now, now, Cheerilee. Your foalsitters will take care of it."

"But den dat means me am a baby."

"An adorable one at that!" Sweetie Belle then cuddled her teacher, calming her down. "First things first. We need to get a diaper on you. Follow me girls. My house has tons of diapers in case my little sister has emergencies."

Applebloom and Scootaloo followed their friend confused, but confident Sweetie knew what she was doing.

Cheerilee was scared out of her mind, but had no choice but to follow
111121221111111111111221111112122211111.title: Her Students (Diamond Tiara and Silver Spoon)

choices: Sweetiee Bell return with the supplies right on time.
Sweetie is too late. Cheer had an accident.
1111212211111111111112211111121222111112.content:
In a surprising turn of good luck for the crusaders nothing happened on the way to Sweetie's house. They got a few strange looks from the towns folk but nopony stopped them. Cheerilee clung to the young unicorns back like it was a liferaft in a storm, which it probably was to the former adult. The magenta foal was living her fears, suddenly thrust upon her in a mean and horriable way and then told she was stuck like this forever.

What if she could never teach again? Teaching young fillies and colts was her life! Nopony would take a baby seriously! What would she do if she couldn't teach? What about her house! What about her? She couldn't even use the bathroom anymore let alone cook or buy groceries. Who would take care of her!? The mental effects only made her fears worse. She had the mental and emotional control of a foal, and she was one step away from completly loosing it! It was taking all her willpower, and basically mauling her pacifier which was given back to her, to keep from causing a scene.

The crusaders cooed at their teacher through the entire way but it didn't help. True it didn't hurt either. Cheerilee responded to the soft voices calming her, but then she would realise she was acting like a foal and that would upset her again! A visious cycle. They finally made it to Sweetie's home again without incadent.

Huh? I was expecting something to go wrong. Scootaloo said as they entered the house. Don't jinks us ya dodo! Applebloom hissed looking around nerviously. Allright the diapering supplies are in my room. Sweetie Bell said setting their teacher on the wooden floor. You two watch her. So saying the unicorn ran upstaires.Cheerliee whimpered looking at the suddenly giant sized house. It only reinforced how small and helpless she was.

Aww! Its ok Miss. Cheerliee. Applebloom cooed nuzzling the foal. Just wait a moment and we'll go find Rarity and fix this here mess right up. That did cheer the foal up some. Mayby this will all work out?

The most immediate problem is getting a diaper on the foal before the second effect of the transformation occurs. Does Sweeite make it?
1111212211111111111112211111121222111112.title: Something Else

choices: Rarity and Twilight can fix it, right?
Get the reverse dress and we fix this now! The brats have it coming anyway!
1111212211111111111112211111121222111112.content:
Sweetie Bell returned not a moment later the supplies hovering in her magical grip. Ok Miss Cheerilee lets get you dressed before. The pale filly suddenly bit her tongue to keep fro saying "accident." Cheerilee knew what she was going to say though and started to sniffle. The crusaders sighed feeling for their teacher. Sweetie levitated a diaper out of the package and pushed the foal onto her back. It was a fancy thing, with frills around the leg and tail holes and colorful designs on the front. Sweetie grinned in embarrassment at the foals look. Rarity picked them. She said causing everpony to nod in understanding.

To the shock of the other crusaders and Cheerilee Sweetie didn't do anything more than tape a diaper onto the magenta foal. Um, Sweetie Bell. Aren't their other steps? Applebloom asked. There are. Sweetie answered picking Cheerilee up. But if I'm right then it would be pointless to do anything else. Before anypony could ask what she meant a faint "hissing" sound was herd.

Cheerilee's eyes went wide as she felt her flank warm up. She pressed her hooves into the front of the diaper, as if that could stop it. Sweetie gently moved her hooves away. Don't do that Miss Cheerilee. I'll change you when your done. So whats next? I say we break into that brats house and demand the reverse dress! Scootaloo said knocking her hooves together with a "war face." Sweetie Bell shook her head. The plan was to see Twilight and Rarity. She countered. They made the spell remember. I'm sure they can fix this in half an hour.

Cheerilee watched as her students argued back and fourth ignoring her feeling her heart sink lower and lower. They weren't even asking her what she wanted. Foals didn't get much say in what they did, they just went along with their caretakers. Here she was sitting in a wet diaper as her fate was argued over by her former students. That more than anything drove home just how helpless and how little control over her life she had now. As if the universe was confirming hr new status she suddenly felt her gut clench. With a pained cry she messed herself. Tears running down her face, helpless to stop. Foals didn't have control over those body functions.

Applebloom suddenly wrinkled her nose. Ah think the first thing we need ta do is give somepony a diaper change. Sweetie and Scootaloo looked at their teacher who gazed at them with teary helpless eyes. A dozen tricks ran through the unicorns mind on how to calm a foal down, but then she remembered Cheerilee didn't want this. Unlike Rarity Cheerilee was forced into this and treating her like a foal might make it worse. So wordlessly the filly set her teacher down and changed her diaper. Cheerilee just stared at the ceiling for the entire process, shivering at the touch of the wipes and sneezing when Sweetie applied powder. All done!~ Sweetie sang helping Cheerilee sit up, the old diaper vanishing in a puff.

Incineration spell. Sweetie explained noticing the looks she was getting. Despite herself Cheerilee had to giggle, though it sounded more nervous than happy. Ok girls. Sweetie said cuddling the foal, again. Seriously now: what are we going to do to help Miss Cheerilee?

1111212221.content: Why would she want to regress a little bit?

11112122211.content:
"Morning screw up" Spike jokingly told Twilight as she walked through the morning door for breakfast.

Twilight paused abruptly. Tears slowly swelled up. Spike clearly hit a fresh wound. Once they did, Twilight walked slowly to the table with her head down. "I know... I was supposed to not let princess duties get in the way of my friends, but I did." Her tears started to fall even faster after that, so she buried her head on the table.

"Sheesh, I-I was just making a joke."

Twilight's head shot off after that and she turned to Spike. "Well, it's not funny Spike!"

The rapid change of emotions took Spike off guard and he merely said "I-I'm sorry..."

After getting that reaction, Twilight went back to her pity, burying her head on the table. "It's okay... it's not you're fault."

Spike didn't really know what to do, but he tried his best to comfort Twilight, patting her back. "It's okay Twilight. Pinkie and the gang probably don't mind at all."

Twilight just said back in a defeated tone "Really...? Then why did she cry last night when I came back past midnight?"

"Well.. uh... that was um, because..."

"Leave it Spike. I appreciate you trying to cheer me up, but it's hopeless. I can't go back in time nearly that far. What's done is done."

"But maybe you could fix it the other way."

Twilight raised her voice with inflection "The other way? What is the other way?"

"Well, going back in time doesn't really change your age does it? You'd still be a day older than your last birthday. Why don't you just change your age so you're not a day older?"

Twilight's high brows raised with curiosity. "That's.. an interesting idea, but I can't do an age spell. I already tried back when Trixie came back."

"But now you're an alicorn. I'm sure an age spell of merely one day shouldn't be too hard with all that magic."

Twilight's concerns were fading, but one issue still remained. "But will Pinkie accept this? Maybe my other friends will, but she really had her sights set on yesterday,"

"Well... maybe, but... I'll go get her. I'll try to convince her for you."

Twilight just rested her head on the table again. "K.. tell me what she says when she comes back."

Spike wasted no time after that response and headed straight to Sugar Cube Corner.

Once there, he knocked and surprisingly Mrs. Cake responded instead of Pinke, which was out of the ordinary. "Uh Mrs. Cake, have you seen Pinkie? I need to tell her something? It's urgent!"

Mrs. Cake was shy a bit "Well, of course. She's upstairs taking her day off. Just be delicate. She's been crying all morning because of last night."

After hearing that Spike raced upstairs, opened Pinkie's door and yelled "PINKIE!!! PINKIE!!! WHERE ARE YOU?!"

Pinkie was just laying on her stomach, back side up. Her head was in the Pillow and she just responded timidly "Yes...?"

Spike raced up to her "Pinkie! Twilight found a way to fix what happened with a spell!"

There was a brief pause of silence and then Pinkie jumped out of the bed with her normal glee "Really? How?!"

Spike was again caught off guard by the rapid change of emotions "Well.. um, Twilight is going to regress herself a day, so.. her birthday would actually be today."

A huge smile grew on Pinkie's face. "That. Is. AMAZING!!!! Where is Twilight now?!!!"

"She's back at the castle, probably lying on her table. She's depressed and didn't think you'd accept it this way."

"WHAT?! WELL WE NEED TO TURN THAT FROWN UPSIDE DOWN!!!" PInkie quickly rushed to get her saddle bag with 'cheer um up' supplies.

Spike just ran as fast as he could behind Pinkie. Within roughly 5 minutes they were barging into Twilight's castle room.

Pinkie rushed over to comfort her friend. "TWILIGHT! TURN THAT FROWN UPSIDE DOWN!!!"

Twilight just looked up, partly concerned "Yes Pinke?

"Why are you so down silly? You found out how to make today your birthday, didn't ya?"

"Yeah, I just" Twilight wiped off her tears "I thought you'd still be mad."

Pinkie tilted her head "Mad? I wasn't mad silly! I was sad. I was a bad friend to not help you at all! But now it's okie dokie lokie!! Today can be your birthday!!"

"You mean... you're okay with this?"

"Of course silly willy! Why wouldn't I be?!"

Twilight smiled "I-I don't know, but thank you. Let me just prepare myself for this spell."

It took roughly 5 minutes for Twilight to get ready. She said out load "Okay, here goes nothing."

Twilight levitated in the air as a magenta vortex started to form around her. Very quickly she couldn't see Spike, Pinkie, or anything in the room. Within seconds there was a bright glare and poof of smoke!

Something wasn't right though. Twilight could no longer sustain the levitation spell for some reason. It was like her magic suddenly got incredibly weak. So.. sure enough, she falls to the floor with a thud.

What's revealed is a little lavender foal with a stub for a horn and tiny wings. Right after hitting the floor, Twilight did what any foal around her age. She cried.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!!"

Spike and Pinkie's reactions to the unexpected change were virtually the exact opposites.

Spike rushed over to Twilight "oh my gosh, Oh My Gosh, OH MY GOSH!!! WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU TWILIGHT?!!!!!!!!!!!!" All this did was make Twilight cry louder. "R-right..that probably doesn't make you feel better, but.. WHAT ARE WE GOING TO DO?!!!"

Pinkie paused briefly followed by complete and utter glee "AWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW!! Twilight you shouldn't have!! This is the best gift you've ever given me!!"

Spike just said "huh." He was surpremely confused. Twilight continued wailing, that is until Pinkie picked her up and rocked her back and forth.

"Don't cry Twilight. You're one of the best friends I could ask for. You try so hard to make things right that you become an adorable wittle baby. Well, Auntie Pinkie is gonna throw you the best birthday ever!! But first! Somebody needs a diapee wiapee!!!"

Pinkie then went rummaging through her 'cheer um up' saddle bag. She found several diapers as well as baby lotions, wipes, and powders.

"Wait?! Why do you have all of that on you?!!" Spike demanded

"Because this bag is for all my friends silly! and the Cake twins happen to be my friends and babies, haha"

At this point, Spike was too exhausted. "Augh.. I'm gonna lay down for a bit. Please take good care of her. I have no idea what do."

"No need to worry Spike, Auntie PInkie's got this all handled." Spike just left. There was no point in trying to reason around this.

Twilight started to tear up after Spike left, but Pinkie was quick to comfort her.

"D'aaaaawww, there there, Twilight. It's okay. Spike is just cranky wanky right now. But that doesn't mean you're adorable, silly!!" Pinkie then nuzzled Twilight's nose and carefully laid her on the living room table.

"Okie dokie lokie, let's get you in clean diaper wiaper!!"

Pinkie then proceeded with the diaper change, lifting up Twilight's flank, wiping it down, and powdering her up. "You've been a good baby waby, now you're almost done!" Pinkie then slid a diaper underneath and strapped it in place over her friend's flanks. "There, there, all better!!"

At this point, Twilight started to speak up for the first time since she became a baby. "Tanks Pinkie.."

"Awww... you can talk!!!!"

Twilight blushed at that "Yeeaa... so?"

"That's just so aaaaaadoooorable!!" Pinkie then picked up and cradled the little unicorn. "Soo.. whatcha wanna do now?"

Twilight scowled and tried to get out what she wanted to say "I-I.. me.. me wanna"

Pinkie cut her off. "Okie dokie lokie, we'll find out about your age! Follow me!" Pinkie was ignoring the last part instead of confronting it. Twilight was having so much difficultly with pronunciation, that she had no choice but to follow along with Pinkie.

After going to a doctor, the two of them found out that Twilight was one day away from hitting the age 1.

Pinkie just thanked the doctor, preventing Twilight from getting even one word in. Outside of the doctor's office, Pinkie said "Here that Twilight! We have plenty of time to prepare your first birthday!! C'mon, let's go let all of our friends know you're about to turn one!!!"

Where does Pinkie go to first?
11112122211.title: She was too busy on her birthday and Pinkie is ...

choices: Fast forward in time to the Party
Deal with the events leading up to the Party
111121222111.content:
*Knock knock* Pinkie joyfully knocked on Rarity's door with Twilight in her other hoof. She was super eager to tell everyone, but she first wanted to tell her friends.

Rarity yelled on the other end *Coming!*

Once she opened the door, she was delighted to see Pinkie. "Pinkie! You're just the pony I wanted to see, so about that..." Rarity stopped herself in mid sentence after first seeing the foal in Pinkie's hoof. Rarity paused a bit, looking somewhat concerned. "Pinkie, I'm terribly sorry to cut my sentence short, but.. but is that..."

Pinkie giggled. "You guessed it. This wittle bundle of joy is Twilight!" After hearing that, Twilight looked away in annoyance.

Rarity couldn't say anything other than a loud "WHAT?!!"

"I know! Isn't it great!!"

Rarity was astounded by Pinkie's behavior and quickly pulled her inside along with baby Twilight. "Pinkie! Why in Equestria are you excited about this?!!"

Pinkie's enthusiasm deflated somewhat "Wha-what do you mean? Isn't this great? Now we get to celebrate Twilight's age 1 birthday party. The doctor said she'll turn 1 tomorrow."

Rarity was livid after that response. "Her age 1 birthday party! Is that why you're so happy?! So what about that! What about-"

Rarity was cut off by Twilight surprisingly. Twilight began to wail after Rarity said "So what about that!" It meant her whole transformation was for nothing.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!"

Pinkie immediately tried to comfort Twilight, rocking her back and forth. "There, there Twilight, it's okay. She didn't know."

Twilight gradually calmed down. Rarity protested "What?! What did I do?"

Pinkie sighed "The whole reason she is a baby is because she wanted to make up us missing her birthday. She was gonna do it by one day, but her alicorn magic was more powerful than she thought. You just insulted the very reason she is like this, meanie."

Rarity paused and shortly tears formed "Oh my.. I-I didn't know. Twilight" Rarity then faced Twilight, "I'm sorry, I-I didn't mean to insult that. I just want you as an adult is all and... that's all Darling."

Twilight stopped crying after Rarity's apology and even motioned to be hugged. Rarity was pleasantly surprised and the two had a moment.

Pinkie became super ecstatic again. "So does that mean you'll do it!"

Rarity raised an eye brow "Do what Darling?"

"Decorate Twilight's age 1 b-day of course."

"Oh" Rarity blushed, "Well, of course. Twilight is an incredible friend, why wouldn't I. But I must ask, how long will this last?"

"What last?"

Rarity glared at Pinkie "This baby spell"

"Ooooooooo, you mean that! Well... um, I think Twilight will have to grow up again."

Rarity was super concerned "You're serious?"

Pinkie said in a defeated tone "yes..."

Rarity saw out of the corner of her eye Twilight on the verge of crying again. So.. Rarity did everything she could to avoid that. "Don't be so pessimistic Darling! That's fabulous news! Mind you, this will be a big change to adjust to, but that means we'll have an adorable Twilight baby to care for."

Twilight briefly smiled. Rarity's approach luckily avoided a disaster.

Pinkie then raised her mouth. "All righty then! That's super! Then in the mean time, I'll take Twilight to the Cakes for baby supplies."

1111212221111.content:
Twilight's re-first birthday actually was going pretty swell. It had the decorations, it had the baby feel, and it had her friends. However, it lacked one crucial component, all of the guests were significantly older than Twilight.

The party took place in Twilight's castle ball area, but the whole floor was covered in protective carpeting for Twilight. Not only that, a plethora of baby toys were scattered across the floor. Changing tables were located near the walls, in case Twilight had an accident.

The theme of the party was rather strange. Everybody there was required to wear diapers. (Only mares attended this party mind you.) There were drinks and snacks before the cake, but these items weren't very normal. The only drinks available were milk or juice in baby bottles. The food was all mashed baby food. Rarity realized she went a bit overboard, but she wanted to do everything she could to make Twilight feel like the guests.

A lot of the guests crowded around Twilight, which made Twilight nervous to some extent. For these reason, others chatted among themselves until Twilight was free. Some even played with the baby toys to take up time.

*frame to some ponies on the floor*

BonBon stood over Lyra and Minutte with an annoyed look. "Will you two stop that? You guys are acting like babies.."

Lyra and Minutte giggled and Lyra said "Awww, come on BonBon, it's fun.This is the theme of the party, isn't it? We're just playing the act."

Minutte added "Yea, come on BonBon, embrace the baby in you." The two of them just went back to playing with blocks, not waiting on BonBon's reply.

"The-the baby in me? There is no baby in me! I'm an adult, what you two are supposed to be!"

The two didn't respond and BonBon just sighed. "Fine.. give me a block."

*frame to the drink and food table*

Pinkie was at one of the tables, drinking her fifth bottle. "I dunno what Twilight was so sad about. This milk tastes great!"

Rarity sternly looked at Pinkie "Pinkie! Be mindful of others. Maybe Twilight will want some."

Pinkie just joked it off "But Rarity, I need my milky wilky too. Can't ya see this diaper?" Pinkie lifted up her dress, to show the round white cushion around her legs.

Rarity took a deep breathe. "Do you have to joke about this theme..?"

Rainbow butted in. "OF COURSE SHE DOES! I can't believe we all have to wear these stupid outfits anyways."

Rarity kept quiet. It wasn't worth arguing in front of Twilight.

*Frame to when Twilight's about to blow out the candle*

All of the 26 guests sat in high chairs like Twilight and sang at the same time "Make A Wish, It's Your Birthday"

When the time was ready to blow out the candles, Twilight concentrated on her wish "I wish I was like all my friends." As Twilight blew out the 1 candle, her horn glowed and all the guests were relieved. They thought Twilight would turn back. Oh how they were wrong.

At this time, Twilight unknowingly shot a bright magenta bolt up to the disco ball. The spell had an interesting effect on the disco ball. It caused the disco ball to glow magenta, engulfing the whole room in a magenta hue. The light did not last long, but it's radiance hit every single guest for the 30 seconds it lasted. In those 30 seconds, the whole guest roster transformed into wittle 1 year olds. Oddly enough, each ponies' diaper fit their new forms.

Whatever spell Twilight cast, it sure accomplished her wish. She was no longer the only baby in the room in a high chair. She was just like all of her friends.

1113111.content:
When Twilight woke up, she could immediately tell something was wrong. Her bed and her pillow were suddenly too small for her, and her horn was stuck in the board behind her. She pulled her horn out and rolled over, suddenly noticing a much longer and slender set of purple hooves protruding from her bed. Twilight’s mouth fell open.
“What happened to me?” Even her voice sounded strange. It was louder, but had a soft yet regal, melodic sound.

She put a hoof to mouth as she heard it, surprising at the new voice that came out of mouth. What had happened last night that could have cause this, and what had happened to her anyway? Twilight tried to think about the events of the previous night, but her memory was blurry. She had tried to read up on Alicorns, but little information existed about them, aside from historical notes about Celesita, Luna and Cadance. She had looked in some other books, then there was a gap in her memory and she went to bed.

What had happened in that gap? She held her head. Think Twilight, think!

She racked her mind but nothing was coming back to her. Whatever had happened, she wasn’t going to find the answer lying in bed, so she rolled out and landed on her hooves, immediately noticing something else strange.

So that explained the uncomfortable feeling in her back. She stretched out her wings and noticed they were much longer, looking a lot like Celestia’s only purple. Twilight gaver herself another look. Somehow her proportions had changed, her and hooves were all like Celestia, and a long, shimmering mane floated behind her. She checked her cutie mark. It was still a 5 pointed star, but the mark was bigger, again like Celestia’s.

Twilight had to get to a mirror, that was he only way she could confirm this. Moving through her home felt strange, like it was too small for her. She started to understand how Celestia felt when she came to visit.

She raced to the bathroom and gasped when she saw a mirror. Her hypothesis was correct, somehow she had become an Alicorn like Celestia. Was this the result of a spell she cast? A side effect of some magical artefact? A dream? She pinched herself.

“Ow!”

This wasn’t a dream.
1113111.title: A strange morning

1113112.author_name: This site is dead.I wana leave
1113112.content:
Twilight awoke, her head pounding.

Ugh, what happened? Did I break reality or something?

Twilight tried to recall the last few minutes, but only made the pain in her head worse. She remembered trying to cast a spell, but not what or why.

Looking around, she found herself in Canterlot Castle's throne room. It should have been familiar to her but something was off, actually several things. It was decorated differently to how Celestia did it and the throne in which she was sitting in was sized to Twilight.

“Well that's strange.”

Looking down at it, she also notice her body was different, both her torso and legs were long and slimmer and she had long purple wings from each side of her body. It was as thought her proportions had shifted to match Celestia's.

Twilight was trying to come to term's with these strange changes, when a small white unicorn with a pink mane cheerfully walked into throne room, the guards moving to let her through without question.

“Hey Princess Twilight, are you ready to teach today's lesson?”

Twilight stared at both the abruptness of the question and this strange pony in front her. There was something familiar about that voice, and those purple eyes.

“Huh?" Twilight leaned in closer, not able to believe her eyes. "Celestia is that you?”

Twilight and the new spell.
It was a typical day in Ponyville as Twilight woke up to sunshine again. As usual she got out of her bed, brushed her mane and did her regular morning routine. What wasn't usual was that she wanted to try something new.
She wanted to try a new spell. That wasn't too exciting, but was was that it was from a new book she got. The new book was titled Spells and Wonders. This book was rather thick but also had lots of pictures and diagrams describing the spells.
She looked through the book a couple of nights after she received it and was curious about one spell in particular. She saw that the book had various spells that could allow her to transform things and showed her new abilities she could do with her magic.
She was already rather skilled in magic but this book had spells she never saw before. One in particular was a weight spell. It was pretty simple and allowed her to change the weight of things.
Twilight wanted to see what the book meant. She flipped through pages of the spell and saw the diagrams. The pictures showed that the weight spell could change the gravity, mass and volume of things. So without too much hesitation, she decided to try the spell.
From previous experience, she learned that it was unwise to try new spells on herself, her friends, or animals. So she chose a simple rock. She got Spike to help her out with the spell.
She asked him to watch the rock and record any changes that took place. He agreed to help, being her assistant and all, and placed the rock on a scale for her. She started slow.
She first tried the gravity form of the spell. It worked and made the rock heavier. She then tried to reverse the process and it also worked. Twilight was excited that nothing went wrong. She now wanted to try something more advanced.
Next she went for the mass of the rock. It was very similar to the weight form but she noticed that the rock grew a little. That made her happy because it was expected. She shrank the rock back to normal and all was well.
Now she wanted to try the volume portion. She saw the rock grow but the scale didn't change. She was still happy. Now she wanted to move onto something more exciting.
She wanted to see if she could combine the forms. She first tried to make the rock small and heavy. It worked. After a short while of more tests, she was ready to try it on herself.
Spike knew that this could be dangerous, but seeing her previous success, he wasn't too worried. Twilight wasn't sure how her body would react but hit herself with the spell anyway. She was thrown back after she was hit.

What happens next?

Spike and Twilight

1113221111.content:
"I'll get a tarp!" Spike said dutifully, bolting upstairs. Twilight opened her mouth to stop him, but he was gone before she could get a word out. The knocking grew louder and more insistent as the visitor grew more impatient. A glance at the doorknob showed it was unlocked. If they decided to come in, she'd be screwed.

Thinking quickly, she wracked her memory for a spell. There had to be one, she just needed a simple glamor, maybe some simple body modification, nothing she couldn't handle... A lightbulb lit up in her head. If she combined some basic mane, coat, and tail coloration spells with Starswirl's 63rd principle, nopony would be able to see through her disguise!

"Here goes nothing," She muttered as her horn ignited.

In a second, her entire body began to glow. Her coat began to darken, going from lavender to a deep, regal purple, while her mane and tail shrunk down, growing rougher and more unkempt in the process. She felt a tingle as her muzzle began to grow thicker and stockier, thick stubble appearing across her upper and lower jawline. Her body began to gurgle and quiver as her fat redistributed itself. Her ass began to shrink, while pounds moved into her belly, giving her a distinctly rounder, somewhat masculine figure.

To the casual observer, Twilight was a stallion, albeit a massive, greasy fatty. But there were still hints of her true self leftover, so if she wanted to trick anypony who really knew her, she'd need a little something extra. With a flick of the horn, her cutie marks faded away, and a second later, a pair of hammers and horseshoes appeared upon her chunky flanks. Her coat darkened to grey, while her mane and tail turned into short-cropped military-style cuts. Now, even her closest friends shouldn't be able to tell the difference.

She finished not a moment too soon, as the door handle turned and Rainbow Dash barged in.

"Hey, Twili..." She shouted, before trailing off as her eyes focused on the massive figure in the middle of the room. Twilight began to sweat, gazing into her friend's wide eyes for any hint of recognition. She found none, and breathed an internal sigh of relief.

"W-who are you?" Rainbow stammered, her face turning beet red.

"I'm, uh," Twilight searched, her deep baritone voice taking her off-guard, "A-Anvil! Twilight's cousin!"

Rainbow stared for a moment, her lip planted firmly between her teeth. Twilight noticed a trickle of blood leak down her chin, and hoped against hope that she hadn't somehow figured it out, and wasn't desperately holding in laughter. Finally, Rainbow opened her mouth, and said...

With that, Twilight slumped down and continued her ice cream. Once she had finished, she forgot all about the book, the spell. She thought she'd always been fat, and as such she rarely left the house. Speaking of rare, her perceptions of her friends changed too, especially Rarity. She now viewed Rarity as stuck-up, spoiled and egotistical, even though this was far from the truth. She also thought that Rainbow Dash was "pretty cool", Pinkie was "the funny one", Fluttershy was a tree-hugging pushover and... Who was the other one again? The cowpony? Apple-something? Twilight couldn't remember, but she knew that orange Earth pony made awesome food. That's all she cared about, really.

In Twilight's new reality, she was still the Princess' student, but she didn't care about studying or friendship, so she was the LEAST favourite student...

Twilight and Celestia
After getting this new mindset from the spell, Twilight decided to fall asleep. She was rather full and tired from "working so hard." She started to fall asleep until she heard a knock on the door.
She woke up but didn't move. She shouted, "It's open!" Celestia opened the door and was escorted by two guards like usual. When she entered, she was shocked to see what happened to Twilight. She said, "Greetings miss...what on earth happened to you!"
Twilight had a confused look on her face and replied, "Nothing, why do you seem surprised?"
Celestia knew that something was wrong. She saw the new book and responded, "So you were testing a new spell?"
Twilight responded, "Uh, yeah, for once. So are you here to congratulate me or give me a lesson about being lazy again?"
Celestia knew about the spell Twilight cast on herself. She saw all of the symptoms. The weight being the most prevalent, but Twilight's new mindset was what gave it away. She responded, " Congratulations! Um, would you mind handing me that book?"

What happens next?
111322112122.title: Celestia Arrives?!

choices: Celestia casts the spell on herself
Celestia leaves Twilight to her slovenly fate
1113221121221.content:
Twi looked down at the book, then back over to Celestia. "Get it yourself," She grunted, rolling over onto her back, "S' right there."

Celestia rolled her eyes and picked up the book in her magic. She knew this spell very well. Many brilliant magicians had attempted it over the ages, and none of them had the willpower to cast the reversal. Even Starswirl, arguably the greatest magical mind in history, was no match for this simple cantrip. She didn't want Twilight to end up like him, eating and farting for the rest of her days, but there was little she could do. Only the caster could reverse the spell, and right now, Twilight lacked the willpower to sit up, let alone cast a complicated spell.

She flipped through the book, scanning the pages for something that might help, but nothing caught her attention as being particularly helpful. Nothing but weird, oftentimes sexual spells, relating to transformation, mental manipulation, growth, shrinking... But nothing that could help solve Twilight's current predicament.

She did have one idea... If she cast the spell on herself and became a slob, in appearance if not in mind, she might be able to convince Twilight to cast the spell and turn herself back. She just had to keep her wits about her and not give in to temptation. The slob life might seem enticing to some, but Princess Celestia was confident she'd be able to resist long enough to help her favorite student.

But... It was risky. If she so much as considered becoming a slob, it could cause a cascade effect that would destroy her mind and leave her as a big, useless ball of dough, like just Twilight. Perhaps it would be better to give up, leave her once-student to her fate... It wasn't like Twilight had any objections. She could take the book with her to Canterlot and burn it, to make sure nothing like this ever happened again.

What was her choice?
1113221121221.title: Continue

choices: Twilight wants to show her how to be a proper slob now
Celestia's mind is already starting to crumble
11132211212211.content:
Celestia watched as the now slob Twilight burped out loud, not caring about the presence of her guest. "No!" Celestia thought to herself as she opened the book back up to find the spell of her needs. "I will not leave Twilight to this state willingly. The only way this shall pass is if I fall as well! Faustus help us all of it comes to that." With that last but of thought, Celestia closed her eyes as per the spells instructions while her horn began to glow. Her whole body began to follow suit, the pounds adding together by the minute. Already Celesti a could feel the walls of her inhibitions being attacked by the spell but kept as level a head as she could. She just had to keep focusing on the mission at hand or else risk becoming a fat, lazy slob like Twilight.

Twilight meanwhile was laying as she was before with eyes staring intently on the transforming princess. After all the years that her (magically tampered) memories had of the rather sticky nature of Celestia, it seemed the old girl was ready to relax alongside her. To lazy to even show true excitement, Twilight just sat and cheered as Celestia became as far as herself.
11132211212211.title: Celestia casts the spell on herself

choices: She heads outside and tries to stall them
She attempts to make the slob slightly more presentable
11132211212212.content:
Celestia sighed, glancing between the accursed book and her slovenly student. It was a hard decision to leave her faithful student to this terrible fate, but she knew it was necessary. She hadn't faced a mental adversary in centuries, and even the slightest miscalculation would lead to her own destruction, and, inevitably, that of Equestria. For the sake of the realm, she simply couldn't risk it. She shuddered, thinking of how massive the slob would become, given a few decades of nonstop eating. She could remember how big Princess Platinum was after her misadventure with this spell; Looking around at the library walls, she wondered how much an expansion would cost.

Feeling like an executioner, she stuffed the book in her saddlebag, to burn as soon as she reached a secure location. In the meantime, she'd have to do something about the greasy blob once known as Twilight Sparkle. Her family would be horrified to find out what had become of their beloved sister and daughter. Equestria would doubtless condemn her as a monster for leaving the once-hero to this state. But such scars healed with time. Someday, perhaps, Twilight would regain her old self, work off the weight, rebuild her reputation...

Twilight groaned, letting out a massive fart in Celestia's direction. She choked, sticking her head out the window for fresh air. Outside, she could see Twilight's friends approaching the library. She gasped - How would she explain this?

Twilight lay on the floor, slowly drifting off to sleep. It was time for a nap, she decided, and the library floor was as good a bed as any. Suddenly, the lights in the room darkened. The windows became clouded, and a black mist began to seep from under the door. The sulfurous smell of brimstone began to fill the room, and Twi gagged. It was worse than her farts!

"Ugh, what now?" Twi grumbled, pulling herself into a sitting position.

A pair of green eyes appeared in the inky-black mist, casting a greenish glow over the library. King Sombra stepped out of the mist, velvet cape flowing behind him, his lips curled up in a sneer. He stood there in the darkness, the only illumination from his lizard-like eyes, and the purple mist flowing from them.

"Pathetic unicorn," Sombra growled, "You'll lose weight after a few years in the crystal mines!"

"Yeah, no," Twi answered, quickly thinking of a spell and casting it on him.

Sombra's belly felt full and heavy. He placed a hoof on it, eyes widening as he felt it expanding, growing closer and closer to the ground. His plot became huge and flabby, sagging over his tree-trunk-sized thighs. Chins cascaded down his neck, resting on his flabby chest.

"W-wha-" Sombra tried to say, only to be cut off with a belch. He tried to speak again, but he was starting to feel lightheaded. His legs felt weak, like they couldn't hold his mass, and he slammed down onto his plot with a thunderous crash. "I... Feel..." He mumbled as his mind changed. No longer a , Sombra was just a cruel, demanding slob who had taken over the crystal empire for the sake of food. Twilight's kind of stallion.

111331111.content:
She witnesses a bright white light, and then, nothing... except that everything except herself was black and white, and seemed frozen in time. Suddenly, rainbow tendrils flew from her horn and ensnared Twilight around each of her legs. "What sorcery...?" Mild pain fills her body as her bones start popping, and she notices in her room's mirror that her muzzle was crunching down, becoming a different, yet still beautiful face, bearing a petite nose and small red lips. In a panic, she looked around, and saw strange digits separating out of her hooves. That's when she passed out...

When she woke up, she instinctively rose... to her hind legs... no, her only legs. "What happened..." She saw the strange black & white effect was gone as she groggily groped her head with her hand... hand?! Quickly, she ran to the mirror, and saw herself. In the mirror stood what her books only said were legends, a human. This obviously resulted in loud screaming. She was furless, save her mane, which she guessed was now called 'hair' now, and she sported five fingers on each of her 'hands.' She saw she was dressed in 'clothes,' a violet tank top and jeans, and those odd things on her feet must be 'shoes' (Sandals to be exact). She was perplexed by the strange mounds on her chest for a moment. "Why are they so big?" but figured there had to be a reason humans had them. However, she did notice she did keep one aspect of her pony-ness. Looking at her toned rear, poking through her jeans, she was relieved to be greeted by her swishing tail, which nearly dragged the ground. "Guess I'm not all 'hu-man.' However, the bigger question is, why did this spell turn me into one?"

Just then....

"Umm...well...it was like this.."

"Three days ago, I was at Carousol Boutique where Rarity was making me some clothes. She was bragging about being pretty...again. I spoke up, saying 'Do you think I'M pretty?' 11133112.content:
One day, Twilight was cleaning out some of her mustier bookcases when a thick book written in ancient text fell on her head. "What is this?" she pondered. She poured through the book, amazed by the ancient spells she never heard of. Finally, she saw one that she had to try. It was a spell that'd let her visit other worlds. Every time it was cast, one could go to a new world, and it says masters can recall worlds they have journeyed to before with this spell. "I wonder what kind of people I could meet!!"

She went to her mirror, as prescribed in the spell, and spoke the mystic words, "Altera Quantus, String Parallaxium, Vortexus Creatio ex Nihilo!!" A swirling vortex opened, and a strange new world was coming into view. She looked below, and read aloud, "...and now for the stabilizing tome; 'Reflection be my Gate!!'" She sees houses in a small suburb. "Time for adventure, I guess."

Over the many weeks, Twilight visited many realms, and I won't bore you with all her exploits, as this is about one particular exploit, but here are some notable adventures. She:

- Helped a mentally challenged fat man and a giant chicken make peace after years of fighting.
- Helped a backwoods teenage cephalopod get his GED.
- Attended a peace conference in space amongst thousands of species and helped stop a deadly threat to the cosmos when she learned her horn is the horn that can pierce the heavens!!
- Taught a surly booze-drinking robot from the future the true meaning of Kwanzaa, then helped his lobster friend get a three-course meal.
- Met a flying spaghetti monster.
- Helped a fellow wandered of space and time make the leap that will take him home.
- Convinced a deranged sentient computer program to give mankind a second chance.

One day, she cast the spell again, but was shocked when she saw in the mirror a girl that resembled her holding a creepy plush cat, causing her to stop before uttering the stabilizing tome. "OMG... She looks just like me..."

The girl on the other side says, "Something's wrong with my mirror, Panty!! I swear I'm seeing ponies!!" She leans forward to examine the mirror, and Twilight does the same. Twilight lifts her hoof to the mirror as this girl puts her hand to it, when suddenly the image begins distorting, and a bright white light begins pouring out. Rays of light tear from the vortex in the mirror as both pony and girl scream, and then there is an explosion, and then, nothing...

Moments later, Twilight woke up, grasping her aching head as she rose, seeing with blurry vision her room was blasted to shambles, smoldering embers laying everywhere. "Oh, my head." Twilight mutters as she stumbles about. It was then she realized, "I'm on four hooves, so what am I holding my head with?" She lowers the appendage, to see a hand on an arm adorned in a black sleeve capped with a frilly white cuff. "Wha.." Twilight gasped as she galloped around to find anything left that was intact and reflective in her room. Luckily, a shard of her mirror was stuck in the wall near eye level, large enough to give her a general view of her body. She gasped at the sight. Up top, she was almost a dead ringer for the girl she saw in the mirror, save for her horn, which was still affixed to her forehead, dressed in a frilly black dress with a white collar and blue ribbon around her neck, and a cobalt ribbon sash tied around her waist complimented by a large bow in the rear. In her violet and fuchsia hair, which now stretched now to her knees, there was a cobalt bow there as well. Her green eyes stared back in shock. However, starting from this humanoid form's hips she was still all pony, although she was now wearing cobalt and black stockings on her legs going up to her knees, and had another cobalt bow on her tail, however everything else about her pony half, including her cutie mark, was still the same. "What happened... The stabilizing tome!! I was so surprised by how similar we looked I forgot to cast it!! But this... Why did this happen?"

What happens next?

He hadn’t heard that tone in a while. Twilight was trying to sound calm, but Spike could tell she was on the verge of a breakdown.

“Maybe I should just pass it to you.”

He reached for the door-

“NO!” Twilight shouted, almost knocking Spike off his feet.

Ok something was definitely wrong

“Twilight I’m coming in!”

Spike tried to turn the knob.

“No!” Twilight turned it back, easily stopping the young dragon.

The knob wouldn’t turn at all. She was stronger than him, but normally Spike could at least move the knob a little. Had Twilight been working out or something?

“Come on Twilight! Open the door!”

“I said no! Spike stop it! This is not a good a time!”

“Twilight I know somethings wrong! Let me help!”

Spike did not intend to budge, but the door loosening. Not the lock or handle, something on the side.. the door was off the hinges!

Spike deflty leapt out of the way as the door, revealing a much larger Twilight. He did a double.

“Twilight what happened to you?!”

When Twilight woke up, she could immediately tell something was off, but she couldn’t put her finger on what it was. She carefully inspected every spot of her room. Nothing seemed amiss or out of place, though for some reason everything seemed just a little bit smaller. Was this another of Rainbow Dash’s pranks, or something else?

Twilight ran over to he mirror. Was their anything something about her? She looked attentively but could not see anythign except… was she taller? No that had to be impossible, she was a fully grown mare.

This was aggravating. What the problem? The walls? The angle of her room? Twilight growled in frustration, determined that she would not leave until she puzzled this out.. until her stomach growled in hunger.

She headed for the kitchen, passing Spike along the way. Spike looked at her quizzically.

“Hmm… theirs something different about you… are you taller?”

“Huh.. is it your mane?”

Twilight sighed, too hungry to have this conversation, though as she walked she scanned the rest of her castle for any clues. Still nothing. Twilight had long since learn she couldn’t find the answer to all of life’s mysteries, but try as she might this would gnaw at her throughout the day…..

11231211.content:
"Princess Celestia! Princess Celestia! You need to wake up! You're late raising the sun!"

Groggily Twilight opened her eyes to the insistent pounding. Noting the all encompassing darkness around her she groaned.

"Spike, its still dark outside. I'm sleeping."

Suddenly she realised that something was not right. Her voice sounded odd, incredibly familiar, but off somehow. Re-opening her eyes she actually took notice of her surroundings.

This is not my room. Where am I?

All around her was expensive looking furniture in a quite unfamiliar room. Scrabbling to get up on her haunches she noticed that everything seemed a bit smaller than normal.

What is going on here?

"Princess Celestia! We need you to raise the sun asap. We are already 20 minutes past the deadline." A ragged looking earth pony came busting through the door looking at Twilight expectantly.

Taking a quick look behind her Twilight looked back at the earth pony. "I don't think that the Princess is here."

A peculiar look was shot at her. "Are you feeling alright your majesty? You seem a little off this morning."

Finally Twilight, confused by the pony's behavior towards her, looked at herself and everything so far that morning made sense. Although not for long, as she blacked out from the shock.

1123121111.content:
Twilight's knees grew weak and she nearly fainted again, but she somehow managed to remain standing.

"I'm Princess Celestia?! I mean I'm in Princess Celestia's body. But how is this possible?

"Princess?!" The guard asked her "Are you ill? I can fetch the royal physician at once-"

"No! Uh I mean that won't be necessary..."

"But Princess-" The guard looked towards the window.

It was still as dark as midnight outside. The moon had fallen, but the sun was yet to rise and everypony was waiting for her to start the day but she had no idea how! She considered getting Luna, after all if Celestia could raise the moon then surely Luna could raise the sun? But what if it was her fault she stuck in Celestia body? WHat if all this was because of her?! What would Luna do to her?! Even if she didn't know how to raise the sun maybe the magic to do so was in Celestia's body. It was possible... she did technically have Celestia's cutie mark.

Twilight looked at the horizon and concentrated, trying to imagine the sun soaring into the air. She concentrated and to her surprise the sun quickly and easily rose! Wow Celestia must be extremely powerful! Twilight could never imagine lifting something so large with so little effort

The guards looked relieved though still seemed puzzled at her bizarre behaviour.

"Your majesty, forgive me for asking but do you need more rest?"

"Y-yes that would be a good idea! Thank you everypony your princess is fine!"

The guards still seemed puzzled and concerned. It must have been strange hearing Celestia's voice cracking the way Twilight did under stress.


"Are you sure there's nothing you need?"

"I'm sure! Everypony please go!" Twilight pushed the nerest with Celestias wing, breifly surpised she could actually push a pony using only her wings, espeically one as tall and well built as a guard.

"If you're sure..."

"Yes I'll call if I need anything!"

The guards reluctantly left.

Now she was finally alone with her thoughts.

How did she get here? Was this her fault or someone elses? She didn't remember casting a spell like this, but she had had magical accidents before. Would Luna understand? Twilight shuddered. She'd rather not risk it if she didn't have to. Maybe she could check the royal library, there had to be a book about this, hopefully with a spell that could fix things.

If she was here, where was Celestia? Presumably Celestia was in Twilight's body, but Twilight couldn't be sure of that. A part of her wanted to ask Celestia for help but how would she take it? Well she probably wouldn't banish Twilight... wait. Celestia used her own magic to send those letters, and it was a spell Twilight didn't know! And unlike raising the sun this wasn't magic that would be stored in her body!

What would she do if somepony needed Celestia? Would she have to fill in for her? Could she dream of doing such a thing? Would it be considered treasonous her to try? And yet what if some pony needed Celestia really badly? She couldn't let the kingdom fall into chaos! How was she going to manage this?

11231211112.content:
Twilight paced around her room, or rather Celestia's room still ruminating her predicament, imagining the worst things that could happen while also trying to desperately think of how she should handle this.

She heard anther knock on the door, this one was more forceful than the guardpony's.

"Celestia? What are you doing in there? YOu haven't come down for breakfast."

Twilight froze, her wings sticking up rigidly.

Tartarus! it's Luna! I bet she already knows something is wrong. If she finds out I did this she'll...banish me to the sun? Where does Luna baish- No I have to play this cool.

Twilight cleared her throat and did her best to mimic Celestia's calm demeanor.

"I was.. uh... just thinking."

"Really sister?" Twilight imagined Luna was rolling her eyes. "About what?"

"Oh uhh.." She fidgeted. "just about what I might do today."

"Funny you usually have that well scheduled...."

Twilight hastiy looked around, noticing a checklist by her bed and levitated it towards.

"Uhh yes.. but I was thinking about how I was going to approach this day."

"Hmm I see..." Luna didn't sound convinced but she didn't seem to care too much. "Well you shouldn't tarry, your Royal Audience starts in half an hour."

Oh buck!

"Uh thanks Princess Luna."

"Why would you call me Princess?"

BUCK!

"I-I'm just sleepy... I uh didn't sleep well last night."

"Would you like me to look into your dreams?"

"NO!" I'd be so busted! "I mean that won't be necessary."

"Hmmph if you're sure. Anyway I'm off."

"Where are you going?"

"To bed. It's been a long night."

"Huh you're going to sleep?" There was a pause and Twilight was sure that Luna was glaring at her. She hastily corrected herself. "I mean of course you are!"

"Good night Tia..."

"Good night Pr- Luna."

Twilight waited for her to walk away before she stepped out. She headed for the kitchen, still thinking what to do.

Hmm... Luna clearly thinks something is wrong. Hopefully she just thinks I'm out of it. I hope she doesn't think I'm a changeling or something! Twilight took a deep breath. No that would be ridiculous. Though if she checks my dreams she's going to figure me out. I just need to get through Celestia's morning duties well enough that I don't cause a disaster, then I can head to the royal library and try to find a way to fix this.... Can I really fill in for Celestia? Maybe I should just call in sick, reschedule her morning duties and head to the library.... but ponies could be counting on me, what should I do?
11231211112.title: For my own amusement

choices: She decides to head to Ponyville
112312111122.content:
No I shouldn’t risk it, I don’t know how to do Celestia’s job and I don’t want to cause any trouble. Besides if I can find a way to undo this spell then Celestia will be back in Canterlot and no one would be any the wiser.

She hastily scarfed down some pancakes, feeling a brief tinge of nostalgia, as she remembered Celestia making them for her as a filly, then she told one of the guards she wouldn’t be seeing any pony as she wasn’t feeling herself today.

Twilight ran up to the library, Celestia's legs still feeling strange to her and pulled out all the magic books she could find.

"There’s nothing here about body swapping! Arggh!"

Wait.. Discord might be able to help.. if he’s willing. And isn’t the one behind this in the first place.

She cast the spell received that should bring her, but instead of him materialising in front of her, she heard a series of beeps, and a voice like his but muffled.

“You have reached Discord’s answering service. Sorry I’ve gone off to the chaos realm for a week. To leave a message just say something and I’ll get back to you. Maybe. If I can be bothered.”

“Are you bucking kidding me?!” Twilight said, before letting out a low scream.

“Beep! Message recorded.”

“No I didn’t mean to- Oh whatever.” She cancelled the spell. “Oh crap! Discord’s going to wonder why Celestia left that as a message! Wait that’s the least of my problems right now….”

There didn’t appear to be any spells in the library that could help her. Twilight wondered how much time had passed. She hoped something bad hadn’t happened in her absence. It was strange Celestia hadn’t tried to contact her, assuming she was in Twilight’s body. If she wasn’t, where was she? Who or what would be in Twilight’s body?! Spike or her friends could be in danger. Though maybe it was simply laying inert.

Could she really take that risk? If there was an imposter running loose in her body then she had to stop her! Then again, what if Twilight wasn’t the only who had swapped bodies? She hadn’t noticed any pony else acting odd, but she had been on her own much of the day. It was worth a check. She checked with her royal guard, one of the ones who would watch over Celestia during appointments.

“Ah Princess, feeling any better?”

“A little.” Twilight smiled weakly. “Has any ponyelse… not being feeling themselves?”

“What do you mean, your majesty?”

“You know.. reporting that they might be under any strange magical effects.”

The guard looked confused then shook his head.

“No, your majesty.”

“Nevermind. I mean good, that will be all.”

Twilight walked away, thinking things over again.

Hmmm.. somepony else would have sought help if they had been body swapped. And I’m pretty sure Luna is her usual self. But that still doesn’t explain why Celestia hasn’t sent a letter if she’s in my body and where she might be if she isn’t. I should head to Ponyville and check it out… but what if Canterlot needs me? But if Celestia is missing and an imposter is in my body then I need to deal with that right now! But what if Canterlot faces an immediate crisis in my absence?

She levitated the list of duties over and quickly skimmed the list, seeing if any of them required immediate attention

11231222222222221.content:
Twilight awoke from her slumber. She could immediately tell that something was wrong. She wasn’t in her room, she was somewhere else. The walls were adorned with pink and her bed was larger and softer. Next to her was…. Shining Armour?! Twilight yelped jumped out of the bed. Why was he here and in the same bed?!

Her wings rose up in alarm, and that’s when she noticed.. these weren’t her wings! And her coat. Why was it pink?

Her sleep haze passed and the obvious hit her. She had somehow switched bodies with Princess Cadance! But how? Twilight didn’t remember casting a spell like this. Then again she couldn’t seem to remember last night.

Shining Armour rolled over, his eyes open. Twilight realised she must have woken him. He smiled at her.

“What’s with the noise sweetie?”

“Uhhh…” Not knowing what was going on she wasn’t sure how to explain it. And she certainly didn’t want her brother rubbing yet another magical accident in her face.

“Hey before we get breakfast would you like to-” Shining Armour’s smile widened and his eyes narrowed.

Twilight shuddered. She couldn’t let him finish that sentence.

“NO! NO! NO!"

Shining’s eyes widened and he clearly looked perturbed. Twilight realised her faux pas.

“Sorry. It’s just uhhhh….” What was the standard excuse? “I have… a headache. Yeah.” Twilight clutched her head unconvincingly Sorry I didn’t mean to yell, early morning jitters.”

“I see.”

Buck. How was she going to explain what happened now? Hmm maybe she wouldn’t have to. If she just played along for a little bit she might be able to fix this without any pony being the wiser. That would be the best for everyone.

“Uhh so how about we get some breakfast? Breakfast sounds good, right?”

“I guess….

That look… he was obviously disappointed and Twilight knew he had hurt his feelings. How would she smooth this over?

“I’m sorry about before… I didn’t mean to be rude, I just- I’m not feeling myself.”

He came over to her.

“Are you ok?”

“I’m fine, just a little tired. Maybe I’ll feel better after breakfast. Lets go!” Twilight punched her hoof forward and walked ahead.

How did I switch bodies with Cadance? I don’t know any magic like that. Could this have been discord? But would he? Hmm maybe this is a dream. She pinched herself.

“Ow!”

This wasn’t a dream.

Maybe she could find a spell to fix this in the Crystal Empire’s library. She always thought more clearly after breakfast.

She looked over her shoulder and noticed Shining Armour had barely moved. What was he doing? Wait, did his horn just glow? Why would he be using magic now?

Shining Armour looked her up and down again. Well she wasn’t a changeling… unless they had figured out a way to beat the detection spell. She was definitely acting oddly. Was she mad at him? Had something happened? Maybe he could figure it out.

Normally she was a morning pony but she felt like staying in bed a little longer. She might have wrote some stuff down yesterday but for the first time ever she didn't feel like making or following a list or stressing as much as she usually did.

After a short lie in she headed down to the kitchen almost running into Spike. The young dragon blinked in surprise.

"Yeah... I guess I'm just feeling different this morning."

Twilight paid no heed and started preparing breakfast. Hmmm... what did she want to do today? Normally she would have a schedule planned out, but she felt like being looser today. 1123322211.content:
I'd say it was an average day in Ponyville, but there's no such thing.

Twilight looked at her library with gleaming pride. For the first time in a long time, everything was perfect. With the absence of trouble in the last few days, she was able to dust, wax, alphabatize the books, dust again, reorganize the books by color, and send fifteen letters to Celestia about her learning about alicorn magic...... and that was just today. "Today is a rare day Twiley." she told herself "Everything is in perfect order for the first time in forever! It's time to reward yourself." Twilight walked over to the cupboard and looked behind the frame of her and Celestia. It sat there, perfectly ripened and waiting for her mouth. Twilight grabbed the peach, eager to savor it's peachy-perfect taste. All she needed was a good book to curl up with and this day would certainly go down in her mind as the most..........

Twilight stopped at the doorway.......
Her eyes opened wide........

Books were strewn about everywhere........

Dust and dirt coated all the bookcases......

And sitting on a throne of torn pages was the culprit as he reached for Twilight's peach......

"Good morning Twilight!" Discord said through a mouth of peach, "Or evening.... I don't care." Twilight watched in horror as Discord snapped his fingers, turned his mouth into a slingshot, and fired the peach pit right at a window, shattering it. "Yes!" Discord cheered as he fisted the air "Right where I wanted it! Preatty good aim huh?" Twilight tried not to say anything for fear of what would come out. "I just came over here for a visit and found this place soooooo boring. I hope you don't mind my redecorating."
At this, Twilight slowly let it out. "How many times have I told you to not" "CUT!" Discord said through a megaphone marked 'Director'. "I know you can show more feeling than that! I just ruined your perfect day! Really let loose your unbrideled fury!" Twilight simply pointed to the door "Get out before I do." Discord facepalmed himself, "Thats your problem! You just never let loose enough to cause any damage, at least not that I've seen. You need to have a little more chaotic personality like mine....... tell you what I'll do." Before he said another word, Discord sucked in air as a strange mist flowed from Twilight. Instead of flowing into his mouth, the mist flew into a jar he was holding. He then blew a brown mist that flowed into Twilight's mouth before she could close it. "I've put your not so chaotic personality in this jar while you have a taste of my own. It might take a bit to work, but you just might like it."
