113331313.content:
Twilght's eyes widened as the library and Spike seemed to shrink before her.

"Wait why does everything seem so small?" She was surprised at how loud her voice sounded and quickly put a claw to her mouth. "Oh no!"

Twilight bent down trying to make herself appear as small as possible, but she was growing rapidly. Her tail knocked over a bookshel.

"I didnt think i'd turn into a full sized dragon!"

Twilight concentrated trying to make the spell stop, but either her magic wasn't working, or it wasn't smethin that ocudl be stopped when it got goign. Could she still use unicorn magic as a dragon? She didn't have time to worry about that, her body pushed agisnt the wall of the libary.

Spike gawked at this but backed away, not doing what to do, but not wanting to be crushed.

"Twilight? What should I do?"

"Run! Get of the library while you still can!" Spike did so, despite how strange his pony legs felt to him, he was surprised at how fast he could gallop. He turned to look behind, only to hear a crash as Twilight's head burst out of the library. She looked downa t the wreckage and looked like she might cry.
"What am I going to do? I destroy the library! And all those books!"

Spike nudged her, though Twilight had always been prone to getting lost in her own worries, and with her size and thick scales it was harder to get her to next. Spike tapped her several times.

"Uh Twilight. Twilight."

She was still lost in her own misery.

"I wonder how many bits this will cost..."

Screams filled the air, snapping Twilight back to reality. The sight of an enormous dragon bursting out of Ponyville library elected screas of terror. They clearly didn't reconise her, and presumbly thought she had attacked the library. She wanted to scream but she tried her hardest to reamain calm, looking down a the fleeing ponies.

"No wait! I'm not going to-" SHe was cut off as she let out a stream of fire., causing the ponies to scatter further "Oh crap!" She put a claw to her mouth. "How did I do that? I really hope I can undo this spell!"

She stamped out the small fire she created with her feet and concentrated again, trying to undo the spell. Nothing happened.

"NO!"

"Twilight we should get out of here, they think you're attacking Ponyville."

Twilight was breathing heavily, but she tried to slow it down.

"You're right." She thought about trying to teleport, but wasn't sure how her magic would work in this body. And if it went wrong, she could cause destruction oor land on a pony."

She walked away from the library, as fast as she could walk with her strange body, while still watching her surrondings. At her size Spike still had to run to keep up with her.

"Maybe I can send a letter to Celesti- Oh wait."

"And I have no idea how, if I even could. I have to get myself away from here then try to fix this spell again and if that doesn't work.. if that doesn't work-"

"Keep it together Twilight! Let's just focus on getting out of here."

"Right..." Twilight said glumly

11431.content:
This situation was... different, but nothing twilight's analytical mind couldn't handle. Whatever had happened, must have started in the last two hours, as she had certainly still been a pony when she had been brushing her quills this morning. Mane. Brushing her mane. Apparently whatever this was effects one's judgment as well as appearance...
         "Alright, I've somehow become a pony-sized animal resembling a hedgehog... except I'm still purple. If any pony knows what I've turned into, it'll be Fluttershy." Twilight stated, feeling certain they would have this solved in no time. However, her attention was drawn to Spike as he started coughing.
         "You on the other hand should probably pay a visit to the clinic." She commented, concerned for her faithful assistant. He was usually immune to almost everything, being a dragon and all, So any cold should be taken seriously. Quietly nodding, he went uostairs to get his boots and scarf, as twilight headed over to her closet to get her own.
         Puting winter clothing on with paw-like hands instead of magic was surprisingly easy, getting said clothes to fit correctly on a body that was a different shape however, was not. by the time she had managed to get dressed, get out the door, and tromp through the snow to Fluttershy's, it was past noon, and spike was long gone. It was convenient that it was the middle of winter, any other time of year, and Fluttershy's cottage would be full of animals. But, as it was, the only ones who hadn't either migrated, or gone into hibernation were her chickens, and Angel.
         Knocking on the door, all twilight got in response was a muffled 'meep!' and barely audible call of 'be right there!'. It was a good three or four minutes before the door opened, and then only enough for her to peek out and squeak a shy "hello?"
         "Hi fluttershy, I kind of need your help..." was all Twilight got out before before, the door swung wide open, and Fluttershy lit up with a grin so wide Twilight could swear she heard a strange squeak sound when she made it.
         "Oh my, I've never met a hedgehog so big before! and you talk, that's just amazing." It was like introducing her to spike all over again... "Please come in!"
         Before she even knew what was going on, she was sitting on Fluttershy's couch drinking tea and listening to how she was the first animal to come visit since winter started. Also, she seemed to have picked up the strangest little cough in the time it had taken to prepare the tea.
         "Um, Fluttershy... I'm not a wild animal, it's me. Twilight. I was hoping you could help me find out what's going on." Twilight explained, slowly. Watching as the pegasus' expression fell slightly.
         "oh... well, i'm not sure what help i would bei was just excited at meeting a newkind of animal that i thought..." She trailed off, the rest of whatever she intended to say being reduced to meeps and squeaks. But that wasn't what held her attention, No, her attention was focused more on the fact that, while remaining on all fours unlike Twilight, Fluttershy had began to glow. By the time she had Stopped squeaking, not only had the glow disapeared, but so had the cough, and fluttershy with it. In her place was an alarmingly large yellow and orange wolf. The only familiar feature, her soft blue eyes.

"Fluttershy?" Twilight asked cautiously.
"Yes?" the wolf answered.
"I just realized, whatever this is, it's contagious... And i may have infected spike before i left the library."
"oh my..."

As he waited, spike started to grow bored, and tromped over to the window, looking out at the snow. Not many ponies are out today, too cold, and it's not like it would be hard to avoid the few who are. He reasoned, and twilight had told him to go to the doctor... A trip to the Ponyville Hospital couldn't hurt, could it? After all, Twilight had said to go to the doctors before she left, and that was the whole reason he'd dug out his boots.

His thoughts were interrupted though when he heard a thud behind him. Turning around, distracted, he didn't see the oversized yellow wolf sprint by heading for the hospital with something riding on it's back, he was too busy gawking at the Gryphon lying in a heap at the base of Owlowiscious now broken perch, the severed top still grasped in in his right talon. If that wasn't enough of a giveaway as to who the newly transformed gryphon's was, the barn owl-like beak and face were kind of a giveaway.

Trotting over and looking somewhat concerned, spike knelt down and asked.
"Are you ok."

"No, landed on my right talon... Hard... Ow..." That caught spike off guard, as he hadn't been aware of the transformation's mind affecting properties, and wasn't used to Owlowiscious actually talking. But that didn't matter right now. His friend was hurt. Had he actually been paying attention to anything besides the former owl, he might have noticed the fact that his entire body felt soft and fuzzy compared to normal, the extra weight on either side of his back, or maybe the gray hooves sticking out from under the dark purple fur on his legs. But, he didn't and Owlowiscious simply assumed he was a ponyville resident he hadn't met yet. After all, he rarely left the library during the day.

Lifting Owlowiscious onto his back, he trotted out the door, spread his wings and took to the air heading for the hospital. He was almost a hundred feet into the air before re realized what he was doing and looked back. Purple feathered wings and a messy green horsehair tail just barely visible around the injured Gryphon greeted his sight. He was a pegasus.

Distracted by this realization Spike flew straight into the snowbank next to the door rather than landing in front of the hospital.

Groaning as he pulled himself out, Owlowiscious electing to pack a bunch of snow around his hurt arm before doing the same, a familiar voice from behind them asked if they were alright.

Turning around, it's...

1153321.content:
Twilight sighed as she flopped onto her bed in her old suite in Canterlot. Shining Armor, her brother, and Cadence, her new sister-in-law, were off on their honeymoon. The excitement of the wedding had burned Twilight and her friends out, and as a result, they were spending the night in Canterlot. Princess Celestia had led her friends to the guest suites, but told Twilight her old suite was still clean and usable, a fact for which the unicorn was grateful. It was nice to spend the night somewhere even slightly familiar.

         She fell asleep the moment she hit the covers, and was thus unaware of what would transpire that night.

-----


         As Twilight slept, a figure carefully opened the window to her suite. Slipping in, the figure closed it just as carefully. Stepping over to Twilight's bed, the figure smirked, fangs gleaming in the moonlight.

         "Twilight Sparkle," the figure hissed, the moonlight showing her for who she was. Queen Chrysalis spoke in a low tone so as to not wake the unicorn. "You were my undoing. I should have made certain to deal with you in a more permanent manner than simply banishing you beneath Canterlot. But I'll make certain that your life is little better than a day in Tartarus after this."

         With that, the Changeling queen withdrew a glowing green powder from nowhere, and sprinkled it over the unicorn. "By the week's end, everypony you know and love will turn on you. Despite all you've done for them, they will betray you. This will make certain of that."

         Chuckling slightly, Chrysalis departed, sneaking back to her home far across the Equestrian border.
1153321.title: Changeling's Revenge

11533211.content:
Twilight groaned as the sun shone in through the window. She could have sworn that she had closed the curtains the night before.

She stretched her wings as she got up and jumped out of bed.

Wait... wings?

Twilight turned her head to see two blue wings on her back, small and insect-like. "What is going on here?" She asked herself, trying to stay calm. "Mirror. I need a mirror!"

She rushed into the bathroom and looked into the mirror.

And screamed.

"No!" Twilight wailed. "I'm a monster!"

Indeed, the Unicorn looked very differently. Her coat was black and her mane was blue, though a darker blue than queen Chrysalis's mane had been. There were holes in her legs and in her tail and mane.

But the worst part was her horn, which was now crooked and longer than before.

The finishing touch was the addition of a second horn, shaped like a small crown.

"This can't be happening!" Twilight screamed.

'Knock-knock'

"Twilight?" A voice called out. "Are you okay? We heard screaming!"

Twilight's heart stopped for a second as she recognized Rarity's voice.

"What do I do?"

115332111.content:
Thinking quickly, Twilight threw herself under the covers just as Rarity opened the door. Please, please, please let her not have seen me...

         "Twilight? Darling, are you alright?" Twilight heard Rarity trot in, along with the others. "We all heard screaming coming from this room."

         Twilight wracked her brain for a solution, and said the first thing that came to mind. "It's... it's nothing, girls. Just a bad dream, nothing more."

         "Ya sure, Twilight?" asked Applejack. "You sounded pretty spooked."

         Thankful that the bearer of Honesty couldn't see her face, Twilight replied, "Yes, I'm sure. I think I'll stay in bed a little longer, though. I'm kinda bushed from what's been happening the last couple of days."

         "No kidding," Rainbow Dash said, stifling a yawn. "I'm still kinda exhausted from pulling a Sonic Rainboom while flying up. Do you know how much work that takes?"

         "Well, um, if Twilight wants to stay in bed a little longer, we should probably leave her alone for a while," suggested Fluttershy. "I mean, if the rest of you want to, that is."

         "Okey-dokie-loki!" came the cheerful voice of Pinkie Pie. "Just be sure to come down for breakfast before it's all gone, silly filly!"

         "I will, Pinkie," Twilight said, though she had no intention of going to breakfast until she'd figured out what the hay had happened to her.

         Before anything else could be said, however, Twilight's new body betrayed her. It was a simple, unintentional buzz of her Changeling wings. But in the silence that followed, it seemed to echo menacingly.

         "Twilight..." Applejack said slowly. "What was that?"

         "Um... some sort of insect?" Twilight suggested. She knew it was hopeless, however. She had felt the covers move when her treacherous wings buzzed.

         There was the sound of powerful wing beats, and suddenly Twilight's covers were pulled off. A quick glance revealed that Rainbow Dash had flown off with them, and was now glaring down at the transformed unicorn. "Yeah, an insect called a Changeling!" the pegasus snarled.

         Twilight gulped. The situation looked rather grim. What was she going to do?
115332111.title: Confrontations

choices: She does: "I could never doubt you, my beloved student."
She doesn't: "I will ask you once: Where is she?"
1153321111.content:
Glancing around, Twilight could see that her friends were all glaring at her. Even Pinkie looked somewhat upset. Nevertheless, Twilight gathered her courage and attempted to salvage the situation. "Girls, please listen to me. It's me, Twilight!"

         "A likely story!" Rarity said with a sniff. "Why should we listen to anything a Changeling says?"

         Thinking quickly, Twilight came up with a plan. "Ask me something only Twilight would know."

         "Easy enough," said Applejack with a glare. "How many apple trees did you pick clean by yourself during that one Applebuck season?"

         "About... 25, I think?" Twilight couldn't remember all that well, since it had been a while.

         Applejack's expression softened for a moment, before Fluttershy interrupted. "That's not good enough, Applejack. We need something more definitive." She stepped up to Twilight. "Um, if you are Twilight, then what was the first animal you tried to help me wake up during Winter Wrap-Up?"

         "Snakes," Twilight said simply, shuddering a little. "Followed by bats, bees, and skunks."

         Rarity shook her head. "Fluttershy, dear, anypony who wasn't deaf would have heard that commotion. We need something even more specific."

         "I've got one," came a young boy's voice. Everypony blinked, turning to behold Spike in the doorway. "What, exactly, did you say to me before I ran off, during that whole thing with Owloysius?"

         Twilight winced as her words on that night came back to her, and she repeated them verbatim: "'This is not the Spike I know and love.'"

         Spike nodded. "It's Twilight, all right."

         Applejack shook her head. "But... but this makes no sense! Twilight's a unicorn, not a changeling!"

         "Indeed she isn't," came a serene voice from the doorway. Spike scrambled out of the way, making room for Princess Celestia. Her eyes were stern, and her expression grim.

         Twilight gulped. "Princess... please, you believe me, don't you? I'm your student! The one you instructed to make friends at the Summer Sun Celebration? The - "

         "That's enough." Twilight snapped her mouth shut. Did Celestia believe her?
1153321111.title: Defusing the situation

choices: Twilight's a natural at being a Changeling!
11533211111.content:
Princess Celestia walked over to the transformed Twilight, and leaned down, nuzzling her gently. "Did you really think I wouldn't believe you, Twilight? I've known you long enough, and you were never a good actor."

         Twilight nearly collapsed in relief. Around her, the other mares likewise let out breaths that they hadn't realized they were holding. Rarity spoke up. "Still, this begs the question. How did Twilight become a Changeling in the first place?"

         Celestia frowned. "If I were to hazard a guess, this is a transparent ploy at revenge from the Changeling Queen."

         Twilight blinked. "But why me? Why would she target me, rather than you, or Shining Armor, or Cadence?"

         Celestia smiled. "Out of everypony who interacted with her while she posed as Cadence, you were the only pony who suspected her true intentions." The Princess's face fell, and she hung her head. "Yet when you tried to expose her, instead of listening to you, I told you off. You've rarely been wrong in the past, and yet I refused to even consider the possibility that you were telling the truth."

         When Celestia raised her head again, the ponies were all shocked to see her eyes brimming with tears. "Can... can you ever forgive me, Twilight?"

         Twilight responded quickly, nuzzling the Princess. "Of course I can," she said. "You've been there for me ever since that fateful entrance exam. I could never stay mad at you."

         Celestia smiled, and wrapped Twilight in a hug, which the former unicorn eagerly returned. As they embraced, however, Twilight felt a sudden surge of energy. It took her a moment, but she realized that it had to be coming from Celestia... more specifically, Celestia's love of her!

         Twilight thought about breaking the embrace... for all of one second. The sheer intoxicating quality of the love she was getting quickly overrode that, and she continued to hold her teacher. At least, until Rarity coughed. "Ahem. This is very touching, truly, but we can't exactly let Twilight roam around Canterlot like this, now can we?"

         Breaking the embrace (and the flow of love, much to Twilight's dismay), Celestia nodded. "You're quite right, Rarity. Given recent circumstances, Twilight's condition would only raise undue suspicion, and maybe even outright hostility." She frowned, putting a hoof to her chin. "Still, while I'd normally insist she stay in Canterlot until I can find a way to reverse this change, I believe that would be counterproductive. I think it would be best if Twilight went with you all back to Ponyville, and conducted research there."

         "And just how is she gonna do that, yer Highness?" asked Applejack. "Get back to Ponyville, ah mean."

         Celestia smiled wryly. "She is a Changeling now, for better or for worse."

         Everypony looked at Twilight, who flushed slightly under the attention (or was it a sort of afterglow from absorbing Celestia's love?). Still, she turned her thoughts inward, searching for her magic... and for the means to transform.
11533211111.title: A Princess's Hope

choices: No incidents; they get to Ponyville, and Dash begins Twilight's flying lessons.
115332111111.content:
Twilight's body was engulfed in a brief flash of green light. When everypony blinked the spots out of their vision, they saw that Twilight now bore her standard lavender unicorn form. "Ah, much better!" she declared, looking in the mirror. "That's the face I wanted to see when I woke up."

         Celestia chuckled. "Well, it looks like you have things well in hoof, here," she said, and turned to leave. Before she did, she paused. "Though, could you change back for a moment, Twilight? There's something I'd like to check."

         Twilight blinked, but complied, returning to her Changeling form. Celestia walked over, and prodded the crown-shaped growth on Twilight's head. The ex-unicorn gasped at the contact, proving that it was attached. "What's up with that crown?" she asked.

         "I'm uncertain," Celestia replied. "Although, if memory serves, the Changeling Queen had a similar crown on her head. Perhaps it is a symbol of status?"

         Twilight shrugged. "Who knows. Besides, as small as I am, I probably won't be imponynating a Princess." A flash of green light caused Celestia to step away from her student. When it cleared, to everypony's shock, there stood a perfect physical copy of Celestia, down to the jewelry. The only difference was that one was staring at the other, who was staring at her hooves. "Of course, I could be wrong," the second Celestia said, in a perfect copy of the Princess's voice.

         Rainbow Dash began giggling. "Oh, man. Imagine the pranks you could pull with this!"

         The second Celestia glowed green, returning to Twilight's old form. "Okay, I can shapeshift without worry. And apparently I need to be careful about when I trigger the changes." She smiled at her friends. "Let's head back to Ponyville before anything else unexpected happens, okay?"

         "Hey, hold on, Twilight!" Rainbow interrupted. "You may have gotten the hang of shapeshifting, but you haven't even started flying yet! It'd be a shame to waste those new wings of yours."

         Twilight blinked. "But if we get back to Ponyville, we'll have plenty of open space, and we'll be less likely to be spotted by other ponies."

         Rainbow opened her mouth, then closed it again. "Eh, I guess you're right."

         "I wish you luck, my little ponies. Luna and I will do what we can for your condition from here, Twilight," Celestia said.

         The ponies all bowed to their benevolent ruler, and filed out, heading for the train to Ponyville.
115332111111.title: Twilight Sparkle, Changeling At Law

1153321111111.content:
"Ah, home sweet home." Twilight said as they got off the train.

"Yeah, yeah." Rainbow Dash said. "Less talk, more practicing flying."

Twilight rolled her eyes. "We need to drop Spike off at the library first, along with our luggage."

"And miss out on you crashing?" Spike asked. "No way."

Twilight sighed. "Fine. But the luggage needs to go first."

-

They made a quick stop at the Ponyville library, dumped the luggage and headed off to Rainbow Dash's preferred training area.

"This place is really remote." She said. "I practice my new and super secret tricks here."

"So you're sure nopony will see us here?" Twilight asked.

"Sure." Rainbow Dash said. "Now drop that disguise and get flying!"

Twilight did as Rainbow Dash told and turned back into her Changeling form.

"You know, I might never get used to that." Rainbow Dash admitted.

"You and me both." Spike said.

"Very funny." Twilight said.

"Okay then, first things first." Rainbow Dash landed next to Twilight. "Spread 'em."

"What?" Twilight uttered.

"Your wings." Rainbow Dash clarified. "I want to see them.

"Oh, okay." Twilight flexed her new muscles. Her wings spread out, giving Rainbow Dash a closer look at them.

"Well, they're not like Pegasi wings." Rainbow Dash said as she ran a hoof over them.

"That tickles!" Twilight said.

"Sorry. Anyway, your wings look more like an insect than a pony. Move them, will you?"

Twilight started to move her wings. It came rather naturally to her.

"Yup, don't move like Pegasi wings either." Rainbow Dash mused. "I say: just go for it. Beat those wings and fly up!"

"You call that teaching?" Twilight uttered.

"I'll catch you if you fall." Rainbow Dash offered.

"Fine." Twilight's wings began to move faster. Soon enough she was nearly buzzing and hovering in place. "Here I go!"
1153321111111.title: No incidents; they get to Ponyville, and Dash b...

11533211111111.content:
Continue
Flight practice 101.
Twilight was up in the air, not very high, but pretty far up there at least to her because she wasn''t used to this.
Rainbowdash said,"Okay now try turning left."
Twilight hovered and slowly moved left. She replied, "Like this?"
Rainbowdash replied, "Perfect. Now try going right."
Twilight did so easily. She said, "This is easier than I thought."
Rainbowdash replied, "Wow you're a natural. Alright now on to something a little more complex. Try making a left circle."
Twilight did so again with ease. She said, "What next?"
Rainbowdash responded, " Try right. Then try a figure eight."
Twilight did so and replied, "This is fun. I would say that I would have to get used to this buzzing though."
Rainbowdash smiled and replied, "Alright now you have graduated to level two." She flew up in the air next to Twilight and said, "Try following me. I will start slow but I will get more complex as you improve."
Twilight responded, "Okay, where are we going?"

What happens next?
11533211111111.title: She's a natural!

choices: "Strange giant bugs are trying to tip the train over!" (Changling attack)
"Giant bugs are ripping through the roof!" (Changling attack #2)
1153321111112.content:
As the whole group entered the train, Princess Celestia assigned them to the V.I.P train cart so that no regular train riders were able to catch Twilight and her friends.

The V.I.P suite had the most room in it and seemed to have a small bar filled with snacks and popular drinks that the high-end ponies of Canterlot would love to consume, each end of the V.I.P suite were six giant pillows that everyone grabbed and began to rest on.

After thirty minutes in during the way back to Ponyville, Twilight was curious about her strange and newly acquired Changling powers. Whilst her friends were lying down on their respective giant fluffy pillows, Twilight took close looks at her friends from time to time and began to change herself into her friends. Rainbow Dash and Applejack were secretly watching Twilight transform into close replica images of not only but themselves, but replica images of other ponies that they have seen before. Firstly starting off with Princess Luna, then moving onto Princess Cadance, then moving onto her own brother Shining Armor. While deemed impressive, both Applejack and Rainbow Dash grew curious of Twilight's new power and the instances of how and when she would actually use it instead of her actual entertainment.

"Hey Applejack..." Rainbow Dash leaned over to Applejack who was resting on her designated pillow, turning her head to face Rainbow Dash.

"Yeah Dash?" Applejack whispered back to Rainbow Dash.

"This whole Changling stuff sounds fishy..." Rainbow Dash whispered.

"What'd ya' mean?" Applejack raised an eyebrow at her winged friend.

"Well... she's taking it pretty well that's she's a Changling... and I don't trust Changlings..." Rainbow Dash whispered back.

"Ah' guess we've been on edge a little since th' weddin', but it's Twilight were talkin' about here, we need t'help her." Applejack replied.

"But what if she had to do that love sucking thing on one of us..." Rainbow Dash said.

"C'mon now, ah' don't think Twilight would do such a thing." Applejack quickly re-assured Rainbow Dash.

Suddenly there was a loud thumping sound on the roof the V.I.P suite, Fluttershy jumped up in the air and landed back on her pillow scared of what was going on. Rainbow Dash and Applejack quickly got off their pillows and stood on the floor. Twilight slowly turned around and jumped off her pillow in mid-transformation, she had changed herself into a Royal Guard donning golden armor.

"What's going on?" Rarity asked everyone in the room.

"Dunno, sounds like it came from th' roof." Applejack looked up at the ceiling.

A large stallion quickly ran into the V.I.P suite covered in bruises and scratch marks across his face, everyone looked at him and saw the damage done to his body.

"What happened to you?" Rainbow Dash yelled out to the stallion.
1153321111112.title: On the train, something happens!

choices: Twilight loses and trots towards her queen
11533211111121.content:
"Some kind of bug-ponies are assaulting the train!" He said. "They're trying to tip us over!"

Just as he said that something struck the side of the train, causing it to tilt slightly.

"You!" The stallion said to Twilight, who was still disguised as a guard. "You've got to do something! Some of those bugs got on board, they said something about a mare! They're looking for a 'Twilight Sparkle' or something. You have to find her before they do!"

"She's safe." Applejack assured him. "What we need to do now is stop the train before somepony gets injured or worse!"

"I agree." Twilight said. "I think it would be best if we-

Another crash interrupted the Royal Guard mimic. The sound of steel tearing rang through the train.

Just up ahead there was a hole in the wall. Several Changelings poured in, followed by their queen.

"So we meet again, you meddling little ponies." She said to them. "Where is Twilight Sparkle?"

"Right here." Twilight said, undoing her disguise and causing the distressed stallion to faint. Fluttershy quickly tended to him.

"Ah good, there you are." Chrysalis smiled. "Come along now, we must leave these wretched ponies behind."

"What are you talking about?" Twilight snarled, baring her sharp teeth. "I'm not going anywhere with you!"

Chrysalis's eyes shone a deep green. "Oh yes you are."

Twilight felt her mind being invaded by the queen and she struggled to resist.
11533211111121.title: "Strange giant bugs are trying to tip the t...

choices: Celestia and Luna, and a cadre of Royal Guards.
Shining Armor and Cadence! They've been sightseeing...
115332111111211.content:
Twilight quickly used her magic to form a 'bubble' around her body, blocking the Changeling Queen's magic. "Nice try! But in case you forgot, I'm the sister of Shining Armor, and more importantly, the student of Princess Celestia herself! You think you're the first to try to mentally control me? Think again. Many unscrupulous ponies have been after me ever since I became the Princess's student!"

         The Queen bared her teeth. "So, you think to resist me? Me, Queen Chrysalis?!"

         "My ruler was, is, and always will be Princess Celestia," Twilight replied. Then, taking a shot in the dark, she added, "By the way, this was a very nice plot of yours to try to drive a wedge between the Princess and myself. Unfortunately for you, we're already researching a means of undoing whatever you did to change me in the first place."

         The Queen blinked. "How did you know it was my doing?!"

         Mentally, Twilight nearly face-hooved at how easily her opponent was suckered into the verbal trap. "Easy, you just told me." Her friends all giggled a little.

         Chrysalis, however, was not amused. "If you will not submit to my whim, then I'll just have to tear your friends apart!" She motioned to her subordinates, who rushed forward. Before they could move much, however, they all slammed into a barrier.

         Twilight's Changeling eyes were blazing. "Attacking me is one thing, but attacking my friends is another. You will not have them or me!" With a yell, she forced the barrier forward, slamming all of the Changelings, the Queen included, out of the train. With another application of her potent magic, Twilight sealed the hole made in the train. She then used her Changeling powers to look like her old self again, before using another spell to awaken the comatose guard.

         "Ugh... wha? What happened?" he asked, shaking his head to clear it.

         "Don't worry, the Changelings have been dealt with," Twilight said. "Let's get the train moving again."

         Nodding, the stallion stumbled out, still a little woozy from his impromptu nap.

         Rarity looked at Twilight. "Most impressive, darling. It just goes to show, there's nopony in the world who can match you for power."

         Twilight blushed. "Well, like I said, some of the less scrupulous nobles in Canterlot have tried to either take advantage of my naivete, or outright control me with magic. Mental defenses were some of the first spells the Princess taught me."

         Spike nodded. "I remember this one time, that Prince Blueblood tried to mind control her into letting him into her suite, which has a massive library in it, as you all saw. He sulked for weeks when she didn't even notice at the time."

         Twilight grinned at the memory. "I'd forgotten about that. He wanted some of the books the Princess had gifted to me as her student. When his spell failed - repeatedly, I might add - he outright demanded to my face that I let him into my library. I just told him no, and said that he'd have to talk to Princess Celestia."

         Rarity looked like she'd swallowed a lemon. "And to think I once desired to be his wife. I am happier than ever now that the Grand Galloping Gala was such a spectacular failure."

         Applejack smirked. "Shucks, ah think we're all a bit happy it didn't turn out like we thought it would. Jus' a bunch of high-falootin' nonsense."

         Rainbow Dash scoffed. "Yeah, well, I'm a bit peeved that the Wonderbolts were too busy to talk to me after inviting me to the VIP section. Still, I guess that's celebrity life for you."

         Twilight smiled. "The Gala may not have turned out like any of us wanted, true. But we all learned a valuable lesson, no?"

         The mares all chuckled as the Friendship Express puffed its way down the tracks to Ponyville.

*****


         Chrysalis staggered to her hooves along with the other Changelings that had been with her. "Damn it all! This wasn't how it was supposed to go!"

         "Then how was it supposed to go?" an upset voice said from behind.

         Chrysalis froze. She knew that voice. Slowly, she turned around, to come face-to-face with...
115332111111211.title: Occlumency at its finest

choices: Go with Celestia the Alicorn Princess
1153321111112111.content:
The infamous Changeling Queen was flanked by not just both Princess Celestia & Princess Luna, but the two rulers brought an entire platoon of Canter lot Royal Guards.

Desperate & angry at the same time, Chrysalis quickly used her magic to cause a nasty dust storm, giving the Changeling Queen and her kin to escape from the might of Equestria's rulers & Canterlot's finest. Disappointed in their attempt to capture Chrysalis in hopes of finding a way to return Twilight to normal, Celestia, Luna, and the Royal Guards walked out of the entrance to Chrysalis's lair, as Celestia pondered about what Chrysalis was trying to do with Twilight as a Changeling.

But then, Luna looked over at her older sibling & asked, "Is everything alright, sister? You've been worrying since you told me about Twilight turning into a Changeling." "I am worried about Twilight, Luna. I'm just concerned that there might be no way to reverse the damage that Chrysalis has done to Twilight" Celestia answered, as Luna tried her best to comfort her own sister.

"Look, I...Understand that Twilight is like a daughter to you, my dear sister. But I can most definitely promise you that Chrysalis will face justice for her crimes." Luna said, hoping to lighten Celestia's mood. Thankfully, it seemed to be working, as Celestia looked at her younger sister with a gentle smile on her face & replied, "I appreciate your reassurance, Luna."

However, little did either of the two princesses know, but someone was watching them from above, away from their sight of view. But it wasn't Chrysalis nor her Changelings, but something else entirely.
1153321111112111.title: The Calvary Is Here!

choices: Follow Twilight the Changeling, Spike, Rarity, & Fluttershy
Follow Applejack, Rainbow Dash, & Pinkie Pie
11533211111121112.content:
Meanwhile, Twilight & her friends managed to get back to Ponyville safely, despite Chrysalis & the Changelings trying to find her & make the former unicorn defect & hurting her friends. But thankfully, Twilight Sparkle was a good unicorn at heart, plus with all of the tutoring from Celestia, she built up a good resiliency against any manipulation magic.

As they stepped off the train, Twilight was in her Unicorn form, thanks to a Changeling's ability to shape shift into any creature at will. Then, Rainbow Dash stepped out next, as she looked at Twilight & said, "Man, I can't believe that Changeling Queen tried to hypnotize you, and you made her back off!" "Yes, but that proves that this pony is still Twilight, darling." Rarity replied, as she stepped off the train as well, where Spike wasn't too far behind.

"Ya know, Rarity. It's like my ma always said 'Ya can't judge a book by it's cover'." Applejack answered, as she came out with a sleeping Pinkie Pie, which is a surprise since the pink mare is usually like a monkey on lots of caffeine.

After Fluttershy got off the train, the seven of them went into two groups; Twilight, Spike, Rarity, & Fluttershy went back to Twilight's home to figure out how to change Twilight back to normal, while Rainbow Dash, Applejack, & an unconscious Pinkie Pie went Sweet Apple Acres to help Macintosh with the apple-bucking season.
11533211111121112.title: Back In Ponyville

choices: something happens in the middle of the night (The Changelings Attack Again)
115332111111211121.content:
After a long walk from the Ponyville Train Station, Twilight walked inside her home with Spike riding on her back, as Fluttershy & Rarity weren't too far behind.

When all four of them entered Twilight's house, they each began to cover the few windows of Twilight's Tree Home, just to make sure they don't cause panic if anyone found out that Twilight had become a Changeling. After all, there were uneasy tensions between Equestrian & the Changelings after Chrysalis's attempt on taking over the kingdom that ultimately failed.

After all of the windows were covered, Twilight changed back into her Changeling form, as Spike said, "There. That should give us some privacy." Twilight looked at Spike with a smirk on her face & replied, "Thank you, Spike. I...just wanted to say thank you for not treating me like I was an enemy, girls."

"Twilight, even though you're turned into a Changeling, you're still the same Twilight Sparkle we all cared about, darling." Rarity said, as the white unicorn mare of a fashionista walked up close to Twilight the Changeling, putting her right front hoof on Twilight's left shoulder as reassurance to Twilight's situation as a Changeling. Thankfully, the glowing effect that happened between Twilight & Celestia earlier wasn't happening again.

"So, um....What s-should we do now, Twilight?" Fluttershy asked, as she sheepishly looked at her transformed best friend, hoping not to make her upset or anything like that. Then, Twilight looked at Fluttershy & answered, "Well, since I'm now somewhat a Changeling, we should look up any & all information the Changelings here in my personal library."

"Okay, but which books do we need to look for exactly, Twilight? You do have a big library, after all." Spike asked, and Spike was right about one thing; Twilight was a 'Triple-A Egghead' when it came to books, literature, and knowledge.

So, in hopes of clearing things up, Twilight replied, "Actually Spike, here are 4 books that I can recall that have information on Changelings. There is 'The Changeling Anatomy', 'A Changeling Ability Guide, 'The Guide To Equestria's Monsters', and 'The Guide To Changelings For Derps'."

With that information, Twilight & he others began looking through Twilight's library. They looked through book after book for hours, even after the sun went down. However, after searching through these books, some of them fell asleep out of exhaustion to help Twilight. Heck, even Twilight herself fell asleep from looking through these monster-sized books.
115332111111211121.title: Home Sweet Home

choices: the mysterious being intervenes Chrysalis's plans
1153321111112111211.content:
It was only 2 hours before midnight, and Twilight, Spike, Rarity, & Fluttershy were sleeping from reading all of the books about Changelings in hopes of getting Twilight to change back into her old form permanently.

But suddenly, they heard these loud shrieking noises outside, causing all four of them to literally jump from the shrieks, as Spike said, "What's going on out there?"

However, Twilight definitely recognized the shrieking noises outside, as she replied, "It's the Changelings, they're here in Ponyville!" "But that's impossible, darling. How could they find out where we're at anyway?" Rarity replied, as they then heard these loud buzzing noises outside, which were the sound of the insect wings of a Changeling, around a hundred of them.


With no other choice, Twilight & her friends went outside to stop the Changelings, but just as they were about to attack the Changelings, Chrysalis launched an ambush on Twilight & her friends, knocking them unconscious, while the Changelings continued their attack on Ponyville.

A short time later, Twilight groggily woke up to feel that she was dragged by two Changelings, one on each side. The former unicorn looked ahead & saw her friends Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Pinkie Pie, Rarity, Fluttershy, and even poor Spike held hostage by Chrysalis and her bodyguards.

The sadistic Changeling Queen turned her head to see her kin dragging Twilight before her, as Chrysalis gave out an evil smile & said, "Ah, Twilight Sparkle, how nice of you to finally join us."
1153321111112111211.title: The Changelings Strike Back!

choices: the mystery being lets the situation play out
11533211111121112111.content:
The two Changelings then tossed the half-conscious Twilight onto the ground, as if she was a rag doll. However, her friends were becoming more worried than ever about their physically transformed friend, especially Rainbow Dash, who wanted to literally spring into action and kick Chrysalis's flank so hard that the Changeling Queen would run back to her mother, as the rainbow-mane Pegasus yelled, "Leave Twilight alone, you oversized bully!"

Rainbow Dash was about to bull rush Chrysalis, but like their Queen, the Changeling bodyguards could use magic, as two of them zapped Rainbow Dash with electricity, stunning the cyan pegasus, as Rainbow Dash fell to the ground from her muscles buckling from the electric attack.

"Rainbow Dash!!" Yelled the rest of the Mane Six, as Twilight painfully got up on her hollow hooves, looked at Chrysalis and asked, "What do want, Chrysalis?!" Chrysalis let out an evil chuckle & answered, "Simple, Twilight; I want revenge."

Twilight knew what Chrysalis meant by revenge, as Twilight the Changeling said, "What this about me foiling your plans to take over Equestrian?" Then, Chrysalis shot a blast of energy at Twilight, as the rest of the Mane Six yelled, "Twilight!!"

But before Twilight's friends could help, Chrysalis's bodyguards aimed their mystical horns at them, warning them that they would suffer the same pain as Rainbow Dash had inflicted. Then, Chrysalis's tone changed into rage, as she answered, "You ruined my plans to take over Equestrian! You & your friends defeated me!"

But after those words, Chrysalis's voice tone returned to an evil form of calmness, as she said, "And now, I've changed you into the same being that your friends feared. However, since your friends still know you as the same good-goody two-hooves pony you were..."

But then, Chrysalis got her face at touching distance to Twilight's, as the Changeling looked Twilight right in the eyes & said, "I will make them suffer. I want to see your 'friendship' destroyed, forcing you into total darkness." Then, Chrysalis then commanded her bodyguards to begin the execution of Twilight's friends.

But then, something in Twilight's brain triggered, causing her to do something drastic as she yelled, "You want to take it out on the Elements of Harmony? Take it out on me then, Chrysalis! I'm the Element of Magic, and I was the one that found out about your plan. Take it out on me, you...living. Piece. Of. Crap!" Both Twilight's friends & Chrysalis heard what Twilight called the Changeling Queen, as it definitely got Chrysalis's attention. From Chrysalis threatening to kill her friends, Twilight really snapped, but as the saying goes, 'desperate times call for desperate measures'.

However, little did the Ponies or Changelings know, but the mysterious being from earlier was watching the whole scene play out from a nearby rooftop. The mysterious being could see Twilight's friends were held hostage, as it's looked to where Chrysalis was kicking Twilight the Changeling repeatedly in the face.
11533211111121112111.title: A Dire Situation

choices: Fenrir pounced & attacked Chrysalis (Hooray, he's a good guy)
Fenrir pounced & attacked Twilight the Changeling (Uh Oh, he's a bad guy)
115332111111211121112.content:
(Warning: This Chapter contains the following; Violence, Changelings getting injured, and a physically scarred Chrysalis. Viewer discretion advised. I will keep the blood and gore down as best as I can. Anyway, enjoy!)

But then, the mysterious creature began to stand up on it's two legs as it tilted it's head up to the sky and screamed, "AARRROOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" It's howl got everyone's attention, including Twilight and her friends, Chrysalis & her bodyguards. They looked up & saw the being that made the bone-chilling howl.

It's body was tall, muscular, and slender-like. It's eyes glowed a bright reddish-orange, as the creatures eyes gave off an angry look to them. Though the creature's mouth also glowed a reddish-orange , showing off it's sharp teeth, capable of biting through any pony or Changeling. It's arms were both strong & long, as the creature's clawed hand gripped tightly onto the post on the rooftop.

Twilight could see that this creature had 3 clawed fingers & a clawed thumb on each hand, indicating it's some sentient type of creature with feral abilities, as the creature's pointed ears showed, confirming it was a wolf-like creature, as it's large lupine tail slowly moved from side to side. But what creeped out Fluttershy, Spike, & maybe Pinkie Pie was that bits of the wolf creature's Arms & legs had these glowing red-orange marks on it.

As it stood up on the rooftop, the moon was full at the time, as it shone behind the wolf creature's body, giving it a very intimidating look & feel to him, all while showing it's fur color to be a menacing dark grey, as Twilight noticed these metal chains wrapped around his arms, like a dark accessory.

Chrysalis looked at the wolf creature & said, "Are you friend or foe, beast?" But just like that, the wolf creature did a powerful jump, as it pounced toward either Twilight or Chrysalis.
115332111111211121112.title: Fenrir, The Unbound Wolf

choices: Suddenly, the Changeling reinforcements arrived and Fenrir fights them
1153321111112111211121.content:
(Warning: This Chapter contains the following; Violence, Changelings getting injured, and a physically scarred Chrysalis. Viewer discretion advised. I will keep the blood & gore down to a minimum as best as I can. Anyway, Enjoy!)

"Twilight!!" Twilight's friends yelled, as the scary wolf creature landed right where Chrysalis & Twilight where located at. However, both Twilight's friends and Chrysalis's bodyguards weren't sure which Changeling the wolf creature grabbed.

But then, the wolf creature stood up on his hind legs and large wolf paw-like feet, as he towered an intimidating 7 feet tall over the ponies & changeling bodyguards, while he held a Changeling with long blue hair by her throat in the wolf creature's left hand. "Twilight?" Spike asked, worried about Twilight if she was alright.

Fortunately, they saw the other Changeling get back up, indicating that Twilight was alright, and the Changeling that the wolf creature held was actually Chrysalis herself, meaning the wolf creature was one of the good guys, even if he looked like he could rip a pony's flesh apart.

However, when the Changeling bodyguards then ignored the Mane Six & began to focus their attention on the one being that held their Queen in it's grasp; the wolf creature known as 'Fenrir, The Unbound Wolf'. Fenrir snarled at Chrysalis, as he held the Changeling Queen in his left clawed hand.

"You..will regret your decision, beast." Chrysalis growled, as the skin on Fenrir's upper snout crinkled, snarling even louder at the captured Changeling Queen. But then, out of a feral impulse, Fenrir violently bit down on Chrysalis's left front leg, causing the Changeling Queen to scream from the pain Fenrir was inflicting on her, as Fenrir felt bits of Chrysalis's green blood on his canine teeth from biting on her leg.

From hearing their queen's screams of pain, the Changeling bodyguards confirmed that Fenrir was very hostile, as they charged at Fenrir. But then, Fenrir's senses picked up the hollow clopping of the Changeling bodyguards' hooves, so he gave Chrysalis a nasty claw mark scar across her left eye, as Fenrir threw the Changeling Queen at a few of her bodyguards, knocking those few off their hooves.

Then, Fenrir leapt forward at the bodyguards, as his claws tore through the Changeling armor like it was paper. But when one of the bodyguards fired a blast of dark magical energy at Fenrir, but thanks to his inhuman reflexes, Fenrir noticed the bodyguard firing the energy blast, as the large wolf quickly dodged the attack, rushed at the Changeling bodyguard, and grabbed the Changeling with it's teeth.

However, even the Mane Six couldn't believe what just happened when they saw him dodged the bodyguard attack. But then, Fenrir bit down hard on the Changeling bodyguard's body, as it's spine cracked & broke from Fenrir biting down hard, breaking the Changeling bodyguard's spine like a twig. However, Fenrir only broke the Changeling's lower back, meaning the changeling bodyguard was still alive but can no longer use his hind legs anymore due to the nerves in his lower body are severed from the rest of his body, surely a fate worse than death for a Changeling, as Fenrir tossed the unconscious Changeling bodyguard aside like a ragdoll.

However, only a few of the Changeling bodyguards survived, as they called for help from their brethren to distract Fenrir while they got Chrysalis to safety. Fenrir noticed Twilight reuniting with her friends, as the Changeling that was once a unicorn hugged her friends out of worry for them. Fenrir lightened up a bit, as the Unbound Wolf could see that this Changeling known as 'Twilight' wasn't evil like Chrysalis, but something else entirely.
1153321111112111211121.title: Fenrir, The Unbound Wolf Part II

choices: Fenrir won the battle, without a single scratch on him
Fenrir won the battle, but not without receiving a few scars
11533211111121112111211.content:
(Warning: This Chapter contains the following; Violence, & Changelings getting injured. Viewer discretion advised. I will keep the blood & gore down to a minimum as best as I can. Anyway, enjoy!)

However, as most of the Mane Six hugged one another, Rainbow Dash began to regain consciousness, as she noticed Fenrir, who had some green Changeling blood on his claws. This caused the cyan Pegasus to literally jumped up onto her hooves, as she screamed, "What the hay is that thing!?!"

From those words out of Rainbow Dash's mouth, it got both Fenrir's & the Mane Six's attention. Twilight approached the terrified Rainbow Dash, as the former unicorn said, "Easy there, Rainbow Dash. He's not going to harm us." "Twilight! That..Thing tore those Changelings apart like they were nothing!" Rainbow Dash yelled, as Twilight the Changeling firmly answered, "He's not a monster, Dash. He could've killed us, but he didn't."

Then, Rainbow Dash looked up Twilight, then looked at her friends, and realized that neither Twilight or her friends were injured, meaning that Fenrir wasn't an evil creature. "Yeah, but why didn't he hurt us as well, sugar cube." Applejack asked, confused about why Fenrir spared them from ending up the same way as Chrysalis's changeling bodyguards.

But unexpectedly, the wolf creature known as 'Fenrir', spoke up in a growling feral tone in his voice and said, "Hate. Bug. Ponies." Twilight & her friends all gasped in unison, as they now realized that Fenrir could talk. Sure, it wasn't exactly perfect speech grammar, but it was enough for anyone to understand what he was basically saying.

Anyway, as random as can be, Pinkie Pie looked at Fenrir and said, "Wait a sec, Mr. Wolfy here can talk?" Fenrir calmly nodded yes once, as Twilight understood what Fenrir was talking about as she asked, "Bug Ponies? Wait, do you mean the Changelings?" "You. Say. So." Fenrir answered, as Rarity spoke up & said, "Wait a minute, darling. Twilight herself is a Changeling, but why aren't you attacking her as well?"

Then, Fenrir slowly walked toward Twilight & her friends, as he only stood about 4 feet away from them, looked down at them, and answered, "She. Smells.....Different." But then, both the Mane Six and Fenrir heard the loud shrieking sound of a hundred Changelings charging toward them at an aggressive speed.

Fenrir turned around to see a hundred Changelings charging toward him, Twilight, and her friends from a distance. Fenrir knew there was only one thing he could do to them; he had to fight the Changelings directly head-on. "Ponies. Find. Hiding. Place. Now." Fenrir said, as he heard Twilight ask, "But what about you?"

"I. Fight. Changelings. Someone. Has. To." Fenrir sternly answered, but as he was about to charge off into the battle, Twilight stopped him as she asked, "Wait..Who are you?" "I. Am. Fenrir." Fenrir replied, as he then sprinted off toward the attacking Changelings on all fours like a wolf. He charged toward the charging Changelings at 100 miles per hour, as both sides closed the distance further & further.

But then, Fenrir rammed into the group of Changelings, as about a dozen of them got knocked off their hollow hooves,and that was when the real battle began. The Changelings quickly turned around and focused their attention on Fenrir, as he clawed at 5 Changelings that charged at him, rendering them unconscious. Then, 10 Changelings lunged at Fenrir, attempting to pin down Fenrir. Unfortunately for them, Fenrir sensed them, as he back-flipped over them, then he quickly attacked the 10 Changelings from behind, slashing his claws at them.

Quickly, Fenrir ripped a lamp pole from the ground & used it like a weapon, as he screamed, "RRROOOOAAAARRR!!!!!" This caused the remaining Changeling forces(73 Changelings left) to attack Fenrir in all directions, as Fenrir swung his makeshift weapon at them, knocking a lot of them down & delivering serious damage to them.

However, from the Mane Six's perspective, they couldn't tell who was winning due to how much dust was picked up around the battlefield, making it hard to see the fighting between Fenrir & the Changelings. But then, there was silence, there was no sign of life beyond the large dust cloud. But the question for the Mane Six was who won this battle? The Changelings? Or Fenrir?
11533211111121112111211.title: The Rage Of The Swarm

choices: the locals saw Twilight as a Changeling and formed an angry mob to attack her
115332111111211121112112.content:
"Fenrir?" Twilight asked, as she and her friends became very worried about Fenrir's well-being, worried if he was still alive or....Well, you get the picture. But suddenly, a single Changeling flew out of the dust, as it charged toward Twilight and the Mane Six, hoping to bring harm to them.

However, a blunt metal object was thrown out of he dust cloud, as it hit the Changeling in the back of the head, knocking him out cold. Twilight & the others got a closer look and noticed that the blunt metal object was actually the lantern of the lamp post. Then, they looked forward at the disappearing dust cloud and saw that Fenrir was still in one piece.

He walked toward the Mane Six, as he looked down at them & said, "Missed. Me?" Rainbow Dash flew up to Fenrir's head height with her pegasus wings & said , "Fenrir, you were so AWESOME! Oh man, didn't you see those moves guys!?! He was all like 'ggrrrr' and 'Rooaarr' and 'hooyeah'!!" As Rainbow Dash imitated the moves Fenrir used on the Changelings, Rarity noticed the pile of unconscious Changelings behind Fenrir, as she replied, "Yes, it would seems he did put up a fight out of them, Rainbow Dash."

But then, Twilight noticed Fenrir's fresh scars he received from fighting the Changelings, as Twilight became worried & asked, "Are those...scars?" Fenrir didn't exactly come out of that battle unscathed. Judging from Twilight's point of view, Fenrir had multiple fresh scars on his body. Fenrir had a nasty bite mark on his right bicep, caused by a Changeling that got lucky & bit him from behind his arm, but it wasn't very nasty, just a minor wound.

However, Fenrir also had several cuts on his body; 3 across his upper back, a large one at the abdomen, and a nasty cut that went from his left eyebrow, down across his left eye, and ends about half an inch away from his left eye. "Took. Minor. Hits. From. Them." Fenrir answered, as he responded to Twilight's concern.

But then, Fenrir fell unconscious but alive, as Twilight and the Mane Six yelled, "Fenrir!!" They then got up to him and check if he was still alive. Thankfully, he still had a heartbeat.
115332111111211121112112.title: Fenrir's Battle Scars

115332111112.content:
A flash of fire engulfed Twilight. "How do I look?" She asked.

The group stared at her, before erupting in laughter. Even Celestia let out a little giggle.

"What?" Twilight asked. She turned to look in her mirror. She broke into laughter as well.

She still looked like a Changeling, with wings, crooked horn, her 'crown' and holes but her coat was purple. "I think I need a bit more practice." Twilight admitted.

"Try changing into one of us." Rarity suggested. "Maybe you'll do better with a visible example to copy."

"Great idea." Twilight said. She took in Rarity's image. She focused on it.

A flame spread over her body, slower than the first time.

"It's like looking in a mirror." The real Rarity smirked.

Twilight looked in the mirror again and saw that she looked just like Rarity. "It worked!" She said, but her voice was still her own.

"Girls, would you mind helping Twilight practice?" Celestia asked. "In the meanwhile, I'll go and arrange a carriage to bring you back to Ponyville.

"Off course princess." Fluttershy said.

"We'd be more than happy to help." Fluttershy said.

Celestia blinked. There were two Fluttershys in the room. One of them smirked and turned back into Twilight.

"So Twi, do those wings actually work?" Rainbow Dash asked as she ran a hoof over one. "Want to go practice flying?"

Twilight thought about it.

She flies up but loses control

Continue
Twilight and Rainbowdash.

Rainbowdash responded, "Sweet! But uh, you need to change back."
Twilight looked at herself and said, "Oh right. About that...
Rainbowdash replied, "What is it?
Twilight said, "Oh nothing but do you want me to practice as a changeling or a pegasus like you?"
Rainbowdash responded, "Hmm, I suppose flying around as a changeling could be dangerous but I need to know if you new wings work."
Twilight said, "Well we will see." She changes back to a changeling. She then said, "Alright let's get started."
