121312.content:
Applejack is in the orchard apple bucking as per usual, and after about the third tree she notices a peculiar colored apple in this tree's bunch.

"Huh, never seen a orange apple before?" She states quizzically when she hears a slight but familiar cackle. "Who's there?" She states as she darts around the trunk of the tree to investigate the noise. "I swear Discord you best be not fidlin' with mai orchard!" She confidently exclaims. Just then she spots a squirrel up in the tree's branches making a similar cackle to the one she heard before. "Ha ha, look at me yelin' at some varmint. Good thing Fluttershy ain't here to give me grief about it." Applejack laughs and mutters to herself. "Now what about this here apple, it sure is strange. I wonder how it tastes?" She said curiously. "I may just have to try it!" "Then again I can't show it to Granny if I do." AJ contemplates as the autumn wind softy blows. "I know I'll take a small bite and carry the rest back to the house after I finish this area." She says having made up her mind. As Applejack's teeth bit into the small fruit a mouthful of sweat juices filled her gullet. This had to be by far the tastiest apple she ever had! "Ouuuwee that's good!" She exclaimed with glee as she took another unplanned but instinctual bite. As she enjoyed the fruits of her labor the apple was executing it's effect unbeknownst to the small earth equine. Her once modest plot ebbed the swelled ever so slightly, her back legs contracted before stretching longer than they had been same could be said for her front legs. All four of her hooves receded before expanding in diameter even the apple she was very much enjoying seemingly shrunk in her hoof, her main and tail sunk in before blooming outward. And finally her head shrank before ballooning to a marginally greater size causing her beloved cowboy hat to look ever so off on her newly enlarged head! " I really need to stop, I shouldn't eat this whole thang!" AJ stated feeling very conflicted. " Buck it, I'll save the next crazy colored apple I see and show that to the fam! This one's mine!" She said greedily as she scarfed the remaining of the treat of an apple in her now larger mouth. "Man that hit the spot! Well time to get back to it" AJ said as she gathered up her bucket and trotted to the cart. She stopped for a moment realizing just how easy it seemed to pick up and how light the over all bucket felt. " Wow, guess I'm getting stronger than I thought!" With that she placed the bucket in the cart and began to head to the next tree when another cackle could be heard if ever so slightly but between the loading and the rolling of the cart's wheels she didn't quite pick up on it. Either that or she didn't pay it any attention. She breezed threw the rest of her area of the orchard knocking most if not all the apples down in one buck, due to her larger frame and stronger leg muscles. On her eighth tree she did manage to buck all of the apples at once causing her to exclaim, " Yehaw, I thought only Big Mac was capable of such a thing! I always thought he was pullin my leg when he told me he could do it! Hot dawg I can't wait to tell him that not only do I believe it can be done, but that I his sister can did it!" As AJ relished in her accomplishment another slight change was taking place in her body, she diminished again before swelling even bigger! Still not enough to fuss over but she was indeed larger than moments before. " Big Mac bes be ready for an apple buck-off here soon!" She said excitedly as she continued on her route, she ended up finishing in record time thanks to her snack and headed back to the barn to turn in the harvest. Along the way she spots.....
121312.title: One odd apple.

choices: She catches a glimpse of the growth
1213121.content: "Hi, Applejack done already?" Asked the filly. "Why yes sugar cube, how are your chores going?" "Oh fine, just finished feedin the pigs."AB answered respectfully. " Excellent work Apple Bloom, thanks for not fussin about your duties this morning." AJ stated proudly. Apple Bloom smiled and stared up at her big sister for a moment and noticed something off about her as she responded with, "No problem Applejack, I know better." Apple Bloom dawned a quizzical look at AJ after she finished speaking and held it for longer than the hard working honest country pony was comfortable with. "What's the matter Apple Bloom, do I got something on my face?" AJ asked truthfully. "No?" AB answered uncertain of what was off about her sister. "Well then, do you have something else on your mind? AJ asked curious now. Apple Bloom looked her sister up and down scanning for answers. "I don't know, you just seem different is all? "Ha, different how? AJ responded playfully. When Apple Bloom's gaze returned and stopped on her sister's head again she caught what was bugging her. "Oh it's your hat? Yeah your hat, that's definitely it!" The filly stated confidently. "Mai hat, what about it?" AJ asked bewilderingly. "Say Applejack when was the last time you washed your hat?" AB questioned. "Ah..., maybe three months ago why?" "That can't be right!"Pondered AB. "Where are you going with this Apple Bloom?" Asked AJ. "Because it shrank, he he."AB let out a soft chuckle with her revelation. "Shrank, what in tarnation are you talking about?" AJ questioned. "Just look at it Applejack, either it shrank or you grew! He,he"AB let out another chuckle at the absurdity of the idea. Applejack complied with the request and snatched the hat of her head. It did indeed look smaller in her enlarged hooves. "Huh, I guess your right sugar cube. The odd thing is I haven't washed it recently and leather doesn't shrink as much after the initial time?" AJ acknowledged, trailing off in thought. "Yep, it's definitely smaller or maybe you ARE growing Applejack?" AB joked. "Ha, ha silly filly. You bes pray it's the former, you won't want me to stomp on ya with my giant hooves!" AJ playfully expounded slamming a mighty hove down in front of the filly with substantial force causing a loud clank. This took Apple Bloom by surprise and slightly frightened her. "Yeah sure wouldn't want that, heh heh" AB responded with nervous laughter as her imposing sister looked down on her. "Aw Apple Bloom ah was only goofin, there's nothing to be afraid of. I would never hurt you?" AJ apologetically reassured her sibling. " I know Applejack, that was just some mighty fine actin." AB replied having calmed down considerably. "Gee thanks Apple Bloom, no worries. Now what do you say we head back to the barn and wash up for super?" AJ says sweetly. "Sure thang Applejack I'd like that." AB said joyfully. As the pair make there way towards the barn Applejack has another growth spurt does Apple Bloom notice?
1213121.title: Hey ya sis.

choices: Apple Bloom keeps her word and the family have a mostly event free dinner
Applejck becomes the largest member of her family over the course of super
Applejack sends an urgent message to Twilight about her predicament
12131212.content: The sisters make there way towards the barn, as they are closing in on the structure Applejack recedes in size again before spurting outwards in all directions. Apple Bloom who had had been staring aimlessly into the distance up to this point, caught the sight of orange hair expanding into her peripheral vision to her right. She then quickly turned her head to gaze fully upon her elder sibling and couldn't fathom what she was witnessing. It didn't last all to long and it wasn't by much but her sister had grown larger right in front of her very eyes! "What the hey?" AB blurted out without a second thought. "Apple Bloom watch your mouth! You know Granny don't like such language!" AJ scolded the filly surprised by her outburst. "I'm sorry Applejack, it's just that you GREW! Iknow that sounds preposterous but it's true I jus seen it!" Exclaimed the filly in disbelief as she continued to examine her sister. Apple Bloom thought to herself for a moment, (Man she's got to be almost as big as Big Mac, maybe even bigger!) she shuttered as she finished the thought. "Apple Bloom are you still going on about that? Ah thought you were goofin before, but it sounds like you are starting to believe it yourself." AJ quizzically claimed. "I swear BIG sis I'm not making this up!" AB protested as she stopped in her tracks causing Applejack to do the same. " Can't you tell somethings off? Your legs are longer, your backside is wider, shoot even your head is bigger! It's really weird, ah mean look at me. Don't I look smaller than I did I few minutes ago?" AB continued to reason to her sister trying to convince the over-sized pony to notice the change in herself. "Ha, ha Apple Bloom I don't have a clue what has gotten into you but don't you think I'd realize ah was enlarging?" AJ laughed the notion off and confidently declined. "Maybe not Applejack, I mean it wasn't a huge spurt or nuthing. Perhaps since it's happening to you, you can't tell." AB purposed logically. "Oh come now Apple Bloom what sense does that make, my whole form and balance would be thrown off if ah was bigger! " AJ rationalized as Apple Bloom scanned Applejack again for any oddities. "I don't know, would you say you've had a normal day then sis? Did you find anything strange out in the orchard, did you nick yourself on a tree, or perhaps pricked yourself with a strange bush?" AB rattling off a series of questions trying to justify the phenomenon. "Let's see here, I ate an apple. It was orange like me!" AJ answered truthfully humoring her younger sibling for a moment. Just as Applejack made that revelation Apple Bloom noticed something odd about Applejack's cart attached to her back. "That's it!" AB blurted out excitedly. "Wha the apple, naw it couldn't be. Sure was tasty though." AJ stated reminiscing on how delicious that apple had been salivating slightly. "No your cart! See how it's risen higher than it had bee when you started?" AB said deduct-fully like a expert sleuth. Applejack turned to look at her rig, it did feel like it was a bit raised not to mention tight. "You see you haven't adjusted it to your new height, the front wheels are barely making contact with the ground!" AB added sounding even more sure of herself. "Maybe Big Mac fiddled with my rig to slow me down Apple Bloom you know how competitive he gets." AJ reasoned trying to stay calm with a dash of worry in her tone. " I don't know Applejack sure doesn't sound like something Big Mac would do even with his competitive nature, he prefers a fair game to a rigged one." AB stated in a consulting tone. "Ok, but adult ponies don't just grow Apple Bloom. I hit my peak growth spurt ages ago!" AJ stated sounding more confused than anything. "Welp apparently not Applejack but don't worry, ah am here for you." AB said comfortingly. "I know sugar cube, I have the best darn sister in all of Equestria." AJ said proudly full of warmth in her tone. "Well we bes be continuing to the barn now wouldn't want Granny Smith to worry." AB stated responsibly. "Yeah it's is about that time ain't it. Hey Apple Bloom, can you keep this whole growth thing between us?" Applejack concurred whilst making a small request. " I'll try but if you get any bigger I doubt the others won't notice." AB agreed as the thought of her older sister having difficulties exiting the barn filled her imagination. "Sounds fair, in the meantime ah should probably consult Twilight she'll know what to do." AJ states while coming to terms with her situation. As the girls close in on the barn Granny Smith can be heard from the house hollering, "Hurry up you two super almost ready.
12131212.title: The incredible growing Applejack!

choices: Act casual as to not alarm Applejack
Freak out and start to panic
Get the supersized mare out of the house before she wrecks it
121312122.content:
As the pair walk past the garden's gate towards the the front of the house Applejack turn to Apple Bloom and says," Go on now Apple Bloom, I'll meet cha in a minute!" Said AJ sternly. "Ok sis, oh and don't worry I'll wash up as well." AB states with a pleasant smile on her face.

Applejack nods and makes her way towards the barns entrance as Apple Bloom happily trots up to the front door and proceeds inside. "Where's Applejack? Ain't she witch you?" Said the lime green old mare. "Why yes Granny, she was. She's just stowing her gear and securing the harvest, that's all." AB answered truthfully. "Oh ah see, that makes sense. Say you two were out there for quite some time, is everythin alright?" Granny Smith inquired instinctively. "Yeah, every things fine Granny." AB replied sounding slightly unsure. "Ok then, go wash up now and I'll have your super ready by the time you get back." GS stated sounding ever so slightly unconvinced. "Yes of course, be back it a minute!" Said AB in a nervous tone. On the way to the wash room she shots her brother heading into the kitchen/dinning area. "Hey ya Big Mac." She said quickly acknowledging her elder sibling. "Eh yep." BM responded fondly.

At this moment Applejack crosses the threshold of there quaint home, "Howdy y'all, owwee Granny what smells so dang good?" AJ complimented enthusiastically. "It's just simple stew Applejack, no need to make such a fuss." GS delivered flatly with sarcastic undertones. Granny Smith still had not laid eyes on her newly enlarged granddaughter so she had no reason to change here inflections however Big Mac wasn't so lucky since he had just entered the room.

In his eyes there was absolutely no denying the fact his sister was nearly as tall as he was, seeing his sibling standing so near the doors frame. "What's wrong Big Mac did I track something in?" AJ questioned knowing all t well why her bother wore such an odd expression. "Nope" Big Mac said quickly still processing the information in front of him. " Alright then I bes be heading to the wash room so we can get along with super." AJ said proudly as she hung her hat on the rack near the door marveling at how low it appeared to her now.

As Applejack passed Big Mac by Granny was turning around to begin placing the food on the table, with her change of positing she was able to catch a glimpse of the two siblings side by side. It caught her of guard seeing the mare's back nearly level with the stallions. That can't be right she thought, Applejack has never been that tall. "Mai eyes must be playin tricks on me in mai old age, ha ha Applejack looks huge!" The old mare laughed to herself. Apple Bloom was just finishing up when Applejack arrived at the door. "They didn't notice right? AB curiously whispered. "Ah think Big Mac may be on to me, but I can have a bit of fun with that." AJ replied gleefully.

Having finished washing her hooves Applejack returns to the table and takes a seat across from Granny with Apple Bloom and Big Man on the sides. "Thanks Granny for meal." AJ says gratefully. The other two siblings concurs the sentiment and the family converses over the dinner about the days chores and each member fills the old mare in on they're individual progress. "So, you say we're about three fourths done with the orchard now?" GS inquires sounding impressed. "Eh yep" "Bingo" both BM and AJ reply confidently. "Well now that's got to be a new apple family record you two, great job!" GS states sounding positively overjoyed. The conversation carries on merrily for quite some time while Applejack begins to scramble for a second helping.

"My yer sure are hungry today ain't cha!" GS comments on Applejack's enthusiasm for the simple dish. "Sure am, I worked up quite the appetite. Besides it's just so good with all my favorite fixins." AJ stated bluntly. "Well go on eat yer fill sweetie, you sure earned it." GS said warmly. Big Mac couldn't believe his eyes he's never seen Applejack eat so much at super. He shot a glace over at his other sibling who was also staring on in disbelief. He turned again once more to face the hungry Applejack and continued to watch her nervously as she took another spoonful into her mouth.

With all eyes in the room on her now seeing as the conversation had died down and they where full. As Applejack put the last spoonful of her second bowl in her mouth and it's tasty contents slid down her throat, it happened. Applejack's entire form shrank inward almost as if she were imploding before stretching and expanding in all directions. Her substantial stomach pushed against the hard wood of the table pushing it towards the elderly pony as her plot bloomed and covered more and more surface area of the floor. Her head swelled and rose higher and higher as she let out a deep satisfactory sigh. She also tilted her head back shutting her eyes with her front hooves placed firmly on the floor behind her in full stretch mode. Her legs thickened and slid further and further under the able as they elongated outwards, "Man that really hit the spot, thanks Granny!" She stated triumphantly. There was no contesting it now SHE WAS MASSIVE!

All three of them stared in awe as they gazed upon the largest mare, NO the largest pony, Scratch that the largest equine they have ever laid eyes on. None of them new what to say, she had to be 13 feet high! It was insane that they're beloved Applejack was giant to say the least, what were they going to do?
121312122.title: The biggest apple

choices: Granny Smith doesn't give Apple Bloom to much grief.
Granny Smith still scolds them both!
Applejack stops putting off talking to Twilight and makes a late night visit!
1213121223.content:
"Sweet Celestia AJ, yer growing outta control!" Exclaimed the old mare. "Eeyup!" stated Big Mac nervously. "Ah darn, guess the chicken flown the coop Applejack." Apple Bloom said apologetically. You knew Apple Bloom? Granny Smith replied sounding slightly angry. "Now don't go gettin mad at her Granny, I put her in this mess." AJ stated owning up to her mistake. "I be mad at who ever I want to Missy, i'll deal with you in a minute and don't go thinking you can speak any kind of way just because your HUGE." GS snapped at the massive mare. "Now Apple Bloom what's become of your sister and why is it you didn't care to tell nobody?" Inquired the elder pony. Applejack kept her muzzle shut knowing better not to speak when Granny was this heated however in her silence she felt her flank beginning to spread wider on the floor.

She let out a small eek as she realized what was happening! As Apple Bloom continued to explained the situation to Granny Smith Applejack quickly got up nearly bumping into the ceiling now given those last few inches she had recently gained! Keeping her composure she bolted for the now seemingly impossible tiny door. "Ah think I can manage to squeeze threw?" She said not sounding thoroughly convinced. "Now wait just one cotton pickin minute here big missy, Ah ain't finished with you!" GS blurted out angrily as she watched the over-sized equine rush towards the front door. "Sorry Granny, ah haven't got time to get chastised. Least not in here." AJ replied as she fiddled with they small doorknob as managed to get the entrance way open as she proceeded to get scrunch down as low as she possibly could in an attempt to crawl threw.

"Don't go changing the subject now AJ ah won't have disorder in mai house! GS demanded. "Granny perhaps Applejack's right, it looks like she got even bigger! I purpose we continue this outside before BIG sis destroys our house!" AB desperately reasoned with her Grandmother as she watched curious anticipation at her sibling's escape attempt. "Uhhgg, ah think I'm stuck ya'll." AJ stated as she struggled to get her plump plot threw the small opening. "Oh ok, then you two but we WILL continue this! If you had just been straight with Granny you would not have put all of us in this predicament now would you?" GS added in a very "I told you so" manner. "Yeah ok Granny, hindsight's 20/20 and all but that isn't helping much at the moment. Ah feel like I'm trying get threw Winona's door." AJ snapped back with a fair amount of strain in her voice as creaking could be heard from around the door's frame.

"Big Mac quick run out the back and help us pull from there!" AB commanded as she ran to assist her sister from behind. It was a little overwhelming being this close to AJ for her now as one half of her bottom was as big as her! "Eeyup!" responded BM as he headed swiftly out threw the back. GS frolicked as fast as she could over to AJ pressing up against the other impossibly huge backside half of AJ. "It's like tryin to cram a ten pound cake into a four pound oven." GS stated sounding exhausted. " Heh he, yeah ah just hope she doesn't poot." AB laughed as she made her own quip as she continued to throw her weight into the mare's humongous plot. "Ah fail ta see how this is funny ya'll!" AJ stated sounding more than a little annoyed as she was going through sufficient pain. Meanwhile Big Mac had appeared in front of her and having grabbed a rope attached to his plowing muzzle on the way, he couldn't wrap his head around the fact that his younger sibling's head was now larger than he was. "Good thinkin bro, toss one end into my mouth and let's get this show on the road." AJ said relieved at her brothers quick wit. Having just now being close enough to realize this the stallion hesitated and froze in front of the giant mare. "What's the matter Big guy? Come on now I have a plan. I'm still you little sister just bigger, you still trust me right?" AJ stated innocently pleading for her brother's assistance. "E-eeyup" BM said timidly as he carefully tossed the rope into AJ's open muzzle.

He then turned away form the jumbo mare and began walking in that direction. "That's it guys, keep it up" AB stated triumphantly. Just then Granny Smith felt something else along with the slight progress, she could feel Applejack's backside expand all around her. "Ahh no you don't, Applejack quit your growing!" GS shouted as Applejack filled more and more of her vision. AB having felt it too began to worry. "Ah Big Mac, is sis almost out?" not being able to see around her elder sibling! "Nnope" Big Mac said after turning to survey the situation. All momentum had ceased as AJ desperately pushed forward with all her might with her limbs as the creaking of the frame grew louder. " Alright Granny, Big Mac let's give Applejack one more great shove." AB stated not feeling yet deterred. "Sounds good Apple Bloom, let's give it our Apple all." Eeyup" BM rogered up from the other side of the immense pony with fatigue in his voice. " Something's got to give, now Apple family on mia count. 1, 2, threeee!" AB ordered as her whole family pushed and pulled in unison.

With a deafening crack Applejack sprang forward with splendor as pieces of the frame came crashing down around her, Granny Smith, and Apple Bloom. GS and AB collapsed to the floor at Applejack massive hind hooves at the sudden removal of the wall that is Applejack's plot. Big Mac tumbled forward with a roll as the quick release of resistance from the door frame, much like a cork on a bottle. AJ is the cork and the bottle in the Apple residence. Big Mac turned to his enormous sibling who had rose to her feet and swayed her head in relief, she now stood an astounding 13 ft 11 in! "Is everypony alright?" AJ asked sounding genuinely concerned after dropping the rope from her muzzle. "Yes' I think so." AB stated uncertainly. "Yep, still kickin." GS stated. "Eeyup!" BM chimed in. "Thank Celestia, ye-haw way to go Apple Bloom." AJ said gratefully.
1213121223.title: Ahh Applejack yer hindquarters may NOT fit threw!

choices: The spell connects but it's effect is unexpected.
It backfires and makes Applejack even BIGGER!
12131212233.content:
"Alright ya'll, ah bes be heading out of here before I cause any more damage." Applejack said with relief in her voice. "You can say that again Missy." Granny stated staring at the newly reshaped door frame. "Golly, I guess ah should lay off the pie." AJ said embarrassingly as she turn to observe the frame witch was now double arched at the top now, almost as if someone rammed a comically over-sized peach threw, while the bottom was widened out. "This will take quite a bit of work." GS said bluntly "Eeyupp." Big Mac added. "We could leave it as a reminder and just build a new door." Apple Bloom said with a smirk "Naw I'll fix it Granny, sorry." AJ said genuinely sounding very remorseful. "It's alright Applejack, I know you didn't mean to. Besides if I had stopped yammering at ye you could have exited sooner!" GS replied understandingly. AJ thought to herself for a moment, I was already on my way out though? "Yeah it be better if you headed out sis so you can fix whatever THIS is." AB chimed in reasonably. "Yeah OK, I'll see ya'll later then." AJ responded lovingly before bidding her family adieu.

And so everyone's favorite extra large southern farmhand heads out in search for answers and hopefully a remedy. AJ arrives at the threshold of Twilight's castle a lot quicker but also with far to many nosy ponies goggling at her enlarged form. With fearful anticipation she laid a mighty knock upon the large entrance. After a moment she turned to begin her trek back not wanting to disturb her good friend so late, figuring that Twilight had to hear that because even she thought it was a little much. However before she could make a full stride the caste entryway creaked open. "Hello." came a groggy male voice. "Oh hey ya Spike, how you doing. Sorry to intrude so late, has Twilight already turned in for the night?" AJ said nervously turning to face the dragon. "Applejack,... is that you or am I still dreaming?" Spike stated sleepily bewildered at the sight before him rubbing his eyes. "Yeah, it is. Sorry there was no real way to break you in softly unfortunately with all of this." AJ said plainly while gesturing to her body. "Jeez Applejack your BIG! Well hey, come get inside before you cause more of a commotion." Spike replied frankly "Spike is everything alright, who was it at this hou...... r" Came another puzzled voice as an Alicorn rounded the corner from atop the stairs. "Heya Twilight, how are you this evening." AJ responded coyly.

As Twilight descended the staircase she found herself astonished by Applejack's relative size, she was dwarfed by her even though she was still only halfway down the staircase! "Applejack! What happened to you?" Twilight said in a concerning tone. "Oh this, I just thought I would try something new." Applejack replied jokingly "Out with it already Applejack I know it isn't in your nature to be silly." Twilight said stating the facts and getting to the point. AJ drops the charade and explains the whole situation as well as all the facts she knows up to this point. "So I was hopin you help." AJ finished the story up with a plea. "So you ate a strange apple?" Twilight asked plying detective trying to put all the pieces together. "Yeah, that had to do it. So what do ya think Twilight do we got a shot." AJ asked tentatively. "Well I think we could possibly work this out, I just don't know if we meed to enchant something edible or if I can cast a spell directly. Alright Applejack follow me let's go to the library and let me see what I can find. "Sounds good Twilight, thank you." AJ said appreciatively as she followed Twilight into her study.

"Hmmm, these hexes just won't do." Twilight spoke definitively threw a mighty stack of books. "Is everythin alright Twilight?" AJ asked with trepidation in her voice. "It's fine, don't worry Applejack. I CAN fix this, I just want to be absolutely sure these spells won't hurt you since I already ruled out enchantments for this case." Twilight responded calmly confident in her abilities. "Oh alright, then." AJ replied sounding relieved. As time was passing Applejack felt her body changing once more. Her perspective shifted as she receded and bloomed out everything including Twilight seemingly shrank as her height rose, her eyes seeing much more as they settled on there new height. "Ah, Twilight not to rush ya or nuttin but I'm still getting bigger!" AJ stated in a slight panic. "Oh I see, so you are!" Twilight replied trying to keep her composure in the presence of her now 17 foot friend. "Just a moment Applejack I do believe I've found a suitable spell." Twilight stated sternly "That's great Twilight!" AJ excitedly standing to her full height much to Twilight's surprise. "I suppose I don't even need to ask if your ready then now do I?" Twilight stated as she took her position in front of the extremely large mare. "No siree." AJ said ready and willing as she braced herself. "Alright here goes nothing" Twilight said full of determination as her horn began glowing while taking aim. The Princess of friendship finally released the magic within her horn in a brilliant burst of light bound toward Applejack.
12131212233.title: Twilight, tell me you can fix this.

choices: Twilight refuses stating it's to risky given the nature of chaos magic.
She concurs and attempts to Enlarge herself.
Applejack's ceiling thump awoke Twilight's understudy who comes outside.
121312122332.content:
Applejack braced herself by closing her eyes as she felt the magic envelope her bathing the monstrous mare in brilliant light. Twilight proudly held her stance as she witnesses the spell connect successfully. After a moment though she realizes that there is no change to AJ's stature. TS undeterred decides to simply up the ante and closes her eyes to focus as the beam emitting for her horn intensifies.

AJ opens her eyes after several seconds after realizing herself she wasn't changing and saw a beam reflecting from her back down at Twilight unknown to her. After a second or so AJ noticed something odd about her friend. Twilight's body swelled up slightly before contracting upon itself. Twilight was shrinking! AJ blurted out in horror, "Twilight cut it out yer shrinkin yourself" in a desperate attempt to stop the Princess for Friendship from dwindling herself further! As the seconds with the reflected beam trained on it's new target Twilight's hooves took up less and less real estate upon her cobblestone floor. Despite AJ's plea Twilight continued to press on determined to restore the embodiment of honesty and replying with, "It will be alright Applejack it only appears that way your vision is distorted by the spell, it's definitely working I can feel it!" Said TS confidently in her voice only clearly a few octaves higher "Ah bet you can seeing as your the one changing." AJ snidely remarked at TS's stubborn "need" to succeed as she continued to shrink in her hardheadedness. "Alright Applejack we're nearly done here." TS said as she began to open her eyes as her spell winded down.

The glow left AJ and subsequently faded off Twilight who only stood about 8 inches tall now. As Twilight came to her senses she finally noticed something had gone horribly wrong. Applejack was truly massive! She must have been the size of an elephant, or maybe even a medium sized Dragon! "I so sorry Applejack, I just don't know what went wrong. I could have sworn I had this right." She pleaded to the hut sized Apple Farmer as she starred up at her in awe noticing something else off about the predicament. "Don't worry your pretty LITTLE head bout Twi it's fine." AJ responded jovially with a smirk. Giving AJ a curious glace the reality of her situation began to dawn on her while responding, "What's come over you Applejack? Your HUGE, isn't that more upsetting?" TS stated sounding thoroughly confused and that's when she realized AJ's head hadn't hit her ceiling. "Ha, ha Twilight your a real hoot. Ya don't see what's happened?" AJ unable to suppress her amusement any further blurted out blissfully.

This can't be right Applejack should be touching the ceiling by now, possibly even crouching slightly my ceiling is only about 20 feet high? Twilight contemplated and in a eureka moment it finally dawned on her, "Unless you didn't grow, but rather I shrunk!" TS gulped at her revelation as she truly surveilled her surrounding for the first with that thought in mind only to confirm just that. "I'M TINY!" TS exclaimed in a extremely high pitch that came off as little more than squeak at this point. "Ha, ha Twilight knock it off your killin me!" AJ continued to laugh until she reached the point of hysterics. "It's NOT funny Applejack, what do you suppose we do now?" TS replied angrily. "Sorry Twi, it's just that it took you so long to figure it out what happened after ah tried warnin ya. Besides now evey time ya speak ya sound like one of Fluttershy's critters." AJ explained the humor in the event as best she could. "Yeah real funny Apple GIANT, now let's try to figure this out." TS replied coldly not amused by this predicament. "Jeez Twiny, I'm jus trin to lighten the mood." AJ responded sounding dejected. "Huh, it is a little funny when you think about it and I'm sorry Applejack I just don't handle stress well. That's all." TS chuckled sightly realizing she shouldn't snap at AJ seeing as she's scared too.

"Aw It's Ok Twi, I shouldn't have laughed at your expense, maybe when this is all solved but not now. Ah jus couldn't help myself I suppose." AJ stated apologetically not wanting to deter her friends help. Once again a all to familiar feeling began stirring up within AJ as TS spoke, "You said you heard a strange yet familiar cackle where you discovered the apple right?" Applejack's body recoiled before bursting upward once again, "No dag nabbit, not again!" AJ pleaded to no avail as her head struck the ceiling forcefully, "Ouch!" AJ cried as she repositioned her expanding body as her flank ballooned in all directions and her hooves spread across the floor inching towards the tiny equine. "Oh my!" was all TS could muster seeing the colossal mare from her new perspective. It was one thing to watch Applejack get bigger at her normal height but quite another spectacle from a vantage point below the 1 foot mark. Stopping just shy of 24 feet AJ had a look of absolute worry and pain upon her face as she said, "Twi do you think we could take this outside?" "S-sure of course!" TS stammered more than a little spooked as she raised the hoof closest to AJ's museum pillar sized leg until it made contact.

TS initiated the transport spell placing the pair just behind her castle and continued to think about the botched spell. "That has to be it..........chaos magic. Discord!" TS blurted out putting two and two together. "Ya think, ah had a hunch but had forgotten all bout that, in all this hulla ba lu." AJ stated in an understanding manor. "It has to be, I had the spell correct but due to the unpredictable nature of chaos magic it reflected off you and onto me!" TS continued to make a case for her theory. "Yup this DOES seem like something that schemin Draconequus would do." AJ stated sounding more than a little annoyed. "It's settled then we should head for Fluttershy's cottage to see if we can summon him to reverse this." TS spoke in a commanding manor. "Ah Twilight do you really want to go like that or would you rather restore yourself?" AJ asked tentatively.
121312122332.title: Chaos magic? Uhhggg, I should have known.

She doesn't grow at all or possibly even shrinks further
