1213121223322.title: Short, Wolfblood tier chapther

12131212233222.author_name: This site is dead.I wana leave
choices: Discord is away (at the chaos realm?) or doing something
12131212233222.content:
Twilight was enveloped by the familiar glow of her magic. Applejack seemed to shrink before, though she checked her surroundings to make sure.

Applejack chuckled.

"Don't worry Twi, this time I ain't getting smaller, you're getting bigger."

"I know, I know."

Twilight breathed a sigh of relief as she grew back to what she assumed was her normal size (at least judging by her surroundings), but her eyes widened as everything continued to shrink. Applejack raised an eyebrow.

"Twi I think you might want to stop that spell now."

Twilight concentrated, willing her spell to end, but it did not.

"Terminate spell! Terminate spell! Why isn't this working?!"

"I dunno much about alicorn magic or unicorn magic or whatever yah cast, but maybe this chaos magic is to blame?"

Twilight kept trying to end the spell and with each failure she was breathing faster and faster.

"My magic! This can't be happening!" Twilight screamed. She was nearly half of Appeljack's size and growing by the second.. Applejack placed a hoof on her shoulder.
"Calm down Twi, we've got through strange things than this, and I'm here with you. Breath in, breath out."

Twilight was up to AJ's stomach now and hoped she wouldn't get much bigger. tried to do so, applying the breathing exercises she learn from Cadance. She was still breathing faster than normal and her mane was messy but she seemed calmer.

"You're right. Thank you. I'm sure DIscord can fix this. Everything is going to be just fine!" She added with a nervous giggle.

"And it's nice having another giant mare to keep me company"

"Ha ha...." Twilight laughed nervously

"So let's get going to Fluttershys! But ah we need to be careful cause if we both just go stomping we'll spoke her good."

"Hmm, I can teleport us most of the way there and then one of us can approach slowly and whipser to her?"

"Sounds like a plan!"

"Ok get ready".

Twilight's horn lit again and they found themselves in the everfree forest, what would be a minute or two away from Fluttershy's cottage if they were at their normal sizes, but only a few steps away at their current sizes.

"Ah think I should make the approach." Applejack said.

"Ok but be careful."

Applejack walked as quietly and softly towards the cottage as her giant size would allow. She bent down, lowering her voice to a near whisper, only for a familiar yellow shape to leap into the sky.

"EEEEEEEEPPPPP!"

"Fluttershy calm ya horseshoes it's me Applejack! I'm just a bit bigger!"

Fluttershy flailed around in the air for a few seconds the stopped, giving Applejack another look over. She slowly landed on her snout.

"Applejack? Sorry I didn't expect you to be so big. And you look different without your hat."

"Well it turns out Stretsons don't quite come in ma size. Unless Rarity is willing to sew a bunch of mine together or somethun."

"Oh I'm sorry. Though what brings you here? I'd like to help you but- EEEEEEPP!" She leapt into the air again at the sight of Twilight.

Twilight sighed.

"I tried to cancel the magic that effected Applejack and I got hit with it to. I'm still me, I'm not going to go on a rampage or anything."

Fluttershy flew towards her.

"Sorry, I was just surprised to see another giant pony. I mean one giant pony was surprising but I wasn't expecting two of them!"

Twilight sighed again

"Me neither Fluttershy. Me niether. Anyway is Discord here? We think one of his apples might have done this and we're hoping he'll be able to fix Applejack
12131212233222.title: Double trouble

choices: Let's get Applejack returned to normal, she's suffered long enough.
It would be logical to restore Twilight to strenghten her magic.
Starlight is the most recent victim maybe it wouls be easiest to reverse it?
1213121223323.content:
You're right Applejack I won't be very effective if I remain in this state." The alicorn rationalized as her horn began to illuminate. Once she had succesfully created an aura around herself the rear exit door of the castle creaked open to reveal a groggy pinkish lavander unicorn behind it. The lavander and light blue striped maned equine proceeded to step out oto the clearing as the magic that had formed around TS began to dissipate into a stream that was seemingly no longer interested in staying attached to her. The magical energy quickly reformed into a steady beam and redirected itself, bolting towards it's newly acquired target.

"Starlight, look out!" AJ screamed as she watched the spell rush towards the understudy of friendship. The magic struck Starlight Glimmer completly enveloping the mare and after a couple of moments changes began. Her mane and tail retracked before pushing and filling out more and more, the pony's back and flank slumped downwad and inward and then procceded to rise and swell larger and larger. Her hooves simultaneously receded before spreading out across the clearing's gravel with her head dwindling before ballooning to a greater size. The magic then dissolved having fulfilled it's purpose.

"Well this is certainly new but Twilight might I ask, why have you decided to enlarge me?" SG inquired nonchlantly with sleepiness in her tone. The 9 foot 2 inch pony was still trying to peice together the absurd situation confused by the sight, curious as to whether Applejack and herself were in fact that big or was Twilight just really tiny?

"I wasn't..... It wasn't meant for you! You have impeccable timing, I was attempting to enlarge myself! Stated the little pony cleary frustrated.

"Oh, well then what happened? The spell shouldn't have done that." SG asked plainly still pretty tired but strangely calm.

Then in an irritated tone while in unison both the gaint and the tiny mares respond with, "Chaos magic!"

"I see that makes sense, tricky stuff." SG replied not missing a beat in a matter of fact manner. TS and AJ then calmed down and proceeded to clue SG into the dilemma they have been plagued with all day.

"Jeez, Applejack that's quite the tale and Twilight I'm so sorry things have gotten this bad. But hey look on the bright side you've got me now and I'm certain the two of us can fix this!" SG said confidetly to her teacher and aquaintance.

"I don't know Starlight, this chaos magic has been a real pain." "Not to mention unpredictable." TS replied defeated before AJ added angrily.

"Come on now Twilight, you mean to tell me that a little enlargement enchantment has completely bested one of the greatest alicorns to ever walk equestria! I don't by it, it's chaos right? We just gotta approach this at a different angle that's all!" SG stated triumphantly.

"Do you really think this is a good idea Starlight, I mean look at me!" TS squeaked as she pleaded her case while gesturing to her 8 inch frame.

"Yes, in fact I think it's a great idea. We'll never know unless we try right? Beside if I'm wrong then we could just track down that Draconequuus." SG said firmly standing her ground.

"Well one thangs for sure ya'll should probably decide here soon, cause we've still got a growin pony over here!" AJ panicly stated as she felt the sensation all over again. AJ's flank shrank ever so slightly then billowed out signifigantly afterward, her body dipped towards the ground then rose termendously, the counrty pony's head decreased in mass before bulging outward again. AJ's legs and hooves shortened and diminished then thickened, lengthened, and spread out in diameter. Her yellow mane and tail recoiled followed by blooming out again. This was SG's first time witnessing this and she was astonished by the show watching the simple ebodiment of honesty becoming 32 feet tall all at once was incredible!

"Wow, your not kinding!" SG stated dumbfounded.

"Aww shucks, ah really am gettin tired of all this!" AJ whined sounding completely frustrated.

SG looked down and gave her mentor a nod and said, "What do you say Princess, wanna give it another whirl? There's no time like the present!" SG still undetured almost as if she was more motivated than ever now, after seeing the effect on the huge mare first hand.

"It's going to be alright Applejack, Starlight's right if I focus on containment and direction of the magic while she performs the spell we may have a real shot!" TS stated bluntly sounding more hopefull than she had been in a while.

"Well ah supose ya have a point, granny always said two ponies are better than one!" AJ concured sounding a little less upset.

"OK, it's settled then. Now who's first, Applesaurous, The Inredible Shrinking Alicorn, or Starlight The 9 ft Wonder?" SG inquired enthusiastically.

Twilight looks up at AJ and states, "It's up to you Big Gal, what do you want to do?"
1213121223323.title: Twilight what's all the commotion is everythi...

choices: Big Mac takes care of the carts and puts them in the barn alone
They due it and finish together
1213122.content: "Hey ya, Big Mac. Are you wrappin up too?" AJ asked with a slight condescending tone. "Ehh yep" Big Mac nonchalantly replied. Applejack stared her bother up and down and couldn't help but notice that he seemed smaller overall. She chocked it up to euphoria caused by the boost in confidence from her one buck harvesting earlier. "Hey Big Mac, guess wut?" Said AJ smugly. "Hmmm" BM replied with a cocky tone not paying his sister much attention. "I believe ya now about that one buck all apples yield." AJ stated competitively. "Pshh" BM responded lazily not sounding impressed but turning to finally face his sibling for the first time since this encounter stated. "I believe you oh brother of mine because in the back there ah did it!" AJ stated boisterously bragging about the event. As he gazed upon his sister something definitely seemed off about Applejack Big Mac thought, and it wasn't her pompous attitude she was always competitive. "Shhsh" BM muttered in disbelief. "Oh, don't believe me do ya. Well frankly I'm glad!" AJ replied brazen with overconfidence. "Nope" BM stated matter-of-factly. "Is this here your last tree in your section?" AJ asked sternly. "Eh yep" BM answered swiftly. "Perfect, now stand back and I'll give you a demonstration even though ah already finished my share for the day." AJ said happily wearing a smug grin one her face. As applejack passed by Big Mac he figured out what was bothering him about his sister, she wasn't a whole lot shorter than him! "eh" He manged to mutter unsure of what his eyes where telling him. Applejack approached the tree and placed her front hove on it looking up ad counted 18 bushels out loud and proceeded to get in bucking position. She wound her back legs up and maintained a steady balance with her front legs, Applejack then closed her eyes to focus just before releasing her kick. She landed a devastating blow to the trunk causing a louder than normal crack and one by one all 18 bushels came down with tremendous thuds. Big Mac's eyes went wide he could not believe what he had just witnessed, he walked over to the plant to survey the haul with his mouth agape. "Not to shabby eh?" Applejack stated absolutely beaming. 'Eh yep" Big Mac responded bewilderingly still trying to understand and slowly putting the pieces together. He stared up at the tree as he walked around seeing if maybe she missed one or two bushels, but no the were positively no more apples in this particular tree. As this was going on Applejack was growing again while she dusted herself off. Once he reached the front again he stopped to survey the spot where the impact occurred he made a starling discovery. There was some bark chipped off the tree in the spot Applejack kicked as well as slight cracking, Big Mac had never seen such a thing before. She really did some damage! He turned to look at his sister to bring it to her attention and gasped at what he saw in front of him, it was Applejack but she wasn't the same. "Huhh?" Was all he could muster as he stared in denial at his significantly larger sister. She wasn't taller that him but she sure was close to it, and there father's hat was definitely more snug it looked a little silly to be honest. "What's the matter Big Mac, you look perplexed?" AJ stated not quite noticing yet. "Eh y-yep" stammered BM sheepishly. "Oh look at that there I did quite a number on this here poor tree. Be a dear and keep this our little secret. Can you do that for me Big Mac?" AJ asked regretfully sprinkled with an ounce of shame. "Eh yep" BM responded dutifully as if rogering up to orders. "Thanks a bunch "Big" Mac your a real sweetie pie." Applejack said nicely as she looked over at her brother and couldn't help but notice looked a lot smaller than normal. "Eh yep" replied Big Mac confused and more than a little weirded out by his sister sudden height increase, this would take some getting use to. Applejack and Big Mac began picking up the apples and putting them in the last bucket before loading them onto his cart. " So Big Mac do you know what Granny's got planned for super?" AJ asked innocently. Big Mac thought for a moment before responding with a simple, "Nope". The two headed back to the barn side by side raising to nearly the same height, Applejack had a bit of difficulty managing her cart due to it not being adjusted to her new size properly.
1213122.title: Not so "Big" Mac

choices: Applejack grows larger in her sleep
She remains the same size but has an interesting morning
Rarity stops by in the morning to discuss "Pony Tones" business with Big Mac.
12131221.content:
"Applejack, Big Mac, is that you two? Supper is nearly ready!" Called the elderly pony with an apple pie on her flank as the duo approached the inner garden past the front gate. "Yea it's us Granny, be there in a minute. Gotta drop our haul off in the barn k." AJ responded respectfully. This is when Big Mac turned to his sibling and motioned for her to head on inside ahead of him. "Wha, Big Mac you wanna take care of mai wagon?" AJ asked tentatively. "Eeyup." BM replied sternly. "Why that's mighty kind of ya Big Mac, thank you. Say this wouldn't have anything to do about that bucking earlier now would it?" AJ gratefully responded while questioning Big Mac's motives. "Nnope." Big Mac stated firmly trying not to divulge the true reason was being so helpful. "Welp see ya inside then "Big" fella." AJ stated playfully with her muzzle displaying a smirk. A little taken aback Big Mac nodded and turned to face the barn as Applejack disconnected from her cart. The truth was Big Mac would rather put the carts away then face the awkwardness that was sure to follow Applejack's entrance to there home.

"Evenin ya'll" AJ greeted her family fondly. Apple Bloom who had only just now seen her sister since the change looked over at the mare and responded, "Howdy sis......?" As Apple Bloom confusingly addressed Applejack not sure she was seeing things right Granny Smith said bluntly, "Took ya long enough Applejack?" "Yea decided to get a little ahead and knock an extra row out on the orchard." AJ replied truthfully. "Oh, OK then however Applejack don't go overworking yourself now" GS stated sounding concerned. With Apple Bloom still holding a puzzled expression as Applejack made her way towards the washroom. "What's a matter sugar cube?" AJ inquired noticing just how small Apple Bloom seemed as she passed her by. "Oh, nothin. Say where's Big Mac?" AB snapping out of a daydream esk state before quickly changing the subject. "Alright then" AJ replied as she stepped into the washroom. Big Mac crossed they're home's threshold soon after wearing a concerned look upon his face. Apple Bloom rushed to confront Big Mac to discretely as possible to confirm her suspicions."Big Mac is does Applejack seem BIGGER to you? AB carefully asked her brother desperately trying to maintain her sanity. "Eeyup!" BM stated bluntly. "What are you two on about now? I can hear you bickerin bout something!." GS asked sounding a little agitated by they're blatant secrecy. "Nothing at all Granny, just planning a goof on Applejack." AB answered wittily not wanting to alarm the old mare. " Now you know I love a good goof but be nice to Applejack, lord knows she works mighty hard around here." GS says wisely. With that Big Mac heads towards the washroom and passes Applejack on the way. Still a little put off/intimidated by her new size he keeps his focus straight ahead. Applejack notes the odd behavior of her brother who is normally confident if not a little pompous but she just shrugs it off and goes over to Apple Bloom to assist her in finishing setting the table.

After a moment Big Mac returns from the washroom and joins the girls and takes his seat across from Granny Smith. "Apple Bloom states the following while staring down at her bowl of delicious smelling stew, "Thanks for the grub Granny." "Yes, thank you Granny. This looks great!" AJ politely states. "Eeyup." BM concurs gratefully. "Aww, you young ins are quite welcome. Now dig in." GS responds sweetly appreciative of the acknowledgement. The supper goes smoothly with the family sharing funny musings about they're day, however Big Mac and Apple Bloom couldn't help hlp be concerned of they're siblings new developments. Especially Big Mac who had noticed the change after that last tree she bucked it was then that he heard Applejack begin to recall that very story to the lime green mare, "Yeah Granny it sure was somethin, ya should have seen the look on Big Mac's face as he surveyed all 18 bushels on the ground." Applejack said gleefully as her body once again contracted and ballooned larger still if only a little bit polishing off her first bowl. Apple Bloom's eyes bugged out cartoonishly with her mouth agape before turning to glace at her brother in astonishment. "Ha ha, now don't go gettin to BIG for your britches Applejack." GS jokingly sounding ironically oblivious to what just happened despite her on point word choice. " I'll try not to Granny, but I'll need to show you sometime." AJ obliged also seemly not picking up on the oddly contradictory statement as she reached for another helping of stew. Big Mac returned a dumbfounded look at his little sister sharing in her disbelief as he was pretty certain that he had just become the second largest apple.

Cautiously the pair remained silent during the rest of the meal not sure what to say or do, or even what to make of this whole ordeal but they new they had to do something! Applejack finished her second bowl and stood up to her even newer height, she was now Big Mac's height of 5ft 2in. "Well night ya'll,I'm mighty tired from the days work. Thanks again Granny the meal was fantastic!" Applejack said as she receded before ascending a little further into the air to the height of 5ft 9in! "Goodnight sweetie!" GS replied as she joined her grand kids in they're disbelief in the fact that Applejack now stood nearly 6 feet. "Night." was all Apple Bloom could muster after what she just witnessed. "Eeyup." BM said sounding both concerned and scared. Applejack wasn't sure why her family had just taken such a weird tonal shift in they're responses, she also didn't quite understand why the table looked so much lower than it had been. She shrugged it of though and just chocked it up to being weary and headed upstairs to her room for some much deserved rest.
12131221.title: Supper is served.

121312211.content:
That even as she sleeps
AppleJack unknowingly continues to
go thru size fluxes, first shrinking a bit
then enlarging even more than previously.


Overnight AppleJack grows to________
121312211.title: Applejack grows larger in her sleep

choices: She runs into Rarity on her way to Twilight's castle
She causes a stir in town drawing a large crowd
Rainbow Dash spots her (oddly) from fairly high up and swoops down to say hello
1213122111.content:
At the crack of dawn a the familiar noise of a roosters call can be heard outside of Applejack's window as she quietly begins to stir in her sleep. "Mornin already?" The mare said sleepily as she turned on her mattress causing an audible creak in the oak foundation. "Hey Applejack you up?" came the voice of a filly from the other side of her room at her door. "Yep I'm up Apple Bloom, thanks." Replied Applejack groggily. "Are ya decent?" Apple Bloom said in anxiously her voice full of trepidation. "Naw Apple Bloom just fixin to step out of bed now, so give me a minute would ya." AJ protested. "Yeah, OK sure just wanted to return your brush is all." said the filly timidly. Applejack aimed her eyes straight to the dresser where she kept her brush and confirmed it's absence. "It's alright Apple Bloom just leave it in the washroom I'll get it there, really wish you would ask me to borrow it first though." AJ stated sounding slightly annoyed. "Sorry, guess I thought you wouldn't mind. Anyway Granny's almost got breakfast ready so....." Apple Bloom genuinely responded. "It's fine and yeah your right I wouldn't normally mind but ya see Rarity gave me it so." AJ blissfully reminisced. "Ah, that makes sense. Alright see you downstairs!" Apple Bloom said sheepishly. "Alright, time to start the day then." Applejack said as her eyes darted around the room.

Something felt off earlier when she was scanning for her favorite brush and now that she was beginning to rise out of bed those feelings only amplified. "Just what the hey's going on here?" She stated puzzled at the sight of her hind legs poking out from underneath her blanket and off the end of her bed frame. She looked back and noticed her pillow had also shifted clear to the headboard and as she moved her body her bed was squeaking the whole time! She brought her legs over to the side of the bed and finally rolled out and up out of it. Once she stood all the way up it hit her, "This ain't right." She said with a hint of panic as she clearly noticed the field of vision change. "THIS can't be right." Said the mare who had unknowingly gained 9 more inches in her sleep. Her eyes shot straight to the floor hoping against hope that she was standing on something that would elevate her vision to such a degree, even though that wouldn't explain why everything also looked smaller. When she spotted nothing but her orange hooves planted firmly on the wood floor her heart sank. "This can't be happenin, I'M HUGE!" She exclaimed realizing her plight.

"What am ah gonna do? I can't let the fam see me like this, they'll freak?" AJ contemplated her options as calmly as possible. "Ah know I'll go see Twilight she'll know what to do." AJ stated sounded relieved in the idea of consulting her good friend. "OK Applejack you got a plan now, just play it cool you CAN do this" She said psyching herself up to face her family before her departure. Applejack awkwardly managed to make her way downstairs despite the now seemly cramped passageways of her home. "Shoot if this continues I'm going to need to stay in the barn." She stated quietly to herself as her hooves touched down on the first floor landing. "Mornin sleepyhead, get enough rest?" Granny Smith said with glee. "Pssffft" Big Mac spit out some of his apple juice as his gaze met his sister's much larger form. "You alright there Big Mac, he he." Applejack chuckled at her brothers fopaux. "Eeyup" BM said embarrassingly. "Morning Granny, well yeah I did actually. Thank you" Applejack replied politely as Apple Bloom turned and looked up from her plate of grits at her sibling. "Yeah I say she did, I suppose it's true what they say a growing girl needs her rest." Apple Bloom said in a sassy tone. "Silly Apple Bloom ah am a grown mare I don't need no more growing, I was just tired is all. Now go on and finish your breakfast." AJ said nervously not entirely convinced in her own words as she took a seat at the table. "Ah don't know Applejack maybe your sister's on to something, your trotting does sound a bit heavy." GS responded tersely full of wisdom. "Eeyup" BM concurred "Naw, I think I just put on some weight is all." AJ stated confidently as she began eating. "Nnope" BM rejected quickly. "It's alright Applejack, we are here for you. You don't have to hide anything from us, we're family." AB affectionately reasoning with her older sister. The table went quiet as they continued to eat.

After a few minutes of silence Applejack tried to break it and change the subject with,"What do ya'll have planned for today?" "Well ah know what needs to be done, so I'll make sure Big Mac handles it but in the meantime ah need you to go find out what's causing this and if it can be cured." GS replied not having any of Applejack's distractions. "OK Granny I'll do it, sorry for being so stubborn. Ah don't know what caused it unless it was that strange apple? It was so dang good though." AJ caved as she finished her meal and told the family about the details of the odd apple encounter. "Well that certainly sounds like it could be something!" AB said enthusiastically as she pondered the thought of such power she could wield if she found the unique fruit, after all she wouldn't mind being a little taller herself. It was then when Applejack felt something building up inside her, "Uh-oh, I think it's happening ya'll." As she finished her statement her entire body recoiled inward before pushing outward again, her hind and front legs stretched ever so slightly, her stomach pressed into the table bit by bit, her mane and tail lowered and curled on the floor, her plot thickened and spread in diameter, and her muzzle elongated as her head grew bigger and bigger. She Quickly rose to her feet now standing roughly an impressive 7 foot 1! "Alright then ya'll take take care now I bes be going before I can't make it out of here." She said timidly sounding more than a little scared.

"See you later deary and don't worry I'll have Apple Bloom move your thing to the barn and have them ready for you when you return." GS said sweetly full of support. "Bye Applejack, good luck!" AB said lovingly "Eeyup" BM added sincerely. With that Applejack headed toward the door ready to start her journey, as she does so she turns to the hat rack where Bright Mac's hat rested and thinks about taking such an important item. In the end wisely deciding against it since it would just make her size stand out that much more. "See you later ya'll, take care." AJ said as she ducked under the door frame and passed threw unsure if she would ever be able to get in again. Trying not to dwell on this fact to much the over-sized mare took the path threw her front gate and embarked on this new strange quest not sure where it might lead.
1213122111.title: 6 1/2 feet on all fours!

choices: Knock on the castle door herself.
Hide and allow Rainbow Dash to handle it.
They both knock but there is no reply.
12131221113.content:
"Man nothing beats a nice summer evening flight above town." Said a light blue rainbow maned Pegasus to herself blissfully. Rainbow Dash was enjoying a leisurely glide threw town on her way home from an intense day of pranking with Pinkie Pie. "Man Mayor Mare really didn't expect that ink bottle to explode like that! Ha ha ha." RD burst out in uncontrollable laughter as she recalled the incident. After wiping the tears that had formed from her eyes off her face she noticed something strange below walking near the fountain. The town wasn't empty by any means but certainly the hustle and bustle from the day had calmed but amongst the sparing few townsfolk was her dear friend Applejack near that very fountain. However something was off about her and it wasn't the fact she was not sporting her trademark hat, it was her size. She looked larger not just taller either but bigger all around, but that couldn't be right. Could it, RD thought to herself as she made another pass at rubbing her eyes to see if her eyes were deceiving her as she stated, "I'm just tired there is no way Applejack grew, right?" After she finished she focused once more at the jumbo mare, and the unbelievable sight hadn't changed. Her good friend was still towering over the other citizens. RD decided to fly closer to get a better look but was hesitant to call out to her. As she got closer AJ's exaggerated form became more and more imposing the closer she got causing an unusual sense of dread and intimidation to sweep over her. Making it temporarily unable for her to speak to her enlarged friend.

"Hey ya Applejack, going for an evening stroll." RD said as casually as she could muster in her current nervous state. RD waited timidly for her friends reply after finally stirring up the courage to address her friend as she landed. She indeed felt small standing alongside Applejack with her sight being level with AJ's bountiful flank, despite this she ultimately decided that AJ no matter what size was is no threat. "Oh hey Rainbow Dash, yeah ah suppose I am, just on mah way to Twilight's." AJ responded in kind with a look of general unease.This snapped RD's irrational fear away and AJ's worries became apparent in that moment, telling RD that what she needed the comfort of a true true friend. "So how was your day, anything interesting happen? RD asked the obvious still trying to keep the conversation casual and not directly addressing the nearly baby sized elephant question in the air. This approach only served to make the exchange more awkward than it already was causing AJ to get slightly annoyed, "Gee ah don't know it was pretty normal all things considered besides the whole Orange apple that made me GIANT!" Taken aback RD flinched slightly before mustering a witty but ill advised albeit under her breath retort, "I don't know about giant Applejack, you are big for sure but I think you need a couple more feet for that status." With a tinge of unimpressed boasting in her tone. "Are we really arguing semantics right now Rainbow Dash? Look at me I'm HUGE ah don't care if I don't technically classify as [giant] to you." AJ stated almost shouting and clearly angry even going as far to attempt air quotes with her hooves on the word giant. RD just stood there in awe in her friends presence as she watched with her mouth agape the enormous equine get off her front hooves for a second and making the ridiculous gesture highlighting the contrast between the ponies making it that much more evident.Making an audible gulp in realizing her mistake before continuing with, "Gosh I'm sorry Applejack ok, you know tenderness isn't my specialty. That's Fluttershy's thing, please don't get angry with me!" RD said more than a little spooked. AJ turned to notice the small group of ponies around town had stopped what they were doing and were looking their way and murmuring to themselves before looking back down at the clearly frightened RD. "Aw sugar cube I'm not angry at you, ah am frustrated with this whole situation. Now can we continue this a little more near Twilight's place I don't want to draw any more attention." AJ said with reasoning and calmness in her voice. "Y-yeah sure no problem Applejack, whatever you need. I'm here for you." RD replied honestly gathering her composure. "Thanks Rainbow Dash you are always there for me and I appreciate that." AJ responded frankly full of affection.

The two girls continued to conversate as they approached the castle. AJ was a little tired of recapping the story up to this point but figured it would only continue as she encountered more of her friends, so there really was no point in complaining about it. "So this apple is your only lead? Twilight is a great start but maybe we should tell Rarity as well." RD said reassuringly trying to throw as many idea's AJ's way as possible. "Ha and what give her a heart attack in the process besides what is she going to do make me an enormous hat?" AJ stated gleefully clearly enjoying her joke. "Ha ha no, to do an investigation for you. She really loves that stuff!" RD chuckling before adding confidently. "Naw, let's keep it to the fam, you, an Twilight for now OK. I don't need everypony knowing about mah predicament." "Alright fair enough, but it sure would be cool to show you off to a small group of ponies. You could really put on a performance, especially if you get even BIGGER!" "Now Rainbow Dash you know darn well I don't want to be some spectacle and I sure as cow dung don't wanna get any bi......" AJ sternly proclaimed before being cut off by the fear of that all to familiar feeling building within her. "What's wrong Applejack?" RD puzzled as she watched an incredible event unfold. AJ's entire body receded and shuttered inwards before releasing and rising and expanding in all directions once more. "No, not again!" AJ cried in terror as her four hooves spread in all directions covering more and more circumference individually as they spread across the ground while she maintained her balance. Her tail and mane lengthened brilliantly in the light as her back rose higher and higher, her noggin swelled larger in sync with the rest of her vast body. "A-applejack...., are you alright?" RD stammered with genuine concern as keeping her eyes glued on her greatly enlarged friend who had to be at least 8 foot 3 now! "Yeah I'm fine Rainbow Dash, I just want this to end." AJ replied appreciatively but with a god amount of sadness in her tone.

After a short pause RD comforted AJ with,"Don't worry Applejack I'm sure Twilight can fix this!" RD said full of confidence in those words. "Ah sure hope so." AJ responded sounding a little more chipper. "On a side note though it was pretty awesome to watch!" RD stated enthusiastically. "Watch it Rainbow Dash, that ain't helping!" AJ said sounding a little annoyed but also a little happier that RD had managed to get her mind off it a bit. The pair eventually got to Twilight's castle's great doorway. "What do you wanna do Big gal, you want me to handle the knocking so I can ease Twilight into all this?" RD asked helpfully. "Do ya think I'd cause that much of a ruckus?" AJ answered tentatively. In the end Applejack decides to................
12131221113.title: Hey Applejack? Whatcha up too?

choices: Applejack decilines and suggests they get in touch with Twilight instead
Applejack declines and bids Starlight farewell and heads to Canterlot with RD
121312211132.content:
"Ya know, maybe your right. I suppose you otta take care of the knocking an explaining." Applejack said nervously with her mind made up.

"No problem Applejack, I've got this!" Rainbow Dash confidently stated as she put her hoof up to the door and gave it a substantial knock.

"Jeez Rainbow, and ya figure I'd be loud!" AJ commented sounding quite displeased.

"Perhaps, but I need to be sure they heard it. It's a big place after all." RD stated trying to justify her actions. A couple of momments pass with no answer and RD prepares a second softer knocking. After administering the knock she let's out a sigh and turns to AJ.

"Whelp if they didn't hear that first set I doubt they're home. Thanks anyway sugar cube." AJ says definitively as the 8 foot+ mare turns to leave the premises joined by the rainbow maned wonder bolt . After taking only a few steps the pair hear a breaking of wooden seal followed by a slow creak. The pair turn to see a pinkish lavander colored mare with a purple and light blue swirled mane.

"Rainbow Dash, Applejack? What brings you two here? The pony at the threshold politely inquires trying to make sense of the sight in front of her.

"Starlight, I'm so glad you answered we were just about to leave." RD enthusiastically states as she zooms back to the castle door.

"Yes well sorry to intrude at such an hour Starlight, but Twilight wouldn't happen to be home now would she?" AJ asked tentatively fearing the answer.

"Oh it's not an intrusion at all Applejack I was simply catching up on my shows, however to answer the question no Twilight and Spike have left to Canterlot on official Princess bussiness I'm afraid." Starlight Glimmer delivered the news with tact but noticed the disappointment on AJ's face. Since AJ hadn't approached the mare yet she still wasn't fully aware of her situation by glancing but had a hunch something was off.

"Ah see that's mighty unfortunate, well thank ya kindly for your time Starlight. Enjoy the rest of your evening." AJ said defeatedly as she turned to walk away once again.

"Hold on a second Applejack! Is there anything I can do for you, perhaps send a summons to the Princess?" SG pleaded to her dejected acquaintance with a lingering curiosity in the back of her head.

"She's right Applejack, you came all this way for help. I don't see why she can't try?" RD reasoned with the enlarged farmhand once again stopping her in her tracks.

As SG continued to stare at the orange mare the thing that had been bugging her finally clicked and she calmly asked. "Say Applejack, how TALL are you? I've never asked so I don't really know but now I'm definitely curious."

"Ahh well ya see, funny you should ask that cuz....." AJ began to reply shyly as RD gleefully interrupted.

"She's like over 8 FEET tall or something, it's AWESOME!" RD answered blissfully.

"Eight feet! Yikes I figured you were taller but OMC!" SG responded flabbergasted

"I know, it's nutz right!" RD added gushing slightly

"Ah can't believe ya convinced me that you could ease anypony into anything! I must be a dang fool, ya haven't got a subtle bone in your body Rainbow Dash!" AJ stated annoyed at her friends lack of tact.

"It's ok Applejack, I figure this is what you came for yes?" SG asked to get the conversation back on track.

"Yes Starlight I'm afraid this an't stoppin either." AJ confessed with worry in her tone.

"I see, well do you know what caused it in the first place?" SG aprehinsively inquired as the extra large mare approached her for the first time.

AJ goes over in detail of the events that transpired throughout the course of her day thus far as she felt a fimiliar build up of energy inside her gut. "Ah shoot I guess it's that blasted time again!" She exclaimed as the changes began.

"What is it Applejack? Are you O....." SG asked concernedly before she lost her words in awe as she witnessed a bewildering transformation of magic, the likes of which she had ever seen!

Each of AJ's hooves shrank before expanding on the pavement until they were 9% larger, her back dipped before rising into the setting sun's horizon most of which could not be seen now threw the eyes of the mare thanks to AJ's expansion. Her flank receded before puffing out until it was more pronounced, her mane and tail unnaturally recoiled inward before lengthening outward again to match the rest of her body. Her head ebbed in on itself slightly before bursting out in an exaggerated motion until it too matched her now 9ft 5in body!

"Oh my that looked painful, are you OK?" SG asked timidly taken aback by the sheer size of the pony.

"Yeah I'm fine, thanks for askin though." AJ answered dejectedly sounding a little more than just worried.

"Wow, that was amazing! I gotta record this somehow." RD squeed insensitively once again showing she did NOT read the situation correctly.

"Rainbow Dash that is NOT appropriate, can't you tell she's hurting?" SG snaps at RD scolding her for her outburst.

"Jeez sorry for trying to lighten the mood, besides can't she see the benefits to being huge? I know I would have a blast!" RD states desperately reasoning that AJ souldn't be so gloomy about all this.

"But that's just it Rainbow Dash she's NOT you and she's scared, understandably so. I would want to fix this asap if it were me." SG sagely advised deescalating the situation.

"Your absolutely right Starlight, I'm sorry Applejack. I shouldn't project my inferences onto you, you are your own mare." RD deduced remorsefully.

"Ah it's ok Rainbow, ah know you were jus tryin to cheer me up and ah appreciate that. Besides all your confounded jabber keeps my head straight believe it or not. Ha ha." AJ replied sounding ever so upbeat and joyful.

"Well if that's all settled then, what do you say Mondo Mare want me to take a crack at it?" SG confidently asked with a grin across her face.
121312211132.title: Sorry ladies but Twilight's not here.

choices: Starlight attempts to hail Twilight and the girls head to the train station.
Rainbow Dash flies ahead to reach Twilight and grows while on the way there.
The three gals stick together and seek out the Ryme loving Zebra in the forest.
1213122111321.content:
"If yer up to it Starlight, it would be mighty fine of ya to do so." Applejack answered sincerely.

"Of course Applejack, it's no "big" deal I'd be happy to assist you in any way I can." Starlight Glimmer responded casually inferring it was no trouble at all.

"Do you need me to do anything Star?" Rainbow Dash added willingly.

"No, that won't be nessasary Dash. I just need to figure out a suitable spell. Now which one to go for, a simple reduction spell should suffice but given those spurts she's been experiencing I doubt that would do any good." SG responded politely before radically thinking out loud.

"Hmmm, I don't know much about magic seeing how that sorta thing is looked down upon in agriculture but pehaps you could shrink me and then put a cap of sorts on my form to cancel it out?" AJ suggests tentatively.

"A seal! Applejack your a genius!" SG squeed loudly.

"Well now, I don't know about that. Just a lucky guess, that's all." AJ humble as ever denies the notion as an extra obvious blush appears across her mussel.

"Wow Applejack, real subtle. Can't tell your pleased with yourself at all." RD chimes in sarcastically referencing her large friends basful demeanor.

"Ha Hum, well in any case are you ready Applejack, to return to normal?" SG chuckling at RD's observance then asking the enlarged mare to prepare for the reversal spell.

"Ready as I'll ever be puddin." AJ stated faithfully fixing her stance as she did, standing to her full height proudly for the first time since this all began. Hoping against hope that this will be the last time she will EVER be this big.

"Alright then here goes nothing." SG states as her horn flared up with magic in a swirling pattern following the grooves concentrating at it's peak before producing a stream headed straight for AJ. Upon impact an agressive flash of lavender light blinded everypony momentarily before engulfing the 9 foot 5 mare in magic. The magical aura surrounding the immense pony turned a lighter shade of purple before changing entirely to yellow leaving AJ unaffected.

"Yellow, that's not right." SG said quizzically as she watched the magic slowly flow around then off AJ's body and build up near the tip of her nose then transforming into a bolt like stream.

"Oh no, Rainbow Dash LOOK OUT!" having cut of the spell at this point realizing something was definitely wrong SG desperately called out in vain noticing to late that the newly formed beam was already headed torwards the bystander.

"Huh." was all the unaware rainbow maned equine could muster as the beam struck her hard in the side bringing her to the ground with a thud.

"Rainbow ah you alright?" AJ cried out concerned for her very good friend while SG gasped in shock. "I'm so sorry Rainbow Dash, it all happened so fast." SG added sounding quite bothered by the event.

"Ergg, oh man what was that? Y-yeah I think I'm OK, I do feel kinda funny though." The yellow magic hadn't enveloped RD like it had AJ it just evaporated as soon as it hit kind of like a firework against her body.

Having stated this RD began to get to her feet but as she did her legs jolted and streched outwards, her wings spread out brilliantly wider and wider, her backside rose and distended signifigantly, her mane and tail elongated brilliantly as her head seeminly inflated. This was unlike AJ's ascension for RD clearly just grew outright without any recedence but why?

Once she got to her feet proper her back was above AJ's, meaning she was even bigger than her once towering friend.

"Ohmygosh, ohmygosh, ohmygosh THIS IS AWESOME!" RD exclaimed cheerfully as she stamped the ground creating a minor tremor.

"Whelp that didn't work." SG said nonchalantly

"Huh well at least I'm not the biggest anymore. Welcome to the "Giant Mare Club" party of two." AJ relievingly states with humor trying to stay optimistic.

"What do you think happened anyway Starlight? Didn't you cast a shrinking spell?" RD asked candidly while checking herself out.

"That's the thing, I did cast a mass reduction spell but somehow it reversed!" SG answered sounding very perplexed herself.

"Maybe cause ah ate an apple and wasn't zapped by magic or nuttin." AJ said trying to offer an explanation.

"No, that wouldn't factor in. That is to say it's not a matter of how you got big, It's based on the principal of what can be done to your body now. You see normally magic can stack but in this odd case it reversed my spell and discharged it at Rainbow Dash." SG described to the best of her ability in her reply.

RD couldn't help herself lost in thought while admiring herself, "Man this is so cool I bet I could knock some ponies off thier hooves or at the very least some critters over with the wind force of my landings!"

"Awe yeah, don't you think that would throw off your squad though, betta yet you don't supose your formation would be comprimised do ya?" AJ interjected wisely

"I doubt you would be able to even perform ALL of your stunts like that, especially the percise ones." SG added bluntly cutting right to the point wanting to get the 9 Ft 9 In pegasus's head out of the clouds and back to reality with herself and AJ.

"OK I get it it's not all sunshine and rainbows, but do you think Twilight would have a better idea as to what we're dealing with?" RD inquired sounding a little more concered.

"Not sure, but two heads are certainly better than one." SG stated sounding positive.

"Eeh-yep, I agree so wha...... AH darn it NOT AGAIN!" AJ concured before being interupted by another infuriating growth spurt. Her head deflated then dilated bigger and bigger, her legs withdrew slightly then extended outwards and upwards, her mane and tail both moved back before lengthening longer and fuller, her rear and back depleated and sunk down a little then mushroomed outwards and sprang upwards until she stood a proportional as well as whopping 10Ft 7In!

"Aw shucks Applejack, you just couldn't let me be the BIGGER pony huh. Real mature, show off!" RD jokingly scoffs at her humongous rival and dear friend.

"Shoot Rainbow, it's not like I WANNA BE! Besides somepony's gotta keep ya in check." AJ replies quickly still irriatated but enjoing the company none the less, for at least she has another huge mare to embark on this journey with.

" Alright then ladies, what do you wanna try next?" SG asked calmly glad in the fact the pair seemed to be in good spirits.
1213122111321.title: Oh, well that certainly didn't go as planned.

choices: She eats more and falls asleep (Tf begins then)
12133221.content: Celestia's sun was high in the sky as Applejack took a stroll around the orchard. "Another sucsessful harvest, then again ,ah can't remember a non-sucessful one." As she looked across the treeline, Applejack looked to the all but bare trees and sighed at the thought of how proud her parents would have been to see the family's success. She kept walking and was about to turn back to the house when she saw something that made her stop in her tracks. Right in her path, was an apple tree unlike any other in the orchard. It's branches were gnarled and it's bark looked like it was put through a forest fire. Despite it's withered looking leaves, it bore apples that were strangely colored like her coat. One of these odd apples fell down right at her hooves, almost begging her to eat it. Applejack looked around, then picked it up. "Shame to let this appple go to waste." Applejack bit into the orange colored beauty and tasted the sweet, juicy insides. It's thick skin made it troublesome to tear, but the taste was worth it.

12231.content: Applejack changed genders form a mare to a colt and was discovered by.

12232.content:
So Applejack turns into a dragoness, right?

1241.content:
"Boy, howdy! This sure was a hard day!" Applejack fanned herself with her hat as she looked around. It was Applebuck season again, and she had decided on getting a bit of an early start. She had taken a chunk out of the trees today, much to her pleasure. Still, she had learned last year that bucking the entire farm herself was impossible, and hard on herself and her friends. Hopefully, her friends would be available to help her out tomorrow. As she turned back to her house, she found herself stumbling a little in the low light of dusk. "Hoo-eee. Maybe Ah overdid it a little..." She managed to get a few more paces before her legs gave out beside one of the larger trees. "Well, a little nap couldn't hurt..." Curling up under the tree, she put her cowpony's hat over her eyes. She fell into a deep sleep in moments.

         Meanwhile, an indigo-colored mass lurked in the trees of Everfree Forest. If it had eyes, it would have glared at the setting sun. As it was, it could only settle for imagining the glare. It was not happy. Not since last year's Summer Sun Celebration, where it had been banished from the foal Luna. Yes, this indigo cloud was all that was left of Nightmare Moon, a formless mass known simply as the Nightmare. Its hatred of Celestia and her ilk had only increased with its seperation from the younger Princess. It now wanted nothing more to do with her, save making her suffer for another 1000 years. Still, it couldn't do much as a formless indigo cloud. The Nightmare was in a bad situation, and it knew it.

         As it cast its gaze over Equestria, it spotted something. Focusing its gaze, it found itself looking at an apple plantation. And there, resting beneath one of the larger apple trees, was an orange-colored earth pony with a cowpony hat and a trio of apples for a cutie mark. The Nightmare would have grinned were it able. It recognized the bearer of the Element of Honesty, and now she was vulnerable. It flew silently over to the apple plantation, poised to strike.

As it was about to strike Applejack opened her eyes because she was scared of what happened in her dream. She screamed and kicked. The Nightmare was hooved in the face, if it had one, and and fell backwards. Applejack shook her head and saw the Nightmare.
She didn't quite know what she did but she recognized the Nightmare. She said, "What in tarnation is going on here?" The Nightmare got up and saw Applejack now fully awake. It knew that it couldn't overtake her when she was awoke so it quickly left before Applejack could do anything to get rid of it for good.

What happens next?

1252222.content:
Perhaps Applejack will swap bodies with one of her siblings? That's certain to get awkward in a hurry!

Let's start with her younger sister, Apple Bloom. If Applejack swapped with her, it would likely be Apple Bloom who would get the better end of the deal, since she would technically be the older sibling of the two. But, she would also find out that it's not that easy being older, since she doesn't know that kind of stuff yet.
As for Applejack; she would most likely try to make it through her usual rutine, though it's a lot harder for her in Apple Bloom's young body.

Alternativly; Applejack could instead swap bodies with her older sibling, Big Mac. Given how calm Big Mac usually is, it's likely that he wouldn't be too freaked out about being in Applejack's body.
Applejack herself would be another story. After all, she would end up being not only much bigger and stronger, but she'd also be a male! Her own brother, no less! That is a certain recipe for a freak-out, especially if she has to spend some time in her brother's body while Twilight seaches for a counter-spell.

So; should Applejack swap bodies with one of her siblings?

131121222121.content:
As Pinkie started to wipe Twilight's flank, Twilight started mentally regressing. However, neither of them noticed this during the changing. Twilight was too annoyed that she wasn't focusing on her mind. The poor alicorn lost every shred of her past life, leaving nothing more than a 1 year old baby by the end of the changing. The baby Twilight saw Pinkie as her caretaker, but not her mother. Strangely enough, the concept of mommy never came up.

After the changing, Pinkie gave Twilight a rhasberry, tickling the little one. "Sooo.. whatcha think Twilight? Does Pinkie do a good changing or what?"

Twilight's reaction was rather odd. She just giggled. Pinkie couldn't seem to pick up anything yet. "I'll take that as a YES! Sooo.. whatcha wanna do?"

Twilight just said in a high pitched voice "Pway!"

Pinkie became a little surprised by this, but rolled with it. "Uuuuh.. okie dokie lokie, whatcha wanna play with?"

Twilight just said "Pinkie!!" After which, she levitated Pinkie and started making the pink pony dance.

Pinkie's confusion started hitting super high levels and she said in mid dance "Uh.. Twilight.. what are you doing? Can you let Auntie Pinkie down?"

Twilight's response was merely a giggle followed by more dancing. This really started to concern Pinkie.

"Kay, Twilight, you can stop now."

Twilight just giggled some more from Pinkie's request.

Pinkie then tried to force a laugh "Haha, this is fun, right? Haha, can you stop now?"

Twilight didn't seem to notice Pinkie's request at all that time.

This agitated Pinkie a little bit. "TWILIGHT PLEASE STOP!"

Pinkie's sudden loud yell scared the daylights out of Twilight, making her stop. There was then a pause in the room followed by a sudden loud wail.

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

Pinkie's expression quickly turned to concern. "Uhhh.. it's alright silly" She tried dancing on her own, but it did nothing. So, she tried making silly faces, but that did nothing.

At this point, Pinkie was in panic mode. "Uh, uh.. does Twilight want to try my.. my magic cupcakes?"

This calmed Twilight somewhat, quieting her down a bit. Pinkie was happy to see Twilight's reaction, but it was still far from perfect. So, Pinkie took drastic measures and acted as though Twilight was a baby. Maybe this was all an act she thought.

"Aww.. that a girl. There there, I didn't mean to hurt your feelings silly. I- I just wasn't interesting in dancing that's all."

Twilight's tears then dried up, but the little one was still whimpering. So, Pinkie went a step further. She held Twilight in her hooves, rocking her back and forth. This almost instantly stopped Twilight's whimpering.

"Awww, see. You're ok. I gotta say Twilight, you can pull off the baby act more than I thought you could."

Twilight just tilted her head "Wha act?"

Pinkie's eye brows shot up. "Twilight.. you know what an act is... right?"

Twilight timidly shook her head horizontally.

Pinkie was on the edge of hysteria "Ha-how old are you?"

Twilight said "wun"

Pinkie paused, thinking to herself "OH MY GOSH! OH MY GOSH! OH MY GOSH! WHAT DO I DO?!!!!!!"

Twilight seemed scared "P-pinkie?"

Pinkie shook her head, getting out of her mental panic. "Yes.. little one?"

"ya-you kay?"

Pinkie merely played up an act. "Awww, of course I am. Why wouldn't I be? I just was so surprised that you're one. You've grown up so fast haven't you."

Twilight just giggled to that, signalling to Pinkie that she was in the clear. Pinkie then jumped in, "Come with me little one, we.. I mean, I have friends coming over."

Twilight just showed a grumpy face.

"Awwww.. it's okay Twilight, you're still my best friend."

That relieved Twilight a little bit, but she was still upset.

The door bell then rung. "Come on Twilight! This will be fun!" Pinkie was trying to lighten up the mood anyway possible.

Pinkie then put baby Twilight in a baby carrier saddle bag and went to the door.

1311212221211.content:
After opening the door, Pinkie sees her remaining four friends. The four of them said in unison by coincidence "Hi Pinkie.. and..."

AJ spoke up first "Is that..."

Pinkie just nodded her head seriously.

This gave her four friends the creeps. "Come in girls! Meet Twilight, she's the baby I've talked about."

Rarity tried to play along "Oh.. right.." and looked at Twilight "Awww, how are you darling?"

Twilight just stuck her tongue at Rarity. Pinkie cut in "Haha, isn't she a charmer." Pinkie then closed the door and stuck a pacifier in Twilight's mouth to distract her. She put Twilight in a high chair and turned to her friends.

She said in a quietly with panic "girls.. Twilight is actually a baby. What do I do?"

RD couldn't resist shouting at this point "What do mean she's actually a baby?!" The rest of the girls then turned to Twilight, seeing that she was still distracted. Rarity spoke up "Rainbow! Be quiet! Can't you tell we're trying to not attract attention?"

Pinkie just cut in at this point. "By a baby, I mean she is actually a baby. She doesn't seem to remember who I am, she thinks shes one, and her past memories seem to be gone gone."

There was a great silence that came over all of them. Surprisingly Fluttershy was the one to break the silence. "Ha-how did this happen?"

Pinkie answered rather panicked. "I don't know. She just wanted to test a spell on me and this wound up happening. I don't know what to do."

Rarity got in a word now. "Well first things first. She needs to learn some manners."

The rest of them just turned at Rarity with a glare. AJ butt in "Uhh.. Rarity, she meant how to fix this."

Rarity fired back "Well, AJ.. she still needs to learn some manners."

Rainbow was getting agitated "Manners smanners! She's a baby! Her manners are fine for a baby!"

"No Rainbow. Baby girls are supposed to be sweet and kind. She's just rude. I mean, seriously.. how can you allow that?"

Pinkie sighed "You're right... She's angry at you all, because she thinks I'm being taken away from her."

"Oh my.." Fluttershy responded.

"Hmm.. I see.. " Rarity cut in "Well, we can fix that. Pinkie, why don't you leave for a bit. Tell Spike what happened and we'll try to befriend her."

"Are you sure?" Pinkie questioned.

"Absolutely Darling. This just must be done!"

"K"

With that, Pinkie was gone and the four of them were left with a baby Twilight.

"Good goin' Rarity.."

"Haha, this should be easy peesy."

The four of them walked up to Twilight, who quickly noticed Pinkie was missing. Twilight quickly removed her pacifier and started yelling at them in a high pitched voice. "Pinkie me fwend! Gib Pinkie bak!"

Rainbow had it. "Listen Twilight. You're not a baby! Snap out of it!"

Twilight's eye glands slowly teared up in response.

"Great Sugarcube! Look what ya did!"

Fluttershy quickly came to Twilight, trying to comfort her. "It's okay little one. She didn't mean that, she-"

Twilight angrily cut in "No! YOU MEANIES!!" After that her horn started to charge up. This happened within seconds and the room was quickly filled with a flash of bright light,

What happens to the four of them?

"WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!"

AJ and Rainbow looked around at there situation, trying to remain calm. AJ tried calming her friends "It kay.. caaalm dooown"

YOU MEANIE!"Rainbow didn't get any response though, which triggered massive emotions. Rainbow was a cross between sadness and anger, a full on 1 year old emotion spree.

"WEW!" *sniff* "MEANIE GE HURT!!" *sniff* Rainbow then started shaking Twilight's high chair, by moving the legs. From an outsider's perspective, it looked like she was going to tip Twilight over! AJ felt powerless to stop her, but at the same angry at Twilight.

Twilight quickly became scared from the skakyness of the high chair and wailed herself.

The room was amassed in loud wails and it was at this point that Pinkie came back. What she saw before her was all five of her closest friends as babies, crying at the top of their lungs, except for Rainbow who was angry shaking Twilight's high chair with tears.

Pinkie did the best thing she could think of. She yelled at the top of her lungs "WHAT IS GOING ON?!"

They all heard Pinkie's loud booming voice and turned around. Twilight and the others kept crying, but Rainbow insisted on telling Pinkie what happen.

"PINKIE! PINKIE! TWI-WIGHT! SHE MEANIE! TUR US INTA BABIES!!"

Pinkie was angry with Twilight, but she was even more angry with Rainbow. Twilight was mentally a baby, but Rainbow didn't have such an excuse.

Pinkie picked up the baby blue Pegasus "SO?! WHY WERE YOU SHAKING HER HIGH CHAIR?!! YOU COULD'VE SERIOUSLY INJURED HER! WHAT WERE YOU THINKING?!"

Pinkie's words hit like a train. Rainbow's anger slowly faded into sadness. "Sa-sa-so... *sniff* so... *sniff* WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

Pinkie just sighed. What was she thinking... In the span of 5 seconds, she tried to correct her error, by plucking all the babies with pacifiers.

The room finally was quiet for once. "Now listen everypony, Pinkie is here and I'm gonna take care of you cuties. But, be nice." Pinkie then placed carried them upstairs to the twin room, two at a time. First she took Rarity and Fluttershy, then AJ and RD, and lastly Twilight.

Once they were all in the room, Pinkie expertly changed her tone. "Okie dokie lokie then. Who wants to be the first to get their diapee wiapee."

In response to that AJ, RD, Rarity, and Fluttershy had tears form around their eyelids. "It's okay silly willies. I won't bite. How about you first Rainbow."

Rainbow's tears increased after hearing that. Pinkie just gave a motherly smile. "Awww, there there. Come with me."

Pinkie then laid Rainbow on the changing table and performed a speedy comfy diaper changing. She wiped down Rainbow's flank with a nice cool wipe, followed up with powder, and finally slide a diaper underneath for the final part. "Time to strap you in you cute wittle pegasus you!" Pinkie then completed the process, putting Rainbow on the smooth floor. "Kay, now you go play now, while I get everypony elses diapee wiapees on." Rainbow didn't play though. She just watched. She understandably wasn't in the mood to play with baby toys.

Pinkie then went to Rarity and placed her on the table. However, Pinkie changed it up a bit and removed Rarity's pacifier. "How are you doing Rarity Warity?" The conversation was meant to distract Rarity's attention from the diaper changing. Interestingly, it worked flawlessly.

"Dowin?! Me dowin terwibwy!!"

"Uh huh.. go on" Pinkie said while wiping down Rarity's butt."

"Wha is de-wa to go fwom?! Aw you wisanin ta me?!"

Pinkie powdered Rarity's flank before saying "Rarity, it's okay. This isn't gonna last long, I promise."

Tears slowly formed in Rarity's eyelids. "Wa-weawy?"

Pinkie then finished the diaper changing and hugged Rarity tightly. "Yes Rarity. All you can do now is just sit back and play till this gets all solved."

"Kay.. me gess you wight."

Pinkie just nodded and then placed her and Twilight on the ground. "Twilight meet Rarity, I think you two might like each other. There's baby toys all around for you to play with."

The two had a pause of silence before Rarity spoke up "me sowwy abowt earwia.."

Twilight looked up in surprise "weawy?"

"yes..."

Twilight spoke up. "No, me sowwy. Wet jus pway." The two of them played with blocks and the rest was peachy clean. Rarity was trying to just let live for the time being. Meanwhile, Rainbow just scowled, thinking "how can she apologize? she did nothing!"

Next up was Fluttershy. Pinkie took out Fluttershy's pacifier too and responded playfully, "Hey Fluttershy"

Fluttershy just said "Hey..." She was more concentrated on the diaper changing then the conversation.

After wiping and powdering her down, Pinkie asked "are you alright?"

As Pinkie strapped in the diaper, Fluttershy said "Me no kno.. me na too scared. me fee wike norm-al, actwy."

With that Fluttershy was all strapped down. "Okay wittle one. Well, don't you worry. We'll get you back to grown up age in no time."

Fluttershy timidly responded "Kay..." Then Pinkie placed her near Twilight and Rarity.

"C-can me pway wit you two...?"

Twilight looked into Fluttershy and saw a scared y cat. "Yes! Me wub ya company. You seem nice."

Fluttershy blushed "tank you Twi-wight.. me name is Fwuttashy."

"Nice ya mee ya Fwuttashy!" Twilight then responded with a hug. The two smiled and joined in on the castle building.

Pinkie then picked up AJ and laid her on the changing table. "You alright there AJ?"

AJ didn't focus on Pinkie, but rather the diaper she was about to see.

"Awww, I see, you're worried about the diaper change huh?" AJ just nodded timidly.

"No problem silly, I'll give you a fast one then!"

And just like that Pinkie sped through the diaper changing. She was so fast, AJ was very surprised.

With that Pinkie pulled out AJ's pacifier and joined in the fun.

"C-can I pway wit yaw?"

Twilight was beginning to warm up to the newcomers. (Perhaps because they were her same age and acting kindly.) "Yes! Come pway wit us!"

The only one who wasn't playing now was Rainbow Dash. She was still scowling at her friends and sucking on her pacifier.

Pinkie just laid near her. "Hey, Rainbow, ya wanna play?"

Rainbow took out her pacifier at this point "No!"

"Awww, come on. You'll like it. You know you will."

"No! Sta pit!"

"Oooo, somepony is grumpy wumpy" Pinkie then gave Rainbow a rhasberry.

This got her laughing real quickly and she quickly said "Fi-na! Fi-na! Me pway, jus sta tickwin!"

Pinkie just giggled and showed Rainbow a miniature 'whack-a-mole" game. Rainbow looked at the game confused.

Rainbow rolled her eyes and waited for Pinkie to press a button. After pressing it, the game lit on with music playing. It sounded like an arcade game to some degree.

Rainbow was overwhelmed with excitement, but she tried to keep it in. Of course, Pinkie could tell. Babies were very easy to read for her, especially her friends as babies.

Within seconds Rainbow was immersed in the game. Little did anypony know though that Rainbow started to mentally regress during this game. Something about the game just clicked with her babylike state.

"Turn those frowns upside down!" Pinkie's fake smile quickly faded and only a sigh remained in its place. So, she plucked pacifiers in each of their mouths, forcing them to listen to her.

"Maw! Maw!"

"Wowzers, you sure are a hungry baby waby, aren't ya?! No problemo!" Pinkie then pulled out another two bowls. Little did Pinkie know, that AJ was undergoing the process of mental regression with each spoon.

After those, AJ said "Me stiw hungrwy!"

So... Pinkie pulled out another bowl to Rarity and Flutters dismay. Pinkie was pulling out the first spoon when they all heard "Tanks Cawtaka!!"

Pinkie kept feeding her, but asked "Um.. what did you call me silly?"

"Me say cawtaka! cawtaka!"

Pinkie paused "Um.. AJ, how old are you?"

AJ tilted her little adorable head. "wun, why?"

A wave of silence passed through the room. It was broken by Rarity surprisingly. "YOU GATTA JO-KIN!!!"

The burst noise frightened the daylights out of AJ, who wound up hitting her bowl. Her bowl flung into the air, landing face side down on Rarity's little head. Rarity then burst into wails, followed by AJ, followed by Fluttershy.

Pinkie sighed and did the same old same old. She put pacifiers in their mouths, not before removing the bowl from Rarity's head of course. She then did her best act yet. "Awwww, it's okay. Accident-ies happen!" She then proceeded to carry all of them upstairs to the twin room.

She dropped AJ and Flutters off at the room, with a kiss on the foreheads and went off to the bathroom with Rarity.

Where shall we follow?

Pinkie sighed as she sat Rarity down on the bathroom floor and turned to water on. The white foal looked ready to swallow her pacifier with how hard she was nursing on it. She felt the applesauce as it oozed down her face and back, ruining her precious mane. The fact that she had witnessed two of her friends turn into real babies didn’t help her emotional state and continued to whimper and cry.

Aww. Its ok wittle Warity. Pinkie cooed forcing a smile onto her face. It’s just a little mess. Let Auntie Pinkie clean it right up. So saying the party pony ripped the diaper off and sat Rarity in the warm water. Rarity squeaked and cried harder. Here she was being bathed by one of her best friends. Its ok Rarity. Pinkie soothed just let me handle it. It will all be over soon and you will be all nice and clean again.

Pinkie knew what she was doing and Rarity found herself calming down. Much to her shame she also realized she was enjoying it. Pinkie was soft and gentle with the cloth and when she started to shampoo her mane. It somewhat felt like a spa trip to the unicorn. Seeing this Pinkie risked removing the pacifier, and sighed in relief when the foal stayed quiet. Even Pinkie had limits.

There we go! Pinkie said drying Rarity off. All nice and pretty! Pwetty. The foal cooed. Me wook pwetty. Pwetty pony pwincess. She giggled causing a pit to form in Pinkies stomach. Rarity. How old are you? Wun! She answered proudly causing Pinkies mind to halt for a moment. “Oh no! Now its only me and Flutters left! I like foals and I love my friends but not even I can take care of five foals by myself!” Pinkie thought panicking. Me make pwetty! Rarity declared some of Mrs. Cake’s beauty supplies hovering in her magical grip. Pinkies eyes shrunk to pinpricks.

Several minutes later a mascara and lipstick covered Pinkie plopped Rarity down with the rest of the foals. Rarity hadn’t been happy until her make over was over. Somehow the alabaster foal had managed to get a hold-of some cloths during the makeover. She now wore a pink and gold onesie with frills along the waste making it look like a dress along with a matching pair of hoof socks. The design was eerily similar to her gala dress.

Pwetty! Rarity cooed again before she was distracted by a toy and crawled over to play. Pinkie wiped the makeup off her face with a blank expression, closed her eyes, took a deep breath, and counted to ten. Ok Pinkie. Just a bit longer. Once they calm down you can go get Spike and we can reverse this. She told herself.

Fluttershy? Pinkie asked cautiously walking over. The Pegasus foal looked up at her. Fluttershy. Are you allright? How old are you?

1311221.content:
Pinkie Pie was in a lot of trouble with Mr. and Mrs. Cake. She was supposed to bake 5 dozen cupcakes for them by 3 but she forgot due to her urge to play with the twins, Pound Cake and Pumpkin Cake. They were so cute, she forgot the time. When she looked up at the clock, it was already 2 PM. Squealing, she dashed down to the kitchen, gathering all her necessary supplies.

"Oh no, oh no, oh no! If I don't make these cupcakes soon, Mr. and Mrs. Cake are gonna be super-duper-looper mad at me! But I couldn't have left the babies without a playmate! Oh no! Gotta hurry!" She stuttered all of this, gathering the cupcake ingredients as fast as she could. Little did she know was when she was to grab flour, she grabbed some baby powder.Dousing the mix with this, she finished 5 bowls in half an hour. Evening the bowls into cupcake tins, she then shoved them in the oven for 15 minutes; plenty of time to make them perfect and play more with the twins. She then smiled, singing a tune as she hopped back up the stairs to their room.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------

After 20 minutes, Pinkie Pie had finished decorating all the cupcakes and let them out to cool. Pleased with herself, she took one out and shoved it in her mouth.

"A viktowy kupehkake fo mee!" she said with as mouth full of cupcake. Swallowing the chewed up "goodness", she felt a weird drowsiness overtake her. It felt as if it were a child-like drowsiness. Yawning, Pinkie bounced over to the couch, then lying down, smiling as her eyes drooped shut. "Snug as a... bug..." She then let out a wild snore.

In her head...

Pinkie felt as if she were in a dark room full of emptiness. A void of which she cannot escape. It had the eeriest feeling to it. It also felt oddly... soothing... and... peaceful... almost as if she could let everything go... exactly what happened. Who... am I? she thought. A voice suddenly appeared.

"You are Pinkie Pie... a foal..." Pinkie Pie couldn't help but believe it.

"I am Pinkie Pie... a foal..." She said with a drool.

"You have always been a foal... ever since you were born... 5 months ago..."

"I have always been foal... ever since was born... 5 months go..." The voice made her start to talk strange.

"Your friends are your aunties... Applejack is your mommy..."

"Friends are aunties... Applejack mommy..."

"Such a sweet little foal... you'll grow up to be just like your relatives... your mommy, Big Macintosh, Granny Smith... part of the Apple family..."

She couldn't even talk anymore. She could only babble. What also happened was that she became a foal just by those words. She soon woke up to hear a knock on the door. Who entered was...

"Are you sure Pinkie will have everything?" Mr. Cake asked as the couple opened the door. His wife sighed. "Dear, I know your worried, but when has Pinkie ever let us down?"

The stallion sighed. "Your right, I just still get nervious." Entering the building the couple were immedatly assaulted by the scent of freshbaked cupcakes all laid out on the counter. "See." Mrs. Cake siad a little smugly. "I guess I owe you five bits." Her husband mumered. The mare giggled before frowning.

"Looks like ones missing." She said pointing to the gap in the row of baked goods. Her husband chuckled. "Well, what did you expect honey bun? We left Pinkie alone with sweets. I think we can let Pinkie have one cupcake though, don't you?"

The mare nodded. "I guess. She does do a good job. Pinkie we're back!" She shouted.

When the pink pony didn't come bounding down the stairs the pair shared a concerned look. "Maybe she's just sleeping?" Mr. Cake said hesitantly.

His wife frowned. Something seemed, off. "You check on the twins, I'm going to find Pinkie." Mrs. Cake first checked Pinkies bedrrom and knocked on the bathroom door. Nothing.

Her husband came running up behind her a moment later, his eyes wide and stammering something. "Yes dear, what is it?" Mrs. Cake asked. After aanother few moments of arm flailing and half words Mr. Cake finally managed a word. "Pinkie!" He shouted pointing to the living room of hte building.

Mrs. Cake was off in a flash bursting down the door and gaspign at the sight. Her children were playing with another foal. The pink filly looked around the twins age, give or take a month or two, with a curly poofy mane and big blue eyes.

Seeing the door open the twin turned and immedatly started babbing happily at the sight of their mother. The mare thought was fixed on the new foal who was looking at her with a confused expression as she sucked on a hoof.

Her children actually answered her unspoken question by going back over to the foal. Pin-kie. Pumpkin said happily hugging the foal with her brother making the pink filly giggle happily. The blue mare almsot fainted.

Pinkie for her part was looking at the strange mare. Her new friends knew her, this was their mommy. But she also knew her but how? She vaguely remebered voices and somethng about her own mommy and family, but they were already fading from her baby brain. Somethign about apples. She knew this mare so well but how did she know her?
