13513.content:
In was night in Ponyville, the time when Luna's moon was in the sky and when most ponies were far off into sleep.

Pinkie Pie however, wasn't "most ponies"

Deep within her hidden hideaway in the cellar of Sugercube Corner, Pinkie was busy mixing ingredients into a cauldron so large you would wonder how it fit in. Under most circumstances, especially when baking, Pinkie was a happy-go-lucky mare that always knew how to laugh. Tonight however, Pinkie made no giggling, no singing, no laughing, just dead-serious concentration, for tonight had to be perfect. This was no ordinary baking spree of hers, if she succeeded then she would party like never before, but until then she was serious. "My pastries and desserts are always so good" Pinkie thought to herself "No matter what I do however, I always find somepony who doesn't like what I give them. 'To much sugar' one says, 'Not enough strawberries' another says. Well, soon that won't be a problem." Pinkie always had wanted to make the perfect dessert for parties, however no normal baking recipes ever did the trick. She began to poke around some spell books Twilight had, hoping to find something that could help her. When suddenly, she had found it! A recipe for a potion that (If the book was to be believed) would be able to adjust it's taste to anything's liking! All Pinkie would have to do would be to but it into cake batter and POW: a party treat any and everypony could enjoy. Many of the ingredients were actually common supplies found in any full-stocked kitchen, which Pinkie had access to. She climbed the large cauldron as the heater underneath started to kick in. She climbed to the top, ready to add the final and most difficult ingredient to find. A liquefied mix of a "Want it, Need it" spell and a transformation spell were quite hard to come across, but Pinkie being Pinkie, she had found a way. She knew she had to work fast, she had already poured the batter into the mix and the heater would soon start baking. Staring at the edge of her creaky perch and into the vat, she began to quickly pour the contents of the bottle into it. Pinkie could smell the spell's mixing in with the batter and was half tempted to lean closer and smell deeper, so she did. As she inhale deeply, she realized her work was finished. Pinkie took a deep breath as she realized what she had accomplished. As her pink hair poofed into it's usual curly form, Pinkie began to squeal with delight. "OhdearCelestia,Ididit!Ireallydidit!Theperfecttreatforpartiesandit'sm ineforthemakingandbaking!Imean,notthatmytreatswern'tperfectbeforebutthesewil lblowthemoutofthewater!" Pinkie was so happy and just bouncing around from her success that she didn't notice that the platform she was dancing on was breaking from her movement. In fact, she was partying so much she barely had time to reacting from falling. "Woopise-doodle" was all she had time to say before she fell hooves-first into the vat.

After a few seconds, Pinkie opened her eyes and looked around. All she could see was the pink fruit of her labor all around her. Looking up, Pinkie saw the top of the vat and began to swim for it. No use! The batter was hardining and she could barely move. Believing she was done for, Pinkie opened her mouth so the delicous cake would be inside her. It tasted like cotton candy, her favorite.
13513.title: A baking experiment gone horribly wrong

choices: Throw a "I'm a perfectly tasting cake-pony" party!
135131.content: After a few minutes however, Pinkie noticed she was still alive! In fact, she felt better then she ever had in her whole life! As she bit down on the magic-infused cake, she felt as if she was swimming right through it. Eventually, she managed to leap out of the cauldron as she licked the cake batter off her snout. After a minute however, she didn't seem to have gotten it all off as she could taste it wherever she licked her face. Pulling a mirror out of nowhere (because Pinkie Pie) she looked at herself and noticed something odd. Her pink fur had a white sheen to it and licking it, she found it was frosting! She also found that the more she licked the frosting the more there was. It was almost like her body was making it by itself. Looking at her hoof, Pinkie saw that what was normally the hoof seemed like chocolate! Suddenly, realization hit her like a ton of bricks. "Oh dear Celestia" Pinkie mumbled to herself "I...am....a living cake-pony." Looking back at her hoof, Pinkie decided to experiment with how deep her transformation was. With one quick motion, Pinkie bit her whole hoof off. If she was a normal pony, she'd be screaming in pain like a banshee. Instead however, not only did she not feel pain, but her hoof instantly grew back. Munching on the hoof, Pinkie could taste the caramel-tasting chocolate and a what used to be blood turned into a thick strawberry filling she loved to put in doughnuts. "This is so super-splendiferificly-AMAZING! I taste so perfect! Hmmmm, I wonder if the point of this cake mix is still used? Well, only one way to find out for sure:"

Rainbow Dash pulled the covers off her face and pushed her bedhead out of her eyes. Her mane was messier than it had been in years. She shivered in the cold Winter morning air and shuffled down into her bed. A swirling noise came into her room and flew over to the curtains. Tank pulled open the thick cloudy curtains and the sun shone brightly through the window. Dashie's hooves snapped over her eyes as she tried to blot out the evil rays that were invading her eyesight. But the skies were calling her and she knew she must fly. She reached over to the side of the bed and dragged herself out of bed. Expecting to land lightly on her hooves, it came as a shock to her when she froze in mid air before falling hard on the ground beside her bed. She stood up and looked around. Was her room always this big? She tried to walk around but fell on her face. She dragged herself to a mirror, and froze. Her eyes were round and large. Her mane was messy. She was tiny. She was a FILLY!
"Ahh!" she screamed, her voice high pitched, "I have to get Twilight!"

Fluttershy read the leaflet inside her mind and imagining a doctors voice.

Dear PonyVille.

My name is Rodwin Baron Ludvich, I travel far and vide to many unknown lands searching for ze awnser to infamous cases of inzanity and a mental change in a pony's lifestyle, If you know anyvon zat has been acting strange or vierd zen please take your beloved one to me and I vill see ze problem and fix it (if pozzible.)
Yours truly: Rodwin Baron Ludvich.

P.S: I am not affliated vith ze PonyVille doctors as I solve mental treatment.

Rodwin looked at Sara and he looked at her well, he saw a beautiful Alicorn that was not ready to give up on the fact that she is seeing her husband once again after 9 years, Rodwin started to rise up from the chair and then he slowly stretched out his legs in preperation for walking into the town. Rodwin started to follow her as Sara started to walk at a fast pace but she was always looking behind to make sure Rodwin was following.

"As you have told me, ze child of ours has not retrieved ze cutie mark? and she is 8 years old.. zat is pretty late.." said Rodwin.

"She is being bullied in every school or place she goes to.. she is even mocked on the streets of Canterlot as if she was an abomination.. just because around her age she would have already had her cutie mark.. She recently questioned your whereabouts and... well she is very sad about the whole thing.." said Sara.

Rodwin realized that he was missing from his own family, and without him.. his daughter has not earned the love and respect that she should have got whilst growing up. He felt sick that he didn't know this, he knew that people could be cruel at times although he didn't realize that all of the hatred and prejudice for his daughter took place because he wasn't there to look after her and defend her.

"I.. I didn't know..." said Rodwin.

"Well you do now!" said Sara.

As Rodwin and Sara walked out of the castle courtyard they walked past the gates of the castle and were right in view of Canterlot, the tall wooden buildings and the bright blue sky made the town busy as ever. Several ponies were walking past and they were all busy, although as Rodwin and Sara walked through the giant maze of a town, they noticed the amount of gazing eyes looking at them, like it was just yesterday.

Rodwin and Sara took notice of what was going on, many remembered what happened during the time that Rodwin and Sara stayed her and the infamous murder scene that took place many years before, the busy and lively crowd started to slow down and look at the 2 as they walked down the main street, even chldren were looking at the 2.

"Zat murder wasn't my fault!" Rodwin shouted in the middle of the street, everypony could hear the conversation that they were having.

Roxy was looking at her mother as she noticed a shadow outside the living room, it was a large moving shadow and it was getting closer and closer, Roxy jumped to conclusions and fretted that it was going to be a monster, she started to panic as Sara didn't notice the shadow slowly making shape and turning into a form, the shadow looked like a pegasus and slowly and slowly the shadow got closer as footsteps were heard. Rodwin started to break through his fears and decided to make the best out of every moment that he had to talk to his daughter that he didn't have the chance to talk to all these years.

"Momma! Momma!" Rainbow Dash shouted at the top of her lungs as she started to hide behind Fluttershy whilst crying.

"What in tarnation!? is that Rainbow Dash?!" Applejack shouted.

Rainbow Dash heard the laughter behind Fluttershy, and so she started to cry louder and harder until she dug her head into the soft red pillow unable to stop crying after hearing her friend laugh at her current state.

Rodwin saw what Applejack did to Rainbow Dash only just by crying, he was angry at the southern farmpony as he grabbed her hat off her head and then he walked up to Rainbow Dash.

"Zere, zere child, everything is okay... well atleast for ze most-part." said Rodwin as he was stroking Rainbow Dash's mane softly until she realized that Rodwin was stroking her. She was still crying although not as bad as she was originally. She then hugged Rodwin who didn't let go of her.

choices: she runs into somepony she knows
1412221112112.content:
Dash began to suck on her front hooves and stare at the ceiling, slowly babbling like a baby.
"Oh my goodness," Fluttershy said, "you really think you are a foal. Then that means..." she thought about what foals do. They can't do anything by themselves, eat, walk, use the bathroom...
"Uh oh," Fluttershy said. She'd need some diapers to keep Dash from making a mess. She went into the bathroom, Dash calling "momma?" after her as she left. She grabbed a towel and some safety pins. She put the towel in between Dash's hind legs and pinned it there with the pins to make a makeshift diaper until she got some real ones. Dash giggled at the cloth in between her legs, the sensation tickling her. Fluttershy knew she needed some real foal supplies, and fast.
"There Rainbow, now you won't make a mess everywhere, I hope," she said. "Angle," she called for her pet bunny. He came running into the room ready to help. "Keep an eye on Dash while I run to the store please, that is, if you're not doing anything else right now," she said shyly. Angle stood at attention at the foot of the bed and saluted her. Fluttershy could always count on Angle when she was in a jam.
"OK Dashie," Fluttershy said while holding Dash's hooves and looking into her eyes, "momma's going to the store to get you some foal stuff, I'll only be gone for a moment so just stay here and everything will be ok, ok?" Dash babbled and smiled at her. Fluttershy kissed her on the forehead, grabbed her saddlebag and flew out the window to the store as fast as she could. "Momma? Momma!" Rainbow called after her. "I'll be back soon!" Fluttershy called back. She rushed to the store, grabbing adult diapers, a bottle, pacifier, rattle, baby powder, wipes, whatever she thought she needed as quickly as possible and payed then....
1412221112112.title: Fluttershy gets some baby stuff for little dashie

14122211121121.content:
Fluttershy flew through the window as fast as she could, keeping her balance in check to stop any of her recently bought items from spilling out of her saddlebags. With the proper supplies that any mother would need for a foal, Fluttershy was ready for the upcoming challenge.

Fluttershy slowly positioned herself in front of her bedroom window and slowly flew into her bedroom, it was a clean and dare-say empty room. The bed sheets were perfectly done and the pillows were fluffed perfectly. On the floor lay Rainbow Dash and her pet bunny: Angel. The white bunny rabbit turned around to see that his "Momma" has returned with the items. He was relieved of his to and he didn't need to look after the over-grown foal.

"Hello Angel, how was Rainbow Dash?" Fluttershy politely asked her pet bunny rabbit.

Angel didn't respond, instead he ignored Fluttershy and ran off downstairs to get away from her and Rainbow Dash. Fluttershy raised an eyebrow at the bunny rabbit and wondered what she had said to upset him like that. Rainbow Dash also turned around to see her mother had came back home with new items in her saddle bags.

"Momma!" Rainbow Dash lifted her hooves into the air and waved them from side to side.

"Hello Rainbow Dash, did you behave like an angel for Angel?" Fluttershy asked her best friend.

Rainbow Dash didn't speak, she only nodded up and down.

Fluttershy lowered herself onto her bed and dropped her saddlebags onto her mattress, she then saw that some of the foal items that she bought from town had spilled out, now revealing a large package of Foalz Diapers for Teenage ponies, a blue pacifier, a plain white bib, a large baby bottle, a rattle, diaper powder, a and a small cyan colored blanket.
14122211121121.title: she flies home to dash

choices: there was a knock at the door
141222111211211.content:
Fluttershy took the pacifier and gently put it in Dash's mouth, who started to suckle on it. Fluttershy noticed a small yellow stain on the towel in between Dash's legs.

"Aw, did you have an accident?" she asked.

Dash just smiled at her and continued to suck on the pacifier. Fluttershy undid the pins on the towel and tossed it into a trash can. She got the wipes, powder and diapers off of the bed. She wiped Dash thoroughly and placed a fresh diaper under her. She then applied a little baby powder and pulled the diaper in between her legs and secured the tapes.

"There, all done," she said to Dash.

Dash giggled and wiggled around in her new garment, her foalish mind enjoying the new sensation. Fluttershy felt awfully weird treating her friend like this. Rainbow Dash would be so embarrassed if she knew how she was acting, and Fluttershy wanted to get her better as soon as possible. But she was kind of cute acting like this. Fluttershy would help her make the best of the situation.

"Are you hungry Dashie?" She asked. Dash looked up at her with happy eyes, understanding the prospect of food, and nodded.

"Lets get you something to eat," Fluttershy said as she helped Dash stand up. Dash could hardly walk straight, she waddled from side to side like a little foal. Fluttershy flew above her and guided her out of the bedroom.

"Now careful, not too far to the left, don't hurt yourself, ok past the table," Fluttershy tried to direct Rainbow down the hall to keep her from bumping into anything. Dash just giggled at how silly her mommy was being. They finally reached the stairs to the living room. Dash put one hoof out to go down the stairs but immediately slipped and almost tumbled down.

"Eep!" Fluttershy gasped as she grabbed Dash by the shoulders to steady her. "Maybe I'll just carry you down the stairs, ok?" she asked Dash. Rainbow smiled and babbled a bit. Fluttershy scooped Rainbow up in her front legs and flew down the stairs with her.

"Oh my, you're, ugh, a teasny bit, oof, heavy Dashie," she said as she struggled to carry Rainbow down the stairs. Rainbow stared up at her with happy bright eyes full of love for her mommy. Fluttershy finally set her down in a kitchen chair with arms. She didn't have a highchair, there probably wasn't any in Equestria that could fit Rainbow Dash anyway, so she'd have to improvise. Fluttershy took a towel and wrapped it around Dash's waist and then tied it off around the back of the chair so she wouldn't fall out.

"Arms up Dashie," She said to Rainbow and she held her arms up in the air in front of her. Rainbow Dash copied her mommy and Fluttershy slid the chair up to the kitchen table until it was just an inch away from Dash's belly. With the arms on the chair under the table, Rainbow Dash was secure as if she was in a high chair.

"Now sit tight Dashie, momma will be back in a second," Fluttershy said as she flew upstairs. She retrieved the bottle, bib and rattle from the bed and flew back downstairs where Dash was still waving her arms in the air.

"Here Dashie, play with this while I get some food ready," Fluttershy said and she handed Dash the rattle and tied the bib around her neck. Dash shook the rattle with a fascinated look on her face. Fluttershy flew got some milk from the fridge and put it in a pan. She put the pan on the stove over low heat to heat it up a little. She then took some carrots, apples, pears, peas and ground them up separately in a food processor. Dash had adult teeth, but Fluttershy didn't want to risk having her choke. She was careful to try and keep the foods separate from each other in order to keep the flavors from mixing and becoming bad tastes. She eventually had four little bowls of mashed up food to feed Dash. She didn't know which ones she'd like but she had plenty to try. Fluttershy brought the food over to the table where Dash was sliding the rattle across the table and watching it bounce along.

"Ok Rainbow Dash, how about some nice carrots?" asked Fluttershy as she held up a spoonful of mashed carrots. Dash dropped the rattle and held her mouth open. She fed Dash the carrots, apples, pears and peas. Rainbow ate happily, food falling out of her mouth every so often which would always illicit a giggle from her and Fluttershy. Dash polished off all four bowls of food.

"Wow, you must have really been hungry," Fluttershy said. She cleaned up Dash's face with a wash cloth then headed over to the stove to get the milk. It was just the right temperature. She filled the bottle up and screwed on the nipple. She flew over to Dash with the bottle who was eagerly awaiting it. Dash held her arms up and reached for it.

"Ah, ah, baba, baba," she said. Fluttershy smiled and held the bottle to her lips. Rainbow grabbed it and immediately began to suckle. As she drank Fluttershy undid the towle behind her and slid the chair back. She then picked up Rainbow with her bottle and flew over to the couch with her in hoof. She sat on the couch cradling Rainbow as she drank. Fluttershy ran her hoof through Rainbow's mane and stroked her belly. Rainbow drank happily making cute little sucking sounds and muffled content vocalizations.

"You're so cute," said Fluttershy down to her baby. Fluttershy loved taking care of her, but she knew that if Rainbow stayed like this, she could never fly and pursue her dreams again. Fluttershy was going to get help soon, as soon as she found a way to either get someone to go for help or take Rainbow to help without anypony seeing her. When Rainbow had finished she continued to suckle on the bottle for more. Fluttershy took it out of her mouth and Rainbow still made the suckling motion with her lips. Fluttershy placed the pacifier back in her mouth and Rainbow sucked happily staring back up at her mother. Fluttershy stared back eyes full of love when...

"Who could that be?" said Fluttershy, somewhat fearful it could be someone who shouldn't see Rainbow Dash like this. But then she heard...

14122211121121111.content:
"Fluttershy, you in there?" said a familiar voice with a southern accent.

"Oh thank goodness," Fluttershy said with relief. She set Dash down on the couch and walked over to the door. She opened it to see Applejack with some saddle bags on her back filled with fruits and veggies.

"Howdy Fluttershy," Applejack said, "I've got the produce you asked for."

"Oh thank goodness your here," Fluttershy said.

"Why? Somethin the matter?" Applejack asked with concern. Fluttershy then did her best to explain what had happened.

"Wait wait wait, what do you mean 'acting like a foal'?" Applejack asked.

"I mean she thinks she's a baby and I'm her mother," Fluttershy said. Applejack paused before bursting out into laughter. Just imagining Dash acting like a big baby seemed like a joke. Fluttershy frowned and Applejack saw that she wasn't kidding.

"You're serious?" AJ asked, "How in the hay is that even possible?"

"Well, see for yourself," Fluttershy said and she stepped aside to allow AJ in. AJ walked in to see Rainbow Dash on the couch wearing a diaper and sucking on a pacifier. Her jaw dropped at the sight.

"What the hay? Rainbow? Rainbow what's goin on?" AJ asked, stepping closer to Rainbow. Rainbow looked up at her and smiled.

"Aunty," Dash said, "Aunty AppwelJawck!" She reached her arms out to hug her. Applejack reflexively returned the hug, feeling a mix of joy at holding her friend and fear for what had happened to her.

"Wha... what are we gonna do 'shy?" Applejack asked as Rainbow held onto her.

"I don't know," Fluttershy replied, "I can't leave her alone, she's completely helpless. I left to go to the store for five minutes and even that was risky. We need to get help or to get her to help."

"Well we sure as hay can't tote her around town like this, it'll be humiliatin for her," Applejack replied. They both pondered the situation until....
14122211121121111.title: Applejack outside

141222111211211111.content:
"Ah'll go get Twi," said Applejack, "she'll probably have a book or somethin that can help Rainbow. You stay here and take care of her." Fluttershy nodded in agreement.

"Thank you so much Applejack, I don't know what I would have done if you hadn't come along," said Fluttershy. Applejack got up and patted Rainbow on the head.

"Now just sit tight Rainbow," AJ said, "I'll be back with Twilight in a few minutes and we'll get you all fixed up OK?" Rainbow Dash just stared up at her smiling behind her pacifier.

"Ya know, yer perdy darn cute like this Dashie," said AJ. Then a foul sent filled the air. Applejack and Fluttershy recoiled in disgust, knowing that Rainbow was the source of the smell.

"Maybe not that cute," Applejack said with a hoof over her nose. "Ah'm off to get Twi, you best tend to her Fluttershy. I'll be back in a jiffy," and with that, AJ left to get help. Fluttershy stared at Rainbow who was starting to notice the mess she made. The feeling was not comfortable and Rainbow began to tear up.

"Changie, diapie changie!" she said to Fluttershy. Upon seeing Dash upset, Fluttershy's disgust disappeared and her motherly instincts kicked in.

"Aw, did you make a messy little Dashie?" She said. Rainbow nodded, still teary eyed. "Then lets get you all cleaned up," Fluttershy responded warmly. She picked Rainbow up off the couch and carried her upstairs to the bedroom. Fluttershy laid a large towel out on the bed and set Rainbow down on it. She then got the Foalz diaper pack, baby wipes, diaper rash cream and baby powder ready. Fluttershy hesitated a bit before undoing the diaper, but then she saw Dash's teary eyes and discomfort and all doubt went away. She undid the dirty diaper and slipped it out from under Rainbow, careful not to get any mess on her beautiful rainbow tail. She wadded up the diaper and threw it in the trash bin. She then wiped Dash thoroughly making sure that she was completely clean. Rainbow relished the feeling of being cleansed by her mother, her anxiety lifting away with each wipe. Fluttershy then applied a little diaper rash cream to help keep Rainbow comfortable. She then slid a fresh diaper under Rainbow's bottom and dusted her with a little baby powder. Finally she slid the diaper in between her legs and secured the tapes. Fluttershy then quickly ran to the bathroom to wash her hooves off, then she returned to Rainbow.

"There, all better," she said. Rainbow padded her new diaper with her front hooves, making in crinkle. "You were such a good girl Dashie, lets go back downstairs and you can play with some more toys." Fluttershy picked up the now elated Rainbow Dash. She recognized the word "toys" and knew that it meant fun for her. Fluttershy flew her downstairs and set her on the living room floor. She got Rainbow's rattle, a stuffed bunny and a couple of building blocks she had around for when she foal sat. Rainbow giggle with joy at the toys, grabbing the stuffed bunny and cuddling it agains her chest. Fluttershy beamed at her cuteness. She didn't want to get too used to this though, because Rainbow Dash needed her old life back. She couldn't stay a baby forever. But while she was, Fluttershy could enjoy it.There was a knock at the door and Fluttershy rushed to it and opened it.

"Oh, thank goodness you're back," she said. Outside the door stood...
141222111211211111.title: Applejack decides to go get Twilight

choices: Fluttershy tells them about the bump on her head.
1412221112112111111.content:
"Oh, thank goodness. You're back." Fluttershy raised her hoof up to her forehead and wiped off droplets of sweat that worked their way down her body.

"Hello Fluttershy, Applejack told me that you needed to see me." Twilight stood in the doorway with Applejack standing next to the Unicorn, she didn't want to explain what the situation was. Twilight had to see what become of Rainbow Dash.

"Yes I need your help..." Fluttershy blushed, she covered her face up with one of her hooves.

"Whatever the problem is, I will try my best to help. So... what's the problem?" Twilight asked Fluttershy.

"Could you please come inside and I'll show you..." Fluttershy moved out of the way allowing Twilight and Applejack to enter Fluttershy's cottage, they both heard strange gurgling sounds and squeals of joy.

"Are you foal-sitting Fluttershy?" Twilight asked Fluttershy as she walked into the cottage.

"Uhh... yes... and no..." Fluttershy couldn't make up her mind.

Twilight walked through the cottage to hear the gurgling and the giggling had gotten louder as she moved closer to the living room couch, she slowly turned herself and circled around the couch to see a patch of blue fur in front of the couch. Twilight moved out of the way to get a better look and she found the source of the gurgling and the giggling. Rainbow Dash.

The poor little foal was sitting down in front of the couch tightly holding the teddy bear she was given. She had pacifier in her mouth and she started to suckle it loudly. Twilight's mouth dropped wide open and her pupils shrinked to the size of peas, her ears drooped downwards and her tail was up in the air. Twilight couldn't help but start to laugh at the sight before her.

"Bwa-bwa..." Rainbow Dash turned to see a purple unicorn standing behind her, for some reason she did not know the unicorn was laughing pretty hard. Rainbow Dash started to join in on the fun and crawl over to the purple unicorn. However Twilight moved back when Rainbow Dash tried to get near.

"Rainbow Dash is so adorable!" Twilight giggled out loud. She trotted over to the overgrown foal and patted her on the head which seemed to cause Rainbow Dash to smile. She loved the attention.

"Well Twi' is there a way of fixin' Rainbow Dash? Ah'm guessin' there is some magic spell or a potion or somethin' that'll work on her." Applejack trotted up next to the unicorn and asked her about the many possibilities to fix Rainbow Dash.

"I don't know Applejack, I'll go back to the library and bring back a couple of spell books. But we first need to know how this happened to Rainbow Dash, she didn't turn into this in just a few seconds that's for sure." Twilight said.
1412221112112111111.title: Applejack and Twilight

choices: Rainbow Dash starts to cry and Fluttershy calms her down
14122211121121111111.content:
"How d'ya think Rainbow Dash started to act like this? Ah' mean, she ain't actin' an' ah' don' think she would do that..." Applejack reached up and scratched her head with her hoof, confused at the situation.

"I don't sense any magical spells being used on her, so it can't be magic." Twilight added in.

"What about you Fluttershy?" Applejack turned around to look at Fluttershy, seeing that she had moved and was tending to Rainbow's needs.

Fluttershy stopped what she was doing and looked up at Applejack and Twilight, feeling a little embarrassed that she didn't tell them at the start of all of this.

"Well... uh, when I found Rainbow Dash... she uhh... was lying on the ground outside asleep... but she had a large bump on her head... so I took her in and when she woke up... she started to act like this..." Fluttershy blushed a little.

"Y'mean where that little bandage is?" Applejack pointed at Rainbow Dash's head.

"Yes." Fluttershy nodded.

"Is it okay if we see it?" Twilight asked Fluttershy.

"Uhh... I don't know if Rainbow Dash would like that..." Fluttershy turned her head towards Rainbow Dash to see that she had picked up her own pacifier and put it in her mouth, she gurgled loudly to the ponies around her and she noticed that the purple pony was getting closer to her.

"Hello little Rainbow Dash." Twilight craned her head down and smiled at Rainbow Dash.

Rainbow Dash spat out her pacifier, letting it fall to the ground.

"Hewo..." Rainbow Dash tried to wave to the purple unicorn.

"How are you today?" Twilight asked.

"Ba-ba!" Rainbow Dash gurgled.

"Oh really?" Twilight lifted her head back up, acting surprised. Pretending to play along with Rainbow Dash. Fluttershy and Applejack looked at each other for a moment not knowing what Twilight was going to do.

Rainbow Dash nodded up and down and started to burst into a random fit of laughter, she fall on her backside and kicked her legs up into the air. Twilight watched as Rainbow Dash was now distracted, she concentrated on her levitation spell and used her magic to focus on the bandage that was plastered on the top of Rainbow's forehead. It slowly started to glow a bright purple and it started to peel itself off without causing any pain to Rainbow Dash.

The bandage levitated into the air and floating above Rainbow Dash, the adult-foal stopped laughing for a moment and saw a purple glowing object right above her slowly levitating towards the purple pony.

"Oooooh..." Rainbow Dash blurted out.

Rainbow Dash was on her backside, but she found it very hard get back up. She didn't know how to use her legs properly and she wasn't able to get up, she wanted to see what the purple glowing object was and she wasn't able to.
14122211121121111111.title: Fluttershy tells them about the bump on her head.

141222111211211111111.content:
Suddenly, the trio of girls heard little whimpers coming from the regressed pegasus. They looked over to see Rainbow's eyes watering up as she tried to reach the sparkling bandage above her. The whimpers grew into whines, which grew into a cry, which grew into outright bawling!

"WH-WHA-WAAAAAAA! WAAAA-HAAAA!" she wailed, kicking her hooves in her tantrum. Fluttershy gasped, struggling to hold her flailing friend.

"Oh dear! What's wrong, Dashie? What's wrong?" she asked, trying to sooth Rainbow Dash.

"Oh no, did I hurt her? If I did, I'm so sorry!" cried Twilight, looking at the red, swollen bump on Rainbow's head.

Applejack, while taken aback by Rainbow's outburst, noticed her futile efforts to reach the twinkling bandages that were being suspended above her.

"Oh, Ah think Ah know what she wants, sugarcube." She points up to the bandages. "Dash likes that little lightshow yer doin' with yer magic, Twilight." The unicorn noticed this, and everything became clear. Before she could levitate the object down to Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy stopped her.

"Wait, Twilight! She may be an adult, but she could still hurt herself by strangling herself in the bandages because of her injury. Maybe you could use something else."

14122212.content:
“Ok, now you gotta watch this!” Called the sky blue mare with the prismatic mane a few dozen feet in the air. The violet alicorn rolled her purple eyes below her.
“You’ve shown me nearly everything Rainbow Dash!” She called up to her friend, recalling the various loop-de-loops, barrel rolls, spins, dives, twists and turns the daredevil pegasus already showed her.
“Not everything!” And with that the prismatic mare flew higher into the partly cloudy sky. A part of her doing that the weather was so nice today. The fall had just begun and already the air was feeling crisp and cool. Smirking, Rainbow Dash soared through the sky, showing off yet another of her tricks to one of her friends. This time, she was sure she would make it into the Wonderbolts! This was better than the sonic rainboom she was sure of it!
Twilight Sparkle, new alicorn princess, watched on as her friend spiraled high up into the air until the only thing that set her apart from the sky was her multicolored mane. She watched as Rainbow Dash zoomed across the sky, collecting a few of the scattered clouds in her wake, she circled pulling them tighter until they were one huge cloud.
Twilight knew from her studies of weather patterns that this accumulation of water vapor causes friction and can create a storm cloud. Rainbow Dash knew this too as she formed a bigger storm cloud. It was entirely in her control as she soared higher, leaving the cloud at a reasonable altitude. She pushed herself higher into the troposphere. Twilight bit her lip, her stomach dropping at the sight of her friend so high up beyond the clouds. From extensive study, Twilight knew that the higher one goes into the atmosphere, the thinner and colder the air gets. However, she also knew that pegasi were adapted to flying at high altitudes. Just how high, no pony knew.
Twilight saw her friend hesitate for a split second before changing direction and plummeting towards the ground. Twilight felt her heart start to beat faster as Rainbow Dash gained speed; on the threshold of a Sonic Rainboom she hit the storm cloud waiting in her wake. The result was spectacular.
Rainbow lightning shot from the cloud in all directions. It was absolutely marvelous and blinding. Streaks of red, yellow, orange, blue, green and purple danced across the sky in what Twilight assumed was a five-mile radius. It was spectacular and she watched with her mouth agape. It took only seconds to realize that the mare responsible for the beautiful light show was nowhere to be seen. Panic crept into the young alicorn as she searched the sky for her friend. She couldn’t see anything.
Shakily, still not used to her new wings, Twilight Sparkle took to the air to look for her friend. “No, no, no, no, no…” Twilight murmured to herself as she scanned the sky and ground.
Suddenly, below her was a speck of blue and rainbow clashing against the green grass of an open field. She bolted towards the ground. Getting close enough to teleport she appeared at Rainbow’s side.
The sight before her was one she will forever wish to get out of her mind. Rainbow laid on the ground. A dark red pool beneath her, her head was gashed and dripping blood. Her legs were badly broken and her wings…Twilight couldn’t look at them without wanting to vomit. Her mind went into overdrive. She had to get Rainbow Dash to the hospital. But her training grounds were a good few miles away from Ponyville. Twilight had to think fast.
14122212.title: Toddler(3-5)

141222121.content:
Once she saw the small town and the hospital in the distance she felt relief wash over her. She was close enough to teleport. She touched down just outside the village and gently placed Rainbow on the ground. Since her magic wasn’t strong enough to hold the pegasus and teleport them at the same time. She quickly conjured the spell and the two disappeared with a “pop” only to appear inside the hospital waiting room with another “pop”.

Everypony in the waiting room jerked back with shock as the lavender alicorn appeared out of thin air with her mangled, badly bleeding and barely breathing friend in tow.

“She needs help!” Twilight demanded. Immediately two nurses were on the spot and with magical help, lifted Rainbow Dash onto a stretcher and whisked her away. Leaving Twilight Sparkle alone in the waiting room with one thought on her mind. Now she had to tell her friends about all this.
141222121.title: Take her to the hospital

Four lines of text, scattered across multiple scrolls, was hardly a detailed description of much of anything, but it was all she had to go on.

choices: Play along with the "Dream" (it's not a dream...)
143332221.content:
Waking up to an alarm clock, is an unpleasant experience. Waking up to one when you know for a fact you've never owned one in your life, doubly so. Waking up to that, on your day off... you get the idea. So as you can probably imagine Rainbow Dash was more than a little hesitant to get out of bed. Instead opting to swat the offending device into the wall with a hoof, where it was now lodged and while muffled, no less annoying. Grumbling, she finally dragged herself out from beneath the covers.
          Finally opening her eyes, the first thing she she noticed, was that her mane was in desperate need of being brushed, as one tangled yellow lock was dangling in front of her eye. It was actually kind of funny, it was messy enough to pass for pinkie's usual style. Blinking a few times to clear her vision, the second thing she noticed was that this was not her cloud-house. Sure it was built out of clouds, and there was enough Wonderbolt-ish stuff lying around, but the architecture was all wrong. That much was made clear when the door that should have been the washroom, instead led to a hallway.
          "About time you got up. Straighten your mane and get your suit on, Soarin wants to try the new maneuver this morning." An all too familiar voice called out. Immediately, Dash was alert. Spitfire had just told her to put on her uniform so she could go flying with her and Soarin? This could mean only one thing.

         "Best. Dream. Ever." She whispered to herself, caught up in the moment, and hardly moving, much to Spitfire's annoyance.

         "Come on Surprise, quit dawdling and get ready!"
143332221.title: Surprise, Surprise, there's a Rainbow in disguise.

151131.content:
There was something odd about the glittering green gem, but that didn't change the fact that it would look flawless when paired with something with silver trim.

The moon shone through the windows of the Carousel Boutique, illuminating the floor as well as the white-coated pony who stood upon it. Rarity was working late, which was not an uncommon occurrence. She'd found a remarkable gem earlier, and she had been struck with a flash of inspiration. She'd gone through numerous designs, and was now assembling the dress. It was a slimmer piece, white with silver on the edges and strings of angular green gems running down the back. The focal point of the design was to be the gem that had inspired it, set into a broach. Rarity lifted the gem into the air with her magic, and as she held it in place over the dress, it positively gleamed in the moonlight.

With the piece now complete, Rarity lifted it from the dress form. She preferred having other ponies model her clothes so that she could get a more objective look, but she didn't want to wait until morning, and she doubted anyone was awake at this late hour. Except maybe Pinkie, but this shade of green would clash horribly on her. So Rarity put the dress on herself.

In a flash, Rarity changed. Where a mare had been moments before, a filly now stood, blinking in surprise. The dress had changed wit her, and in good news, it fit perfectly.

The question now was, how did Rarity feel about all this?

It wasn't often Rarity withdrew magic books from Twilight's library, but this one had caught her eye. Or at least, one specific page.

“A potion to accentuate a pony's beauty? How wonderful!”

Skipping over entirely too many paragraphs of warnings and disclaimers, Rarity glanced at the effect, the ingredients and the recipes, surprised at how simple it appeared.

The ingredients were mostly a few plants that weren't that hard to find, and traces of some uncommon gems Rarity had no trouble finding.

She read the instructions carefully and before long was done, producing a glow gold potion, matching the illustration, a sweat smell wafting off it.

“Well it looks like I did everything right.” Rarity smiled to herself. “Bottom's up”

She drank the liquid and immediately felt invigorated, racing to the mirror for any signs of a change.

“Nothing? Did I-” Rarity stopped, suddenly feeling a charge running through her. Her mane stretched out, falling behind her and reaching around her cheeks like a scarf, , her fur suddenly seemed fuller and healthier, and her face, couldn't put her finger on it but her eyes and features stood out more, and there was something about them that drew her eyes.

“Wonderful!” She said.

Looking down she noticed she was a little taller, and her body shape was closer to Fleur, a pony she had always envied.

“I have to show everypony!” Rarity skipped out her workshop to do just that.

They dug for gems, Rarity quickly noticing her larger size and claws were well suited for digging, and she dug almost as well as any Diamond Dog, and soon dug up a horde of gems twice as large as Spike.

Rarity was delighted.

"I've never found so many gems so quickly!"

Spike smiled to. Rarity lay down and stretched out, then passed several gems to Spike. Spike eagerly dug in, but Rarity looked warily at a saphire that caught her eye.

"How am I suppose to eat this?"

"Just put it in your mouth and chew, your teeth are strong enough." Spike gestured.

"Are you sure?"

"Yes. I do it all the time!" Spike chewed into a gem to demonstrate.

Rarity was still uncertain.

"I can't imagine a gem would taste particularly good now.. and would something I found in the ground really be safe to eat?"

"We're dragons our bodies our designed to take it. You've never seen me get sick from it, right?"

"I suppose."

Rarity dusted off the gem with her tail and cautiously put in her mouth, touching it with her teeth before biting in. She was surprised at the ease in which it broke in her mouth, and then the blast of taste. The gem was so sweet, so textured.. she could feel every facet, as though it was a gormet dish, carefully prepared just for her. She let out an involuntary purr before swallowing."

Spike smiled back.

"See? I told you you would like it."

"Yes, very much so!" She took another and ate it quickly, just enough to feel its taste, happily humming again."

"What did I tell you? Being a dragon is great."

"You shouldn't have force this on me! How am I supposed to live in Ponyville now?"

"Where did you even get that necklace anyway?"

"Some trader wandered into town and wandered out! I just bought it because it was pretty and I hoped you would like it! It was like the necklace called out to me or something!"

Rarity studied him, a serious look on her face, while the young dragon shivered nervously. After several moments, Rarity's face suddenly softened.

"Ok... I believe you. Of course you wouldn't do something like this on purpose." She pinched his cheeks affectionately. "I'm sorry I was so angry at you... while theirs several things I like about being a dragon, how am I going to live in Ponyville looking like a monster? Will I ever get to make a dress?"

Spike scratched his chin for a few seconds, before his face lit up.

"Wait, Twilight!"

"Hmm.. that could work, though even with a Princess on my side ponies would have a hard time accepting me."

"Ok she'll probably freak out, but we'll show her your still you! Then she'll see! I mean once she knows your still the same pony she won't care that your a dragon!"

"I hope your right.."

Twilight spread word across Ponyville that was she holding a Princess conference and asked everypony to meet her outside her treehouse. She borrowed a podium from Mayor Mare, and prepared a speech, Spike standing at her side..

"Thank you for coming everypony." She shifted through her cards, while still keeping her eyes on the audience. "I have called you here, to let you know there is no need for anypony to be afraid. Something strange has happened to one of us, the former bearers of the Elements of Harmony, but she is still the same pony she's always been. Her appearance has changed, but her personality and nature has not, and I swear as a Princess of Equestria she has no despite to and WILL NOT harm anypony, she merely wishes to resume the life she had before, so no matter how fearsome her outward appearance may seem, you do not need to be afraid!"

Twilight tried gauge the audience's reactions, though all she could hear was silence, and all she could see was trepidation. SHe shifted through her cards, realizing she hadn't prepared one for this moment

"So uhhh... no matter how scary she looks, don't be scared, ok?"

She was greeted with more silence.

"Ok, Rarity come on out!"

Rarity, who had be curled up behind the tree house, cautiously flew towards the podium.

Predictably many of the crowdponies turned and ran, but Twilight was prepared, raising a magic barrier around the area. It wasn't as large or strong as one of her brother's, but she was sure it would suffice.

Rarity was saddened, and a little angered by ponies continual fear of her, place her hands on her hips.

"Look here! Yes I'm a big white dragon, but I'm RARITY! I'm not some brute! And no, I do not eat, nor will I ever eat ponies, we dragons can eat the same things you eat! Or gems... delicious gems.." Her mouth watered a little, before she became aware of herself and wiped. "I'm still the same pony and dress maker I was before."

Much of the crowd remained unconvinced.. Rarity dived down and flew over and around them, close enough to grab them if she wanted to. She spun around over thier heads, many ponies hitting the ground, knowing they couldn't escape. After demonstrating she could get them, but meant no harm, Rarity flew back towards Twilight.

"See? I'm not going to hurt anypony! And I'm still one of the pony who's helped save your flanks I don't know how many time!"

Spike stroked her as she lowered herself, hovering just off the ground.

"Yeah, she wouldn't hurt any of you! I can't believe your all treating her like some kind of monster! She's still the same beautiful and wonderful Rarity."

Rarity smiled and kiss the dragon on the cheek. It was just a small peck, but enough to light his cheeks up.

"Thank you spike."

The crowd did seem less agitated, many finally daring to face her

The young couple took great pleasure decorating their new home and enjoyed hunting for gems together, but still made time for their friends, as though nothing had changed. Rarity did not give up her love of dressmaking, though always made sure to make time for others.

But things do change. To Rarity's delight, Spike grew into one hunk of a dragon. The two dug, extending the cave to accommodate both them, and the numerous offspring they would conceive.

They were sad to see many of their friends and family pass away, though still had Twilight and made other friends, the dragon couple becoming quite familiar to Ponyville, as its guardians and friends.

Rarity awoke, her head feeling heavy and strange.

"Ugh I must have overslept it feels like I've been sleeping for years."

Her blurry eyes flickered open and she immediately realised she wasn't in carosal botique. Rarity gasped, inspecting her strange surrondings. Apparently she was in a cave, though their was something strangely elegent about the shape of this save, , and it was decoarted with an elbarate pattern of gems. All around her were gems, though they were smaller than she would expect. She removed her hoof from her head, realing as she noticed itwas a claw., and her leg was certainly not that of a pony.

"What happened to me?!" She shrieked. Even her vice was different. Louder, deeper, yet still maintinag a certain lady like quality.

She paced around frantically, before noticing the clear, reflective surfaces reflected the image of a great white dragon! Rarity whirled round to face the beast, before the horrible realization dawned on her. She was the beast!

"How could this happened to me!"

She looked at her reflection again. She was a large adult dragon, though it was difficult to ascertain her size her, though thinner and slenderer than she was expect one to be, with a gem like array of blue spikes and well sized white wings.

"Hmmm as dragons go, I don't look half bad. What am I saying? I must get to Twilight and have her fix me at once!"

She crawled out the cave, briefly blinded by the sunlight and took to the air, lifting herself with her powerful wings. She was surprised how smooth her take off was, it took a while to raise her new bulk but she was unexpectedly comfortable in the air.

"Strange... apparently I know how to fly. Maybe its from the last time I had wings or maybe its something about being a dragon." Lifting herself higher into the sky allowed her to get a wider view of the landscape. this area felt somewhat familiar to her and she had an idea what direction Ponyville might lie, stil unsure if this was a memory or buried dragon instinct.

I hope my friends still recognize me....

When she reached Ponyville.

Rarity woke up and realised she wasn't in her bed, or even her bedroom. She didn't know where she was, but the room she was in was much larger and grander, richly furnished with the finest money could buy. She stared in admiration before asking herself the obvious question.

“Where am I?”

Nopony was around to answer her. She cautiously stepped out of bed, noticing something else was off, but unable to put her hoof on it. She left through the marvelously crafted double doors and found herself in the palace doorway.

“How in Equestria did I get here?!”

Rarity slowly walked through the hall, looking around in the hopes something could giver her a clue about how she got here. As she turned a corridor she crashed into two armored pegasi. Realizing her mistake she quickly stood, noticing that for some reason she was taller than they were. She placed a hoof to her mouth and her cheeks reddened. Oh no, am I in trouble?

To her further surprise the guards looked extremely flustered, and immediately prostrated themselves before her.

“E-e-excuse me your majesty!”

Rarity pulled her head back and stared blankly ahead.

“Your majesty? Their must be some mistake?”

The guards shivered.

“W-what mistake could we have made Princess Rarity? W-w-we didn't mean to crash into you.”

“PRINCESS?!”

They backed away and gaped at her, though still remained bent down and shivered.

Rarity's mouth shivered, no words coming out at it, until she shut it and spoke again.

“I'm no Princess! I'm flattered you could mistake me for one but really the idea is absurd....”

“B-but your majesty” The guard pointed at Rairty's side. She looked down and saw that somehow she had grown a pair of large feathery wings, much like Celestia's. And on a second glance, her body was larger yet slimmer, becoming closer in shape to Celestia's. She stretched them out and inspected them

“This is magnificent! But I have no idea how it could have happened..”

“You have always been our Princess, your majesty.”

Rarity tilted her head, noticing now she had a longer neck.

“Really? What happened to Celestia and Luna?”

The guards looked at each other blankly then Rarity.”

“Who? We have never heard of those ponies, your majesty.”

“How can this be? I thought everypony knew of Celestia and Luna! How else does the sun rise and set?”

They looked at her like she was crazy, but also seemed afraid to even think it. Do they think I am an "off with their heads" kind of princess?

“They rise on there own, your majesty.”

“Really?”

They cautiously nodded, unsure what to make of this.

“Oh never mind, carry on.” Rarity gestured for them to stand up.

“We-we're not in trouble?”

“Of course not, though you really should watch where you walk.”

They lowered their heads.

“Yes Princess Rarity!”

Rarity walked past them.

“Princes Rarity? That does has a certain ring to it...” She smiled to herself then looked serious. “But I should really fine out where the real Princesses went and how I wound up here.

She headed downstairs and went through the hall. A chef pony stopped her.

“Ah miss rarity, your breakfast is ready. Soufflé and truffles.” He held up a luxuriously decorated plate.

“Oh my. That does look good.” Well maybe I can enjoy this a little longer....

151322222211.content: Rarity looked at the gems she and Spike had found so far, gleaming with pride. While she was not one to be greedy, she was proud of the haul she was making. While taking a detour to their usual gem hunting field, the magic that led Rarity to gems suddenly had her going off in the direction of this rocky outcropping. While this place strangely wasn't on the map Spike took from Twilight, this place was rich with gemstones. However, while Rarity was proud of finding this place, Spike couldn't help but feel nervous. It was bad enough this place wasn't on one of the maps owned by one of Equestria's smartest magic users, but there was an unusual feeling about this place. Sure the gems here were the tastiest looking ones he ever saw, but it just didn't feel right. Spike's fears would have been for nothing if he wasn't so deep in thought that he didn't see where he was going. As it was Spike found himself tripping on something as Rarity ran to him with a worried look. "Oh my dear Spikey-Wikey, are you..... oh my." Rarity stopped as she looked at what Spike had tripped on. Sticking out of the ground was the rounded edge of what appeared to be a white crystal. Using her magic to pull it out however, it appeared that the gem also had black splotches in it's coloring. As Rarity examined the beautiful crystal, it began to glow as if reacting to her presence.
151322222211.title: Searching for gems with Spike

Rarity tossed it onto the cart with the others as the two continued looking. Looking at the sun's position, Rarity decided it was time to start heading home. "Alright Spike darling I suppose we should...." By that time, Spike was already starting to leave and just waiting for Rarity to catch up.

Having something important to do with Twilight (At least she said it was important.)Spike simply gave Rarity a hug and left her to sort out gems they had collected. "Sapphire.....sapphire......emerald.....ruby.......crystal." Suddenly, she stopped and looked again. It was the same black and white crystal from before. It seemed almost as if it was glowing even brighter then before and the black splotches moved around. "I'm certainly planning on this being used for something special..... maybe if Applejack needs another dress." Rarity kept staring at the gem as it glowed brighter and the splotches moved faster. "Well, what pony in their right mind wouldn't want this strange.....and........beautiful. Suddenly, the glow from the crystal exited it ans the orb it created entered her body. "Oh my.." Rarity said as she felt her body begin to change.

151322222211222.content:
"Rarity?" Twilight asked as she came in "Sorry to barge in, but Spike said you...." The alicorn's mouth stopped and her eyes widened as she saw what was happening to her friend.

Rarity could hear Twilight come in, but was too occupied with a sudden pain coming from her head. The pain kept growing as it neared her horn, then stopped as she felt something poke out. Then the pain went to a lower area near the stomach as she felt herself becoming filled with something. As the pain lessened, Rarity could also feel herself getting heavier as something of hers kept brushing against the floor. Rarity looked back to her tail, worried if it was next, but it didn't seem to change. She did however notice her fur looked different. It had kept it's white look, however, now she was adorned with black splotches. "Just like the crystal" she thought as she walked towards a mirror. Now it was time for her eyes to widen as she saw what she had become. On her head now stood two horns instead of one, equal length and style. Looking under herself, she found why she was feeling heavier. As if they was always there, two udders were across her stomach. "Oh my" she said in horror "I've become..... A COW-PONY!!" Turing towards Twilight, she knelt down as much as her milk-filled udders would let her. "Darling, she whined what happened to me?!"

Twilight instantly regretted saying that as Rarity began crying. "However" Twilight fibbed "I think I know how we can fix this, there might be a book in my library that can help us. Of course we will have to send a letter to Celestia so we can find out what was responsible for this." With that, Rarity's mood instantly lightened and in a voice that would make Pinkie Pie proud spoke "Alright then darling, lead the way."

Twilight sighed, as much as she didn't want to risk anypony seeing what she was about to do, she also didn't want a friend of her's to be in pain. "Rarity" the young alicorn said "I'm going to have to ask you to lay on your side." She didn't really have to ask, as Rarity was already on the floor moaning quietly and waiting for the pain to leave.

Rarity saw Twilight lay down facing the udders that were giving her so much pain. She expected Twilight to use some kind of magic, but felt something else. Rarity could feel both the milk being drained from her and the pain dimming down. Under normal circumstances, she would be "udderly" mortified at even the simple thought of this sort of thing happening to her. But maybe her cow body was getting to her, because this not only felt relieving, but natural as well. It took a while, but soon Rarity could feel that her udders were empty. (For now at least.) Realizing it as well, Twilight stood up and smiled as Rarity did too. "Darling" Rarity inquired "If you don't mind me asking, how was it?" Licking a drop of milk from her lips, Twilight said "Wonderful.........

Twilight struggled to resist the hypnosis the milk was putting on her as Rarity watched in confusion. "I have to fight this.....but Rarity's milk tasted soooo good, I want more of mistress's milk. NO! KEEP IT TOGETHER TWILIGHT! KEEP! IT! TOGETHER!

151322222211222221221.content:
After a few minutes had passed, Twilight was still trying to beat the the urges inside her head. Urges that were telling her to stop thinking for herself and leave all decisions up to Rarity.... no.... Raricow. That's it, Mistress Raricow. "NO!" Twilight screamed in her head "I have to resist this power!" The sweet taste of the milk disappearing in her mouth, Twilight could feel the power of the milk slowly dying down and started to relax.

Rarity's mind was racing like Rainbow Dash during a speed trail. For some reason, it felt wonderful to hear Twilight call her mistress. In fact, just the thought of somepony simply drinking her milk felt like a day at the spa. Rarity could see the effects of her milk loosing their grip on Twilight and couldn't help but feel down as Twilight was keeping her free will. "Hmmmm, maybe she doesn't have to."
151322222211222221221.title: She is still resisting

1513222222112222212211.content:
Rarity made a smirk as she walked closer to Twilight, who was still fighting off the diminishing effects of Rarity's milk. "Oh Twilight darling, don't you want a little more milk? You look so thirsty." Twilight looked at her friend in shock as she almost took a step towards her, but stopped. Rarity realized this wouldn't be an easy deal, and she had to work fast. "Come to me my dear, come and drink of what your mistress has to offer." Twilight kept trying to resist, but something about Rarity's voice forced her to look at the cow-pony as she spoke. She did feel quite thirsty..... maybe just...."NO, I can't listen to her!" Twilight tried to look away, but before she could, she noticed something odd. Rarity's eyes changed color, a simple ring of black, then to a purple that matched her mane, then to a milky white. The rings kept flowing as Twilight walked towards Rarity....or was her name Raricow? Twilight couldn't focus as all she could think about was kneeling beside her mistress's udders and drinking her fill. "That's it Twilight darling." Rarity spoke, keeping eye contact with Twilight "Just drink and let me take care of everything."

Twilight could taste the delicious cream flowing into her mouth as she continued to look up at her mistress. She couldn't remember why she was resisting this, and certainly didn't want to. As she drank, her thoughts were becoming muddled and became a little worried. The more she drank however, the more she realized that that was what Raricow was doing for her, taking away the trouble of thinking for herself. "That's it my dear" Twilight heard as the spirals came closer to her "Just drink and lose yourself. Drink and obey.....drink and obey....drink...and....obey." Twilight relaxed as she realized those words were her new life.

Rarity smiled as Twilight fell under the spell of her milk and her hypnosis. In her mind the old Rarity was dead, now she was a perfect blend of cow and pony. She was now (Pause for effect)

RARICOW

Looking at her new slave however, Rarity noticed something different about Twilight's body

Twilight and Rari-cow
Twilight was so taken by the effects of the strange hypnotic milk. She could no longer control herself and just went with everything that was going on. Rarity was having fun with her new "pet" and gently stroked her mane. However, she wasn't ready for what was about to happen next.
Rarity looked at Twilight for a moment and soon saw what was happening. Two horns started to sprout upon Twilight's head. It looked rather gross as they broke through the skin of the old unicorn. She then noticed a strange round mass of flesh form on Twilight's underside.
It was getting bigger and bigger until it hit the floor. Four teats then formed on the mass and it was now an udder. Rarity was thrilled that this was happening. Having the princess as her slave...what an accomplishment and she barely had to do a thing. She smiled as she watched Twilight. The udder was very large and Rarity knew that it was full of milk like hers was. She saw the Twilight's fur started to get spots. Twilight looked very much like a cow now.
Rarity focused on her new slave as she kept drinking her milk. Soon Twilight got full. She wanted more but knew that she couldn't drink another drop. Rarity looked at her and said,"Is my new pet all full now?"
Twilight replied, "Yes mistress. She was in pain and started to shake.

What happens next?

151331.content:
Rarity walked through town, trailing behind Applejack, watching her step instead of catching up. Fluttershy walked alongside Rarity.

"Hurry up! Y'all don't want to miss this!" shouted Applejack.

"Just a moment... just waking up..." replied Rarity sluggishly. She nearly collapsed asleep, Fluttershy managing to catch her and awaken her.

"Um, sorry if this sounds rude, Applejack, but why did you wake us up at six in the morning just to see an apple?" questioned Fluttershy.

"Just an apple?" laughed Applejack. "This is no ordinary apple, this is the biggest one grown in Equestria ever! Granny Smith is taking photos and everyone else is going to be there! Even Princess Celestia and Luna!"

Rarity opened her eyes wide in shock. "Princess Celestia? But I never got to do my hair or put on a dress or bring her a gi-" she exclaimed, before being cut off by Applejack. "Calm down! Just use your magic horn to fix your hair!"

Rarity cocked her head. "Why did I never think of that?" She immediately fixed her hair with magic. Although worried about the dress, she managed to catch up to Applejack, Fluttershy running alongside her. They reached the grand apple unveiling only minutes later, where Celestia gave a speech to announce the ceremony. Rainbow Dash, already bored, walked up to Rarity and Fluttershy. "Hey, guys. Did Applejack trail you here as well?"

Fluttershy nodded, although she jumped and tripped over when Pinkie Pie bounced up to her from behind and squealed in excitement. Rainbow Dash, Applejack and Rarity simply glared at her, as if to say, "Really?"

Pinkie helped Fluttershy up. The latter quickly noticed someone was missing. "Where's Twilight?"

"Oh, she's watching the speech." said Rainbow, begrudgingly.

Soon after, whenever the speech was over, Twilight and Spike met the others. As they talked (Twilight, Applejack and Pinkie seemingly the only impressed of the group), the Cutie Mark Crusaders walked up to them, holding a basket full of apples and offered them. Everyone took one and ate at it happily. Hours later, the show was over and everyone had returned home.

1523111.content:
It had started out as another ordinary meeting of the Cutie Mark Crusaders. Three young fillies, Apple Bloom, Sweetie Belle, & Scootaloo, were trying out everything they could to see if they could get their cutie marks. Today, it seemed like they were out to get "Mad Scientist Cutie Marks", as Scootaloo was mixing together a strange concoction.

"Are you sure we should do this?" Apple Bloom asked, with a worried look on her face.

"Of course! What's the worst that could happen?" Scootaloo exclaimed, stirring ingredients together in a pot.

"What does this stuff do?" asked Sweetie, looking at the green liquid.

"Ummmm...I don't know," said Scootaloo as she poured some of the mixture into a bottle, "but we'll we need someone to test it."

"Well I can't because....um.." Apple Bloom said, try to think of a good enough reason.

"I'm not drinking this stuff, either."

"I'll do it" Sweetie said in her cheerful manner. She picked up the bottle and drank it all down.

"Well, anything?" Apple Bloom asked.
1523111.title: The CMC try making potion.

15231111.content:
Sweetie Belle was starting to shrink. At first it was not noticeable, so the three thought that they had failed once again.

"I thought for sure we would get our cutie marks this time," Scootaloo said in disappointment. "Maybe we could try playing golf or being firefighters..."

"Ummm... Scootaloo, I think there's somethin' wrong with Sweetie-" Apple Bloom tried to point something out to Scootaloo, but the pegasus filly didn't hear her at all.

"Perhaps we could-"

"SCOOTALOO!"

"What?"

"There's somethin' wrong with Sweetie Belle!" Scootaloo and Apple Bloom stared at Sweetie Belle.

Sweetie was now no bigger then a one year old foal. The two ponies were talking but Sweetie couldn't hear them.

"What are we gonna do?"

Sweetie Belle walked into her room curiously, "Rarity?"

Sweetie Belle heard a high pitched mumble under the covers, "Five more minutes. I'm having a good dream Sweetie Belle."

"Rarity! Something's wrong!"

Sweetie watched as Rarity (in Sweetie's body) jumped out of bed, "What's on fire?! Eeeeek!"

Sweetie Belle looked at herself, "Hey, I didn't mean to light the curtains on fire, you know."

Rarity could barely speak as she looked at herself, "Sweetie Belle? Is that you?"

"Yeah, is that you, Rarity?"

"No, it's the boogie pony," Rarity replied sarcastically.

"Definitely Rarity."

Rarity returned to her serious state, "So like I'm you and you're me."

"Yeah."

"What are we gonna do?"

Sweetie smiled, "Let me be you for a day and you can be me for today!"

Rarity replied, "___"

15311.content:
Ah, the most basic(and sometimes most frightening) of changes in stories. But shall it be only her gender this spell misses with? Or will it do more...? Either way, let's begin, shall we?

It was late afternoon when Fluttershy, the timid yellow pegasus finally finished her daily chores for the day. While they were never too much from the animal caretaker to handle, they were a task all by her lonesome. The ate up her day like nothing else could and often kept her from spending as much time as she would like with her friends, especially Rainbow Dash as the two had finally started to connect as friends again. Regardless, she had made a promise to her dear friend, Twilight Sparkle to assist her today with spell of some type. While she was not sure why or for purpose, she attend to keep her word.

Fluttershy made her way to the Ponyville Library with no delay, duely noting that on her way back she should pay a visit to her friend, Rarity, afterwards and schedule their weekly spa day. And to perhaps drop by Sugarcube Corner and pick up something sweet for later that night. Alas, that would have to wait until after this was was taken care of.

Knocking on the door with her hoof, Fluttershy mumbled to herself, "Oh, dear... I hope I haven't kept her waiting too long..."

Opening the door was none other any Spike, the baby dragon. He greeted with toothy grin, "Hey, Fluttershy! I'm guessing you're here to help Twilight with whatever it is she's been up to for the past few days. I'm guessing it's a spell, but I don't really know."

"I suppose so..." Fluttershy replied shy, "I'm not sure why she asked me to come here, myself. And through a letter no less..."

"That makes you, me, and the rest of Ponyville," Spike sighed. He stepped aside to allow her in and pointed to the stairwell. "Twilight's upstairs in the main library. You can go ahead and head up top and I'll bring you two some lemonade, okay?"

Nodding, Fluttershy entered the building, "Okay then... Thank you very much the gesture. I would love some lemonade."

Without another, but a rather cheerful smile, Spike scampered off to the kitchen. Looking around, Fluttershy could tell that Twilight must have been truly caught up in whatever it was for quite some time. The place was still, for the most part, clean, but there was something to be desired in this with dust that covered over most fo the shelves. While a little nervous, she decided to go up stairs. After going up the second floor of the building, she considered if she should really have come. Let alone why Twilight asked her to bring...

Choice time. A lock of hair hair will show that she'll be changed only in terms her gender where as a Griffon feather, a symbol of change, will show that much more that just her gender will be altered... Which shall it be?

15322.content:
Fluttershy frowned and looked at the tiny red welt in the center of her hoof where she'd been pecked. She'd never heard of a bird that could peck so hard. Before she could reprimand the bird further, she let out a shocked gasp, watching her hoof start to shrink before her very eyes. She held up both hooves and stared as they grew slimmer and shorter, and could tell without looking that her hind legs were doing the same. Then she started to wobble in the air, her already weak wings shrinking down with the rest of her body. Before she touched the ground, the transformation was done, and a scrawny, foal-aged Fluttershy was left standing outside her cottage, looking thoroughly confused.

"Wh-wh-what happened?" She squeaked out, craning her neck to get a better look at herself. "I'm.. I'm.. little again! Ouh, I hope I can still take care of my animal friends like this." She sighed, then took a deep breath and stood as tall as she could, looking determined "Twilight will know what to do, I'm sure of it." She trotted down the path and out of her front gate, down the road towards Ponyville.

15431.content:
Spike slowly walked down one of the trails used in the Everfree Forest. Twilight had sent him to Zecora's hut for some special herbs to use for one of her spells, and since she was too busy to do it herself, Spike was called up. Not that he was unhappy with it, of course. He would do anything to please Twilight, and this was a task he could do himself.

Things were about to change, however.

Spike stopped when he sensed something was...wrong. He couldn't describe it, but he felt a change in the atmosphere, like something bad was going to happen. Then the dragon tensed up when he felt a presence behind him. Slowly, he turned to face it.

It was a unicorn standing several feet behind him. She was a faded blue, having a dark green mane that hung from her neck, her horn was pale and almost translucent, and her cutie mark showed some kind of reptile-like beast Spike couldn't describe. The unicorn grinned an evil grin, her teeth sharpened and almost cat-like. Spike felt a sense of fear, but he didn't know what was going to happen. Then the unicorn spoke.

"I know you. You're the dragon that always lived with those ponies."

"Y-yes, that's true. But what's the problem?"

"What's the problem? HA! It should be obvious. You are supposed to be a dragon! A naturally-born killer! Made to kill ponies!"

"But I can't be like that! You can't just force me to kill ponies! That's cruel and inhumane!"

"Oh, don't think of it as forcing. I'm merely going to help you."

The unicorn's horn glowed white, and Spike immediatly collapsed to the ground, his body convulsing uncontrollably. He felt no pain, but he could feel himself changing. He saw with horror that his vibrant purple scales were darkening, becoming charcoal black. He felt his teeth enlarging, serrated edges forming, becoming almost shark-like. His claws, tiny and barely visible, sprouted out and became curved and sharp. His tail elongated, the limb whipping the ground as if it were alive.

Spike soon blacked out, the last thing he saw being his body growing bigger...

It was a lovely day in Equestria. Spike had just finished alphabetizing some new scrolls, when he heard the door open. Twilight entered, using her magic to levitate a rather large package in front of her.

"Hey, Twilight!" Spike called out. "What's in that package?"

"A mirror," said Twilight, as she carefully placed the package on the floor. "Princess Celestia suspects this mirror is magical and she wants me to verify it."

"Sounds interesting," said Spike. With permission from Twilight, he opened up the package to reveal the mirror. It was a beautiful thing; the frame was adorned with silver and gold and the glass...

"Take a look, Twilight," said Spike. "The glass of the mirror almost looks like the surface of a quiet lake."

Twilight walked over to look in the mirror together with Spike. The moment they both looked into the mirror, it's magic activated. Spike and Twilight were first put in a trance by the mirror. Then, the glass of the mirror shone bright and the souls of both Twilight and Spike were sucked into the mirror. They were quickly spat out again though, exept for one detail: Twilight's soul flew into Spike's body and Spike's soul flew into Twilight's body!

With it's magic exausted for now, the mirror once more went inert, causing it's victims to come out of the trance.

Who is the first to regain their bearings?

15433121.content:
When Spike awoke, he could immediately tell something was off. For one thing he was not in his basket, but a bed, In a strange, enormous yet vaguely familiar room.

What happened? Did Twilight drag me in here?

He hoped out of bed, to inspect his strange surroundings, landing on his feet. At least he was expecting feet, but looking down he noticed he was on four hooves!

A quick glance of his his body, revealed he had somehow turned into a pony! A young stallion, not quite fully grown, with a purple body and a green mane. He felt it in his hooves.

“Woah I never had hair before… except for my stache.”

Spike wondered how this change had happened, but he wasn’t too bothered. Twilight had probably been messing with a spell and brought him here. Now he had a chance to impress Rarity!

Still, something was strange about this room. It looked like one of the rooms to Twilight’s castle, but was much too big, bigger than Twilight’s bedroom! Even the doorframe was huge, much larger than any pony would ever need, even Celestia. He hadn’t shrunk had he? Spiek’s furntiure and belongings seemed approite to his size. Ah well, Twilight would be sure to explain what ever strange had happened, and if not, they’d find out together.

Stepping into the hall, it too was much larger, as was everything else! Maybe he really had shrunk. He raced for Twilight’s room hoping to find an answer. His new legs felt strange, but he had no trouble galloping.

“Twilight! Twlight!” Spike shouted, as he raced along the long hall. Twilight’s room was almost in sight.

Spike’s shouting had clearly awoken her, and he could hear her stirring. It sounded louder than he would expect…

“Mmmm…. What is it Helping Hooves?” Twilight’s tone was the same, but her voice sounded different

“I’m not Helping Hooves I’m-”

As he drew closer, he could see, an enormous purple shape lifting itself up.

“Ahhhh!” Spike jumped as the shape turned to face him. “Twilight… you’re a dragon!”

Twilight grimaced. Even as a dragon, she still had the same facial expressions.

“Well of course I am, you didn’t wake me for this, did you?”

“Did you cast some kind of spell?”

Twilight tilted her head.

“What are you talking about? I’ve always been a dragon.”

“No you’re a pony and I’m the dragon!”

“Is this some kind of dream you had? We’ve always been like this, come on Helping Hooves, lets get some breakfast.”

“Why do you call me that? My name is Spike!”

“Whatever, maybe you’ll feel better after some breakfast.”

Twilight walked out of her room, as though everything was completely ordinary. She headed for the kitchen, manoeuvring around Spike as though she had done it a hundred times before.. How could she be so casual about this?”

“But- But.” Spike didn’t know what to say. Had something happened to her mind?

With some effort, he pushed back Twilight’s enormous curtains and gasped at what he saw. Ponyville was much larger, yet still resembled the backwater town he knew. Yet instead of the ponies he expected to see walking and flying around, their were dragons!

Was this a dream? An alternate reality? A really crazy spell mishap?

And what did Rarity look like in this strange reality?

Maybe he’d find out after breakfast

But, no matter which one of them that he swaps bodies with, Spike would have to get used to walking on four legs, using magic from a horn and being a girl, while the girls would have to get used to walking on two legs, lifting things with hands instead of magic and being a boy!
