155111222.content:
Princess Celestia, Regent of the Sun, and co-ruler of Equestria, fairly collapsed into her bed that night. "Ugh, what a day," she moaned. It had been a few days since the wedding in Canterlot, and she had just finished dealing with all sorts of rubbish today. Mostly, it was fallout from the Changeling invasion of Canterlot. She'd put it off long enough, and it had all come crashing down on her today. Sometimes, being an immortal alicorn isn't all it's cracked up to be, she thought dully. I wish I'd gotten a chance to read the job description when King Oberon and Queen Titania stepped down!

         Sighing, she curled up deeper into her bed. "Just relax, Celestia," she told herself. "Everything will be back to normal in the morning. You'll see." With a yawn, she closed her eyes and fell asleep.

*****


         Deep in slumber, the Princess of the Sun was unaware of a lithe black form slipping in through her window. It glared daggers at the sleeping alicorn.

         "Princess Celestia," the Changeling Queen hissed. "By all rights, Equestria should have been mine. I was within a hairsbreadth of ruling this country entirely!" With visible effort, she calmed herself. "Yet, it was not you that proved to be my undoing. That was Shining Armor and Cadence. I can't get at them at the moment. So for now, I'll settle for you!"

         The Changeling Queen's twisted horn glowed, and a container popped in out of nowhere. Opening it, she levitated out the contents, revealing them to be a sickly-green powder. Spreading it over the Princess, she laughed quietly. "For all the love your subjects give you, by the end of this week, they will betray you. You will feel what it's like to be run out of your rightful kingdom. And you will have no choice but to turn to me for help."

         With that, Chrysalis, the Changeling Queen, slipped out of the window, and scurried off into the night, doing everything in her power to avoid detection.

"HeEhEeFrEsHMEaTgoNNabeFUNKILLKILLmakeherlikeUSdeathpainHUNTHUNTHUNT...& #34;

1551211.content:
Celestia has never felt so lethargic in her entire life, and that was a big statement.

She barely managed to crack her eyes open, let alone sit up in bed. Her whole body felt she'd gone three round wih an ursa, without using magic. She finally managed to crawl out of her plush bed and practically fell on the floor. Muttering an expletive so ancient no even Luna knew its meaning, she stretched her body with several loud cracks and shuffled to her full-length mirror.

She was'nt prepared for what she saw.

Standing in the mirror, in contrast to her usual radiance and appearent youth, was a very old looking alicorn. The usually bright colors of her mane were pale and faded, the mane itself, usually flowing in an unseen etheral breeze, hung limply around her wrinkled face, her coat was pale grey instead of brilliant alabaster and her magenta eyes had lost their vaugely mischevious glint.

"What is this...?" Celestia noticed her voice was now rough and hoarse. When she finally worked up the willpower to pry her gaze from the mirror, she gasped when she saw the clock, she was supposed to raise the sun a half hour ago! Ignoring the pain from her protesting joints, she stiffly mad her way to her balcony and began the ritual she had maintained for several millenia.

Reaching out with the unique spell she inherited from her mother so long ago, Celestia touched the sun she had known so long and nudged it over the horizon, its life-giving warmth washed over her land. Celestia released the spell she held and slumped to the floor, 'I don't remember raising the sun being so difficult...' she thought.

It took about ten minutes for Celestia's strength to return so she could stand up, which she struggled to do. She nearly had a heart attack when there was an urgent knocking at her door. "Enter" she called, her door opened and her sister Luna stepped in, closing the door behind her. "Sister, are you alright? You were late... with the..." Luna's voice trailed off as she saw her dear sister in her current state. "Hello Lulu." Celestia said with a weak smile. "Celestia... what has hppened to you?"

1552221112211112212121212112221112.content:
Twilight took her time as she walked through the hallways of Canterlot castle.

It was the day after she arrived home and met her new sister. after spending the night in the guest bedroom and helping her mother feed Sophia, Twilight decided she would head up to the castle and visit Princess Celestia, wanting to see her mentor in person again after a long time. As she reach the entrance and the royal guards, after a quick check, let her past, the purple unicorn made her way up to the princess' study where she knew Celestia would be.

As she walked, Twilight began to wonder if she should be doing this. As much as she would to see and speak with her beloved teacher, a part of her was beginning to wish she had just stayed home and spend more time with her little sister. the games they could be playing, the stories she could be reading to Sophia right now instead of this played through her head as she drew closer to the study, but Twilight decided she had to come now or she'd never make the visit.

I'm going to do this. she thought to herself, I'll get to spend some more time with Sophia after I’m done with my visit, I want to do this person, not by letter.

Celestia looked up from the book she was reading when she heard the door to her study being opened and smiled as she saw Twilight entering.

"Why Twilight Sparkle, I must say, this is certainly an unexpected surprise" Celestia said as she put the book down and approached Twilight, "What brings you here today."

Twilight smiled warmly at the greeting as she answered her teacher, "I'm visiting my parents and I thought I'd come by to see you as well. seeing as it's been so long since our last visit."

"I see and how is everything at home?" Celestia asked, trying her best to play the question off as causal

"Well, there's been a big chance recently, which is why I need to come and visit Mom and Dad." Twilight answered, after a brief second to ready herself, she spoke again, "I now have a little sister."

Celestia kept her true emotions well hidden. she already knew what the reason behind Twilight's visit and what the answer was going to be, but knew she couldn't avoid it.

"Well that certainly is a pleasant surprise." Celestia said, a sly smile appearing on her face as she jokingly added, "it's good to see your parents are still able to enjoy some "fun" together."

Realising what the sun princess meant, Twilight quickly shook her head, "Oh no no, nothing like that." she said, feeling a blush of embracement as her parents' love life was certainly something she didn't want to talk with otherponies about and certainly not with her Teacher. "My parents found her left on the doorstep. we have no idea where she came from other then her name and a pendent was wearing."

Celestia gave a gentle nod, "I see and how has it been? having a sister?"

Twilight looked up into Celestia's eyes and said, "Truthfully, Princess? Wonderful! I've only know her for one day and I already feel so much love for her. I'll do anything to make her happy, and there's so many things the two of us could do, like reading a book to her. I just wish I didn't live so far away in Ponyvill so that i can spend more time with her.

As Celestia listened to her student, she smiled warmly as she felt her heart fill with joy. she knew she made the right choice when picking Twilight sparkle and her parents to be Luna's new family.
1552221112211112212121212112221112.title: Visiting the Princess

choices: Celestia Disagree's and Makes an Excuse
15522211122111122121212121122211122.content:
"Has Spike joined you on the small journey?" said the Princess as she turned around to sit down on a chair.

"Yes, Princess. Spike is with Mom and Dad playing with Sophia, I think Spike loves Sophia, they have been playing together since the moment they met eachother, Spike has been playing with building blocks and Sophia has just been sitting there watching in total excitement. I think they will get along greatly, and Spike loves the idea of a little sister aswell." said Twilight she looked up at the Sun Princess.

Knowing Celestia, she was happy that Twilight herself was happy, it was evident on her face as she smiled, although it wasn't the peppy and happy smile of the Princess, it was a sad smile. Not knowing what was going on, Twilight quickly forget and shrugged off the feeling that something was somewhat wrong. Only to bring the question to mind: Where is Luna?

"Princess?" said Twilight.

"Yes, my faithful student?" said Celestia as she smiled down towards Twilight.

"Where is Luna?" said Twilight raising an eyebrow and hoof to where Luna was at this time.

Celestia stopped for a moment and started to think quickly, it seemed that after all these years her mind isn't on a quickfire cycle enough to bring out a direct awnser to something so crazy and wrong towards her sister, she looked down at Twilight who was staring directly back at her.

"She's gone for a while, she has gone to Stalliongrad for a couple of weeks." said the Sun Princess.

"Really? why is she gone?" said Twilight.

The relief of the excuse brought Celestia to a clam and normal state, knowing that lying is wrong especially to do so to her own student is absolutely a sin, but there was no other way of saying that Luna is Sophia, not even a speck could break the quick silence that besieged the whole room.

"For personal reasons, I sent her there to relax and calm down from all the worries of being a Princess, I sent her to a very fancy hotel where she can relax and catch up on having time to herself." said Celestia.

Twilight stared back at Celestia, and then smiled gleefully as if it was accepted, and yet it was.

"Hey Princess!, I have an idea!" said Twilight who didn't want to be in the awkward moment with her Teacher.

"What is it Twilight?" said Celestia.

"How about you visit us and see Sophia? how about it? I think you'll love her!" said Twilight who's excitement was getting a little out of hand like a child on a sugar rush, or simply put: Pinkie Pie.
15522211122111122121212121122211122.title: Staying for Longer

155222111221111221212121211222111221.content:
At first Celestia wanted to say no, giving Twilight some sort of excuse on why she couldn't visit. It had only been a few days, but already she was feeling as alone and heartbroken as the did Luna had first became Nightmare Moon and had to be banished to the moon, the Princess couldn't risk the chance of breaking down into tears and the likes upon seeing Luna, But before she even opened her mouth to give her answer, another, stronger desire welled up within her and she said, "Of course I would love to."

With her mind, Celestia was partly shocked at her answer despite the number of reasons she had just mental listed to herself on why not to agree, but the other part of her didn't care. She missed Luna and wanted more then anything to see her again, no matter what.

A few minutes later, after informing the guards and the castle stuff of where she was going to be, the princess was soon walking with Twilight on their way to her student's home. Celestia's arrival in the Sparkle family home went as ponies would expect. After assuring Mr and Mrs Sparkle that no special treatment was expected and that they to bow to her every two minutes, Celestia was sitting down at the table, enjoying a cup of tea and talking with the Sparkles.

After awhile Spike came into the room, carrying Sophia in his arms,

Trying to swallow back her remaining tears, she tried to talk to Celestia, but all that came out was, "Apababada (Baby Talk)."

Luna realized her body must have regressed to that of a baby filly. She saw that she was in a diaper even. Celestia then picked Luna up in her mouth and place her on the bed. "GUARD!" Celestia yelled in the old royal voice, scaring Luna a bit as she ducked down on the bed.

The guard soon came in and said "Yes your majesty?"

"I thought I had told you specifically to watch over my daughter as I prepared the crib, not to guard the door outside my room. My daughter could have been seriously injured," Celestia scolded.

The Colt shivered in his armor with no answer to respond with. "You're dismissed. You may go now. your 'duty' is done here. I expect better of you next time. Dusty, you may bring the crib in," Celestia says and soon a crib with a moon on it was dragged into Celestia's room.

Luna had never seen this side of Celestia before. If she was putting on an act, she was playing the mother part quite well. But why did Celestia call her 'daughter'. Luna knew they were sisters. Why would Celestia go and say that, unless, it may be part of an act and Celestia has some sort of plans for Luna to 'fit in' with modern day ponies. Luna didn't realize that while she was thinking over all of this she had peed soaked her diaper and started to feel the warmth on her tush. 1553322112211112.content:
Vinyl quickly jolted to her couch and put the CD in her stereo, turning the bar all the way up to max volume. Vinyl wasn't really thinking about Octavia's needs and how this music would interrupt her practicing.

Vinyl then levitated the remote and sat in her music sofa. (The sofa she'd sit in just to hear music blast through her ears) "Alright Time Break, show me what ya GOT!!"

Vinyl turned on her stereo and the room was quickly filled with a loud DJ mix. Vinyl's mane flicked back while the music was blasting air and magic over Vinyl. Little did Vinyl know about the magic though, because her eyes were closed so she could just take in the music. She had a huge smile on her face, while she slowly regressed.

The regression sped up or slowed down depending on the current tempo. To a non-DJ, the tempo was pretty fast, but it was relatively slow for a DJ.

Meanwhile, Octavia could only feel its vibrations on the house "Oh brother.. Vinyl, why can't you be more proper?..." She thought to herself though, "It's not worth it. You can't here it Octavia. You know what happens with Vinyl and her music." Octavia sighed and went back to her music.

Vinyl had regressed only 2 years before the tempo jumped up to even faster speeds. Within 10 seconds of the tempo change, Vinyl had already lost 1 year. The song stayed on this tempo and her years quickly vanished. As the song went on, something changed about the atmosphere. The room underwent a massive change, essentially becoming a baby room. The carpet was now soft to a touch, the room became a soft shade of blue and white, and the sofa turned to a shade of pink. A playpen with all sorts of toys, such as blocks, formed in the corner. Nearby, a stroller formed, with a blue baby bag, which contained bottles, pacifiers, and other baby necessities. A changing table with stacked diapers and baby supplies even formed near the stereo.

While the room transformed, so did Vinyl. 2 minutes into the fast tempo, she was already younger than the CMC. She was only a couple years away from being at the ripe age of 1. All these transformations happened without Vinyl's knowledge. She was still entranced by the sound of the music. The tempo then changed to something softer as song was finishing up, and Vinyl slowly regressed to the age of the Twin Cakes. Right before the song finished, magic hit Vinyl and a fresh diaper formed around her flank. Once the diaper was on little Vinyl and Vinyl was the age as the Twins, the music stopped.

Vinyl opened her eyes after the song and was...

Vinyl blinked as the music ended. The white furred foal looked around the room slowly her brain trying to understand what her eyes saw. The stereo clocked on by itself, but the music it played was softer lighter. It almost sounded like a lullaby, something meant to sooth younger ponies. That also seemed to knock Vinyl out of her trance. Her eyes winded, her pupils shrunk, and her head whipped around the room. What in Cewestia's name happened! She squeaked and covered her mouth. Me voice. Me no sound wike tat!

She finally looked at herself, specifically her blank flank covered by a diaper. No! No! Tis no wight! With a shaking hoof she prodded the diaper as if to confirm her suspicion. When it didn't disappear in a puff of smoke Vinyl panicked. No! Tis no wight! Me no foaw! Tis must be a twick! Abuh ga! Her quickly deteriorating speech only added to her mounting panic. All Vinyl could really focus on was an overwhelming desire to get away and she hopped off the sofa. Unfortunately the small step for an adult was a bit further for a foal. The fall didn't hurt, the carpet was really soft, but the sock finally pushed Vinyl over the edge.

Octavia had long ago tuned out Vinyl's racket and lost herself in her music. The grey mare had a smile on her face as she moved her bow across her beloved instrument loosing herself in its notes. The grey earth mare had entered a state of Zen and didn't know that Vinyl's music had stopped. She did hear when a foals loud wail cut through the house shattering the peace like a hammer through glass. Octavia screeched her bow sliding across her cello creating a sound that would be compared to a sick cat screeching. Vinyl! Octavia yelled dropping her gear and running to her friends room.

Vinyl! The white foal stopped crying when she heard her friends voice. Octavia stood in the door way her face slowly morphing from panic to a flat blank look. The grey mare looked around the room slowly her face unreadable before her eyes fell onto her teary eyes regressed friend. The music continued to play.

155332211221111221.content:
Vinyl? Octavia asked her blank face masking a racing heart as she looked at the foal. No that can't be right. The grey earth mare said taking a few steps in. Vinyl Scratch this had better not be a prank. What happened to the room? Vinyl. You get out here right now! Octavia yelled her mask of calm breaking. Vinyl started to cry softly her own fear only multiplying upon seeing Octavia start to panic. Octavia heard the crying and walked over to the blue mane foal. Gently she picked the crying foal up. Vinyl. Is that really you? She asked her mind still having a hard time accepting this.

The white foal looked at her with teary dark eyes and nodded. Oh. My. Celestia! Vinyl what happened?! Octavia shrieked clutching her friend to her barrel. Vinyl tried to explain but all that came out was babble and half formed words. "Oh no! I/she can't talk!" Both thought at the same time. Oh, dear. This is not good. Octavia was "this" close to loosing it. Suddenly finding your friend/roommate turned into a foal with a fully stocked nursery was not something she had expected to see. "I'm not ready to be a mother!" Octavia thought her head already filling with how this could go wrong.

Vinyl though knew she had to do something and beat on her friends chest with a hoof. It caused about as much damage as getting hit with styrofoam but it got Octavia to look at her. Ta mooo-ik! Vinyl said pointing to the stereo which continued to play the soothing melody. Octavia blinked clearly confused. Mooo-ik! Vinyl said again pointing widely. "Moo-ik" Octavia repeated. Moo-ik? Moo, mu, music! We need to turn off the music! Vinyl nodded widely. The grey mare set her friend down and charged to the stereo. 15533221122111122111.title: Vinyl

choices: Vinyl Scratch acts awkwardly around Octavia, not knowing how to act

155332211221111221111.content:
The surge of magic continued to move towards them and Octavia quickly backed behind the sofa. Fear had taken over her. She wasn't really thinking about her friend and in the last second before the magic hit Vinyl, Octavia called out "VIIIIINYL!!!"

The magic energy flowed into the nearest living thing and after a 10 seconds of entering Vinyl, the little baby room was filled with a farting sound followed by a drizzle. Vinyl's first diaper as a newly-regressed foal was ruined. After the noises, there was a brief pause of silence. Shortly after, Vinyl burst out into a loud wail. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!"

Octavia looked nervous and peeked from the side of the sofa. The wave of magic was gone, but what she feared would happen, did happen. Vinyl had an accident. She would have to change her own roommate's diaper. The word "improper" didn't even begin to describe this situation.

Octavia mustered up the courage and approached her crying diapered roommate.

Vinyl didn't even notice Octavia. She was too focused on her messy situation. In her mind, she harshly criticized herself "How could you do this Vinyl?! You're a nopony! You're a nothing! Octavia will not help you. No one will. You're a waste of space and no one should waste their time with you."

Octavia slowly walked up to Vinyl, partly not to scare Vinyl and partly to keep her distance. Something happened though in her slow walk to Vinyl. She came up with an idea, something that just might sooth Vinyl. Octavia sang notes "Fa Re Laaaaaaaa Mi Dooooooo.."

Octavia continued to sing, but it had little effect. One other idea hit her. She soon approached Vinyl, preparing to do something more soothing. Before she could do anything, she smelled the intense stench originating from Vinyl's diaper. Octavia tried with all her will to ignore the smell, saying to herself "It's ok. It's ok. Vinyl's a friend. She will know something had to be done."

After mentally rehearsing herself, Octavia said in a firm motherly tone "There, there, Vinyl. It's Ok. Octavia is here." Vinyl merely wailed a little softer after hearing that.

She then picked up Vinyl, saying in her mind "ew, ew, ew, ew, ew, ew!" Once Vinyl was snuggly in her front hooves, Octavia rocked her back and forth. She would've sung something, but her mind was lost on what to sing. She wasn't exactly skilled at winging music, especially when she was nervous like right now.

Vinyl looked up at Octavia with her adorable eyes and said "Aaktaabiiaa.. tanks... me owwa won."

Octavia forced a fake smile "It's nothing. Now, let's get you... situated."

Vinyl nodded and Octavia carried her over to the changing table. The changing had begun for the first one at least. Octavia knew the process, just doing diaper change on her roommate was still uncomfortable to the nth degree.

She first pulled out some baby powder and wipes and said "let's see how that diaper of yours."

Octavia undid the diaper straps and quickly threw the dirty diaper into a waste-pin. She sighed. Things were worse than she thought. At least, the worst of this changing was behind her. For the rest of the changing, Octavia handled herself much better. In no time at all, She then lifted up Vinyl's chubby hind legs and wiped her flank clean. Lastly, she applied baby powder to Vinyl's behind and slid a fresh new diaper in place. Octavia strapped the new diaper in place and everything was back to a calm state. Hopefully, it would last long.

After Vinyl's changing was done, Octavia stated "I guess I'll be acting as your temporary mother. I'm sorry if I panicked earlier. I just don't know what to say."

Vinyl Scratch...
155332211221111221111.title: Wittle Vinyl makes a Big Icky

choices: We need to find a way to fix this.
1553322112211112211112.content:
Vinyl mulled over the offer. On one hoof having Octavia as her "mommy" for however long this lasted just screamed awkward on so many levels. "She's probably thinking about how "improper" this entire situation is." Vinyl though a little amused as she looked at the grey mare. On the other, she really didn't have much choice. She had just had her diaper changed for Celestia's sake! She needed somepony to look after her and Octavia was probably the pony she trusted most for it.

Octavia for her part was tying to keep a smile on her face. Her "mommy!" Octavia what were you thinking?!She thought, scolding herself mentally.Do you even know how, well "improper" does not even come close to describing this! You just offered to take care of her until this corrects itself. You have never even taken care of someponies else's foal let alone your own! This means more diaper changes! "Ewewewew! eeeeeeewwwwwwww! I don't know if I can survive many more of those! Why in the darkest corners of my mind did I even humor the idea of having a foal of my own?!

Octavia was brought out of her spiraling thoughts when Vinyl hugged her. The foal had crawled over to the end of the table and wrapped her tiny hooves as far around her friend as they could. Oway. Vinyl said soft. She spoke slowly forcing the words out to the best of her ability. Tank eu Octie. Tu da bestist. "Oh now I remember." Octavia thought as she returned the awkward hug. The two just held that position for several moments basking in the first true moment of piece in what seemed like an eternity.

Does this mean you'll start calling me mommy? Octavia asked playfully. Yes it was strange for her to make a joke but she needed a laugh. Vinyl broke the hug shaking her head "no" but she did giggle. Good. Octavia's smile fell. Now Vinyl I will try to treat you as an adult as much as possible, but no promises. You need certain things now and I would really like if you didn't fight me to hard. Octavia said seriously. The foal nodded sadly. As much as she hated it things would change for her. She wouldn't fight, but that didn't mean she wouldn't argue against certain things. Like the cloths. There was no way Octavia was putting a foal dress on her! Vinyl sighed and poked her second diaper with a frown already dreading the future. Octavia noticed. Well I have to change you so I think I got the worse end of the deal. The mare argued back. Vinyl agreed with a giggled. Yeth! Tu got...bad...pawt. Octavia sighed to brace herself for the future and picked her charge up.

What happens to disrupt the moment of calm?

15533221122111122111121.content:
We need to fix this. Octavia said. What do we do though? Vinyl shrugged. Well, I guess we could go ask Princess Twilight. Octavia said after a minute of thought.
Vinyl nodded happy they at least had a plan now. Ok then. Octavia said forcing a smile. Lets go see the princess. Vinyl clapped. Yay! Then what Octavia said registered. We? Yes we. Ou-swde? Vinyl asked her voice nervous. Yes outside. Octavia said with a sigh bringing her over to the stroller. Waa?! No! Vinyl yelled starting to squirm. Octavia groaned. So much for "not fighting me." The musician though. Listen Vinyl. I. Am. Not. Leaving. You. Alone. Octavia said emphasizing each word.

I refuse to leave you without supervision so you are coming with me. The two glared at one another their wills fighting. Octavia won. Its either the stroller where I can out the top down and cover you with a blanket. Or my back where everypony can see you. The threat worked and Vinyl deflated like a balloon. Otay. She said her lip quivering. Octavia felt something stab her heart. "Oh dang it. Not the sad foal look!" Look I'm sorry Vinyl. Octavia said sincerely rocking her slightly in an attempt to cheer her up. But I can't leave you alone. You understand right? The foal sniffed and nodded. Octavia bit her lip.

Tell you what after we finish with Twilight I'll take you for ice-cream. Vinyl perked up. Wih spwinles? Rainbow sprinkles. Octavia promised. Vinyl smiled and Octavia pat herself on the back. Soon Vinyl was placed in the stroller and the strapped in. The foal twisted some, but found the strap too tight to do much more than move her upper body and kick. Tis es dumb. She said crossing her forelegs and pouting. Octavia bit back a "daww." Well its certainly better than letting everypony see you. The mare said tucking a blanket around her charge and pulling the cover down hiding Vinyl from view. Vinyl would never admit it, but she did feel comfy like this and a small sigh escaped her. Seeing her change settle down Octavia opened the diaper bag.

Now lets see here. Diaper, whips, powder, bottles, formula, a pacifier, some toys? Octavia's voice became more confused as she continued to find more and more items that made up a very well stocked diaper bad. The grey mare pulled out a rattle and both stared at it. Well whoever made this spell was certainly through. Octavia commented putting the toy back. Neither pony knew how to feel about that. That done Octavia approached the stereo like it was a snake ready to strike. Vinyl managed to wiggle her head around to watch. Octavia approached, and hit the button that would eject the CD. They flinched, and when nothing happened they both gave long sighs of relief. Holding it like a bomb Octavia carefully placed the CD in the bag. She didn't know what to expect and the relief was palatable when it didn't blow up or send them into an alternate universe. Well, time to go. Octavia said more to get herself going more than anything. Vinyl, her forward vision blocked by the screen, whimpered and sunk into the seat praying that nothing would happen. It's ok Vinyl. Octavia soothed slinging the bag on. I'm sure Twilight will know something.

155332211221111221121.content:
As the magic built self-preservation finally kicked in and Octavia turned tail. She had some vague plan of grabbing Vinyl as she ran but it didn't matter. Octavia had gotten three step when the magic was finally released. Vinyl cried out if fear as the burst of magic hit the grey mare and she began to shrink.

Unlike Vinyl the changes were not slow but fast as if the magic wanted to hurry the process up. Octavia opened her mouth in a silent scream as her body twitched with the magic. A diaper appeared on her flank before her cutie mark vanished. The rest of her body soon changed to match her new wear becoming smaller and chubbier as her body took on the big headed, chubby limb look of a foal. She got smaller and smaller as time went on quickly dropping from a mare, to a teenager, to a filly, and then a toddler.

As she dropped bellow two years her iconic bowtie popped into her hair, becoming an oversized hair bow. Finally after less than a minute the magic vanished leaving a grey foal around the same age as Vinyl or the Cake Twins if a bit older. Octavia looked at her tiny chubby hooves in shock before looking own at her own blank, diaper covered, flank. Octavia looked up at Vinyl her eyes a mixture of fear and disbelieve. Octavia's eyes suddenly began to water and she began to wail. WAAAAAAAAAAA!

She had a good set of lungs and the noise penetrated the entire house. The shock of seeing her friend regress along with hearing her cry also pushed Vinyl's emotions over the edge, again. Both foals wailed at the top of their lungs expressing their fear in the only way they could. The noise was deafening echoing thought the house and exiting onto the street.

It is quite possible someone heard them crying. The question is who hears something and goes to check?
155332211221111221121.title: Bring on widdle Octavia!

155332211221111222.content:
Vinyl looked at her friend/roommate as the grey mare starred right back at her. Octavia suddenly groaned and clutched her head. Ugg. Wha? Vinyl saw a sort of flash in Octavia’s eyes before her entire expression softened. To Vinyl’s almost overwhelming shock Octavia smiled at her, a soft gently smile more tender and caring than any expression Vinyl had ever seen on her friend. What’s wrong sweetie? Octavia asked walking over to a shocked Vinyl.

“Octie it’s me! Can’t you see something wrong!?” Oocttaa iii caaaa uuuu agable! Vinyl’s heart sunk lower as only foalish babbly left her mouth and she started to cry harder. Hello to you two wittle winle! Octavia cooed picking her up. No, no. Don’t cry sweetie. Mommies here. Shhhhh. Octavia started to rock the foal and hum a lullaby, gently rubbing Vinyl’s back as she did. Despite herself Vinyl started to calm down, her new body reacting to Octavia’s efforts to calm her and her cries softened. Vinyl suddenly jerked when she felt something.

A faint hissing sound reached her ears and she looked down to see a growing stain on her diaper. “I’m wetting myself!” She screamed in her head shocked that she didn’t even feel such an action. A moment later Vinyl felt her stomach churn. “Oh no! Please! Celestia! Luna! Anypony not that!” Vinyl’s prayers went unanswered and her first diaper of her new found foal hood was ruined.

AWW was that it? Octavia cooed giving a motherly smile. Did my little pony just need to make a big stinky? Well, let mommy change that smelly dydee. Vinly had reached the breaking point and went past it. Not only had she been turned into a foal, she had messed herself like one, in her friends arms, who apparently thought she was her mother! She continued to cry and squirm as she was laid on the changing table. Now hold still. Mommy can’t work with you squirming. Vinyl felt the strap slide across her chubby tummy, restricting her movement as her first diaper change in over two decades commenced.

There we go. Octavia said cheerily picking the foal back up when she finished. You are just fussy today. I think somepony needs a nap. Vinyl continued to squirm and babble, trying to explain what had happened or at least escape. She did not want to listen to that accursed sound anymore! Who knew what it would do?! She was a foal though, and was powerless as Octavia swaddled her and set her in the crib. Vinyl kicked her legs, the only movement she could make wrapped in her fleece cocoon, as she was set into the crib her eyes pleading with Octavia. The grey mare just smiled, popped a pacifier in her mouth, and kissed her on the head. Now you get some nice sleep while mommy practices. Vinyl felt her hope wither as she watched Octavia walk to the door. Suddenly the mare stopped, confused, and changed course to the stereo.

I don’t remember putting this on. Octavia mused finally noticing the song now that her foal had been tended to. “Time skip?” Never hear of her. Vinyl dared to hope as Octavia mused over the accursed, magic music that had caused all this.

155332222222222211111.content:
Shining Armor yawns as he jumps off the throne and gets ready to go to bed, when he walks out to the balcony and looks out over the Crystal Empire.

It's been approximately 6 months since Twilight's coronation day and he couldn't be more proud of her. But deep down, he can't help but be a little jealous of his little sister. Jealous for rising to the status of alicornhood, gaining immortality, and power beyond his wildest dreams. Although his sister becoming an alicorn, or the godlike power she gained made his green with envy, it was her immortality was what made him jealous. Jealous that she would remain youthful for millennia, while he would grow old and die. But that led to a completely different and stronger emotion that took hold of him: sadness. He was reminded of how his wife would remain young for generations, while he would grow old and die. But he knew what he was getting into when he married Cadance, how their marriage wouldn't last forever and he promised to make her years with him the best years of her life, since his chances of gaining immortality were slim. His thoughts are interrupted when one of the castle servants comes by and says, "Sir, your wife asked me to come look for you, she expecting you to return to your bed chambers and she wants to tell you something."

Shining smiles and says, "I'm coming. I'm just getting a little fresh air."

He leaves the balcony and trots towards his and Cadance's chambers. He arrives and sees his wife, Cadance, laying on their bed, still awake. (Author's note: Don't worry, this isn't clop) He closes the door, walks over to their bed and lays down with her. Cadance turns her head and stares at him lovingly. She says, "Hey, Shiny."

He chuckles at her nickname for him and reaches out and and strokes her mane with a hoof. He says, "Hey Cadance. So what is it you wanted to tell me?"

She asks, "Do you know what tomorrow is?"

Confused, Shining says, "I don't know, Thursday?"

She says, "Well yes, but no."

Thinking some more, he says, "The day one of your aunts come to visit?"

Giggling a little, she says, "No."

While thinking, one horrifying idea comes to his mind. He says, while paled, "I didn't forget our first wedding anniversary, did I?"

She says, "No! That's not for another 3 months, silly!"

Letting out a sigh of relief, he says, "Okay, you got me, what's tomorrow?"

Laughing out loud, she says, "You silly colt! It's your birthday, tomorrow!"

Acting surprised, he says, "Really? I guess it slipped my mind. Thanks for remembering, sweetheart, but you don't have to do anything for me, I'm just turning 22, it's no big deal."

Staring at him with such love and compassion, she says, "You're my husband, Shining. That makes all your birthdays special to me."

Snuggling closer to him and placing her head under his chin, and nuzzling his neck, she says, "And tomorrow morning, you'll get the best present you could ever ask for."

Smiling down at his beautiful wife, he says, "Cadance, I already have everything I could ever ask for. I have an amazing family, an adorable little sister, a majestic home, and best of all." He strokes her pink coat of fur on her back, and says, "I have the most beautiful wife a stallion could ever ask for."

Gazing into her lover's eyes, she says, "Then you're in for quite a surprise tomorrow morning."

Pulling her closer, he says, "I'll believe that when I see it."

He falls asleep quickly, and Cadance sneaks out of bed to prepare the gift. She looks back at her sleeping husband, and whispers, "You'll love tomorrow morning, Shining." She then exits the room and walks down the hall.
155332222222222211111.title: Through Cadence's love

1553322222222222111111.content:
The next morning

"Wake up, sleepyhead."

Shining Armor stirs from his sleep and is about to get out of bed when cadance says, "Don't get up yet, we have a surprise for you!"

Shining Armor groans from not getting up as he just wants to get rid of the crick in his back, which he somehow gained overnight. Then he thinks, 'Wait, did she just say we?'

He then opens his eyes more clearly, and sees Twilight standing by Cadance. He exclaims, "Twily! I didn't expect you to be here!"

Twilight says, "Why wouldn't I be here for my B.B.B.F.F.? It's your birthday, for crying out loud!"

Cadance says, "Twilight came here to help me with your gift. It took a lot of work and I have to say it was a success!"

Shining smiles and says, "Well since I don't want to put all your hard work to waste, what's the gift?"

Twilight and Cadance smile at each other and Cadance says, "Actually we have 2 gifts for you, and I believe we should save the best for last."

Shining says, "Well what's the first gift?"

Cadance smiles and says, "Well, first thing's first, I'm pregnant!"

Shining yells, "What!"

Cadance says, "You're going to be a father!"

Shining exclaims, "Cadance that's great news!"

Cadance says, "Well then you'll love the next gift and it's the best one!"

Shining looks around and says, "Well, where is it?"

Twilight smiles and says, "Oh you'll see."

Twilight then levitates a red piece of cloth to him and says, "First, put this on."

Twilight puts the blindfold over his eyes and he smiles and says, "Okay, what are you two up to?"

Cadance giggles and says, "Just get off the bed and walk forward a little."

Shining gets out of bed and walks until Twilight puts her hoof in front of him and says, "Okay, now get ready for the biggest surprise in your life."

Shining, rolls his eyes and says, "Try me."

Twilight pulls the blindfold off his face and Shining's eyesight adjusts properly to see a mirror in front of him. He puts on a confused face when suddenly he notices something on his back that takes his breath away.

Shining Armor notices what looks like tufts of feathers on each side of his back but the shock makes him move a new set of muscles he never had before and a pair of white wings spring from his back. With a slightly open mouth, he touches one of the wings with his hoof and retracts it a little when he feels real soft feathers. He then looked back at his forehead to check if he still has his horn, and sure enough, it's still there. He can only stare at what he sees; he has wings!

He mutters, "How did?"

He feels someone rub his neck and say, "Happy birthday, Shining."

He looks behind him to see Cadance rubbing her head into his neck and smiling at him. He tries to ask, "I'm a…"

Twilight says, "An alicorn? Yes!"

A thought comes to his mind and he asks, "Does this mean I'm also…"

Cadance finishes, "Immortal? Of course!"

Sining Armor turns his attention back to the mirror and continues to stare at his body. He studies his wings and how majestic they look. He is still having trouble processing his body. He's now an alicorn. Just last night, he was thinking about how slim his chances were of becoming ascended and gaining wings. Yet here he is, turned from a mortal unicorn into an immortal alicorn, the very image of a god or goddess, the most powerful and awe-inspiring pony in the history of Equestria, all in the length of a single night.

At that thought, he tries concentrating his magic and found that it has become more powerful. He stands there with his eyes closed, feeling the power of a god flow through him.

Twilight asks, "So, what do you think?"

Shining turns around with his still confused expression and asks, "One Question. How did this happen?"

Cadance and Twilight smile at each other and Cadance says, "We were thinking you were going to say that! Well, it all started a little after you fell asleep…"

15533222222222222122221111111.content:
(This chapter is not a transformation one. It's to set the tone for how Sunset Shimmer is feeling and goes along with the phrase from the last choice, "she needs some fun in her life." )

It was about 11 o'clock on Saturday. Spring break had just arrived, which meant Sunset Shimmer and her friends had a full week of break ahead of them. Sunset Shimmer had already made plans to spend at least half of her break in Equestria. There was a fair level of apprehension to the trip though. This would be the first time in years that Sunset spent nights in Equestria, in her pony body. She wanted to catch up with Celestia, Twilight, and all of Twilight's friends. Still, she was nervous. What would Celestia be like, or Twilight even. She had some idea for Twilight, but she and her only had one visit and the rest had been through book text. She also didn't know what would Twilight's friends be like, how similar they'd be to her own friends. She also know why she had to rely on just Twilight's friends. She didn't really have any other friends to meet, since she avoided friendship last time she was in Equestria. Lastly, was her parents. Facing them would be difficult. It was just about as stress inducing as meeting Celestia again. At least for Celestia, she had a pen pal that constantly reassured her about Celestia. She had nothing like that for her parents.

As for her human friends, the humane5 didn't mind their friend being gone. In fact, they encouraged it. Her friends, especially Rarity, knew how important such a visit could be for Sunset and wouldn't let their friend back out on such an opportunity.

Sunset Shimmer was just finishing up on her last entry in the magical book.

Dear Princess Twilight,

I can't wait to see you, Celestia, and all you're friends. I'm already packed. So, all I have to do is lend this book to Fluttershy for my trip and head through the portal. I should be coming through the portal in about 30 to 40 minutes.

By the way, thank you for letting me do come back to Equestria. It means a lot to me.

Your friend,
Sunset Shimmer

(The portal only worked because the book was in both universes. So, the book would have to stay in the human universe for Sunset to easily come back.)

After Sunset finished, she closed the book and held onto it closely. This was a habit of hers ever sense she started using the book again. If it was in use, as opposed to being a past relic, she wanted to keep it as protected as possible. She walked downstairs at brisk pace to find Fluttershy caring for an animal friend in the living room. After Sunset had made friends with the humane5, she ended up staying at Fluttershy's, instead of that rundown apartment.

Sunset approached Fluttershy somewhat softly, but still made enough sound to make her presence known. Sunset was nervous leaving her friend for the weekend, so she decided to spit the words out fast and get the anxiety over with. In a moderate talking voice she said "Hey Fluttershy, I'm off to Twilight's. Here is my book. I know you will, but please keep it safe while I'm gone."

Fluttershy was a little overwhelmed by her friends assertive fast response. Still, Fluttershy quickly smiled and nodded, petting Angel to reassure him that everything was OK. Fluttershy knew Sunset was stressed and this was just the form her stress took. She tried to mimic Sunset's speed of conversation to get it over with for Sunset's sake, but a part of her still pushed back, trying to give a calm slower response "Don't worry Sunset. I'll keep it safe. Tell Twilight that I and the rest of said "hi" and have fun."

Sunset smiled confidently and responded again in her fast talking voice "You bet! Thanks again. I'll make sure to tell you and everyone else, all about it when I come back!"

In less than a minute, Sunset was out the door, walking at a steady pace to the nearest bus stop. She was focused on her task, getting to the bus stop. Normally, she was aware of her reactions to Fluttershy, but this morning not one thought went through her head about how she reacted to Fluttershy. She was too stressed, to think about such things. The weather was nice, sunny with mild breeze, but Sunset paid it little attention. Within roughly 8 minutes Sunset arrived at the bus stop down the cul-de-sac, several minutes early. Sunset then started thinking about Equestria. Her mind became lost on what would happen in Equestria. It was exciting and nerve racking at the same time, or what Pinkie would call "nervous-cited." Time quickly flew by without Sunset noticing, and the bus arrived. Sunset was quick to notice the large vehicle pull up near her and broke out of thought. She paid the small bus fine and sat at one of the nearby seats. The bus was practically empty; none of her classmates would be on at such an early hour. After all spring break came just yesterday and most students wanted to sleep-in. Sunset began thinking again about Equestria, and before she knew it, 15 minutes had passed and she was at her stop. If it wasn't for the bus driver announcing their stop, Sunset might've missed it in her daze. She thanked the man for doing so and headed off, internally criticizing herself for almost missing the stop.

Even though the portal was just nearby and she had plenty of time to spare, Sunset walked at a brisk pace, trying to focus again on the task at hand. Besides, thinking about what might happen was stressing her out. She planned out this morning perfectly and had more thought out plans for her trip than the average teenager. Sunset knew she was on top of things and she didn't want to make any more mistakes by thinking too much. Within 2-3 minutes she had arrived at Canterlot High and the statue. She approached the portal side, pressing her hand against it to only feel the moderately hot stone. She was ahead of her schedule. She had a sigh of relief and leaned on a side of the statue, touching the statue every so often, until she felt her fingers go through. Sunset thought again about her Equestria trip, considering her earliness a decent excuse to continue thinking about it again. Roughly four minutes passed and her thinking was topped cold, literally. Her finger had tapped on the stone and instead of her feeling a hot stone surface, it went through and she could feel a cold pass over her finger. She quickly pulled her finger out, hoping Twilight didn't see anything. It was time to leave. Before stepping through, she looked around for any humans who might see her. None, not one was in sight. Sunset took a deep breath and traveled through the portal.
15533222222222222122221111111.title: Sunset Shimmer pre-Age Regression

choices: Sunset becomes angry, lashing out at Pinkie
Sunset becomes sad, and Pinkie has to cheer her up
155332222222222221222211111111.content:
Sunset emerged through the portal, to find Twilight and Spike right nearby with what looked to be a pony version of Pinkie.

Twilight was the first to greet Sunset, quickly followed by Pinkie and then Spike. Twilight was obviously nervous. This was the first time Twilight was meeting with Sunset Shimmer in person either. However, it was plainly obvious that Twilight had a different way of showing it. Some spectators might say that Twilight handled her stress worse, having her nervous emotions blatantly obvious. Pinkie could even tell that Twilight was more stressed than usual and so she tried to quickly butt into the conversation. Their other friends would have been there, but work was in the way. Spike wanted Twilight to relax, but on some level he could tell that he had little control over what would happen.

Twilight quickly said with a loud voice, almost like she rehearsed it. Perhaps she did or perhaps she just saw Sunset's hoof come through slightly."Hi Sunset Shimmer, how was your-?"

Pinkie jumped in, greeting herself and finishing Twilight's sentence. "Hi Sunset Shimmer, how was your trip?" Twilight looked a little frustrated. Pinkie was taking more of an initiative than her and it was a little annoying. Spike just jumped in afterwards saying quieter "Hi Sunset"

The simultaneous responses took Sunset very by surprise. She knew this trip would be full of energy, but she wasn't expecting a greeting that fast. Sunset spoke up, not taking the needed deep breath, "Good, I'm really happy to be here. I just don't know where to start." Sunset was hoping for a second afterwards to catch her thoughts, but sure enough, Pinkie quickly butted in.

"That's awesome!! No need to worry about your trip, I know tons of things to do, like going to Sugar Cube Corner and having you taste our delicious treats."

Twilight quickly followed behind, "Pinkie, could I show Sunset Shimmerto her room first?"

"Awwww.. but Twilight... We can do that at any time."

Normally, if this were the human Pinkie, Sunset would've chuckled, but she was concerned that such a thing would be in poor taste. So, she spoke up "I'm open to whatever you three feel like."

Twilight was annoyed by this answer, but guessed that Sunset was doing this out of gesture. So, Twilight, despite her insistence to butt in, let Pinkie take control of the conversation.

Pinkie was delighted to hear Sunset's response. She could tell that Sunset was nervous, but at least she was open enough to follow along. Still, Pinkie could see that Sunset wasn't particularly relaxed, which meant her age regression plan was a go. When Pinkie heard that Sunset was coming into town, she thought of all sorts of ways to cheer her up. And in a somewhat normal Pinkie fashion, she came up with an odd solution, this time being age regression. To Pinkie, it was the best way possible. She just had to use her special ingredients and cook up a delicious cupcake. Still, Pinkie knew Twilight would pester her, so she had to split Twilight and Spike from Sunset somehow. "Ah HA!" she thought. She knew how to split them up. She quickly spoke up.

"That's awesome! I can take you to the Sugar Cube Corner Then! In the meantime, Twilight and Spike can set up your belongings in the castle."

Sunset hesitated, but quickly said "Sounds fun," to not hurt Pinkie's feelings.

Twilight's facial expression showed she was clearly surprised, but she nonetheless said "Alright. That sounds good" and her and Spike were off with Sunset's saddle bag.

Sunset could tell that she said the wrong thing, judging by Twilight's facial expression. However, she had no way of fixing the situation. She mentally criticized herself, but at the same time, she tried to be easy on herself, since she had no idea how to act. She quickly said in a nervous fashion, "Cool, Well, I'll see you both soon." Sunset was quickly pulled by her right hoof immediately after saying that. Pinkie was ecstatic, running in a quick pace, subtly pressuring Sunset to do the same to keep up.

Surprisingly, Pinkie had everything under control. Her on the spot ideas guaranteed her success. Still, faith was on her side.

Pinkie rushed outside of Twilight's castle and Sunset just ran with her, hardly having time to pay attention to the scenery. The same thing happened outside, as Pinkie ran passed all sorts of ponies. Despite the high speed aspect of it, Pinkie still had time to say "hi" to every pony they passed. Sunset wished she could blend in, but just accepted her fate that she was running through town, avoiding tons of possible friends.

Before they knew it, they were at Sugar Cube Corner and the door was locked. Pinkie didn't know if the Cakes would be gone for their catering gig, but the door being locked, confirmed it. Fate most certainly was on Pinkie's side. With the door locked, the Cake Twins were probably napping. Pinkie smiled "Here we are! Sugar Cube Corner! The doors locked but I have a key, but be quiet, the Cake Twins are probably taking naps in their cribs as we speak."

Sunset Shimmer smiled. Pinkie was certainly like her Pinkie back home, yelling in excitement, but then saying to be quiet. The name, the cakes, was also familiar to her. The bakery back in the human world had two bakers of the same name and they had two twin babies as well. Sunset was beginning to feel a little comfortable with her surroundings, but she wanted to still stay on her hooves, in case something unexpected happened. She followed Pinkie inside, asking at a slightly quiet talking voice, "What are we going to do here with the babies napping?"

Sunset's question, made Pinkie chuckle, since it gave her the idea that Sunset would soon be a baby like them and possibly napping as well. Pinkie then said gleefully "I have this cupcake I want to make for you. It's just sooo good. You have to try it."

Sunset was a little taken back by Pinkie's chuckling. Did she say something off? Anyways she just said "Sounds nice. Thank you Pinkie" and watched as Pinkie used all manner of ingredients, some particular one's she was unfamiliar with. Normally, back in Equestria, she would've talked to Pinkie, while she cooked, but Sunset had been running around for so long that she preferred the silence to talking. As Pinkie was finishing up, she noticed Sunset was tired and said "You can sit at the table over there Sunset. You're cupcake shall be done soonerific."

Sunset sighed and said "Thank you. I sure could use some kind of rest about now." Pinkie said under her breath afterwards "don't worry, you'll get some..." Sunset Shimmer didn't hear a word. She was too exhausted to focus on subtle stimuli. The amount of surprises that awaited her on the other side made her feel like this break would be hectic.

Pinkie then put the cupcake in the oven and baked it for 5 minutes. This ingredient was special. It didn't need a lot of time, especially since Pinkie baked only one. She conveniently didn't have enough ingredients to make more than one cupcake. While Pinkie waited, she just watched the oven, and Sunset Shimmer just zoned out.

Time passed quickly and the oven dinged completion. Then Pinkie cheered, "Your cupcake is just about ready! Just need to put on some frosting." Pinkie covered it in orange frosting that matched Sunset's coat with star sprinkles. Pinkie came over with the cupcake and laid it on the table. "Here it is!"

Sunset Shimmer realized almost immediately that this was a planned cupcake. Seeing it so distinctly designed really made her feel like she was in the company of friends. She passionately said "Thank you Pinkie! This looks great."

"Awwww, shucks, it's nothing. It's what friends do after all." Sunset felt the warmth radiate off of Pinkie and gave a happy smile, before she ate the cupcake in one bite. It was too small not to eat it in one bite.

The taste was breath takingly delicious, but Sunset still had her eyes open after eating it. She then noticed something odd was happening. The world around her was getting.. bigger! Everything, the chair she was in, the table, Pinkie, the distance to the stairs. She tried containing herself. It mostly worked, but one could easily tell she was breathing heavy. She didn't know what was happening and she didn't want to immediately assume it was Pinkie's doing. Maybe she just was getting lightheaded. Her reasons didn't make much sense, seeing as she was panicking mentally.

As Sunset silently panicked, her body underwent extreme changes. In a mere two minutes, she would go from a 16 year old pony to a nine month old foal. As the transformation was 75% done, Sunset's panic increased, resulting in quiet tears fall from her face. After all, her world was getting increasingly bigger with no seeming explanation. It hurt Pinkie to watch, but in her mind she had to. Not until Sunset hit the age of nine months could Pinkie say something. If she interrupted, the transformation may have stopped completely.

With 3 months left to go, Sunset's cries started to sound louder, until she finally hit the ripe of age of 9 months. At that point, she was wailing. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!"

Pinkie knew once this happened, the transformation was complete. She quickly picked up Sunset and rocked her in her hooves after Sunset started wailing.

"There, there, Sunny Wunny, it's okay. I'm here."

Pinkie's calm words and soothing rocking broke Sunset's wails. Sunset immediately looked up at Pinkie to see what was going on.

Pinkie smiled "See? I told you it's okay. No need to fear."

Sunset was still curious what was going on, as she was only looking at Pinkie. Her voice was high pitched and she struggled to form words. Her dialogue sounded completely opposite to her response to Fluttershy an hour earlier. "Wha gooo-win on-" Sunset Shimmer quickly cut herself as soon as she realized something was off.

Pinkie answered her question. "I turned you into a baby."
155332222222222221222211111111.title: Back to Equestria, and Back to Foalhood

choices: Pinkie locks Sugar Cube Corner and Sunset starts to like being a foal.
Twilight enters and Sunset asks to be turned back
1553322222222222212222111111112.content:
Pinkie's words stunned Sunset. She thought to herself "what? what is going on?!" Sunset was filled with rage inside, but at the same time fear, and a desire to stay friends with Pinkie. All of her motives came crashing down and she didn't know how to control all the emotion. Like many babies at her age, her emotions consumed her and caused her to do the one thing many babies do, cry.

Sunset Shimmer wailed even louder this time "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!& #34;

This was bad. Sunset's wails would wake up the Twins. So, Pinkie made a quick decision. She plucked a pacifier into Sunset's mouth. Sunset's wails instantly stopped, because she couldn't control her mouth. She instinctively sucked on it against her own will. Though she wouldn't want to admit, there WAS something pleasing about the pacifier.

As she sucked on it Pinkie explained her plan. "Now listen Sunny Wunny, I did this for your own good. From the stories, I've been told, you seem all stressed wessed. You even acted it when you got here. So, I decided if you did act that way, I'd turn you into a foal. You need to remember that lighthearted fun again. That pure fun that you experience at a young age. Besides, don't worry.. You'll remain you, you'll just have a couple foal tendencies, like enjoying pacifiers, hehe"

Sunset didn't know what to do. In the long run that is. She was forced into a predicament that she couldn't resolve in the present. She'd just have to wait for Twilight or some other pony to come by and notice her. This foal-hood wouldn't last long. The best she could do at the moment was make the most out of her situation.

So, she tried showing Pinkie that she wanted the pacifier removed. Pinkie saw it as a great sign and gladly removed it. Sunset said "Kay... me wiw twy ta hab fun wike dis. Pwease, be gent-wle"

"Yay! That's the spirit Sunset! Now, I can feed you, play games with you, read you a bedtime story, or tuck you in bed. But fiiiirst, somebody needs a diaper change!"

Sunset mentally groaned after hearing "diaper change." She kept on a seemly happy face, though Pinkie could tell Sunset was faking.

"Hehe, don't worry, this will be super duper comfy!" Pinkie then laid Sunset Shimmer and pulled out a diaper along with some baby powder. She lifted Sunset's hind hooves into the air and applied a thorough coat of baby powder. Then she slid a fresh diaper underneath and strapped it in place. "Ta Da! Little Sunset is all set. hehe."

Sunset really really didn't want to admit, but the changing was actually comfy. Perhaps this is what Pinkie meant by "foal tendencies." Or... was it possible that Sunset Shimmer actually would've liked that change regardless of the foal tendencies.
1553322222222222212222111111112.title: Sunset becomes sad, and Pinkie has to cheer her up

choices: Makes an icky in her diaper
15533222222222222122221111111121.content:
Pinkie joyfully said "Okie Dokie Lokie, whatcha want to do now Sunset?"

Sunset really just wanted to be her normal self again, but she knew that was out of the option. She didn't know what to do. Luckily, her tummy answered for her. It growled loudly soon after Pinkie's question.

Pinkie giggled, and in a motherly tone said "D'aaaaawww, looks like baby waby is hungry wungry. Don't worry. We've got plenty of baby food around here. I actually went and picked some more earlier this morning in case you wound up as a foal. Hehe. come with me." Pinkie's end statement was sort of silly, seeing as Sunset Shimmer was in her hooves and couldn't really move anywhere on her own.

Before Sunset could respond, Pinkie plopped her into a high chair. "One second Sunset. I just need to do something." Pinkie quickly went out of sight. Sunset was scared. What else was this pony planning?

The mystery of where Pinkie went was quickly answered after Sunset heard the door lock. In her mind she panicked, "Noooo!! Now what am I gonna do?"

Pinkie was soon right back within view, towering over baby Sunset. She could tell that Sunset was worried. "Awww, don't worry Sunset. I know you want to spend time with other ponies. It won't last long. I just can't have any one disturbing you or the other babies. There's all sorts of stuff you need before you see them, such as lunch, the diaper change soon after lunch, and a bundle of joy. Right now, you're all saddy waddy. We need to turn that frown upside down!"

Sunset was beginning to think this was checkmate. Pinkie won. There was no way she'd see Twilight and the others any time soon. All she could do now is hold onto her adult-ness, to not be swayed by any of these baby activities, She was not going to stay a baby for this entire trip. A scary thought just reared over Sunset's head. "How long did Pinkie want to keep her like this?"

So, in a somewhat timid voice, Sunset bravely asked "Pii-pinkie?"

Pinkie jokingly responded back "Ye-yea?"

"Me was wondwin how wong ya wan ta keep me wike dis?"

Pinkie smiled "Only until I can tell you're not stressed. When that happens though, I'm open to still taking care of you. And don't worry, you won't have to stay in Equestria forever. Twilight might be willing to hand you over to your human friends can take care of you. I'm sure the other Pinkie will give you bundles of joy just like me!"

Sunset realized the inherent paradox of that statement, In order for Pinkie to let her change back, she needed to show she wasn't "stressed." In other words, she'd have to show she was enjoying herself. However, enjoying herself as a foal would make her more tempted to stay a foal. The only way out was pretending she was happy. But even that seemed like a stretch. Pinkie seemed to read her every emotions. It was bad enough that she could when Sunset was a mare, but as a foal, she instinctively let out her emotions more than she wanted. As Sunset thought about this, her emotions were already showing on the outside. While she didn't realize it, she was quietly crying. Currently, she was stressed and it like most of her emotions took a form in the outside world.

While Sunset was busy thinking up a storm, Pinkie came over and picked her up. "There there... Remember. It's okay. You're foalsitter Pinkie Pie is here." Pinkie then rocked Sunset slowly, causing her to get a bit drowsy. Sunset then shifted her focus back to the outside world to prevent herself from falling asleep. The last thing she wanted was a baby dream. There was a scary catch to this. Pinkie could use sleep as a weapon now, stopping Sunset's thought processes either by making her go to sleep or by making her focus on the outside world.

Sunset drowsily said, "Pwease.. stoo-"

Pinkie cut her off. "Right! Stock you up with a baby bottle. Don't worry, I'll just take a pre-filled bottle for you." That wasn't what Sunset wanted to say, but couldn't really do much. At least Pinkie stopped rocking her back and forth to get the baby bottle. She could finally focus on her internal world again. This was brief though, because in less than a minute, a bottle of formula was shoved into her mouth.

Like the pacifier, Sunset just instinctively started sucking on the bottle, against her own will. The milk was formula was surprisingly warm and it's taste was delicious.

Then, soon after Sunset started drinking her formula, there was a knock on the door. Then Pinkie and Sunset heard Twilight speak up, "Hey Pinkie, Sunset? Are you too home. Pinkie didn't move an inch, trying to be as quiet as possible. Sunset on the other hand, desperately wanted to speak up. In her mind, she kept telling herself "SPEAK UP!" Despite the self-talk, Sunset's body wouldn't stop sucking on the bottle. This is exactly what Pinkie would've wanted. She won again.

Twilight waited about a minute and then the two of them heard her say something to Spike "Come on Spike. Apparently, they're not here. Augh, Pinkie... where did you two go?"

Sunset yelled mentally "NO! TWILIGHT! PLEASE! COME BACK!" It was no use. She still had another half of the bottle to go through till she was finished. So, she just let it happen and tried to make the most of it. She wasn't thinking of the impact this would have. She just was tired of being stressed out and enjoying these foal activities was an escape from that. As Sunset continued to suck on the bottle, a little smile formed on the sides of her mouth. She truly was just letting formula pass through her and letting her enjoyment take over.

Pinkie saw this and smiled. This was exactly what she thought would happen. Sooner or later those scary wary stress-y wess-y thoughts had to make way for joy. Sooner or later Sunset's frown would, as it had, turn upside town. Pinkie gently rocked the new baby side by side, expressing her joy somewhat.

Pinkie's success just kept on coming and there still so much more foal activities for Sunset to try out.

After finishing the bottle and being burped, Sunset...
