155332222222222221222222111111111.content:
Weeks ago, one of Chassy's acquaintances happened to knock on Chassy's door while Chassy's parents were over. This acquaintance was a Pink unicorn with navy blue eyes and a white mane and tail. Her name was Youthenizer and her cutie mark displayed a red heart with two light pink hearts. (Chassy was a pegasus)

Despite Chassy asking Youthenizer leave, she stayed at the insistence of Chassy's parents. Chassy's parents were only in for a couple of days to talk about their vacation, but they tended to get off topic a lot. To be fair, it was mostly Chassy's mom. Chassy's Dad simply followed along most times.

Sure enough, that precise thing happened.

Shortly after Youthenizer joined the conversation, Chassy's mom asked her. "Sooo.. Youthenizer, what is your cutie mark supposed to represent?"

"Aww, well, it's supposed to represent my love of youth. Ya see, I just lose it with kids. They're so gosh darn adorable I just can't contain myself. Lucky me also gets to work as a caretaker for young ones big and small, from kids just entering school to wittle babies new to the world."

"That sounds like a tremendous career! Don't you agree Chassy?"

Chassy just sighed. "Yes mom.."

Chassy's mom then got a horrifying idea! "Hmm.. ya know, while we're on the subject of little ones, do you want to see our little Chassy's baby pictures?"

Chassy and Youthenizer practially responded at the same time, saying "WHAT?!!" Chassy meant this in a negative sense, while Youthenizer meant this in an ecstatically positive sense.

Chassy's mom just said "Yup" ignoring all of Chassy's pleas. They went up to Chassy's room and Chassy's Mom pulled out a box in Chassy's closet.

The box read "Chassy's Baby Photos."

For the rest of that evening the two "d'awwwed" over Chassy's pictures. Chassy and her dad soon went downstairs to get some piece and quiet. Chassy was still horrified at just the thought of Youthenizer seeing all of her most humiliating baby pictures.

Youthenizer wound up staying for her parents whole trip and little did Chassy know Youthenizer was allowed to keep some of her baby pictures.

About a month later Chassy would experience Youthenizer's humiliating plans for her.
155332222222222221222222111111111.title: Baby Picture Humiliation

choices: We fast forward to when everypony leaves
1553322222222222212222221111111111.content:
A month after the unpleasant parent visit, Chassy's birthday finally arrived. She had been waiting weeks for this. It was supposed to be her break from all the ridiculous annoying failures in her life. Even though she was still looking for her cutie mark, her birthday had always been the one day she could escape everybody's pity. Normally, she simply received warm support and she was anticipating that this year.

Sadly for her sake, she was going to be getting far more than warm support this year. In the weeks following Chassy's birthday, Youthenizer was talking with Chassy's other friends and acquaintances, convincing them that this year Chassy's birthday should be a "Surprise Re-First Birthday." In other words, this year, for a surprise, Chassy would be turned into a 1 year old with the same mentality of her current self. Youthenizer convinced everypony that this would for the best, by arguing "Chassy would have so much more time to explore her passions without facing ridicule." Not only was Chassy's friends persuaded. Chassy's mom was also persuaded, rather easily compared to Chassy's friends. Chassy's mom would allow Youthenizer to take care of her daughter, as long as Chassy was able to explore her passions and that Chassy's mom could come visit. By the time of Chassy's birthday, everyone but Chassy had agreed.

Chassy found something odd about this year. Her party was going to start at noon, which was abnormally early for such an event. Sure enough, her friends set up Chassy's home with the typical party decorations by that hour.

By 12:10, everypony had arrived and one of Chassy's close friends suggested "So, Chassy, we have a special surprise for you this year. But first you need to get in your birthday girl chair and close your eyes." Chassy gave a confused face but followed after everypony's nodding.

She quickly closed her eyes and soon heard from everypony "Are you ready? One, Two, Three" After three, Chassy was knocked out. Her friends magically put her to sleep on three. Then with the combined magic of everypony, Chassy was transformed into an adorable baby version of herself.

Her body became chubby, her wings turned to feathered stubs, her eyes to round dark red dots with a smaller white dot in each.

Her friends were swept with cuteness at Chassy's adorable new form. Some ponies even lost all focus on the cute sleeping baby.

In Chassy's slumber though, her new life was being situated. Her friends transformed her belongings into that of baby belongings. Youthenizer's belongings were moved from her roommate's home to Chassy's. The party decorations were switched out with ones fitting to Chassy's new age. Last and most importantly, Chassy was dressed up. Youthenizer changed Chassy into a comfy white diaper.

Then Chassy's friends got Chassy into an adorable high chair in about the same place. They each got into the same positions and gently yelled "surprise!," waking up little Chassy.

Chassy slowly opened her eyes, becoming increasingly more confused. Once her eyes were completely open, she silently scanned the room. She made the following mental notes: Everyone looks bigger, the room is decorated for a baby birthday, my flank feels funny... The reality quickly hit her. 'I'm a BABY!'

Chassy immediately started wailing "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!'

Everypony was quick to comfort her. Youthenizer rocked Chassy back in forth in her hooves and the rest of Chassy's many friends comforted her with kind words, such as "there, there" and "it'll be okay sweetie."

This strangely soothed Chassy and she quickly asked "Wha happen..." cutting herself off once she heard her voice.

Youthenizer explained "It's okay Chassy. We all just turned this into a surprise re-first birthday. You're one again! Isn't that great?!"

This only caused Chassy to tear up again. All of her friends tried to calm her again, glaring at Youthenizer.

What now?
1553322222222222212222221111111111.title: Chassy's Surprise Re-First Birthday

15533222222222222122222211111112.content: So Chassy wishes to "start over" and the powers that be take her literately. How does this warped wish occur?
15533222222222222122222211111112.title: Misunderstood Wish

choices: Wake up with her parents. Did they grow younger too? Do they notice the changes?
155332222222222221222222111111121.content:
Chassy sighed sadly and buried her face into the cloud. The beige Pegasus wiped her red eyes and flicked her tail. Another dud. She muttered sadly looking at her blank flank. Despite being a full grown mare Chassy had yet to find her Cutie Mark, a fact she took great pains to hide from the world. It went without saying that this was a source of extreme shame and confusion for her. Because of this she had tried numerous jobs and hobbies hopping one would “speak to her” and finally show her what her special talent was. However as the years passed and she came no closer to finding her talent her spirits started to sink despite the unwavering support of her parents.

She sighed again running through a list of jobs she could try tomorrow having recently quit her current one in the weather factory, again. Maybe it’s me. She muttered looking herself over. I’m colored more like a unicorn than a Pegasus. Maybe I was born wrong?
With a sad groan she looked up to the night sky. She suddenly gasped when she was a flash of light streak across the sky. A shooting star? She muttered remembering the old pony tail about wishing upon a star. She snorted. Wishing on a star like a little filly? Get real Chassy. But still. Can’t get any worse. She muttered looking up. She thought about all her past carriers and hobbies, how each one had turned out and what she knew now. If I could try it again, I bet I could find my talent. She muttered.

Ok then: “I wish I had a chance to start over and find my special talent but with the knowledge I have now.” Nothing happened. Of course it didn’t. She sighed opening her wings and flying back to her parents’ house and her room. Yes she still lived with her parents, though she paid her own bills, it was another source of shame to her. Maybe I am just a blank flank filly. She muttered. Chassy suddenly became very tired during the trip, struggling to stay aloft and simply collapsed into her bed sound asleep once she made it back.

The room lit up with a soft silver light as she slept and a glow started to surround her. This is Equestria, and every story has a grain of truth to them, like the legend of Nightmare Moon. While wishing on a normal star doesn’t do anything, wishing on a falling star is another matter. Some power had heard her wish and would grant it. Unfortunately Cassy had wished to “start over” and “find her special talent.” Chassy meant starting over from the beginning of her frantic job search, trying everything one more time so she can truly see what would work for her. She never said that though, and her wish to “start over” would be granted.

Chassy was levitated into the air and began to change. Her body became small and chubby, her wings tiny feathered stubs, and her eyes rounded becoming huge orbs compared to her now tiny head. A diaper appeared on her flank, and was soon covered by a princess themed sleeper. The room also changed with its occupant. The bed morphed into a crib with several stuffed animals, a little mirrored play set hanging on the side, and even a mobile. Her dresser shrunk the top morphing into a fully stocked changing table with the cloths changing into onesies and sleepers. Other changes happened to the décor and wallpaper finishing the change from a mares room to a foals. When the light faded a foal no more than a year old slept peacefully in her nursery, nursing a pacifier and cuddling her teddy in a deep dreamless sleep.

Well she got her wish. How does the family react the next morning?
155332222222222221222222111111121.title: Wish upon a star.

choices: Chassy, what happened? (Remembers her daughter used to be an adult)
Does Chassy need a change? (Thinks she is supposed to be a foal)
1553322222222222212222221111111211.content:
Chassy woke the next day feeling more rested than she ever had before. “I slept like a baby!” She thought smiling happily.

Everything just felt so right.

She was warm, wrapped in a fuzzy fluffy blanket, and laying on a soft mattress. Better than her old one anyway. Even the sun seemed brighter. As she woke up though she began to notice that something was wrong.

A rubbery item was in her mouth, that she couldn’t remove. Something was also hovering above her head and there was something wrapped around her waist. Something that felt like a, a.

Her eyes snapped open. A diaper! Chassy finally got a good look at her room and herself noticing that changes that had happened last night.

“This can’t be happening!” She thought holding her bear in a vice grip and almost inhaling her pacifier in her panic. “This is just some strange dream! Princess Luna, this isn’t funny! I want to wake up now!”

At that moment though the pegasus heard a hissing sound and began to feel her diaper warm up. She squealed in shock realizing what was happening.

“This isn’t a dream! I’m a baby again! But how, my wish! But I didn’t mean this!” She thought then she began to cry. Softly at first before escalating to a loud foal cry as she dropped her pacifier wailing like a upset foal.

“I didn’t mean this! I don’t want to be a baby!”

Not a moment later the door burst open and her mother was scooping her up. Chassey was stunned. She couldn’t remember her mother ever looking so, young. Looks like her parents were also regressed.

Shhh. Its ok sweetie. Don’t cry. Shhh. Her mother said bouncing her gently and patting her back. Despite everything Chassey finds herself calming down, more so when her mother gives her pacifier back. Nursing the rubber toy helped calm her down, much to her surprise.

There we go, nice and calm. The mother mare said patting her daughters back. After a moment the pegasus mare held her daughter at arm’s length and asked.

15533222222222222122222221111111.content:
It was a typical summer sunday in Ponyville, the sun was out with hardly a cloud in the sky. Twilight was shopping at "Rich's Barnyard Bargains," the biggest story for grocery needs. Spike would normally occupancy her, but he had scheduled for weeks that this would be his comic binge day, to catch back up. Starlight was out with her friend Trixie for the evening. Of course, both of them still had plenty of time to write something on the grocery list.

As Twilight was getting the last of the items, such as toiletries, a thought hit her as she saw Mrs. Cake shopping for groceries again. 'Am I basically Spike and Starlight's mom? Nah, I don't do every mom oriented thing. I mean I just go grocery shopping, set up dinner, advice them on when to go to bed, keep them scheduled most of the time, comfort them when they're feeling.. bad...' Twilight took a moment to do the breathing exercise Cadence taught her a while back. 'It's okay Twilight, you choose to do this stuff. I'm sure they wouldn't mind helping out if I asked.' Twilight paused. 'Wait that's exactly what my mom did.." Twilight sighed, feeling as if her friendship duties had for the longest time made her essentially a mom.

As she was down in the dumps, something hit the corner of her eye, she stopped, causing the groceries in her grocery saddle to clatter a little. She saw a sign talking about a new brand of bath soap. On the cover it read that it wasn't just soap, but a softener as well, making a ponies coat quote "as soft as a foals." The only negative was that on the back it said in tiny print that "Do not heat water with any of the following spells when using it' and provided a list of perhaps six spells. It was hard to make out, but Twilight wanted to try something new. This could make her feel less old (even though her problem had more to do with her responsibilities, not her coat.)

Wit that item, there was nothing more she needed and she proceeded to check out. The lines were surprisingly empty for a sunday afternoon. Perhaps, ponies were just out and about. The weather was great after all.

The pony proceeded through her items with a fast pace, putting everything in shopping bags with a levitation spell. The total was roughly fifty bits, a little bit more than normal. The new bath soap costed a little bit more than normal. Twilight thanked the individual colt and proceeded home, which was not far away.

She walked through rather crowded streets, staying focused on her castle just a ways a way. Within roughly 8 minutes she got the big shiny door, opening and closing it. "Spike! Starlight I'm home!"

No one called back. "Oh dear, Starlight's not back yet? I hope she can make it for dinner."

Twilight efficiently started putting things away. Roughly 30 minutes later, everything was set and she went to the kitchen to set up some hay burgers. She knew how her friends/children liked them.

When she was done with that, she set up the table. The time was roughly 7:00 at this point. "Gee, should I call Spike down? I thought Starlight would be here by now."

"SPIKE! DINNER IS READY!"

Spike was a little annoyed "I'LL BE DOWN LATER! I'M AT A GREAT PART RIGHT NOW!"

Twilight motherly rolled her eyes. "K! PLEASE COME DOWN AT SOME POINT THOUGH!"

Spike didn't hear her and so Twilight just figured he'd do so anyway. She then went to the living room and picked up one of the books she got that day on the history of YakYakistan. She wanted to read up on Equestria's new allies as a gesture of kindness.

Several hours went by where she was immersed in the books pages, only to be taken out of it by the sound of the front door opening and closing. "I'm home!" Starlight yelled "Anypony still awake?"

Twilight quickly folded her current page and rushed to the door, calling "Yes! One sec!" In seconds Twilight was up at the front with eager questions "So, how was your evening? Wanna talk it over with dinner?"

Starlight looked at Twilight confused "Dinner? Um, Twilight it's 10:05, I had dinner out tonight."

"Ah, sorry about that. I was a little immersed in my book." Twilight blushed. "Well, I'll go ahead put the hay burgers away and then we can talk, how's that sound?"

Starlight smiled with exhaustion. "Thanks Twilight, but can we hold off until tomorrow. I'm pretty tired. I was thinking about just taking a nice bath or something."

Twilight looked a little saddened, but tried to keep her cool. "Oh, well, that sounds okay. I bought some new soap by the way, it's also coat softener. Try it out and tell me what you think."

Starlight perked up "Oo, good thinking, Twilight. I could use something like that."

Twilight smiled "Glad you liked it. I know you're more into spa treatments than I am though, so don't use all of it. I'll probably stay up a bit longer. Reading this great book."

Starlight smirked "What's this one on?"

"YakYakistan history!"

Starlight chuckled "Of course, well we can talk about that tomorrow too. Night!"

"Night!"

As Starlight went to the bathroom, Twilight checked in on Spike to find the little dragon fast asleep with comics spread out on his bed. Twilight smiled. "I keep telling him not to read comics on his bed. Oh well..."

Starlight did the usual, laying out a towel for later and turning on the water on hot. She went to the bathroom as it was getting ready. "Ahh, tonight was a good night.."

Went she was finished, the bath water was up to a moderate level, but it was annoyingly cold. "Augh, not this again.." Twilight then charged up her horn and used a heat spell on the water. She then saw the bath soap Twilight was mentioning on the side in it's bright pink bottle and squirted a little bit into the water.

The water quickly acquired a pinkish hue and Starlight calmly sank in. "Ooo.. this is nice. Twilight has good taste..."

As Starlight sank into a calm laying position, with her head resting on a warm towel to the right end. Thoughts passed through her head at slow pace, as the subtle age regression started taking effect.

Starlight didn't notice, but her height was gradually slipping away along with any sign of age on her face. Her thoughts drifted back and forth between her couple friends, wondering what would come in the future. As these thoughts passed through her head 5 minutes in, she was recognizably a filly, same as the CMC. Her head and the towel slid further down, causing the water to completely cover her chin. At around this time new thoughts passed through of anxiety and whether she'd be able to find any new friends. Sweat and visible signs of fear were apparent on her face. After another two and half minutes of these thoughts, she was considerably smaller than the CMC, roughly a toddler. Head and towel drifted even further into the water, sinking down until her nose was just above the water. In the pinkish water one could see a closed smile on her face. Her thoughts had changed a second time, now focusing on how fun, nice, and great all of her friends. Within thirty seconds, her nose sunk into the water, causing her to squirm from lack of breath. She then opened her eyes and gasped at the top. She was just barely able to touch the bottom of the tub on her hind legs. Her thoughts then brought on an enormous well of anxiety as to whether her friends really liked her. For some reason, she couldn't stop thinking about her friends. As she lost more and more height, she couldn't touch the bottom anymore and started struggling to not drown. "Ahhhh! halp *pant* Somepone halp me! *pant*" Her voice was high pitched and was riddled with a baby accent. Twilight could faintly hear something and got up from her chair to check, walking at a moderate pace down the hall.

As Starlight struggled to get composure, she regressed down to a one year old foal and her thoughts drifted to an anxiety that she had no friends. From struggling to drown and those depressing thoughts, she yelled at the top of her lungs "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!"

Twilight was just seeing the bathroom door down the hall as she heard wails from an infant. She didn't know what it was, but for some reason panic set in. She ran as fast as she could to the door, opening it briskly to see her student in pink water.

"STARLIGHT!" Twilight quickly levitated her out of the water to find that her student was nothing more than a 1 year old. "STARLIGHT!?"

Twilight's yell woke up Starlight from her drowned induced coma. She faintly opened her eyes to see an enormous Twilight. She nervously looked down at her body only to see a chubby body of a foal. Tears quickly came out of her eye sockets and she started wailing at the top of her lungs. Fortunately for Spike, his bathroom was far down the hall and couldn't hear it.

Twilight quickly levitated a towel and dried her baby student/child, shushing her calmly "Shh shhh.. it's okay Starlight. I'm here." Starlight briefly got a grip only to start wailing yet again.

Seconds later, she was dry, Twilight wrapped her in the towel and started cradling her. "It's okay Starlight. I'm here." Starlight got a grip again and prevented from wailing again, but she still had tears in her eyes and was noticably frightened.

In a high pitched scared baby voice, she asked "Wha-wha ha-pen ta me?"

Twilight took a deep breath. "I don't know why, but you turned into a baby." This illicited more tears. "It's okay, it's okay Starlight. Remember, I'm here. I won't let anything bad happen to you."

That calmed her down.

Twilight cradled her some more. "There, there.." and then something caught the corner of her eye, it was the new soap. Instantly, a flashback hit her about the warning.

"I-I think I know what happened."
15533222222222222122222221111111.title: A Normal Day Turns Into An Abnormal Night

choices: Starlight has an accident free sleep
Starlight has an accident in her sleep
155332222222222221222222211111111.content:
"Did you heat the water with a spell?" Twilight asked calmly

Starlight nervously tried to recall the immediate last 7 minutes. "Uh.. uh... me no kno.. maybe, why?"

Twilight took a deep breath. "Because it had a warning on the bottle about doing that."

Starlight covered her face "Wha? Bu bu, how wha me sa-pose ta kno dat... sniff. This no fa-wa!"

"It's okay Starlight. I'm sure we can fix this tomorrow morning." Twilight tried to calm her while still being truthful.

"Bu bu, me no wanna way-ta. Ef me no chan bak den den.. wha wha ef me neba chan bak! Wha ef me stay wike dis fa-eba?!'

Twilight tried cradling her some more. "It's okay Starlight. I understand your concern, but we'll fix this first thing in the morning."

Starlight murmured "Me gess me betta ge use ta dis..."

Twilight pondered for a second. "Well, in the mean time, I should probably keep you someone safe from an accident."

"Me gess..." And a couple tears came out.

Twilight seemed concerned. "It's okay Starlight. You won't be staying like this forever."

Truth be told, Twilight didn't know how to calm her feelings. The only tool she could think to use was soothing words.

She then went to a linen closet, bullet out a soft white silk cloth and then a bobby pin. Following afterward, she laid the little on the bathroom mat and methodically folded the cloth straps over, tightening them with the bobby pin.

Twilight giggled at how adorable Starlight was and, perhaps without putting too much thought into it, showed Starlight to the bathroom mirror. "What do you think Starlight?"

Starlight stared with silent curiosity at her image. Her mane was still styled the same, her eyes were beady with a purplish color. The makeshift diaper actually looked pretty cute. A faint smile formed on the edge of her lips. "Tanks Twi-wite.."

Twilight motherly smiled and tried to stay more considerate "Would you like to sleep with me tonight though?"

Starlight gave a befuddled facial expression followed by small acceptance. "Me gess dat fa da bess."

"Don't worry Starlight, we'll resolve this."
155332222222222221222222211111111.title: Fear of Forever and Hopeless Acceptance

choices: In the morning, Spike makes a big deal about it
In the morning, Spike doesn't make a big deal about it.
1553322222222222212222222111111112.content:
Starlight sighed again. "Me gess..."

Twilight thought to herself 'Eessh, she's really down in the dumps.. maybe I could... try this. She is a baby after all.' After that weak response, Twilight started cradling her "Don't worry! Mommy is here?"

Starlight raised her eye brow in sad nervous confusion, "Mommy?"

Twilight nervously sweated, trying to keep a smile "Yes? What is it sweetie?"

Tears suddenly welled up in Starlight's eyes and she motioned to hug Twilight. So, Twilight levitated her into a hugging position. "Tanks mommy Twi-wite... m-me so scared..."

As Twilight walked to her room, she tried to remain considerate. "Scared of what sweetie?"

Starlight looked up at Twilight and wiped away her tears. "Me scared dat me neba gonna make any fwends."

Twilight became incredibly confused. "What's the matter? You have Trixie and all of my friends."

Starlight's worst fears were being aired out to dry. "Bu-bu, wha ef day no weawwy wike me?! Wha ef day jus wy-in?!"

Twilight was stunned. She had no idea that Starlight had that thought. "Starlight."

"Huh? Yes mo-mommy?'

"Please do not make mommy cry."

"Wha?"

"We all love you sweetie! Please don't speak like that again, okay? You are a star!" Twilight then levitated Starlight's tummy to her face and she gave a raspberry as they were walking.

Starlight giggled in response. "Okay haha mommy." A couple seconds later, Starlight said more seriously "Tank you mommy."

"You're welcome Starlight."

Twilight then kissed her on the forehead and brought the two of them into her bed. "Night Starlight."

The two were tucked into Twilight's comfy purple covers, with Starlight resting in Twilight's arms.

"Nite mommy.."

Starlight had one of the best anxiety free nights that night, more so than the less appealing dreams or nightmares. As a result, she got by without a single accident.
1553322222222222212222222111111112.title: Starlight Starts To Enjoy Babyhood

choices: She asks Spike or her friends
She decides to watch Starlight herself
15533222222222222122222221111111122.content:
The morning saw Twilight waking up first. The alicorn smiled down at the sleeping Starlight who was sucking on her hoof as she slept. Twilight resisted the urge to squeal at the cute scene. Come on Starlight time to wake up. Twilight said gently shaking her friend. Starlight woke with an adorable yawn and smiled up at Twilight, before realizing her hoof was in her mouth and quickly removing it blushing madly.

Twilight giggled. Good morning little Star. The alicorn cooed nuzzling Starlight. Mouwing mommy. Starlight said happily. Twilight resisted the urge to sigh in relief. Apparently Starlight had recovered from her breakdown last night. Then Twilight remembered her experience’s babysitting the Cake Twins and her own niece and frowned. Starlight. Are you….wet?

The unicorns’ eyes widened but after a moment she sighed and shook her head. No mommy. Me no wet. Twilight sighed as well. Do you need to go potty? Starlight again shook her head no. Twilight frowned wondering if she should press the issue or not. It was decided for her when Spike yelled. Come on Twilight breakfast is ready!

Ok Starlight here’s the plan. Twilight said getting out of bed and levitating Starlight onto her back. We are going to have a nice breakfast and then mommy is going to look for a cure. Starlight frowned. Can’t we wook now? Twilight shook her head. A good breakfast well help us all. I Pinkie Promises I will clear my schedule and look into making you a big pony again as soon as we have eaten. Ok? Twilight made the motions sealing her fate. Me guess. Starlight said morosely. She wanted to be big soon. Besides, you can handle being mommies cute foal for another few hours right? Twilight asked bringing Starlight around to tickle her.

Ha hahaha! Mommy stup! Twilight smiled but found herself worried. She had noticed how easily she had slipped into the role of “mother.” A part of her was starting to like it. Starlight was also enjoying the attention and found it so easy to call the alicorn “mommy” and a traterous part of her mind was asking if she really wanted to grow up.

The twos antics were brought to a halt when they saw Spike. The drake had a wide eyes look. Twilight? Why does that foal look like Starlight? The alicorn didn’t answer right away. Instead she magiced up a high chair for Starlight, strapped the foal in, tided a bib around her neck and placed a pancake in front of her. Now can you feed yourself? Starlight rolled her eyes. Tes mommy. She said slightly annoyed. She wasn’t that helpless. Ok little star. You eat and I’m going to talk with Spike. Starlight nodded and then remembered that foals didn’t have good control of their magic.

Twilight gave a brief rundown of what happened, the soap regressing Starlight and acting like her mother to keep her calm. So after breakfast I’m going to examine the soap and find out why it regressed her. Twilight finished. Spike was still for a few moments before shrugging. Ok. Twilight blinked. Ok? She parroted. Yeah! Ok. Spike said filling up his plate with gem pancakes. Your, taking this well Spike. Twilight commented earning a shrug. I mean this isn’t world ending, and you know what happened. Starlight is calm and with your super awesome alicorn magic I bet you can have her back to normal by tonight. So why worry. Twilight blushed at the praise but hugged the drake. Thanks Spike. No problem Twilight. The moment was interrupted by a crash and the pair turned to find a sheepishly grinning Starlight covered in pancake bits and syrup with her plate on the floor. Apparently Starlight had given up on her magic and had tried to use her hooves. Twilight sighed. Ok. New plan. Breakfast, then a bath, and then research.

A thought suddenly struck Twilight. If she was researching then she wouldn’t be watching Starlight? Twilight was not going to leave the regressed unicorn alone in case she had another breakdown. She supposed she could ask Spike, but the drake had little experience foalsitting. He was responsible though and could play “big brother” for a day. Also Starlight would be comfortable near him. She could also ask one of her friends. At the very least Pinkie would be bouncing off the walls at the thought of another playmate for the twins. But how would Starlight react? She was worried about how all her friends would react if they found out she was a foal and she might not have gotten over that fear. However a part of Twilight balked at the very idea of being separated from her “little star” for any length of time. She could watch Starlight but then she wouldn’t be able to devote herself entirely to finding a cure meaning Starlight could be stuck like this for a while. A part of Twilight wondered if that would be a bad thing.

Twilight bit her lip wondering what to do.
15533222222222222122222221111111122.title: In the morning, Spike doesn't make a big de...

choices: Yes. In fact, Starlight wants 'mommy' to be in the tub with her.
No. She seems happy, but she doesn't have a moment of weakness.
155332222222222221222222211111111222.content:
Starlight broke Twilight concentration, shouting "Dun!" in an adorable high pitched voice.

Twilight snapped out of her mental trans with an idea on how to make her decision. She quickly levitated Starlight so that she was hoovering near her and asked. "Good girl! Now, Starlight, what do you think about having Spike give you a bath?"

Spike immediately objected "WHAT?! I DIDN'-" Twilight cut him off with her hoof to his mouth, whispering in his ear "You'll get every day off for the next week if you agree to this."

Suddenly, Spike smirked and whispered back "allow me seven days to move around as I please and we have a deal." Twilight sighed and nodded. This was all hypothetical though and Starlight might not have agreed.

Starlight's response was one of quiet gradual concern, with her facial expression showing slight concern that only mounted as she saw Twilight and Spike whispering about her. About a minute after Twilight's response, Starlight was closing her eyes tight with gradual tears flowing out. "No mommy! Pwease! No!!"

Twilight was again surprised by Starlight's rather massive emotional expression. Against her better judgement, Twilight then cradled Starlight in hooves to sooth her, ignoring the syrup over her. "There, there, Star, I won't make you do anything you don't want to."

Spike gave Twilight a grin and Twilight gave an even meaner grin back, causing Spike to drop it. Starlight peaked behind her hooves, still in a fearful pose "We-weawy?"

"Yes really Starlight. I'm for all intensive purposes your mommy. I don't want you to be sad. I love you."

Starlight then wiped away her own tears with a couple sniffles. "Ta-tanks mommy. Me wub you too."

Twilight then poked the little one's nose. "How about we get you cleaned up then my wittle bundle of love?'

Starlight smiled back. "Gud id-ea mommy!" Starlight still wanted to be a mare, but it didn't seem that way from the outside. In fact, her behavior maybe suggested that she wanted to stay this way.

Will this be reflected more during bath time?
155332222222222221222222211111111222.title: She decides to watch Starlight herself

15533222222222222122222222.content: Maybe something is going to happen to ALL of the Mane Six, at once?

1553322222222222222.title: Other transformations now!

info.brief_description: Our favorite ponies from MLP:FiM go through some rather unusual changes.
info.description:
Ok, this one is for the bronies out there or anyone else into the new My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic show. I noticed others have done stuff like voring & weight gain, but nothing related to transformation. I mean, come on, imagine how much we could do with this one.

Basically saying, this involves any of the MLP:FiM cast playing around with or getting exposed to transformation magic. It can expand to more elaborate storylines if you want, but transformation is the main priority with this.

Transformations:
Age (AR/AP)
TG
Animal TF
Size (Shrink/ Grow)
Appearance
Inanimate
Expansion

A lot of other transformations can be used, but there are a few rules.

No killing off characters. (This is NOT gonna be another "Cupcakes".)
No sex or vore (Mild shipping is okay, but don't let that be the focus)
Put effort in describing what's going on, unless you're giving more options. I want for you to be able to describe events like an actual story!
Keep to the rating, people! It has to be E or 13+. Nothing above that! I expect most of the content to be E, but you can go to 13+ levels if you so desire.
I hope you don't mind, but I'll be editing some chapters. Nothing major, mainly formatting, spelling and grammar and that stuff to make it a little easier to read. Oh, and if anything is major, it's because something that is written just feels incorrect and doesn't make much sense to me. Remember, READABILITY IS KEY.

Other than that, anything goes!

EDIT: My gosh, this has become bigger than I expected it would. However, to all those adding to this story, I have one thing to say: USE PROPER GRAMMAR, SPELLING, AND PUNCTUATION! Seriously, I expect these to be readable, and I don't want to have to edit through ALL of these chapters. I can't stress that enough, people.
info.pretty_title: My Little Pony: Transformation Is Magic
